review_body: The hotel is near from a subway station and is convenient. Staffs are very warm and kind. They can speak English and Japanese fluently. I spent good time during a stay. I want to stay again on the next time. Thank you so much.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Even though our corner room is next to the elevator, it was quiet and comfortable. Truly enjoyed my stay here. Staff are friendly and willing to help, though may not be smiling often. Myeongdong shopping street is just opposite - extremely convenient for food and shopping.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a no frills basic hotel which served our purpose very well as we were just there for an overnight transit stay and wanted the convenience of location and access. It was clean and value for money. The staff and service was excellent !It is also very conveniently located. Right across the street from Myeongdong where there are lots of eateries and shops where you can get your fix of Korean beauty products from Nature Republic, Etude House etc as well as many Korean snacks like seaweed etc. There are also a lot of eateries and we had Korean bbq and Korean abalone porridge. There is also a Paris Baguette near the hotel which services good sandwiches, pastries and cakes.Access to the hotel is so convenient. If you do not have a lot of luggage, take the train from the airport to Seoul station and change the train to Myeongdong station and use exit 2 ( stairs) or 3 (escalator) and it is just a 1 min walk from there. If you have heavy luggage, i would suggest the airport hotel shuttle bus 6015 or 6001 which stops just across a street from the hotel and you just need to cross the street and there is a traffic light. There is someone to help to load the luggage onto the bus.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: MRT station is just few steps from the front door. Airport transfer bus is in front the hotel. Shopping and dining area is just across the street. Room is very comfortable and spacious. Very recommended
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Prince Hotel is in the heart of Myeongdong in fact literally in front (across the street) of the famed Myeongdong Shopping Area. It is also the most convenient hotel to stay in since its location is 5 steps away (literally) from Exit 2 of Myeongdong Subway Station where most tours pick up point is. We enjoyed our 5-day stay in Prince Hotel. We would also like to commend their very approachable, helpful and knowledgeable staff receptionists. The rooms were neat and comfortable also. Their toilet bowl was fancy.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room of the hotel was nicely furnished and we had plenty of space for 3 people. It looks exactly like the pictures found on its website and travel sites (e.g. Agoda). Staff were friendly and helpful. However, do note that toothbrush and toothpaste were not provided in their rooms. The only complain about their room is their air-con system - it automatically shuts off and on. When we clarify, we learnt that their air-con system has a function of detecting the temperature in the room. If the temperature of the room is higher than what is on the remote, the air-con will turn on. Likewise, it'll turn off when it gets cold. This makes it hard to adjust to the room temperature. The hotel is located conveniently right outside Exit 2 of Myeongdong station - and is directly opposite the Myeongdong Shopping Street. It is also opposite the Airport Bus Limousine pick up point which was convenient for us when we head to the airport on the last day with many luggage. Personal Suggestion: Exit 2 does not have any lift from the train platform to street level. Hence, if you are carrying a lot of luggage, I would recommend taking the airport bus as there are quite a few flight of stairs at Myeongdong station. However, airport bus is more expensive than AREX (the bus cost KRW14,000 for one way to Incheon Airport).
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Conveniently located next to Myeong-dong station, a 8-floors Daiso, opposite the Airport bus pick up point and the famous shopping district. The only thing I do not like is how the air-con is configured- it shuts down for 5 minutes after every 30 or 60 minutes. I woke up kicking away the blanket and sweating because of this.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Went for 3 nights trip here. A good decent hotel, expect a minimum facility, we had no problem with the room since only use them for rest & shower. Best thing are location and the staff. Myeongdong is just across the road, subway entrance also very nearby all within 5mins walk. No need to worry about food and finding basic essentials, there is a seven storey Daiso shop beside the hotel.Receptionists are very friendly and accommodating, always greet us everytime we passed the entrance. Concierge also very happy to help with luggage. We can store our luggage before check-in or after checkout at concierge. Two elevators operating, took no time for us to wait since the property considered low rise and had small number of rooms per floor.Room is clean, about 20sqm, equipped with TV, fridge, hairdryer, all amenities in bathroom, bottled water, kettles and round table with chairs. Only problem came when room got very warm and we tried to turn on the AC, it blows heat fan instead of cool fan, very annoying and after we asked from operator, turns out they control all the AC from central. There were some lights not functioning as well when we arrived so we asked the cleaning lady. In shower room, also got a problem with drainage but they quickly restore it. Shower room was a bit awkward since we had to shower inside a bathtub with a glass door, bathtub size similar to those in Japan hotel. Had to mention the cleaning lady did very good job to clean our room.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The pillows provided could be more comfortable.The location wise is very good, near train stations and shopping areas.Hotel is near namsan seoul tower, about 10mins walk, the hotel is also near restaurants.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is just 2 stops from Seoul Station (on line 4). It is in a popular shopping area. The room was clean and comfortable and the front desk help was good and spoke English. Lots of good restaurants nearby.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my first trip to Seoul and totally enjoyed my stay in this hotel. The hotel is situated in Myeongdong with an excellent location. It is not noisy at all compare to others in Myeongdong! Staff is very helpful and friendly. Helped us with luggages and also with postal services information. They never fail to greet you whenever you are back!Room is very clean and provides basic amenities like hair dryer, conditioning shampoo, shower gel, and lotion. Just a note that you might need to bring your own toothbrush.Keep up the good work, Prince Hotel! Fighting
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location to Myeongdong shopping and train station. Just outside the Hotel Entrance. Most tours meet up point are also here, so that's an added advantage. Airport transfer bus is just across the street. Arrives every 15min inteval. Cost 15,000 won per pax. Front staff were very pleasant and super helpful with any queries. Had no problem communicating in English. Allowed us late check out. Luggage storage is available. The hotel was bright, clean, and welcoming. The room was great. It had great amenities and it was modern. Added : A 7 Floor Daiso next door. In short, Location Location Location!
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very convenient location, just next to Myeong-dong station. Clean, comfortable. Room facilities good, shower hot. Not too noisy because it is situated at Nan Shan region, opposite to the noisiest area. Actually it's the second time I stayed there.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location at reasonable price, airport bus stop is just across the hotel. Room is clean, tidy and spacious enough. Staff are friendly and helpful. It is so suprised to receive a confirmation phone call before check-in, feeling respected.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There are a lot of hotels near Myeongdong but I think this is one of the best! We stayed for 10 days, and had 2 separate rooms. We arrived early in the morning, and the staff let us checked in early in one of our room while they still preparing the other room.Our room is in the corner facing Myeongdong. It was spacious! One of our room has king bed, and the other one has 3 single beds. Even the restroom is spacious! The only thing I didnt like is they limit water delivery in the room. Yes, i believe most hotels in South Korea has this crazy policy but some hotel has drinking fountain on the hallway atleast.Anyway, the hotel is nearby Myeongdong shopping district, bus station, subway station, convinience store, fast food, restaurant, Namdaenum market, N Tower, etc and a plus is its in a quiet corner of the street.Overall, it was a great experience with Prince Hotel Seoul. Will be coming back for sure.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After debating between Prince Hotel and Nine Tree hotel we are extremely happy to have settled on the Prince Hotel. The price was great and room was spacious. If you are looking at the picture on reviews and websites there is a flight of stairs but dont worry there is a side entrance up a slight incline for convenience. No need to lug stuff up the stairs! The hotel is across the street from the 6015 airport bus Myeongdong stop. Right downstairs is the Myeongdong metro stop. And a bus stop that many buses come through are also right down the street. (One night we took the metro to Dongdaemun and then the night bus back. The night bus dropped us right off across the street!) There is an 8 floors high Daiso a few doors down and also a 24 hours convenient store. McDonalds is about 2 minutes walk away, Tous Le Jours and Paris Baguette is also nearby! When you look at the map you will see it is across from the main thoroughfare of Myeongdong main street but this is actually one of the pros. You do not hear any of the street noise or no need to walk through crowds of people just to get to the metro stop (this is especially important if you need to get to and from the airport bus; you don't' want to drag luggage through those crowds). I've stayed at other locations directly inside Myeongdong where I had to plow my way through the crowd to get to the metro or bus stop. And where the noise from the crowd and street vendors was actually bothersome. We stayed at a Twin Room C. It had 2 twin beds, a small table with 2 chairs (so helpful when you buy street food from across the street and want to enjoy in front of the TV), refrigerator, bathtub, big screen tv, 2 free bottled waters daily, great closet space with plenty of hangers. Bathroom has essentials but need to bring your own toothbrush! No slippers either. Staff was average. They weren't all warm and bubbly but they got the job done. They always said hello when we returned. When we checked out they were very willing to keep our luggage no fuss no hassle. Just be careful when you wheel it down the small hill as it can gather momentum fast and you are on a main road! Overall I am very glad we booked this hotel and if the price is right we will definitely stay here again!
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were only in Seoul for one night after coming from the Olympic Games in Pyeongchang and we wanted to experience the city. The Prince Hotel Seoul is right in the heart of the city, very close to subways, taxis, the main shopping centers, restaurants and a 5-minute cab ride from Seoul Tower. The hotel itself is clean, rather stylish, affordable and the staff is terrific.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very convenient and closer Myeongdond subway. All stuff was so kind and very good service :) this time is 7 times of my trip but I never change my mind to choose another hotel. I love here so much and next trip I’ll come back here again !
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location literally steps from Myeongdong subway station and across the street from the street food street, and around the corner from the three massive Lotte stores. The room was nice and the room also had Korean and American power plug in outlets
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel location is located at strategic place with subway outside the hotel.Is also convinient if you going to airport as the airport limousine service is just opposite..Hotel room is relatively clean.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location and good value for a few night stopover. Very convenient for walking to markets and shops during the day and night. Remember when looking for restaurants that most are not at street level so remember to look up or go underground
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Convenient place to move around. The hotel is clean and the staff are very polite. Will stay again when we visit Seoul another time. The bus to the airport is directly opposite the hotel at 15000 Korean won.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location of the hotel is great. The room is clean and ok, nothing fancy. The breakfast was minimal but sufficient. But the front line service could be better. They dont seem knowledgeable, very much dependent on the internet to get you answers (which we have done also but we thought the locals would have a better idea, apparently not). Gave us direction according to the internet, but could not explain why one option is better than other. Another occasion, gave us the wrong station to drop off and we had to figure out the way from that station (it was within the vicinity but not the nearest) and we had to walk for more than 1 km. The last straw was, my hubs dropped (or stolen he wasnt sure) his set of cards (T-money cards, the room card and some small change). we told the front desk. Instead of being sympathetic, we were charged KRW10,000 for the lost card. This was the first time we were charged for a missing room card. Left a sour taste in our mouth.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: With my girl friend, stay here for 10 days in September. having a break while we go jeju.Pros:1) So near to seoul myeongdong when its just a traffic light away, quiet and yet to the busy shopping street2) the bus stop for the klook pick up is just below the hotel so convenient 3) We got a corner room and it was so comfy and great street view. 4) The front desk staff were amazing, during one panic night. when my trolley lock malfunction, the staff came up to room and help. And bring down to the mechanic. And its solved. Was so relieved!!5) Its super near to the giant daiso and a convenient mart which has great friendly staff6) Also near to a porridge shop which is down the street opposite the daiso directionCons:1) Have to crack my head at this, maybe the ramp that leads to the hotel is kinda steep to pull the trolley. And this is a extremely small con point
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Describe the service you experienced - Friendly StaffsTell us how you liked the room - Small But CleanTalk about the location & amenities - Great Location, easy access to public transport, stores & eateries.Say what you liked best & least - I love the location. The room is pretty small but I guess the location can compensate.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is very easy to find. Just 5mins walking from the airport bus stop. Also walking distance to Myeongdong shopping area. Staffs are very friendly and ready to help. The toilet is equipped with a warm device so it’s quite comfortable sitting on it.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very convenient location(one-minute walk to Myeong Dong Station, Myeong Dong main street is just across the road), very friendly and helpful stuff, we had a wonderful experience staying at Hotel Prince!
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. One minutes away from subway station, airport bus stops and right across the hotel is the Myeong Dong shopping district. Two train stops away from Dongdaemun station and one stop away from Seoul Station. My rooms came with a bottle of welcome wine each.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall Very good. Room was clean and Housekeeping was prompt. Hotel staff was courteous and helpful. Good location, near the subway and bus stops. Only downside is that internet connectivity needs improvement.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this hotel because it could accommodate our family (2 adults and a teenage son) into one room rather comfortably. The location is PERFECT for us. The MyeongDong Metro station exit is only about 30 metres from the door. There is also a large DAISO budget store less than 50 metres away. Eateries and shops are all around and the street market is just across the road. If you are signing up for one of the day tours, many of them will have their pick up point just outside the hotel. The Seoul Tower cable car station is also only a 15 minute walk away.Getting there was easy as the Airport Shuttle Bus dropped us off just across the street. We arrived early (around 11 am) and were pleasantly surprised that our room was ready. It was a corner L shaped room which gave us enough space to put 3 single beds. The room was clean and the staff were courteous and helpful. In terms of decor, it's a bit dated but definitely still presentable. We would recommend it for families visiting Seoul for the first time.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is excellent. Within 1-2 minutes walking distance to myeongdong station, shopping street, day tour meeting point, airport limousine bus no 6001, 6015 and 6021 drop off points.Room price resaonable.Very good service from front desk.Room wifi good
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Convenient location with the airport shuttle bus stop just opposite the road. The MRT station was just less than 2 mins walk from the hotel with many good eating places and cafes nearby. The room was spacious except that the furniture was a bit old but in good working condition. Room was clean and tidy with good, comfortable temperature that worked well under control to suit your needs.
hotelName:
2    Prince Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at L7 Myeongdong for 3 nights in June/July. Location was ideal for Seoul. Right near the Myeongdong metro exit (2 stops from Seoul station with connection to Incheon). Also, airport bus stop is only 1 block away. Nearby Myeongdong night market is around the corner from the hotel and multiple excellent restaurant choices are within easy walking distance. Concierge was very helpful throughout our stay.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located in the heart of Myeongdong, this hotel was more than what I expected. The bed was extremely comfortable, and room was enough to fit 2 large suitcases (just in a deluxe). Room was clean, quiet and love the refill filtered water station. We stayed here for 5 nights and was a very convenient location only a 2 min walk to the subway and plenty of convenient stores and street food directly behind the hotel. Would totally stay here again!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The reception was warm and welcoming and they speak good English. The room itself was smaller than I expecting basing on the photos I have seen, but nevertheless it was enough space for 2 people. The room was clean and felt clean. The bathroom and the toilet was separate which was a good thing. The bed was soft yet firm enough for back support. The pillows, however, were too soft for my comfort. There was a blowdryer but no flat iron. ☹ There was not enough storage space, we had to put some of our things on the floor. On our second day we utilized housekeeping but when we came back, I felt like nothing has changed at all. Bed was made up but the clothes I left on the bed was hanging on the headboard. Due to this unsatisfactory cleaning, we didn't ask for housekeeping on the following days. The best feature for this hotel is really its location. Myeongdong shopping area/street is literally just beside the hotel. Easy access to the Metro, with only 1 minute walk to the Myeongdong Station which is located in front of the hotel. Also the bus stop for the bus going back to Incheon airport was also a 1-2 minute walk from the hotel. Lots of shops, bakeries and convenience stores nearby. Would love to come back and would recommend this hotel to other travelers.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is situated a stone throw away from Myeong-dong train station. Also just a short walk to the shopping street, excellent access to shops and restaurants also a 7/11 next to the hotel.Hotel room is comfortable and clean, staff is friendly and able to speak English. Foot spa and roof top bar are a pleasant treat after a long day out. Highly Recommended if you are going to convenience.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice and new hotel...have a great view from the hotel. excellence location and easy to shopping, eating and sighting seeing. Next to MTR and airport shuttle.... room size is big and clean. breakfast is good enough.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 5 nights at the hotel. Good location to Myeongdong shopping and restaurants. Room size is small though even for Family room and small bathroom. Struggled to open 3 luggage at one time. Modern hotel and staff speaks English and special thanks to Anthony Moon who always greets guests at front of hotel. He was very helpful to get a taxi for us to hospital nearby when my daughter caught a virus. The foot spa and rooftop bar are together on 21st floor and B1 laundry machines are simply great for us to clear some laundry load. Lifts' speed at the hotel can be further improved though especially 1 lift to go to 21st floor and B1, it can take up to 10 mins. No pool though which is a pity.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all, the room was nice and clean. A comfortable bed, good AC and a clean and modern shower.During our stay in Seoul, my girlfriend injured her foot, she could barely walk and had a lot of pain. The friendly staff of the L7 Hotel Myeongdong took really good care of us. I specially would like to thank Sally, she rebooked a tour for us to a different date and made an appointment at the hospital for my girlfriend. Also, she gave us a wheelchair and ice packs for cooling the foot. She was very kind and really professional!Also what I liked about the hotel is the location. In just a 1 minute walk you're in the main streets of Myeongdong and it is very close to multiple Myeongdong station subway exits. There are plenty of coffee bars where you can eat breakfast in case you don't have breakfast included in your reservation.We had a great time at L7 Hotel Myeongdong.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of this hotel is real good is near the myeondong shopping district and many restaurants surrounding. Staff on the Ground floor also nice and polite. but the room is standard. we order family room but its really small room. the Wifi also not so fast and many of the electricity can't works well.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Honestly there is nothing to pick on L7 Myeongdong. Everything is so perfect here, location, Subway and Airport Limousine is just right outside. Highly recommend and worth the price to stay! I would also like to compliment their front desk staff "Alan', he is so warm and genuine to all the guests. Because of Alan, I am sure L7 can bring back many tourists!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We got the Superior Room with the view of the Tower. They are not kidding when they say it's a twin bed and a 25.1 ㎡ room. The room is small, and the bed is tiny (and I'm a big guy). But you know what? Even though it bothered me at first, the hotel and the room are pretty great. First of all, the bed mattress got the perfect firmness. The sheets were clean, the room was clean, and the bathroom/shower is just amazing (Japanese toilets are a fun adventure :)). Wifi is free and blazing fast. And you can take a bus shuttle to the airport for about $20. The staff was terrific and very helpful, and the view is spectacular. But this is not the most important part. The most important part is the location of this hotel. It's five steps away from the Myeongdong station and two steps away from the Myeongdong shopping/market area. The location is phenomenal. The tiny room might look intimidating at first, but the pros outweigh the cons in this case.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: good location, excellent room. the main problem was the staff. they hardly understand english. i called on Monday for a 4a.m. wake up call for Wednesday. then i called again that evening (Monday) to make sure they understand what i asked for. guess what? They woke me up on Tuesday 4 a.m.!!! they did not understand why i was angry. five minutes later they call again to remind me to get up!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! all the apologies of the manager the following day were not worth the sleep i missed on that day.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A good hotel in a great location. The twin room was quite spacious and had a view of the N Seoul tower. Reception was efficient and helpful. The hotel is almost on top of the Myeongdong Station and adjacent to the Airport bus drop off/pick up. The bathroom had a shower and multi function toilet. It is well stocked with toiletries. It has a bistro style restaurant and rooftop bar. The room has a safe, tiny fridge and enough room for luggage storage. Temperature control is easily managed and the room was quiet. I would happily stay there again as the tariff was quite reasonable.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is not my first stay, but a lengthy one. The hotel is strategically located near the airport bus (6001 or 6015 drop off Myeongdong Station), and that sort of won me over my other choice Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel (you have to drag your luggage thru a crowd for 6 minutes or so to Solaria). We had a Family Twin on the higher floor (it’s a mere 21 storey less 2 floor counts!) – the size ain’t impressive and it gets to be a problem once you stay longer than 3 nights.The music in the lift is awful - please fix that! The front desk’s service in my view is uneven; some hits & misses. Sometimes a bit of panic when there are situations to manage (I have rudimentary knowledge of Korean and noted the conversation). The housekeeper (they rotate their duty) is at times forgetful, and misses replenishing things (forgivable, given the traffic). I’m not sure if I would return for my 4th stay in 5 years and would be on the lookout for fresher newer hotels. But for first timers wanting Myeongdong action, and if you travel light, it is not too bad.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my 3rd stay. Very accessible by airport bus 6015-you arrive at the door step(Myeongdong Station). Rooms aren’t big-typical of hotels in HK, Seoul & Tokyo. Bustling shopping mecca in 3 minutes walk. Reception is better, English speaking staff are assigned. Skipped hotel breakfast this time round. Decent hotel but its popularity also means its aging faster.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very friendly and knowing staff. Good location = close to subway and especially close to lots of snail-face care (ladies know!) and sneaker (teen know) shops. In the Hotel you can enjoy the most infuriating elevator muzak ever. Rooms & cleanliness OK. self service laundry kiosk and laundry service both available.Then the problematic part: the breakfast. The breakfast room/restaurant lacks adequate facilities to keep hot foods hot and cold cold, a little concerning, would not pas a Finnish health inspection. Hot foods to be kept at the minimum of 60 degrees centigrade and cold at +2-6. Here everything is luke warm, even the salmon. So the slightest hick-up in the kitchen hygiene might have very memorable if dangerous consequences.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in a few hotels on this trip and this is the best one so far. Staff are extremely friendly and approachable. I received much help and advice from them. Location is fantastic next to Myeong Dong shopping street and easy access to major points of interest in Seoul. Room is very clean n nicely decorated. Thanks again to the the reception for making this such a lovely stay. Will stay here again in the future.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A good choice mid-range hotel for tourists making a first visit to Seoul. Location: Adjacent to Myeongdong subway station makes travel around the city easy from here. The street food markets of Myeongdong are directly behind the hotel. The neighborhood is bustling and safe.Service: Excellent staff. All spoke English well. Very professional.Room: Modern and clean, but a bit on the small side. Small hotel rooms are quite characteristic of all Seoul hotels it seems.Breakfast: Excellent with good variety. I definitely recommend including breakfast should you choose to book this hotel.All in all, a very good experience.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 2nd time staying at this hotel. My first stay is 2yrs ago and this time round, I can feel they are upgrading and improving. The staffs are friendly and helpful and I like the hotel deco and location. Housekeeping has to buck up thou & maybe can consider earlier operating hours for the hotel bar
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff here were so very helpful every-time we needed anything they were ready to assist! We stayed a week & found it very comfortable. It is a great location very central to many theatres & excellent shopping & eateries. Plenty to see & do. Breakfast was very good, just a pity the staff here weren't more pleasant..they should go to the front desk & learn from them! The concierge couldn't have been more courteous! Would definitely stay here again if we visit Seoul in the future.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Minimalist hotel. Really good accommodations. Some wonderful art on the walls. Location is great. Decent food in the area. Goooooooood shipping. Cabs are inexpensive enough to take almost any where. Found a nice magic shop, Tek Magic. Most stores open 7 days a week. Some great street art. We recommend this hotel and city.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ahhhhhhhhh!! L7! I will DEFINITELY be staying here again! I booked this accommodation based on accessibility as my Dad doesn’t have good knees. I had organised a surprise trip back here to Korea for him as he hadn’t been here in 34 years so you can imagine how much happier I was when the hotel turns out to be AMAZING! The staff have been so friendly and helpful, the hotel is located right in Myeong-Dong which is a hub for shopping all things beauty and fashion, the subway is on your doorstep as is a bank, 7-eleven, money exchange and great food! The rooms are funky, the showers are great with awesome water pressure, the upstairs foot spa (access via the disabled lifts) is HEAVEN after a long day of shopping and touring and the breakfast each morning isn’t just toast and cereal! They have bacon, eggs, waffles, fruit, salad, sausages etc! If you don’t really know your way around Seoul, this is a great hotel to start off at and the airport bus drops you practically outside and most tours can easily pick you up from out the front. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: L7 Myeongdong by LOTTE is only a few yards to main Myeongdong shopping streets and airport bus stop. If you have bulky lugguages, use Exit 9 of Metro Line 4, otherwise Exit 7 will be even more closer. The hotel provides all necessary amenities and toiletries in room. The size of the twin room I occupied was average but the bathroom was a bit compact. But the shower area and the rainforest tap were good enough to make you refreshing and wash out your fatigue. The pillows and mattress were very comfortable. You can rest assured that you can have good sleep after a day out. The staff at the main entrance was very polite and helpful. If you are a shopaholic and love to live in bustling area, L7 Myeongdong by LOTTE is definitely a good choice in terms of proximity and convenience.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in a very good location, literally where the 6015 Airport bus stops and close to the Myeondong station. Very close to the big supermarkets and fascinating evening markets in the Myeondong area. It is so central to downtown Seoul that I walked everywhere.The hotel itself is good, the check-in staff could not be more helpful and my room was adequate, on the 11th floor, facing the tower and cable car to the top. The room was good with all of the facilities which you would expect. The bathroom had a big walk in shower with high quality shampoos, body washes etc.The three lifts which served the hotel's upper floors were responsive and fast.My only gripe was that the bar and lounge on the 3rd floor (reception) was never working , the bar attached to the restaurant (2nd floor) would only serve drinks if you ordered a meal so the only place to get a drink was the 21st floor rooftop terrace where the cheapest drink was a bottle of Spanish beer for 18, 000 won. This is an outrageous price... the next day I had dinner elsewhere for the same price!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic location, excellent staff, a very nice room that was clean and comfortable with a great view of the N Seoul Tower. Really liked this hotel and was fantastic value for a week in such an incredible city. Will stay here again when we return to explore some more.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A Korean friend recommended this hotel for my first ever trip to Seoul. I was told that the location was great, and it was...better than great...awesome. The hotel is next to the airport bus stop, literally. The subway station is just a few few minutes of walk. Everything you need is there...7 Eleven, bakery & pastry shops, restaurants and, of course the shopping streets. The 2 big department stores are within easy walking distance.The room was modern, comfortable, nice and clean. The bathroom's size was reasonable, relatively big shower stall instead of bath tub (yes!) with amenities from Malin & Goetz.The staff was pleasant & very helpful. I really like the design and concept of the hotel.This hotel deserves my highest recommendation. I'd go back without hesitation. Congratualtions & very well done!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 7 nights with my wife and 3 years old daughter. Room size was adequate and clean. The best thing about the hotel was the location. Its directly in front of the Myeongdong train station and 2 mins walk to the Myeongdong night market. Theres a 7 Eleven store 2 blocks away so its quite convenient if I needed anything in the wee hours. Hotel decor is also quite modern and the hotel itself is also quite new. Highly recommended!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is the best, Airport Limousine Bus Stop and Myeongdong Station just 2-3 mins away, and it's within Myeongdong (but not inside which I think will be too crowded and too busy at night). Easy to get around to other locations with subways and buses. Money exchanges with good rates are around as well. This is a boutique hotel under the Lotte Hotel Group: rooms - are consider a little smaller then regular Lotte Hotel (which reflected in the price), bed size are good as well as the bedding. Of course, food is everywhere. Another hotel under the group to be considered L7 Hongdae. Areas for improvement: limited space for hanging clothes and towel and no room to put toiletries as well.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Subway station very close by, 7-Eleven, bank, fun Dong with good restaurants, helpful staff, clean, quiet rooms.... but the possibly slowest elevators in the entire world. Prepare to wait, and wait. The roof-top bar is nice, but absurdly expensive. I would stay here again, due to the location.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located right next to the Myeongdong Station, this hotel makes it accessible to the shopping & dining area in Myeongdong. Absolutely admired the decor of the hotel, very conceptual with intricate and trendy details.The room that I stayed in looked quite studio-like, but designed very stylishly that it made it look quite spacious. Bed is very comfortable and the height of the bed is quite low than average hotel bed, making it actually a lot easier to get into especially after a long day.Loved the aspect of eco-friendliness of the hotel, always a plus point for hotel services that champion the environment. Very very recommended for those wanting to stay near the central of Seoul, and I’d definitely stay here again when I’m in Seoul next.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A newer hotel that's right by the 1. shopping district 2. airport shuttle3. Underground metro Room is on the larger side comparing to other hotels in the area. Amy at the reception,speaks fluent English, is extremely helpful!But lacking of varieties at the Breakfast buffet. I get tired of the same items after the 2nd morning.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in this property last week for 2 nights & really liked it. The front desk staff are very helpful & nice - Excellent. It is clean & very neat property.The location is great and close proximity to Myeongdong shopping area and Lotte Department stores & also to Shinsegae departmental stores. Breakfast is value for money and just fine ( except that for vegiterians not many options).
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thanks RosieAfter long traveling time, she help us limit the check in time and arranged a great room for us.Also, our floor has an ice machine which is so helpful. As our member suddenly nasal bleeding which is emergency, the front desk staff are nice and advise us.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When we arrived at the hotel, we were greeted with a smile, which gave a warm feeling of welcome even though it was minus 10 Celcius outside. Front Desk was was helpful in getting us checked in and to our rooms as soon as possible.Due to our daily programs, we only managed to have breakfast twice throughout our stay. Unfortunately, the variety for the breakfast buffet was somewhat limited.Check out was a breeze, where everything was handled professionally and even the airport transfer we got the hotel to arrange for us was excellent.In short, we are going to return to hotel when we visit Seoul again in the future.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location: Airport bus 6001 stops 100m from hotel, exit #9 of Myeongdong station is abt 150m away, day tour pick-up/drop-off locations are also nearby, smack right at the start of Myeongdong shopping streetRoom: On the small side but able to open two full size luggages with still some walking space, toilet & shower is of good size, clean, able to open windows to get in fresh air, individual air conditioning & heatingService: Great service from the concierge to reception to cleaning lady. Service attitude felt 100% genuine. We were able to check-in early ard 1pm and late check-out was arranged (though we didn’t utilize it in the end).
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at L7 for a week for my solo trip. Excellent location. One minute from airport shuttle stop and subway station. Friendly staffs. Clean and new. Walking distance to lotte and lotte young.Will highly recommend this hotel
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very cool design street entrance and 3rd floor lobby. Great service, and excellent location by airport bus stop, subway, shopping and near Namsan. Room had view of tower. Very comfortable beds. Luxurious shower and heated toilet seat. Definitely coming back next time we're in Seoul!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely stay for my 8 nights in Seoul situated in the heart of Myeongdong. Hotel is easily accessible taking the airport bus 6015 or 6001. Bus stop is right next to hotel. Cost about 15k won per pax. Myeongdong train station is right next to hotel too probably around 2mins Walk.Check in/out is at level 3 of hotel. Free wifi is available, connection is decent.Hotel is very new & modern. Room is clean and comfortable. Toiletries such as toothbrush set, shower gel, shampoo, conditioner are all provided for not forgetting hair dryer too. There’s daily cleaning of room and fresh sets of towel + bath robe provided for. Cleaning lady is attentive to details when cleaning up your room eg wont keep your hair dryer back when you put it out to use on a daily basis. There will be 2 bottles of small mineral water provided everyday. Safe is available to keep your belongings in the room too. Didn’t have the hotel breakfast as there are plenty of food choices around the area which will cost you lesser too.Very comfortable stay, will come back again.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My mom and I decided to splurge and stayed in this hotel for a week. We were warned that staying in Myeongdong that long might get crowded and overwhelming but we absolutely loved it. This hotel had every amenity you could ask for. The decor is beautiful and the staff is very friendly. In this hotel we truly felt like we had a home away from home. The beds are incredibly soft and great quality comforters. I would trade my own bed for these beds any day. And the hotel is close to everything. Hungry at 3AM? Walk 5-10 minutes to the many street food restaurants open all hours. Take out some gimbap and go enjoy it in your comfy room. I really can’t say enough good things about this place. It was definitely a highlight of our trip.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Reviews of this hotel convinced me to book at this property. It's clean, the sheets smell fresh and room is spacious. It is also centrally located. Very close to Myeongdong shopping area. The City Hall is walkable. The Myeongdong Cathedral is even closer. We could view it from our room window.Modern style and decor is minimalist. Didn't like that it's too dark, in the Check in area. The elevator is also very dark and gives the appearance of being very tight and small.There's a quaint coffee shop on the ground floor right outside the lobby side door entrance.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Advantages:1. Great location! Outside the hotel are the bus stop and the entrance to MRT station. Restaurants and stores of various choices are within walking distance.2. Got a nice restaurant Ville de Chalotte, offering good breakfast3. Kind staff at the front counter, with fluent oral English.( I arrived at 1:30 pm, and the room was ready to use. )4. New, clean room.5. Free, fast WifiThings to improve:1. Wish the bed were bigger ( for two )2. Wish there were a gym, even a simple one
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is conveniently located near train station exit 8 and airport bus stop. It is also right next to Myeongdong street which is bustling till after 10pm. There’s a rooftop bar that gives a good view of the surroundings. The only thing lacking is a fitness centre. Requested to change bedsheet but I think the housekeeper didn’t. Overall, location is superb but service is nothing to rave about.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at L7 Myeongdong Hotel for 8 nights last week. Great hotel with fantastic location.Right in the middle of 2 entrances of Myeongdong station (exit 7 & 8), with plenty to eat & shop which is walking distance from the hotel. The Airport Limo bus stop is 500m from the hotel as well.The twin room which the hotel allocated to me (level 15) had a fabulous view of the Namsan tower.One negative point is the elevators are extremely slow, but notice that all elevators in Seoul are very slow, so perhaps that's normal.I really enjoyed my stay with the hotel, will definitely choose L7 Myeongdong Hotel again on my next visit.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great choice if you want to explore the heart of Seoul. The hotel is modern and funky with a superb view of the N Seoul tower. You couldn't ask for a more convenient location- shopping, food, corner stores, street food, a department store directly across the road and most importantly ideally located for the 6015 or 6011 limousine buses from Incheon international airport. The Seoul on/off bus stops right beside the stop for bus 6011 so touring the city is as easy as it gets (both airport bus stops are literally a 1 minute walk from stop to the hotel front door). The optional included breakfast was money well spent and they give you vouchers that you take to the hotel restaurant. The nice thing with that is that if you have an early flight or day trip and will miss breakfast you can use the vouchers as cash within the hotel. Knowing that drinks at the roof top bar were expensive and that we'd miss a breakfast due to departure time, we used a few vouchers to offset the drink price.Staff were very attentive, polite and and willing to answer any question, and yes the front desk and concierge were fluent in english.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at L7 Myeongdong for 5 days-4 nights on September 2018. I enjoyed this hotel because of its location from Myeongdong underground shopping, bus tours, subway, and other transportation. It is also steps away from the famous Myeongdong shopping areas and street food. Everything is accessible and I loved walking around the areas surrounding the hotel. I reserved a twin room and it was small but just enough space for two people sharing a room. The bathroom was tight with glass door shower. This hotel was cool for they have many outlets in their seating areas so for gadget lovers you would love how the hotel thoughtfully placed their power outlets all across the room. The laundry room at the basement was a hoot learning but does the job and I appreciated its availability for the guests. The hotel's coffee shop Angels-In Us was really good to get your caffeine fix. I enjoyed that spot a lot. The cafe Americano was strong and fits my taste. Overall, I will stay at this hotel again just for the location alone and coffee.The reason I am not giving this hotel a 5 star review is because of two things: the housekeeping was not attentive during our stay. Our room was clean most times but there were also times as if the cleaning was sub par and half done. Pls L7 work on this issue! cleaning should be standard for any 4 star hotel. The other thing that irked us was the hotel's restaurant Villa de Charlotte. While waiting for our check in time and our room to be ready, we decided to try their lunch buffet at the hotel. Bad idea! worst buffet I ever signed up on.The restaurant charged $28-30 dollars per person when their food trays are almost empty and what was left were just chicken and french fries. I didn't know if this restaurant knew the concept of a buffet? meaning the food needs to be replenished right away before the food trays are empty. We stayed at the restaurant for an 1 hour or so, even then the food trays were left empty. The experience was no longer a buffet but more like HUNGER GAMES. Pros: Location! nothing can beat it. Power Outlets everywhere in the room, well designed rooms, coffee shop, steps away from Myeongdong underground shopping for a Kpop lover this was heaven.Cons: housekeeping needs to be more attentive, Pls stay away from the hotel's restaurant overexpensive buffet. Go outside the hotel for meals that are more satisfying and cheaperHelpful Tips: pls do your reservation early this hotel always get sold out. If you are requesting for an early check in, don't expect it because majority of hotels in South Korea are strict with their check in times.. Pls try the Congee House right next to the hotel, it was such a satisying treat.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Quite an efficient hotel if you stay for short 2-3 days with all the basics and room size is ok. The location is convenient but slightly off the Main Street and the big department stores with about 5-10 mins walk. And the staff are great - polite and friendly and very good English!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Right in the heart of buzz of myeongdong and a minute walk to the Myeongdong subway station.Unique design of the room whereby the toilet is open concept, only has glass door for shower area. Great for couples/single traveller. Drawback is that there's no where to hang your clothes to wear after shower. Gotta step out of the shower area to the main room to dress up.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the minute you arrive, the hotel has a very welcoming feel. Staff were very helpful and accommodating. Our room was very spacious and with a view of the Seoul Tower. Great amenities. The only downside was the breakfast - quality seemed very basic. Minutes away from public transport and the airport limousine bus drops you off directly in front of the hotel.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of the location of the hotel is excellent, literally 10meters away from 2 Metro exits. With this metro you are just a few stops away from all the important sights of Seoul! Next to the hotel there is 7eleven and a Baguette Paris, but more important it is just around the corner of all the nice restaurants and street food that Myeongdong has to offer. Eventhough the area is a very lively area during the day and certainly at night, the room I had was very quiet! The room itself was very clean, spacious and the same as the rest of the hotel very hip and fashionable. The staff was always very friendly, helpful and spoke English (which can be helpful ;-) ). The hotel has on the top floor an excellent cocktail bar with an amazing view over the city. All in all this hotel had everything what I was looking for and for a good value for money so I would go back with pleasure!
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the 20th. floor(last) of the hotel L7 the city is under your feet.Beautiful room which include everything you need and much more, electronic operation of toilets and room facilities, beautiful corridors,excellent dining room and breakfast and service and most of all location in the center of everything.Under the hotel you find "Paris baggett cafe" and "seven eleven"In the basement one can find a laundromat.Enjoy your stay
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is centrally located within easy walk of underground.Room are fairly spacious and modern.Breakfast offers a wide variety of hot and cold food. However don’t wear flip flops or open toe sandals as you will be turned away. Found this quite ridiculous considering it’s a hot climate and the informality of the restaurant.Beautiful Sky Lounge bar on top floor but be warned that it is the equivalent of £10 for just over half pint of larger. Also cannot charge to room account. I had to go all the way back to my room and get cash.We had three separate reservations as our plans changed and we booked extra nights. However the hotel was not willing to marry up our reservations and made us check out and in again. On the last reservation we were clearly given an “old” smoking room as there was a stale smell in the room.Asked receptionist for advise on shopping but was provided with in accurate information.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A modern, clean and trendy hotel in a perfect location to explore Seoul.Transport - 30 seconds away from MyeongDong subway station (exit 9 is the closest). Airport limousine is just outside too, so it couldn't be easier to get here from the airport (and back again).Location - MyeongDong is quite a touristy area, but a great introduction to Seoul for shoppers. Plenty of skin care products and street food on offer. You won't struggle to find food or drink on your doorstep. The room we had was a decent size, and had coffee and water provided and replenished each day.There's a good TV with a range of channels in various languages, and you can plug a laptop into it and watch Netflix using the hotel's speedy free wifi.We didn't use the restaurant, and the bar on level 3 wasn't available during our stay.The rooftop bar is very trendy and has prices to match. One beer was 14000 KRW (about £9) and the food was very expensive also. Good for a special occasion but not for your evening meal everyday.Bed is very comfy, and the bathroom had a good shower. Toiletries and hairdryer also provided.Not many negatives. There wasn't a huge amount of room to store clothes, for two of us on a 14 day trip, we struggled for space.I'd definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location by the train station and airport bus pickup is 1 minute walk away, there is also a taxi stand directly outside.Trendy and value for moneyRooms is a good size and sufficiently and quiet bed is comfortable. No view from the rooms though
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I really like this hotel. The rooms are decently sized and modern. The hotel is really well located. The food is all right and could be better. Nevertheless this is a good hotel and you should give it try. Recommended.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was my first time in seoul, and this hotel was perfect, the rooms are ridiculously clean and spacious, customer service was excellent, close to transport and shopping centers, the money spent for 5 nights at this hotel was worth it. Would definately come back to this hotel.
hotelName:
3    L7 Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked this hotel for 3 nights stay. When I checked in, there is no service such as assisting the luggage, induction of the hotel, or even leading you the way to the lift for going upstairs. The location is great as lots of shopping malls and local stores around as well as great restaurants, easy transportation to go everywhere. \The room is in good size but there is no full body mirror in the room, this is the first time that I stayed in a hotel which does not have that. I didn't check the breakfast as they didn't upsell to me anyways. During my stay, I turned on the "Do not disturb" but still the housekeeper knocked on my door for couple times and I have to let her in to collect towels.Their check out time is 12:00 and I called them an hour ago before my check out time just as politely to let them know I may be a bit late but will check out asap which the operator just rejected my request. When it was 11:50, not even the check out time, the housekeeper knocked on my door again which I have turned on the "Do not disturb" button. So I guessed staffs in the hotel dont really care about that button at all. It is actually very rude as it is not yet my check out time. The lady keep telling me that I have to pay if I stayed over 12:00, excuse me! I have called the operator already, so please communicate well within the company!Last thing is that I wrote some post cards and would like to get the stamps, the receptionist told me that I can get the stamps in the ArtBox which it is a fault information as they didnt sell stamps there at all. = =... I went back to the hotel and asked them if they can help me shipped the post cards (with stamps on) already. This is the first time that the hotel rejected to assist placing the post card and deliver for the customers. Also, they just rejected without providing solution, for example, telling you where you can just drop off the post card as it is a Sunday, post office has been closed.Anyways, my conclusion is that there are lots of hotels in Korea. This is the first time I stayed in this hotel and will be my last time. The staff in the hotel is super stubborn and not flexible dealing with situation and not helpful at all.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great thing about this hotel is that it's in a quiet street off main Gangnam area which is what we like. Convenience store and restaurants near by which is great Few things to note:1. Sound proof isn't great therefore if you have kids, u might have neighbours banging on their walls to ask u to shut up2. They have washer (which is great) but no dryers. So u would need to hang dry your own clothes in your room if you decided to do your laundries there.Would still return to the hotel if I go Seoul again. Just hope that they would have dryers by then:)
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Came because the review seems great. But the service was so disappointing. The hotel is old , the heater was broken, unresponsive and unhelpful staff . Luckily the room is clean lights are dim. Breakfast is so sad and terrible. For this price not worth it. Will not recommend nor come again
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Apart from the strategic location, this place was overrated . It s one of the worst service I ever receive from a hotel .1) on March 31st around 8-9pm the hotel deactivated our room access card and checked in our room to stranger customers. The people were able to access our room and walked right in!!! Most ridiculous mistake ever. Both the trainee guy and lady manager on duty had poor English or maybe they pretend to have poor English as it seems like they didn’t want to be responsible . Simply wanted to brush me off by saying sorry end of case. Luckily my korean friend called them to makeup for their mistake, the next day to compensate they upgraded the room.2) overall the staff needs stronger training and service attitude, nobody cares about customer or helpful. Even asking for a trolley to help ourselves with luggage the counter said they dunno how long the other customer will use it for. Very passive and reluctant to give any sort of help, end up seeing the trolley at lobby with no one informing us it s available .3) Breakfast is bad and very little options, they barely even refill. Do not suggestWill not recommend nor ever consider to stay again.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this hotel based on the reviews on Tripadvisor, big mistake! The room was cheap but far from good value. The walls are so thin you can hear your neighbours talking and I was woken up throughout the night by all sorts of noises. The noise was unbearable how when we spoke to the staff they said we had one of the ‘most quiet rooms’. The towels were also old, worn and had holes in them. Overall we were not impressed. Would not recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed 3 nights at this hotel bc it was close to where my son was living in Gangnam and affordable. It was reasonably comfortable and quiet and well located. But the afternoon after leaving the hotel for Japan, I noticed bites all over my torso, back, shoulders. There are raised red bumps that if you research bedbug bites, are identical. They sting and are itchy and I can't go to the onsen bc others would be disturbed. Such a bummer to encounter this. In the states we have The Bedbug Registry which is very useful when booking hotels. You can check to see if any were reported before you book. I emailed Ocloud hotel as soon as I discovered this but have not heard back. Nothing. This is terrible bc bedbugs will ruin an entire hotel or apartment if they are not caught early. Judging by the sheer amount of bites on my body, these bugs were numerous and hungry. Please find a hotel elsewhere. This can happen to you.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It has a perfect location - 10-walk to the bus station and subway station. You have access to the shopping area selling international and local brands, restaurants (including shake shack). There are several 7-11s plus Starbucks near the hotel.We stayed in a deluxe room which is spacious, clean, and comfortable. The staff are very helpful and communicate well in English. I will stay again in this hotel if I have the chance to go back again to Seoul.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: booked a corner suite room for a night. perfect location, just a few minutes walk to the subway, and a few minutes walk to the crowded gangnam area. there are a lot of delicious restaurant and interesting store like kakao store, makeup sotres, and gotomall. definitely enjoy my stay and would not hesitate to come back.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: stayed for 8 days in a standard double room.location is great in gangnam area, close to metro ( 2 minute walk ) and across the main road with many top end shopping option and some local brands. food options are all over and huge number of entertainment is available.staff is very friendly and always supportive. the room was not that big but had all the required appliances for a comfortable stay ( iron, fridge, safe, free wifi, free tea and coffee).
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Its convenient to everything, clean and affordable! This was not my choice. Lucky my husband decided to book here or else will really regret! We had a very good experience from hotel to food and shopping. Highly recommended!
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros are like what the other reviews mentioned - location and price. Bed is comfortable. However, the stay was not as comfortable. The air condition fan was not adjustable. It kept switching on and off through the night. And it’s a loud and strong fan at that. Kept interrupting sleep. No basic amenities like tooth brush and tooth paste provided. The front desk could be a friendlier and more helpful - requested him to see if there was an available room just one hour before check in time and his response was a straight up “no”. Finally the lighting in the rooms and hallway are all white light making the place rather cold and sterile. The toilets are already white tiles and fixtures, felt like a hospital. Will not recommend this unless you absolutely need to be around the area.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 4 nights in the Ocloud Hotel (Room 1311) and for the price paid it had everything you could need. Best of all it was a great location. Set back from 2 main roads, it had easy access to the metro around the corner, which has an express train to Gimpo Airport and also connects you via transfer to Seoul Incheon. The hotel was a few streets away from Gangnam metro station and right in the heart of the Gangnam neighborhood which has shopping, restaurants and constant action! I would stay here again if I returned to Seoul.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The building of the hotel is placed in between few other buildings, somehow close to Gangnam-daero. The reception at the ground floor is run by nice and helpful staff, and has a comfortable waiting room. Rooms are average in size and equipped with a boiler, a microwave, a small fridge and a sink, packed in a very compact and still effective way. Beds are cozy, and overall clean, although we found some dust while moving the beds. The bathroom is compact and functional; we found it quite clean. There is no room service, but there is a restaurant at the basement which serves all meal (depending on the package, you can get breakfast included).
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The homepage of this hotel makes it look very designed , but in reality it is a bit less sparkly . The roof garden is overgrown and unattended - the gym room is very private , not much equipment, but fine for good work out . Once you get the hang of it , it is a clean and stylish hotel !! Good location , clean and well appointed , tastefully decorated rooms - well worth the money ! The lobby has a Youth Hostel vibe , but the rooms are great . The staff speak almost no English and aren’t very obliging , though this is the case in most Seoul hotels .
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were here the last time in November 2017 and was very happy with the service and the room provided to us. Affordable rate and big room with good service. But this trip, we are rather disappointed with the Housekeeping.We can still see dust and hair strands lying around on the floor even though the Housekeeping service lady just cleaned our room. It felt like our room was not cleaned at all. Overall, we liked the place but the housekeeping team needs to up their game a little.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: As others have mentioned, location is great. Close to stations, food and some shopping! Pro clean, good size room, great shower water pressure, small cons one of my towels was old, had torns in it. Value for the price in the area!
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: During my stay I thought I was going to get a better room for the price I paid but my friends had a sweet and they paid a lot less than I did and they live a lot larger than I did. I just feel that the price I paid for my room should have been a lot better
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would say this is a good business hotel for someone who needs to be near the Gangnam area. There are enough restaurants and shops around to keep your evenings after work occupied. Otherwise, the hotel has nothing much to shout about, floors are not carpeted so could be a bit cold in the winter.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable hotel, modern, somewhat spartan room, but all necessary accessories available, good and fast WiFi.Excellent location near subway station and convenient link to airports.Breakfast is very weak for Western taste, this is the only negative point.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel’s location near Sinnonhyeon station, exit 7 and very close the bars, clubs and restaurants and gangnam main street, You can use subway or subway + bus to go hotel from airport.Very clean hotel, everything is beautiful, thank you...
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a great stay at this hotel. Plenty of room, a very cosy bed and helpful personal. The location is Fangnam is great as well, subway station just around the corner and many restaurants close by. Would definitely come back!
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is beyond my expectations for a three star hotel. The location is very convenient, with public transport and restaurants all within short walk distance. The room is quiet considering the busy location. It's also well equipped, even with a microwave oven in a standard hotel room. There are also two washing machines in the gym room. The hotel staffs are efficient and professional. I would suggest the daily cleaning to be more thorough. I can see dusts in hidden and high corners, and also found stains on towels. Overall I'm very happy with this hotel.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed six nights at the OCloud Gangnam and we found the room clean and comfortable. The hotel is surrounded by eating places of many types and the subway, bus or taxi service can get you where you need to go in a reasonable time. On two separate occasions, two different hotel reception staff actually walked us out the door and down the street to a restaurant they recommended. This type of customer service is generally unheard of so kudos to OCloud Gangnam staff.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been in this hotel in September 2017. The hotel is located very close to metro station and practically walking distance from Gangnam district. The check in was easy and fast. The room was large enough and quite clena, just like the bathroom. The breakfast is Korean food, you will not find continental breakfast. the gym is small. Wifi is free. In general a good hotel for business.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of the hotel is really convenient; near by subway (sinnonhyun and also Gangnam station) , airport bus stop, many shopping places, cafes and restaurants. The room is clean and the service is fine.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good price, clean and decent hotel in Central Gangnam business district. Not exactly infront of Airport bus stop, but just 5-10 mins. walk from Airport bus 6009 stop at Gangnam stop. Also 5 mins. from Sinnonhyeong train station, exit 6. Rooms and bed are small as expected, but enough to sleep. Good hot shower and nice HD flatscreen with CNN. But downside is wifi is very weak, and almost useless as such my poor rating. Only strong at lobby. They will have to fix wifi if I have to book again.Also has basic fitness room where I used the treadmill and some weights, but room had a funny stuffy smell. Offers buffet breakfast for a fee, but many cafe, cvs including 7-11, and restaurant options nearby.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Small room, but with everything you’d need. The Check-in/check-out process is very efficient. There’s the hotel-operated restaurant on the ground floor which seems to be good, but I do not have a chance to try.Recommend if you need a hotel close to Gangnam area.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Ocloud in 2015 and thought it was unbeatable given the price, location, and the size of the room! So it was a no brainer to pick this hotel again on my past trip.Unfortunately, this time the experience wasn't as good. The first room we got had a weird smell... Smelled like... Dogs? Maybe because the AC wasn't on and no one stayed in that room for a while. When asked for a room change I waited 15 mins and no one came so I had to call again. (Maybe because it was Korean Thanksgiving so they were low on staffs?) They gave me another room 2 doors down and it was much better... Still smelled a little but to be fair I am quite sensitive to smells. My bf said he couldn't smell anything. The bedsheets are kind of dirty too... They were washed but with stains. We asked for a change of bed sheet on the second day but the new one still had stains on it. We did not ask them to change it anymore but surprisingly on the third day we didnt ask for new sheets but it was changed into one with no stains LOLHaving said that the location and price is really really good... Paris Baguette (My fav ) is literally a 30 sec walk from the hotel, there is a mini food area right around the corner and a larger food area within 10 mins walk. Subway station is only a minute away if u take the short cut through the office building so if there are no other newer hotel in the area next time I visit I would probably stay here again :)
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The front desk was incredibly helpful in answering my questions about the city and helping me find food delivery when all restaurants were closed for the holiday. Room service left the room looking like it was brand new! The location is right next to a subway station that made it easy to travel.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at OCloud for the first time this Sept-2017. Until now would stay at different hotel in Gangnam area. Tried it based on recommendation from a friend. I am surely not disappointed with this decision.This is a decent hotel, with all amenities, reasonable sized rooms, conveniently located and best of all, within an affordable tariff tag. Courteous staff and clean, family friendly atmosphere.Would definitely stay here again...
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My partner and I booked this hotel for 5 nights and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Great locations to buses and trains and airport bus. Rooms were modern clean and staff were helpful. If we go back to Korea and in gangnam we will stay here again
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at OCloud Hotel for a week in September on a baseball watching trip to Seoul. The suite they put me in was quite large and the price per night was excellent. The hotel is also perfectly situated with a short walk to two Metro stations (Sinnonheyon and Gangnam), which made getting around town very easy. I would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again if my travels bring me back to Seoul.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed eleven nights at this hotel with our three children who are in twenties. Hotel is not fancy or luxury but very clean and well maintained. First time visiting Gangnam and I'm very glad we chose this hotel. Close to subways and bus stops. Lots of good restaurants near by and you can walk to everywhere. Front desk is very helpful and accommodating.I would say O'Cloud Hotel is the best location in Gangnam area!
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: hotel located nearby subway station, and many shops and restaurants are in walking distance, which is pretty convenience. The room is cozy and clean, the maid is nice. The only complain is the wifi access is a bit slow, but it's not a big issue.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ocloud is perfectly situated near the sinnhonhyeon st., I recommend it for travellers who are out there to explore seoul. It is conveniently located by the shopping district with lots of food choices as well.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spacious room, clean and close to subway ( sennohyeon), just a minute (real count of time) away from various restaurants, shops and entertainment. Really enjoyed my stay and will recommend it to others.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is very near to subway station and lots of food choices around. Each room also have amenities like microwave, iron and ironing board. Could improve on changing to black-out curtain as now in summer the sun is up by 5+am and it is really bright. Also the room aircon is controlled by the set room temperature and will off by itself once it drops to the set room temperature, slightly uncomfortable during hot summer days.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've been to this hotel three times already whenever I went to Korea. The location is great it is right next to Shin Non Hyun station which is only 10 mins walk from kangnam station. You have everything near by this hotel. Good restaurants good coffee shops and convenience store is right behind the hotel. I was bit worried that the hotel might be noisy at night because it's near the high street area. But it was ok. The soundproof between room to room were not quite good however other than that the room is clean(except my first stay in this hotel, I had to change two rooms because the bed sheet cover was dirty but second and last time i visited , the room was clean.) and the staffs are nice. I will definitely come back to this hotel again.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here on a previous visit to Seoul a year ago and was delighted to find the same high standard I discovered on my first trip. The rooms are nice, clean modern and a good size with a great shower in the bathroom that got me going in the morning. The concealed mini kithchen facilities with fridge sink and microwave are a really nice touch as is the complimentary bottled water which is replenished everyday. The bed is comfortable and the reception staff are very helpful and polite.
