The hotels location is great just 5 mins from metro stations which is the best and cheapest way to get around, get yourself a T Pass card for the metro 3,000 won and load it up as you need to. The pass gives you discounted fares and makes the using the metro experience much easier. You can get them from machines at any station. Next time I'm in Seoul I have no doubt, I will be staying here again. Also the limousine bus 6009 from airport stops at Gangnam station, 50 meters from Hotel, easy and straight forward. If you stay I hope you find this useful. Enjoy. Thank you OCloud Hotel, until the next time.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, walking distance to restaurants, pubs and subway station. You can find all the shops in the area. Great rooms (clean, spacious and modern) and employees were really helpful and nice. Would highly recommend this hotel!!
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An excellent hotel in a convenient location close to Sinnonhyeon subway station (line 9) and only a short walk to Gangnam subway station. Very friendly reception staff who speak english. Clean and quiet comfortable room with air conditioning. Roof garden is a bonus with views over the city. Restaurant (Ocloud kitchen) on the premises although we only had one meal there. After checking out we were able to leave our luggage at the hotel for a couple of days while we made a short trip to Busan. All in all a very pleasant stay and we would thoroughly recommend this hotel. Thank you Ocloud.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Would highly recommend anyone to stay at this hotel it is very close to train stations and right in the heart of Gangnam without being noisy. The room was very clean and a really good size for 3 friends sharing. Excellent facilities will definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean room, great location in Gangnam.Near shops, many coffee houses nearby.Easy drop-off from airport bus.Airport probably 90 mins away which is not bad in Seoul!The gym was good enough and water was free in the room which is great in a reasonably hot location.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I'm currently halfway through my 20 night stay here. It's an exceptional hotel with kind, courteous and attentive staff from the Front Desk to the highly professional housekeeping and other personnel. The location is top notch with easy access to food, shopping, entertainment and transportation. I come back to Korea regularly and I have now found my hotel of choice! What has really moved me to write this review, was a touching surprise left in my suite while I was out; a beautifully written letter and gorgeously packaged (and delicious) boutique box of cookies thanking me for my custom, wishing me comfort during the rest of my stay and extending their continued assistance should I need it. Amazing. And did I mention how nice their facilities are, from my spacious, comfortable and aesthetically pleasing apartment-like suite, to the modern gym facilities and the incredibly convenient Laundry facilities? I'll recommend this hotel to all my friends and family too.지금까지 정말 잘해주셔서 진심으로 감사드려요. 다들 진짜 친절하시고, 항상 깨끗하게 청소해주시고 또한 세심하게 배려해주시는 직원분들...오늘은 놀랍게도 쿠키랑 정성이 느껴지는 편지까지 받으면서 완전 감동했어요. 정말 편하게 해주시네요. 고맙습니다!!!
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located in a good location, just a short walk to 2 different train stations, eateries and main shopping street in Gangnam. The room size is acceptable and it is also equipped with basic necessities.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for 2 trips, each trip was 15 days. This hotel has everything I need and really feeling like home. Location is awesome, 2 mins walk to train stn, surrounded by shopping districts and food
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: excellent location - Underground, sinnonhyun station. (Kyobo tower)nice service concierges are very gentle. they can speak english Chinese and Japanese.a lot of restaurants nearby this hotel.modernised hotel. shopping perfect location ( coz its in gangnam)My girlfriend had has stayed this hotel twice times.She loves to stay in Ocloud hotel. she says that will stay next summer again.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great and clean hotell,good service.The oblygt downside was the lack of english among its staff.The area is nice with lots off restaurants.The Roms where pretty small,but a nice gym.The restaurant at the hotell was not nice.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pro: Plenty of eateries with a variety of cuisine surrounding the hotel. Near a subway station which has express track to Gimpo International Airport. Near Gangnam shopping street. Airport Limousine Bus Stop is just a few mins walk. Hotel room is spacious, neat and clean.Con: Not for Myeongdong shopping fanatics. Provide toiletries Except Toothbrush and Toothpaste.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. In the center of main Gangnam shopping street. Everything you need is nearby: clothing brands, cosmetics, movie theater, all kinds of cafes and restaurants. Subway station is just around the corner. Airport shuttle bus station is very close. The hotel itself is also good. Rooms are small and there are no disposable slippers and toothbrush available. Other than that, everything is good for the price. I'm planning on staying here everytime I come to Seoul.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A nice cosy little hotel, not too much to see or do outside although there are restaurants downstairs. I don't see any tourist in this area. I went in middle of January and it snowed twice. I was given room 702 and it was SO noisy everyday, i think my room was next to cleaning room.. (I requested for a quiet room) it was not relaxing as I stayed inside the hotel a lot. I had an ok dinner at the restaurant. The staff can barely speak much English. But I love that they give you a big tv in your room and also the bed is quite comfy. The reason I picked this hotel also is because of the window, there is a lot of natural light to brighten up the room.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You are in the main area of Gangnam. The rooms are pretty clean, but very small. Anyway for a business trip they have all that you need. The bed and pillows are amazing. The gym, well, too small. Nice breakfast at reasonable price. At the end, excellent option.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: OCloud Hotel in Gangnam is a good hotel which is conveniently located near to exit 7 of Sinnonhyuen metro station. The hotel is near to many shops, restaurants and bars in a very popular area of Seoul. The room we had was basic, clean, comfortable and serviced daily with fresh towels and drinking water. My only complaint was that the room was too hot; I could not work out how to turn the cooler air on and even the corridors and hallways of the hotel were far too warm! The check in desk was polite and helpful when it came to booking an excursion to the DMZ, I would highly recommend using Seoul City Tours which is the company used by the hotel. Overall, this hotel is a convenient and suitable place to stay if you are having a short stay in this great city.
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I live in Incheon and while my boyfriend was visiting from the states, we took a trip to Seoul. OCloud was a great, simple and lovely experience. The room was clean (although I doubted people cleaned under the bed) and the bathroom was a refreshing Western alternative to my wetroom in my apartment! haha. The hotel's location is so easy to find, and it's steps away from Gangnam's bustling streets and shopping centers. We had a lot of fun exploring Gangnam and making it back to the hotel within minutes of deciding to go back. Best part is the hotel's location -- it's quiet and secluded, and there's a rooftop garden!
hotelName:
4    Ocloud Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This location was steps away from the hustle and bustle of Myeongdong, which we enjoy. Getting to the hotel was simple by airport bus limousine, which drops off very near the hotel entrance. You go to the same spot for pick up, no reservations necessary, just check the schedule that's posted. We had a triple room with comfortable mattresses. AC worked well and could be adjusted as needed. The bathroom was spacious and clean. Shampoo, conditioner, and body wash were provided in wall mounted dispenser. The hotel provided a lounge (24hrs) for guests which offered self-serve water, tea, coffee (hot/iced), comfortable seating, and tv. This was conveniently located next to the washer and dryer nook. Washer/dryer were large capacity and powerful. There is a machine selling laundry detergent in the nook. It only took one round to dry all the clothes. There is only one washer and dryer. Free wifi is provided throughout the hotel. In addition to the comfort of the hotel is the great location. As soon as you walk out of the hotel, you're surrounded with stores, restaurants, street food vendors which stay open late. We really enjoyed strolling through this area late at night with the crowds of shoppers and having our hotel only steps away. I would definitely stay there again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel, room is big as expected, and clean too. The location is just at border of Myingdong that easy to get shopping and restaurants, but not noisy. And, the hotel close to Subway station and 24hours store around, very convenient.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel at the central of Myedong dong, bus stop,... Many kind of food, shopping, ... for your choices. I will recommend for my friend if they have plan to go to Seoul. In the time, we will visit and stay again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very convenience to the traveller, even we went out at 10:00pm downstairs, the shop was still opened, and it also closed to the metro exit with escalator, which is easy to move the luggage when u arrive and leave Myeongdong.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location and good service. I left a photo in the room after checking out, the hotel found it and sent me in Hong Kong as I requested. I don’t give full mark because the family room is not as big and new comparatively.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean and convenient hotel is good for ladies to stay for shopping. Front desk staff are polite with smiles. They even proactively reminded me if we need late check out. Heartfelt appreciated. I’ll choose this hotel again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is conveniently located near food, shopping and transportation. There is the airport limo bus-stop which is also near the hotel. The front desk staff and house-keeping staff are very friendly and helpful. I have stayed here before and it will be my choice hotel to stay whenever I visit Seoul.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is just steps away from shopping paradise. Im impressed that we can select our type of Pillows as well. They are quite personalized and staff are friendly. Room abit small but still acceptable. Food is also all around the hotel surroundings. Just outside the hotel, there is one chic café which serve good coffee.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is conveniently located in Myeongdong. Stop for airport limousine is just 5 minutes walk from the hotel. MRT is very close by. Lots of food options and shopping too. Room was good for two people. Service was good. Only downside was the very limited spread for breakfast buffet. Overall, we had a great stay!
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very good, less than 5 min walk to train station and bus stop/airport bus stop. A lot of good restaurants and shops nearby, just outside the hotel. If you don't care so much about the room and just want a good location then this is the hotel for you.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's a perfect location for a Seoul shopping holiday. With airport shuttle and subway just around the corner, transport is made the easiest. It is a simple and very clean hotel. Quiet although it is the the middle of busy Myeongdong. It's the 3rd time I am staying here.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is very good, near airport shuttle station and Myeongdong station. Convenient to travel to everywhere and shopping nearby. Night market is available near the hotel. Water bottle is provided only in the first day of stay, but we can refill the water bottle using the water machine (with hot and cold water) in the lounge.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked a Deluxe Twin for 3. Was given an extra bed in a room for 2. The room air con was not working so they gave me a free upgrade to a Triple room which was more spacious and had 3 permanent beds. But the shower was a little inconvenient as it was in an awkward corner. Hotel is conveniently located 2 minutes walk from Myeongdong station exit 8. If you take the escalator, U turn and walk till you reach the road. Turn left before the bakery. Hotel is on your right. Hotel is also in the heart of Myeongdong shopping street. Every evening, push carts appear from nowhere selling all kinds of street food. Every room comes with a foot massaging machine.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: within 1 minute walk from Myeongdong subway exit 8. very good location. Connecting rooms available. Hotel provided one complimentary breakfast. Decent size room and prize. There is water dispenser on every floor which guests can refill water for free. Free coffee on 11th floor lounge. Not so good - room keeping (rooms were not cleaned, waste paper pins not cleared, did not refill toilet paper for one of the rooms), have to get into bathtub for shower. Overall, this hotel is still a good choice
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Reception staff was great. Location was great. Room was clean and comfy. Only complain is the breakfast spread is limited. When we were there, the food is very empty and we asked the only waitress. She was rude and not friendly and gestured that they are cooking. They only top up two dishes. We didn’t want to wait and just left.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a good stay for 4 night at this hotel. The room was comfortable. Location very good. The hotel was clean, and the front desk very friendly. Good hotel. 24 hours free coffee. We love this hotel.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Location is exactly in Myeongdong and close to the train station. Easy to travel to everywhere. Staffs are nice (especially the guy who checked us in). Rooms are decent. The only one thing is the air-con makes noise.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is centrally located in Myeongdong and very close to public transport. The hotel reception is on the 3rd floor. Staff are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are nice, clean, and quiet too!
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice clean room. Surprisingly quiet even if it is located at the Heart of Myeongdong Shopping area. Looking for the best places to dine or shop? Just ask the front desk. They are very helpful. We will stay here again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean hotel, wonderful service, located in the heart of myeongdong. Easy access to shopping and food surrounding the hotel. Metro is about 5 mins walk from the hotel. There's even a weighing scale, duct taped provided at the hotel if you need to weigh your luggage or wrap your parcel up before heading to the airport.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Myeongdong is filled with eateries and shopping (mainly for beauty product and snacks). This place is located within myeongdong but close enough to bus and subway stop. Good value for money and friendly front desk staff.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nine tree hotel definitely exceeds my expectation in every way possible. Not only is it near the subway station, it's also conveniently located right near the direct bus to/from airport, right in the middle of myeongdong shopping street and all the street food goodness, not to mention that Namsan Cable Car Base is merely a 10 minute uphill walk away. Despite being so centrally located, the room is clean and spacious. Everything has a place it belongs and ooh the foot massage machine is a surprisingly RELIEVING experience for all the walking from the crazy shopping. Definitely will go there again, if I get to visit Seoul again!!!!!
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Was there for two nights working trip and they gave me six floor low level and the end of the building means when I look out of the two strips if windows it was nothing but the walls of the adjacent building. Had to keep curtain closed anyway. Worse is no working desk that made my computer no where to place. So happened groups of teens staying same time and they all gone to the breakfast area in the morning. Tables were not cleaned on time and I cannot find a clean seat after five minutes. I got some dishes and juice and returned with all of them cleaned by the waitress. Omg. Food is so so. But overall the room is clean and reception service is real nice.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at the hotel from 5th to 10th May with my sister. No regrets! Nine Tree's location is excellent with Myeongdong Subway station and the airport bus stop just a stone throw away. The room's amenities may be minimum but it is definitely very clean. We're always greeted in the morning by a smiling housekeeping staff along the corridor which is a great way to start the day!The front desk staff are also most helpful with directions and requests that we had during our stay. One of the most commendable staff would have to be Alice who remembers her guest's name but also went out of the way to assist us. As we had a very late flight out on the day of check out, we requested for a late check out as we would like to take a fast shower after a half day tour that ended at about 2.30pm. We understood that the hotel was facing a fully booked situation for the room type that we occupied. Instead of rejecting us outright, Alice took the initiative to check with her manager and got us a single room for us to wash up and refresh. (which we are most thankful for)I would say the hospitality we experienced at Nine Tree Hotel was way beyond my expectation. Thank you to all for a most pleasant stay!
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was in a great location for easy access to the subway and also from the airport by limousine airport bus. It is just a few minute walk to shopping area. Friendly staff who gave a very warm welcome and gave more information. The room was clean. Totally recommend staying here!
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a pleasant stay at Ninetree Myeongdong, everything was perfect especially the clean room and bright toilet, had a comfortable rest here for 6 nights! Will definitely come back here again and will be my first choice :)
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family and I love this hotel because its location is very good, the rooms are clean, the staff are friendly & helpful. The lobby has an area with weighing machine, packing materials like carton boxes, string, masking tape and a pair of scissors. I would recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stayed in this hotel was very great & valued, staff were kind, clean room, comfy bed and pillow. The best location near subway and Myeongdong shopping area. We would stay there if we hv chance to visit Korea again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: too close to shopping area,very clean and convenience room.you can go down for supermarket and restuarant. starbuck locate at opposite and paris banquet is not too far. staff is very nice ,just one thing complain is lift too small.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 1.The hotel is in the good location, near to subway and shopping market so it is convenient to go to eveywhere.2. The receptionist are goods in english and pay attention to everyone also very friendly and helpful stuff.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is excellent. Very near to myeongdong station and bus stop to/fro airport. Room is clean, tidy, decent and quite spacious. 3rd time to Seoul, 1st time staying at Nine Tree. I will definitely return and book this hotel again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: if ur looking for a place near myeongdong thats affordable & clean then this is the place, not that classy but rates are really a check if ur on a budget. Should just check if ur choice have breakfast, theirs is not that fancy but it will do. They have a lounge where you can do your laundry while having coffee.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spacious room at perfect location.Nice lounge with free coffee and tea! I like that they posted the guest comments on the wall, which shows the hotel does value what their guests and opinions.Very green hotel with minimal amenities.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is right in Myeongdong if you just want to shop all day in Seoul that’s the hotel for you. However there are plenty of much better hotels if you’d stay slightly further away Myeongdong.The room didn’t even have a window, the only window is in the bathroom. Not good at all for anyone who has claustrophobia! The room was so extremely hot and I couldn’t adjust the temperature. There was either a fan or air purifier behind the bed, the buttons were all in Korean, I tried to turn it on but it didn’t help at all. Wallpaper was peeling off the wall and I I could see the cable, please see my pictures.Breakfast was included in my package and I really regretted this as well. Very limited food selection and supply. Staff was over worked and wouldn’t refill, leaving empty plates in the buffet table.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is truly in the heart of the city, the street market, subway access, even a 7/11 only one minute away.. The full breakfast was really good too, all you could eat!!! Each room has a bidet, a very nice feature.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked the hotel for 7 nights due to its ideal location at myeongdong. Nearest subway station exit is less than 30m. The room was nice, clean and comfortable. I was given a big and spacious room at level 14 but request to change to a room with a view of myeongdong shopping street. The whole room changing process completed within a few minutes after calling in the reception. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who wish to hang around myeongdong.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is situated in a great location and convenient. Very clean and nice hotel. Reception Service is good too. You can even book car charter to go around :) Definately will return to stay next time I visit Korea again!
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A well located hotel right smack at Myeongdong shopping street. Service is good and the room is clean. All the basic necessities are available. A little surprised that guests have to get toiletries from the reception. Only complaint is that the room is a bit small.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good service and the place is at the heart of Myeongdong Market, 3 minutes walk to myeongdong station. From Seoul take line 4, two stops from seoul station. Street food start around 5:00 pm until midnight. Hust outside there is 7/11 store and famous korean Mart where you can get different kind of seaweeds and almond nuts(Falvored) close to Lotte Outlet and walking distance to Namdaemun Market.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good service and the staff very friendly and helpful... i lost my pocket wifi inside the airport bus, and the hotel receptionist help me to call the bus company and inform me ASAP, I finally i get back my pocket wifi..
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located on a very good location for shopping ..eating n also transport from airport ! Staff are nice, and also very helpful !Rooms is normally clean! Compare with 2years ago..it still a very nice living experience for me !!!The price is also very reasonable ! Good choice !
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here 5 nights. This hotel is very convenient as its right at myeondong centre makes shopping and eating very easily. Room is clean but the first night we had a no view room and got it changed the second night. Would come back here again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is an amazing hotel near all shopping store and great restaurants and awesome street food. Airport limousine are just down the street and also near a major train station that will make it easy to travel anywhere in Seoul
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was my second stay in the property. First was last December and First week of March. I primarily booked this hotel because of location. It's still in the thick of Myeongdong. Very near the airport bus stop (6015). I found the room to be adequately-sized. Japanese-style washlet. Basic amenities and free coffee in the lounge. Cons maybe the bathtub and shower all-in-one and the breakfast. Though I would still recommend it as price-point is great for a well-located hotel. Will stay again this September.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very close to Myeong-dong station exit 8 and the shopping area, the staff were nice. My family were stayed in a triple room with 3 single beds. The room was clean and comfort. Room space were enough for us. However, there was only one hook in the bathing room. Hope the hotel can add extra clothes hanging rack in the room. There was a water dispenser with hot and cold water outside the lift lobby.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent service, Great location, Good staff. Rooms are spacious and very neat. Bathroom has big shower area. GS 24hour store on ground level. Rooms serviced every day. Close to subway and many attractions.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is excellent, the airport bus no. 6015 gets off at the terminus and arrives in about 2 minutes after getting off the bus. The room is clean and tidy, the shopping area is downstairs, and many restaurants are nearby.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is great in myeongdong. Minutes away to subway n airport limousine bus stop. Room is also good well maintained. Previously stayed twice before at Nine Tree. Great location easy access to everything.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: close to bus station & metro. right in the shopping district. convenient store just downstairsThe room's insulation is not so good, but room is clean, staff are very kind and helpfulWill choose to stay in the future
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel location is convenience, just 1 minute to Myeong-dong and the bus stop to airport, the room is clean and comfortable also itbprovide a free coffee and tea. The front desk staff are helpful and polite
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Nine Tree Hotel for 8 days...The location is excellent, near subway, the night markets are just outside and for a muslim, easy to get halal food, besides from the night market, its close to D seoul nasi lemak and Kampungku. Its convenient for shopping, lots of shops around for last miniute shopping or souveniers hunting. Pick up point for bus rides to Nami Island, Vivaldi Park etc is also within walking distance. Have to compliment the cleaning lady of our room at 16th floor from 14 feb to 21 feb... She did more than her job requirement, she makes our clothes on d clothes rail look neater as we have alot of clothes due to winter the hangers are not enough so we just hang at the rail. There is coin laundry at 11F, which is also convenient for us, as our daughter vomitted on her jacket and we can have it clean that night itself. Communication with the front desk is easy as they communicate well in english. If we come back to Korea, will definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is spacious, clean, and with all the things that your need. There is a complimentary drinks counter at 11F, self-served one.Very close to the shops and Myeongdong station.Staff are helpful and friendly.
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is clean and staff are really friendly. I was unhappy with certain arrangement in my room allocation. After confiding to her about my problem, she went the extra mile to help me. This is why a hotel stands out with some good employee! Daebak!!
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 8 nights and was super convenient.. just a few steps away from airport bus which is handy if you have lots of luggage. room was clean, and slightly small but that was because we had the corner room. But I had a peek at other rooms and they seemed slightly bigger. The hotel offers all the necessary amenities which is good, eand also ems which is good. Overall great stay
hotelName:
5    Nine Tree Hotel Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family and I spent three weeks at Lotte Hotel World enjoying a range of activities. The hotel is extremely well located and pretty much what you'd expect at this range. What stands out for us is the wonderful staff. Matthew Kim at Concierge in particular was an absolute pleasure. He really went the extra mile to ensure that my family and I were well looked after in a city that we're not very familiar with. So, many thanks for that.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for a few nights at the Lotte World Hotel and had an overall wonderful stay.It started off a little rocky in that they my name mixed up with someone of a similar name from Russia, but we were able to get it worked out.The service overall was amazing. One anecdote: I had forgotten to pack my ties and didn't realize it until 6am on the day when I had to give a presentation at a nearby medical conference. Although there's tons of luxury, duty-free shopping nearby, nothing was open that early in the morning. As such, the concierge (Mark Shim) took off his own tie and let me borrow it for the day. It was a "give you the shirt off my back" moment. He definitely went above and beyond the call of duty on that one.Other aspects of the hotel are that the lobby area is nicely appointed and likely recently remodeled. The only downside was that the rooms are a bit dated and could use a remodel (at least the one that we were in).It has a fantastic location since a major subway station is right there (the Korea subway system kicks butt and is better than all the other ones I've been on including Japan, NY, Paris, London. If you have kids, Lotte World is in the same building and don't forget to check out the Lotte Tower across the street. 123 floors and the view is amazing. 5th tallest building in the world and also has its own Lotte-affiliated hotel.We would definitely stay here again when we return to Korea. It's a great place.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was comfortable at this hotel but it does feel a little old. The location is fantastic, and you're just a stone's throw away from the train station, the Lotte Tower and the mall. It would have been good to have a power outlet at the bedside table. It was a little annoying to have to charge my phone by the TV. The breakfast buffet was pretty lavish, and had plenty to choose from.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've been traveling to and around Seoul for over 20 years. This weekend was my twin daugter's 10th birthday. They wanted to do some activities in Seoul and Lotte Hotel World was a convenient location for us.During check-in, while chatting with the Front Desk clerk, I mentioned we were in Seoul for my kid's birthday. A few minutes later he told be he upgraded our room to one with a view of Lotte World Theme Park.My kids were estatic. We had a great view looking down into the park and the room was decorated with many Lotte World characters (wallpaper, blankets, sheets, etc...) The bathroom also had sinks at both adult andchild level. Definitely, the designers had kids in mind when designing the room.The room was very clean and everything was in good shape. I must also add the beds and pillows were VERY comfortable. For the location, service, room quality, you can't do much better than the Lotte Hotel World
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A Landmark property in Seoul, this is my fourth visit within 10 years and the quality is sustainable, breathtaking looks on the city from the high floors, service and check-in& check-out effective, WiFi - fast and reliable, good sleep quality. However, apparently, renovation is needed!
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First having problems to get with the taxi the right Lotte hotel, because we had a late check in after midnight. We found finally the LOTTE WORLD HOTEL and we received a very warm welcome even after midnight !The room was good, great look to the Sky tower and Park.we could join the club at the 28 floor, great breakfast, lunch/ and afternoon tea. Very friendly services. All in all a pleasure being there.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Traveling with my friend, it was very great experience. we had a good time while we were staying at seoul. Even if the facilities were a litte old, the staff were always smiling and very friendly.Very easy to reach to the restaurants, shopping center, theater and amusement park etc.., so it was convenient to move. Most are available by walking. Breakfast was reletively diverse and neat, but was crowded with many peaple.. the staff was very busy..Also close to subway station and airport limousine bus station and good free wifi evreywhere in the hotel.Because of convenient location and transportation, I recommend business people or family travel, but it is best for family travel. My friend and I were generally satisfied during our stay. If i visit Seoul again next time, I would lite to stay at Lotte hotel.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located close to Lotte stores, a decent hotel but seems a little dated, the breakfast spread is good but not great for vegetarians. You cannot expect much veg options in Korea still there were fruits and vegan breads available. I would say it was a decent stay.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Accommodative and friendly staffs, clean and spacious, lots of activities to do nearby.. Cheers to the receptionist person who gave us the room with a perfect view of the Lotte Tower! Worth the money.The staff were very friendly and the location is great as it is next to Lotte World Park and opposite of Lotte Tower. Also easy access to the subway.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed there for the third time and the hotel needs renovation badly. Flooring, carpet and bathrooms are fairly shabby. Aircon had been centrally switched off although room was warm and stuffy. Internet speed is like working through a modem. What a shame for high-tech Korea. Breakfast is ok but breads/ pastry is not fresh. Hotel looks shiny and modern on first impression but avoid for longer stays.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here multiple times mostly on business trips to Seoul. It's a nice location with a free shuttle to Itaewon and other Lotte hotel in Dongdaemun. Lots of Chinese tourists seem to be staying here.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: ...unfortunately we were a couple. Nevertheless, I picked the hotel for it’s convenience to Gangnam and other areas south of the river. Was very convenient in the freezing winter to be dropped off by the KAL Limo bus from Incheon Airport at the hotel’s doorstep, and to access the subway via the underground connector under the hotel. Getting to the malls and the Lotte World Tower was a breeze too, sheltered from the cold.Hotel was traditionally furnished, but very well maintained for an older hotel. Room service is has an excellent selection, although one of the highest priced I have ever experienced - eg. USD 25 for a club sandwich. Service was very efficient, effective and professional, although lacked warmth - but that’s typical of Korean service. Would recommend and a great option if you plan to stay in the area and spend time at the surrounding malls. Otherwise this modern area lacks the more interesting Seoul culture that you’d otherwise get in MyeongDong.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All Experience in Lotte is Excellent, they care about my family and my travel memories in South Korea.My family loves Lotte due to an amusement park and convenience location (shops and public is reachable by foot)
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Visited Seoul for a week and spent a night there. It has big beautiful Christmas tree in the lobby. Staffs were all very kind, the room was nice and clean. It’s located close to shopping mall which is very convineient. After all it was a great stay.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location of hotel, very convenient with Lotte world and mall connected to the hotel. The subway station is a stone throw away.The room is simple and breakfast is fine.I was about to give a rather good rating till what happened tonight. It was a rainy night and I was hoping to grab a taxi to go for a short walkaround . Not knowing Korean, I was expecting the doorman to help me. However, instead he shove me to the taxi stand nearby. There was not even a line. I was not even sure if the folks there were queuing or waiting for the taxi called from their app. Feeling helpless, I returned to the concierge to face another sympathetic face. Finally I decided to stay in the room as the night was already spoilt.The hotel is very well catered for locals or shoppers, business traveler might want to stay away.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very large hotel - make sure that you book high floor (above 15) otherwise your view might be miserable (depending what side of the hotel). Breakfast room is horrible (Noisy, unfriendly, nobody cares, etc.) - you might as well go into the shopping mall underneath to any shop - you will feel more welcome.Rooms small simple but clean.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The service was quite good, the room comfortable and clean. However, if you're looking for modern luxury, this may not be for you.The furnishings and interiors are dated, and I had a light that kept on going out. The room also felt quite generic and impersonal (but this goes for majority of chain business hotels - just saying that you shouldn't expect this place or others like it to have much character).Overall a fine stay for a business trip, though nothing stellar.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First time visiting Seoul with great joy, stay at a hotel that is one of the magnets in Seoul. The most complete hotel with various needs and recreation. A very strategic location and easy to get public transportation. I really enjoyed it...
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were advised this was a 5 star hotel but this is far from that. The reception may be that but not the rooms.Old, dated and small but the staff were friendly and accommodating.Very overpriced for what you get. Shop around.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've stayed at this hotel for quite a few different occasions. While traveling for business it was close to the places I needed to go, and I also came here with my family as well. I can't help but criticize the room accommodations. First of all the only power outlet is a strip next to the TV instead of near the bed. This means all of your tech needs to charge there and you will need to part with your phone unless you have a 10' cord. The linens in the rooms are very old, and you can see the wear and tear. Above all they are not even very soft. The towels are so rough I wouldn't even use them to wash my car. The bidet on the toilet is also very odd. It doesn't exactly fit the toilet itself and you can see the seat is not flush with the actual toilet. The trash bin next to the sink is also very strange. There is no trash bag, the bin itself is wired, and if you throw away contacts or qtips it would just hit the floor. However there is a tiny black trash bin looking thing next to the toilet that is hard to aim into. Also getting a taxi is very inconvenient. I had one case where I went to wait at the taxi line, 30' to the right of the main entrance with a taxi placard, but had people walking out of the lobby snag my taxi before I had a chance. The employee was not paying attention to me until she already sat the other customers into the taxi. After I gave her a stare she walked over and apologized. I think she just wanted to stay in the shade instead of actually doing her job the right way. On the bright side this hotel is surrounded by convenience. You have the subway and bus terminal about 5 minutes from the lobby elevator. A huge selection of food in the basement, the department store, and across the street in the mall. The aquarium and Lotte world is also a 5 minute walk. Anyone traveling with children would love it here. The new Pororo land inside Lotte World is an amazing playground for toddlers. Overall if you're coming with children this is a great hotel, but remember you're paying the high price for convenience not the room amenities.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was lovely to stay at Lotte hotel world. There is a theme park right next to the hotel and we loved there as well! As this whole cluster is called 'World', all areas are connected so you can have a nice holiday here by yourself. There is everything including - Department store, Shopping sectors, cafe, restaurants, amusement park etc.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent service, helpful and friendly from the Club Lounge manager Rain Lee and Suzy Kim. I have my coffee serviced to me even before I am sitting down. They help me through checking in, during my stay and checking out as smooth as possible.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed here last month for a staycation! I was really happy with the view and the surrounding area. There was a fairly large mall to enjoy and a nice lake nearby :). The one thing we didn't love was the carpet, but it was kept very clean so it wasn't too bad. We also saw there was an amusement park beside the building but didnt get the chance to check it out.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have no reason not to stay this hotel because of the view of room.And I think this hotel was with many advantages such as good servieces from employees and comfortable rooms.해외 여행 어디를 가도 다 뜨거운 여름.. 저희 가족은 롯데호텔월드로 휴가 다녀왔습니다. 요즘 호캉스 호캉스 하는데.. 저희 가족도 호캉스 몇 번 하다보니 자연스레 여름 휴가는 호텔로 오는 것 같아요.롯데호텔월드는 근처에 쇼핑몰과 맛집들이 다 이어져 있어서 선택했어요! 바로 옆에 롯데월드도 있어서 아이들도 좋아하고요... 특히 스위트룸의 전망이 정말 좋았답니다..! 룸컨디션도 아주 좋았고 리모컨부터 컵 하나하나 따로 비닐에 쌓여있어서 안심하고 사용했습니다. 중식당 도림이 유명하다하여 이용했는데, 전망도 끝내주지만 직원들의 서비스와 음식의 퀄리티에 더 만족했네요.. 다음 휴가도 롯데호텔 월드로 선택할 것 같아요~ 덕분에 휴가 잘 즐기다 갑니다. 감사해요~
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed with my wife at Lotte Hotel World for five days. As usual, the staff was very friendly and professional. The service was excellent from all aspects. The room was comfortable and clean. We stayed at executive level so the executive lounge was part of the package. So we invited our friends for light dinner gathering most of the days. The atmosphere of the lounge provided all of us with a comfortable and enjoyable gathering every night. In addition to the food and service at the lounge, the lounge manager Mr. Tae Sun Oh (오태선) served drinks during our gathering and really made our gathering very very memorable. No double to come and stay at Lotte Hotel World when we visit Seoul.Mr. Tae Sun Oh (오태선) really make our stay pleasant and enjoyable
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall it was good but room carpets are super dirty. Lobby impressive hallway clean. But room carpet room needs to be changed it’s so yakking. Lots of spots, it looks 100 years old carpet . Breakfast buffet just ok. Not good as Lotte hotel Seoul in Myongdong.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed there for business for a few days. Beautiful hotel with amazing views, lovely rooms, great facilities, and a brilliant shopping location (and linked to Lotte World which is apparently great but which I did not visit). Nothing comes cheap in this hotel but that is hardly surprising given its standard. I will definitely stay here again on my next visit.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good:Extremely professional and service oriented staff. Absolutely top!!!Facility is great. Hotel is very pleasant and perfect for my business meetings.The cappuccino was great.Negative:The lobby cafe is freezing cold. The air condition is complete out of control. You need a winter jacket in the cafe. 15 USD for a cappuccino is too much even for a luxury hotel.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment I walked in to check in, to the moment I checked out I felt welcomed.Everyone was really awesome even down to walking me to the elevator when I checked in and taking my bag when I went to check out.I stayed here during the Ultra Korea Music Festival and I highly recommend this hotel in general.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family had a trip in Soul on 14-18 May. We stayed in Lotte Hotel world only 1 night. It’s a wonderful hotel in the center of seoul. Next door is shopping center, u can shopping in hold day. The staff was friendly and nice. The bell team is almost girl. It’s so different from another hotel. They were helpful and careful. My family had dinner in hotel restaurant, it’s so delicious. We will come back here in the future!!!
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel very well located next to several stores and restaurants.Rooms clean and very confortable.Excelent breakfast ...it was a very pleasant stay, staff very helpful and pleasantExcellent stay - highly recommended.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I went in this hotel during 5 nights due to business in Seul. The staff is very kind and everyone is able to talk in English. The location is pretty nice and it is possible go walking around to shopping, to sight seen and other very nice attraction which there are nearby the hotel. The room is confortable and clean. The shower is very good. The breakfast worht it 30 dolares because there are a lot of options of fruits, iogurts, breads, cheese and other continental and oriental menu. The hotel is very fancy. The air conditioner could be better. Some nights I woke up feeeling hot. If I would need to come back to Seul, I´d like to stay in this hotel again.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I love how the hotel was very near transportation (airport bus and subway) as well as many restaurants and shopping mall nearby. I also loved how friendly the staff was upon check in and check out. The bed was comfy and room was clean. I would definitely stay in this hotel again!
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The bed was very comfortable and the pillows were nice as well. The bathroom had a Japanese bidet on the toilet seat which was nice. The location of this hotel is what really sets it apart. First, this is the first stop on the Jamsil line for the Korean Air Limo Bus. Second, the hotel sits on top of the green metro line. Lastly, both the Lotte Department Store and the new Lotte World Tower are all accessible via underground tunnels. All in all, this is a great hotel, especially if you have kids bc an amusement park is next door in addition to a real park with a running track made of rubber around one of the lakes. This is an old hotel that shows some wear and tear in some places but I would gladly stay here again.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed on the Club Floor. Check-in is run from a small desk on this floor, by pass main check-in and head to the lifts. There is also a free bar and buffet area which is open till 9pm. Worth a visit for a night cap. Same room as breakfast.The hotel is next to the tallest building in Korea, worth a visit to see the city at dusk.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked early enough and paid minimum. Very convenient location as there are A LOT of things to do at the door step. It's great to be back here. Room (3 twins) is an average size like any other 5-star hotels in Asia. It's hard to find 2 queen sized beds in a standard room like in North America. A friendly staff all around.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: it was new building and landmark of the south korea.it has beautiful view. you can see down all seoul.cannot find higher than this building.lotte hotel world also have the biggest duty free shop ans well as great shopping mall down stair.also you can visit world biggest movie theater.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Quiet rooms, comfortable bed with 2-3 varieties of pillows thrown in, fast wi-fi, great gym (+ a 3 km track around the lagoon outside to run) and great service (shout out to the cleaning lady on the 24th floor who provided me with a replacement iPhone charger within 5 mins of determining that the one provided as standard in the room by the hotel didn't work), besides a great spread at breakfast. Taxis always available just outside + across the road from 2 malls. All that a business traveller needs. I'm definitely going back on my next visit.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed there 2 nights for business. Good decent room. OK breakfast. Good wifi as well as good service.Highly recommended. During night the room was too hot. No shower just bath.. Not easy to go out from it.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Word class hotel located at Jamsil Seoul South Korea. A perfect place to stay in and have your shopping at the Lotte World Mall located just in front of it. Lotte World is also located nearby which is one of Koreas best place to go likened to Disney world.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I’ve stayed at look to hotel a few times throughout the past years and I don’t know why I keep coming back. I personally think it’s overpriced and a bit too big- but this is all my own personal preference. This hotel is most definitely an iconic Korean resort with much to offer and it is good for families and couples. It’s very big and has a convinient department store next door. (highly recommend checking out) along with many restaurants and even Lotte World. I enjoyed the restaurant buffet at the hotel for dinner and breakfast.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very efficient korean service standards. We were attended to prompt service to store our luggage before check-in and after check-out. We check-in on 31 Dec for the countdown and it was an easy walk to the seokchon lake and avoided the crazy human traffic for subway after countdown.Our room overlooked Magic Island and the room was adequate.We also chose this hotel for their airport bus stop situated right in front. So we do not need to carry our heavy luggage up/down the subway.The hotel has underground walkways linking to shopping centers and food, so it was great for us.We also checked out the sauna and swimming pool and found it to be nice facilities for relaxation.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I with 2 young kids stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in late December 2017. The staffs were friendly and well-experienced.When we booked this hotel, we thought that it is located in Lotte World. Lotte World is a 5-minute outdoor walk from the hotel (South entrance). Alternatively, you can also reach Lotte World indoor via the Lotte Shopping Centre/Lotte Mart, but will take you about 15 minutes. The Lotte World Aquarium is also located in a nearby building, which is a short walking distance from the hotel.There is also a complimentary hotel shuttle that runs to Lotte Hotel Seoul in Myeongdong and other nearby tourist sites such as Insadong and Itaewon.The Concierge desk is very helpful with arranging tours. We wanted a private tour to play snow sled, which they helped contact the tour company.There is a KAL limousine bus that comes to the hotel. But note that the bus stop is located outside the hotel at the street level, and not at the hotel's parking lot. It can be quite cold during Winter if you have to wait for the bus.I would recommend this hotel to families with young kids as the location to Lotte World and Lotte Aquarium is very near. COEX Mall is about 3 kilometers away from the hotel.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is just next to lotte world and the lotte department store. We can easily go to the amusement park to play and as well as go for shopping around. There are many good food choices offered for their breakfast buffet in their hotel. It was scrumptious.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would not want to stay anywhere else. Near to all attractions (Lotte World Adventure, Pororo Park, Kidzania, Aquarium, etc). Very convenient to get there from airport. Took a direct KAL limo bus and it stopped right in front of the hotel. Travelling around Seoul was so easy with the train station just below the hotel. Lots of eateries and 7 11 convenience stores within 1.5km radius. Oh, did I miss out the Lotte mart? Good place to buy groceries or stock up on Korean products before we head home.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lotte Hotel World has excellent beds (that are quite big too). Great bathroom with bathtub. Very tidy and clean. Quiet. There is a wonderful Spa that is free of cost for all guest from 6 AM until 10 PM (with 5 pools). The breakfast room is so great! Fresh food in a big variety. Everything is tidy and fresh. Kind and helpful staff. Good service. Close to subway. There is a shuffle bus to and from the international airport that stops at the hotel - with big seats. South Korea is beautiful and calm. Friendly. It was an experience of a life time :-)
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have spent one night in this hotel on 6th of November. This hotel is absolutely fantastic as is. It has everything you can expect. Swimming pool gym amusement park kids cafe literally everything. Even the price is reasonably cheap. Room is clean and spacious compare to other business hotel. Don't judge this hotel by its rumor. It is one of the greatest hotel in korea. Two thumbs up! Thank you for the kindness to the staffs!
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Facilities and services were quite good but the air in the room was really bad. I don’t know why but when I’ve came to the room, Me and my family always have coughed.Hence I could not recommend this standard room for whom has a very little baby.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location to shopping & Lotte Indoor Amusement Park. It’s close to train station, bus stops and shopping malls. Across the hotel is across new Seoul Sky Tower with breathtaking view of Seoul. My family mostly enjoyed the indoor & outdoor amusement park during our trip. Getting around Seoul is very convenient from this hotel.Thanks,CrisYigo, Guam USA
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed with a large group for a conference in the business centres. Overall the staff were friendly and provided great service. Breakfast buffet wasn't very broad but adequate. The rooms were nice but the bathroom showed signs of age. Beds were COMFY - I did enjoy them! On source of annoyance for all of our party was that the wifi would continually drop out and require a sign in when ever not in use for >5 minutes.I would recommend this hotel!
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Lotte Hotel World is an excellent hotel with a perfect location. The hotel is nice, comfortable and relaxing with courteous staff. You can literately walk down to 3-4 shopping plazas with great choice of food and shopping. Access to train station is also easy.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good service from check in counter, friendly staff, they speak good english. Room housekeeping was prompt and satisfactory. Big plus point is the nearby shopping mall and many restaurant. However, the mattress was a bit hard for my back. Overall is satisfactory
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Decent business hotel on par with a Marriott or Hyatt. Some stuff will seem weird to western sensibilities (like the stuffed animals in the lobby.). Excellent breakfast buffet with western, Korean, Chinese and Japanese options. Check out the food court underneath the mall/hotel.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a good luxurious hotel, offering nice and big rooms. Very clean and in good condition, luxury and with a comforatable bed. For both, private and business trip this is a choice you can go with. I would say, for everything this hotel is quite good (location, service, rooms, design, the lobby, breakfast, etc.), really nothing is missing. But at the same time I did not really feel it is special either. There are hotels so nice and impressing that one would want to come back just for the hotel. This is not this one. But if you just need a good, luxurious place to stay at good location, with good service and so on, and especially if you want to go shopping close by (new shopping mall opposite), this is a good choice. For the good prize it offers everything you need and may expect.
hotelName:
6    Lotte Hotel World
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I'm staying at Hotel PJ for 11 nights. I felt extremely comfortable going in and out of the hotel without worries and the rooms were clean and spacious. I listed some pros and cons below:Pros:- Housekeeping always made sure to keep the room clean. If any additional requests like towels or slippers are needed, they would help immediately. Also flexible on when they can clean your room simply by asking them.- Two bath robes are provided in the room and can have them changed everyday on request. A lot of hotels these days don't seem to provide a bath robe, or only one.- Room slippers are changed everyday along with basic necessities like shampoo, shower gel, toothbrush, etc.- Coin laundry with dryer on 8th floor to get quick laundry done.- A very small and quiet gym also on 8th floor that doesn't get utilized much so feels very private for exercises like yoga.- Guest lounge at lobby has 2 Macs (actual Mac and not Windows) to use along with good couches and free tea.- Hotel can hold all your luggage during pre-check-in or check-out which is definitely helpful.- First floor cafe attached to hotel has a very lively environment, with a special wedding-like decoration on weekends.- This hotel is located nearby 3 different subway stations which means there's 4 different subway lines you can get around the city. Each station is about 5 minute walking distance. Very centralized location!Cons:- The surrounding stores and neighborhood feel very old, need to walk a bit to feel modern.- Constant constructions in the area- No traffic light in front of hotel and require to look both sides and hope for the best to cross across, literally frog hopper- The gym is not for weightlifting as there's no dumbbells or benches, just yoga mats, bikes and climbing?- The computers at business lounge 8th floor (where gym is) are very old, Intel Pentium chips. Those are the only Windows computers I found that I can access.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am staying in for 5 day vacation with my 2 daughters. Day 1- staff very accommodating. Although i had a hard time cause i dont speak the language but they are able to instruct me where to go for my sightseeing. They have free shuttle bus that takes you to myeongdon center which is a plus plus. The hotel is very clean. They also allowed me to chech in earlier and provided free drinks while we wait.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel and its rooms are both big and spacious. Loved that they offered free shuttle around Seoul, which made it very easy to go to and from the hotel. I just wish the shuttle guide they provide indicated the exact stop location as it was not clear that the morning and night routes have different drop off and pick up points. Wasn’t also a fan of the hotel’s location as it is quite a walk to the nearest train station and the surrounding community seems a bit shady for me. Appreciated that the room we got was upgraded (thanks!) however, there was a dead mosquito on the wall, a fly flying around, and hair inside the mini refrigerator. All the negatives aside, the rest of the facilities were fine. Check in and check out were a breeze. The self baggage storage was really nice. Might consider booking again when I return to Seoul.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room and building are kind of old but acceptable. It takes about 8-10 minutes to the nearest subway station; recommended to couples or family w/o children. Baggage locker is available at the hotel and really convenient; they do have enough space for people who bring large luggage.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here 4 night and was very pleased with the hotel amenities. The staff was fluent in English and Chinese. The breakfast was a bit pricey but was diverse choice of American and Asian options. My daughter loved the omelet station. One of the best amenities in the room was outlets that had built in adapters that worked for my family from Hong Kong, Japan and America! There were 2 convenient stores and a nice coffee/tea shop next to the hotel. All in all this was a great option in Myeongdong!
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Memorable vacation in Seoul. Very helpful free shuttle service to places nearby and at almost late shuttle service also available. Safe area to stay. Courteous shuttle bus service staff.Many convenient stores nearby, food and restaurant nearby is also good. Close to a lot of places to go to.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great facilities and location, staff were very helpful and overall stay was pleasant. Will definitely recommend!Area is desirable and cafe and lounge is very nice. Thanks for making our stay in Seoul memorable!
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Front desk was very welcoming and provided excellent customer service. Clean and modern hotel - beat expectations. Shuttle service provides easy access to key attractions. Will return next time when I go to Seoul !
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was clean and fairly modern. The location was also convenient and very close to the subway. Staff were also very helpful if you need a taxi called to any tourist spots or the airport. I would recommend this hotel for a more affordable option in Myeongdong.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: PJ Hotel is my fave place to stay when I am in Seoul. I have stayed here many times and they only keep improving their services. This time the fron desk manager let me check in early as the room was available. It was a surprise as I was very tired that day after a long flight and very much in need of a shower and a bed. The room is spacious and very clean. The housekeepers are meticulous and efficient. The hotel provides a free shuttle service which is an added bonus and the hotel is a few minutes walk from 4 subway lines. Its also walking distance to Kwangjang market where I get my street food fix. There is also a 24hr convenience store which makes it safe to go for a midnight snack. I highly recommend this hotel to stay. I have already booked my Sept stay here already!!!!
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel, clean and large room, comfy bedding, very well maintained hotelFriendly staffs, excellent service. Free shuttle bus services to nearby tourist attractions & shopping districts is a bonus.walking distance to stations.Don't putt off by the dark / alley walk from station at night. it is very safe in Seoul.Will stay again Highly recommended.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Not gonna lie but the hotel stay was better than expected especially since we got it for a pretty reasonable price online ! Though we arrived too early for check in , the hotel staff at the front desk were really helpful in helping getting our luggage stored and in providing loads of useful information ! As we booked our hotel with breakfast , the breakfast varies slightly day by day so overall it was pretty worthwhile if you would like to omit the hassle of finding food in the morning ( though it would be fun too :) ) The staff handling the breakfast were quite understanding too, allowing us to go in 5 mins earlier than the opening time (7:00) when we explained that we had to rush to catch a tour at 7:45 . The shuttle bust and the rooms are just simply wonderful ! Overall would recommend staying here though it’s quite a bit of a walk from the nearest stations but if you’re up for a few mins (9 mins walk to Euljiro station and Chungmuro ( if I’m nt mistaken ) and a 18 mins walk to Myeongdong station !
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would like to compliment the Front Desk staff. Firstly we arrived on an early flight from KL and although normal book in time is 1400, they arranged for our rooms to be ready at 1130. Not only was this much appreciated by our elderly parents (aged 90 and 80), but when we found the bathroom was unsuitable for them (shower in bath) they upgraded them to a bigger room with a walk in shower at no additional cost. This was done quickly and very professionally. So a big thank you to them!The other great feature is the free shuttle bus servicing all the shopping areas around Myeongdong. A great service that runs on time!
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall was a pleasant stay.There is ample eateries and convienence stores nearby which is a plus point in case you are looking for food anytime.Walking distance to the nearest train station and also the coach buses to n fro from Icheon Airport.The hotel do provide shuttle services to certain popular spot tho..Will return when i visit Korea again...
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was very good to choose this hotel with my parents. We used a three-bedroom, the size of the bed was reasonable and the room was clean, so it was good. The front staffs were always kind and answered questions late at night with a smile.If I come to Korea again, I will choose this hotel.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located in the heart of Seoul. The rooms are clean and comfortable with free Wi-Fi. The hotel is also within walking distant to a range of good local restaurants. There is a free bus shuttle service that loops around a few local train stations that is conveniently located next to various shopping districts you can explore. Hotel staff are friendly and obliging, ensuring your stay is a comfortable one.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel PJ was great all around for us. It’s well built, well furnished and decorated, comfortable and quiet. Balcony was nice, breakfast was great, free city core circuit bus was great. It’s in a re-developing part of town so the neighborhood is mixed. We enjoyed eating at the nearby non-fancy family restaurants. Hotel has staff that speak English well enough for communication, but be advised that most people and establishments on the ROK do not speak English, and many signs and menus employ only Hangul lettering. So absent an interpreter, it’s a difficult country to visit. But we found the people to be helpful and warm, and we never felt unsafe anywhere.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I came to korea becuz my business trip here. This is my 3rd or 4th trip in asia. But i think this hotel was very nice and warm greeting. When i checked in first time front desk who wore glasses has nice smile. I simply silmiles back to him. He explained nicely!!! I went gangnam(?) most of time but this was my first time in myundong. anway it was nice stay here in pj’. Mr. Park was very nice guy. I asked him abt this area he expalined me welll. I didnt know what to eat newr here but he was very helpful. It was little late night i wanted have some snacks w/ traditional foods and famous things to eat. He was very nice and i wish i could see him when i come back to seoul.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room condition was overall cosy and good:) However, the most impressive thing was the friendly staff. Since I wasnt familiar with this area I could tell the staff were so willing to help me.In addition, the surrounding is tranquil so you might enjoy your personal time without any interruption:)I especially liked the cafe in the ground floor:)
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved this hotel. The hotel itself was very nice and the location was great. We stayed here twice during our visit to Seoul. The first part of our trip, we stayed 5 nights in a standard double which was pretty large. The buffet breakfast which had a pretty good selection of items was included in our price. The best thing about the hotel was their courtesy shuttle that took us to most of the popular spots like the Myeong-Dong, Insa-Dong and Dongdaemun Shopping areas,the Namdaemun Market, the Shinsegae and Lotte Dept Stores, The hotel was close to two of the local train station stops. They have a coffee shop and bakery on site and a convenience store just outside the hotel. They also have a coin laundry on the premises as well as a business center and fitness room. On the second part of our stay, we booked a balcony deluxe twin. Unfortunately, this room seemed older and the balcony didn't offer much of a view due to all the construction going on in the area. The beds and bedding were very comfortable.The staff were all very friendly and helpful and there was always someone who could understand enough English to provide assistance. The only negative would be that when they have a wedding there, the coffee shop would be closed because the weddings seem to take place there. But to see the floral decorations was worth the inconvenience since there were numerous coffee shops near the hotel.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect location, probably 10 mins walks to the famous shopping district. Hotel is clean and comfortable! Shuttle bus service is provided to different tourist spots. I'll definitely come back to this same hotel again.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel PJ Myeongdong is easy to find. Walk out of exit 10 of euljiro 4ga and walk for about 5 mins. This place is really a value for price. The lobby was impressive and they even have an exquisite lounge for all guest with complementary tea. The front desk and concierge were friendly and helpful, as we were starving from an early flight out of Hong Kong we basically didn't have much food. They showed us some really good place down the road, with really friendly ahjussi and ahjumma who feeds you with a lot of banchan.
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was in the perfect location. Short walking distance from train stations and airport bus stops. Decent local restaurants nearby, 24hr convenience store on first floor of the hotel. Close to historic centre of the city and shopping malls(their free shuttle goes to Myeongdong and Dongdaemun shopping centre). The staffs were very well trained, room was spacious and comfortable. Highly recommended to stay in Seoul!
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in PJ Myeongdong during my first visit to Seoul and it was a pleasant and joyful experience, the hotel was clean, the rooms spacious, the beds comfortable and the staff were cheerful and helpfulThe fact that Myeongdong shopping street is only few minutes away is a big bonus I will definitely stay there again
hotelName:
7    Hotel PJ Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Not worthy certificate of excellence. Not even near it. Don’t get fooled by the rating thinking you making a good choice. Why? I will tell you and show you why.Short versionBad locationBad cleaningUnprotected Wi-FiNo luggage serviceBad surrounding areaBad soundisolation and very noisyMostly Chinese tourists, they seem to like this hotel.Free drinks are not drinks but coffee, not even tea is ok!A lying reception, first they don’t provide AC, then AC is not working, then it suddenly works (turned on by hotel).Long version.Let me start by explaining that this hotel is not in the tourist part of myeongdong, not sure it can be considered to be in myeongdong at all? That is why they offer shuttlebus service because walking to the touristspots takes 20 minutes. But the tall Korean guy with glasses in reception did not even mention the shuttlebus service to us upon arrival. Instead he gave us the room closest to the construction side with lots of noises. There is constructions going on around the hotel, mostly on the east side and a school also. That means lots of noises and early also! I knew they had lots of empty rooms because I booked same day, so I asked the same guy for another room. He lied saying they don’t have any but I insisted they had and was given another room. This time with a non-working AC. When I told him the AC is not on he said we do not provide AC. At that point I was really angry been lied 2 twice by the reception upon arrival and not offered any good service at all! I showed him the email of my confirmation and hotelpage saying clearly there is AC in the rooms. So he replied that it is not working. Later he called our room saying it will be on in 1 hour.
