review_body: It was my second time staying at this hotel. It is in the most convenient location. The hotel staff, everybody we encountered the front desk to housekeeping, are always attentive, friendly and courteous. The Spa located at B1 of the hotel is superb. The best I ever had!!! I will definitely stay here again on my next visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location: very goodRoom: very goodConcierge: very good, fluent in EnglishLobby Area: very goodFront Desk: goodAmenities: good, toothbrush and toothpaste you have to request from the front deskThe only problem: you have to take your own luggage to your room, if you have a lot of luggages, I suggest that you leave it with the concierge and bring the impt luggage to your room.I enjoyed my stay in Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong. I'm sure I will stay there again in my next visit.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If shopping is what you are looking for then this is a great location. Food is also easily available. Plus near 2 subway stations. Which made it really easy to meet for our day tours. Highly recommend.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 4 nights. A friend recommended this hotel to us and I must say the location was good, room was clean and bed was comfortable. However, on our third day when we wanted to take their shuttle bus to go Seoul station, one of the staff asked us to put our room number to register with them our intention to take the bus. We waited for a long time and the bus did not arrive. Only when we asked them then another staff said the bus was not coming. We have to take the subway on our own to Seoul Station. I think they should inform us instead of letting us wait until past the pick up time. No apologies were offered too. Not a nice feeling.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was recommended by colleague. Only thing that baffles me is that toothbrush/paste were not provided. I also had to request for rubber mat to place in bathtub to prevent slipping. Overall was Gd. Will stay again !!
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: About 300metre from euljiro 2 station (exit 2 euljiro underground shopping centre), quiet although at myeongdong shopping area because it is located in one of the alley. Luggage was well taken care of with good safety measurement if you plan to go for a walk after checking out. Lotte mart is just few stations away. If you like shopping and don't mind some walking, we walked from namdaemun shopping area all the way back to the hotel (maybe 1-2km) and walked to namsan cable car station from the hotel. Two halal restaurants were just around the hotel ie Gurkha & Busan Jib (as I was traveling with my Muslim friend)
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Situated in Myeongdong shopping district with blocks after blocks of cosmetics shops. Food is easily available at all times. There is 2 MRT station - Myeongdong station(15min walk) and Euljiro 2 station (5min walk) nearby. The hotel also provides free shuttle service to a few popular areas. Hotel staff was always friendly and helpful. The only drawback was the daytime noise caused by renovation works that was going on.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: nice hotel not very luxery - beds are for me perfect not too soft. it was very proper - bidet etc breakfast not much choice - but italien espresso. Also some traditionell food. The stuff was friendly - english is a little vetter as in japan but a little poor.Our personal guide for the whole stay was very good -
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Situated in the heart of Myeongdong and close to euljiro Line 2 station (3 mins) walk. Arrived at hotel at 9:30 nighttime, but still can find lots of eating places.Rooms are tidy and staff are very helpful and polite!
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is very warm and the air conditioner is totally not good enough during summer. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. Very convenient and good location for food and transportation. Just need to improve the air conditioner system then this hotel will be excellent.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the 2nd time i stayed at Skypark Central. The reason i choose to return is because they are really convenient and easy to get to. They have shuttle buses at Seoul station where you alight from Arex. This time they up their game by providing shuttle services to Incheon airport. The cost is cheaper than taking a cab. Besides the ease of transportation, their services has constantly been prompt and efficient. I signed to be their member because i know i will continue to stay with them for my subsequent visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location at Myeongdong. Wonderful experience staying in this hotel. Very helpful hotel people to show me how to get to the places I asked for . All the staff are very friendly to greet you at the gate. I will definitely come again next time.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very good: a few minutes' walk to a subway. Also close to myeongdong shopping streets. There is a big Oliver Young nearby. There are mini supermarkets nearby and you can exchange foreign currency easily. You can take the free shuttle bus to Seoul Station and then take train to the airport. Remember you need to inform hotel in advance to book the seats. The room is not very spacious. But in Seoul most hotels are like this.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location.near to subway (euljiro 1 exit 2 and 5).very close to myeongdong shopping & street food.easy to find delicious restaurant.staff very polite & fast check in.really recommended.Room very clean.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a quad sharing room. Ample space to open 4 big luggages. Room was reasonably clean. Location was great as it’s near to shops, restaurants and night food street and yet away from the noise. Short walk to airport bus stop.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The mattress is too soft and pillows too softThe shuttle bus to airport arrangements seems every staff have different views.We stayed for few nights and after the first night, the room not cleaned throughly.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Front desk counter smiling should improve . This is my third time staying here. Hotel rate a bit at high side. This time manage to get a better rate for the stay . Hope they can provide free transportation from airport to hotel .
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Front desk's English should be improved. However, helper desk staff's enthusiasm was totally appreciated. It was located at such a location with great room cleanliness. Soundproofing was not very good.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is at central Myeongdong, easy to go to shopping around myeongdong, when you are tired, keep a nap and back to shop again LOL. Near to MRT. Love this location for explore Myeongdong and surrounding
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our standard double room really had a king size bed. Room was clean and had more space than we anticipated. Information and front desk were always helpful. The location is perfect. Close to subway, airport limousine bus, tourist information center, street vendors. On our last day, it rained. We were able to borrow umbrellas. Two bottles of water supplied daily, with a water refill dispenser on our floor. Only wish was to have more space in the refrigerator...only enough room for 3-4 water bottles. Would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was our first time to Seoul so I relied on reviews to pic this hotel. Location is definitely top - can’t beat it. However, this is 3-stars hotel. Beds are not the most comfortable, rooms (and bathrooms) are not spacious and provide only minimal furnishings. Tried breakfast only once since the area is surrounded by multiple food options. Besides, it’s such a hassle to get voucher first and pay for it at reception, then head to the windowless basement area for the restaurant. I may consider other hotels next time - but still in the area.
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean room, though it's small and helpful hotel staff. Location is great , plenty of shops around hotel. For smokers, though it's not allowed to smoke in room, there is a small smoking area conveniently located on every floor near the lift ...
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a great place to stay where everything was accessible. However, the AC in the room was so centralized that it felt no air circulating and we had to ask for electric fan. Outlet was so different that we have to rent an outlet converter. Otherwise the staff are very accommodating and nice. Place is great!
hotelName:
9    Hotel Skypark Central Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located just across myeondong shopping street...it can be reach by exit 3 of line 4 subway station..The room for 3 are spacious..and its very clean.The staffs are nice and helpful plus most of them can speak englishFor muslim there are a nearby halal restaurant..kampungku restaurant.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We made the reservation and payment via agoda.com for a triple bed but at check-in was informed the room was not available. We showed them the agoda.com reservation, but the front desk was not able to help and in the end, gave us a double bed and single bed. Wifi is terrible. Lobby and exterior looks dated but the room was modern and clean and spacious for 3 persons. Location is good and is a short walking distance to Myeongdong and Namdaemun Street Markets. Myeongdong Subway Station is in front of the hotel. Lots of local restaurants and cafes just outside the hotel plus GS25 and 7-11 convenience stores are nearby. Airport shuttle bus drop-off and pickup is 3-5 minutes walk from the hotel, across the street from the hotel. Hotel is located off the main street and is therefore quiet.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is close to Myeongdong shopping district and also Namdaemun market.Staff at the reception speaks good English and is helpful. While walking to the hotel , I was initially a little skeptical as the exterior looks so old and the lobby also looks dated.However the rooms are spacious and well kept though my rooms are not as good as my friends but for the price we paid I have nothing to complain about.Location is what makes this hotel value for money and there are many eateries around. It is also not far from the airport limousine bus drop off and overall satisfied with this hotel as it is meant mainly for sleeping as we were out almost 12 hours every day.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of the hotel is excellent. Few minutes walk to the myeongdong train station. Lots of restaurants, shopping, safe neighborhood and even though the hotel is in the center of all the hustle and bustle, its surprisingly very quiet in your bedroom. Breakfast was very good, selections of hot and cold buffet. The room is excellent in size. Plenty to walk around. The reason why I only gave this hotel 3 star rating was because with my encounter with the staff. From the doorman who don't even greet you when you enter or exit the hotel, to the restaurant staff who help themselves with coffee, hot soups, and juices. C'mon guys, guest like me can see you helping yourselves for the food that meant to be for guests. Go to the kitchen and get your soup or drinks there away from the observant eyes of the guests. It doesn't look very professionals. Room attendant are excellent. My room was very clean. A very big thank you to them.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My friend and I stayed here for 4 nights.It is our first tike in Korea , the staffs treat us very good and helpful in everything. Great strong front desk team with full of informations for customer like a subway , the places to visited, how much the cost to shopping here or there!! Stuff like that . The breakfast was several kind of food but they start from 7am-10am in my opinion if u open one more hours till 11 am will be perfect better . If talk about the housekeeping part, it was very active in the job ,and they are make up room very clean and cozy for stay in. The location just walk 5-10 mins to namsan park Ana cabin car station to go N -Seoul tower. It was perfect hotels locations to go myeongdong market , Catherine church ⛪️, lottle mall and etc, I wish I come back and stay here again for sure.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a week in early April. Perfect location in Myeondong. Very close to the subway, shopping and Namsan park. Room was good size, bed a little too firm, bathroom was good thou it had a shower in the bath. Internet was ok, sometimes a little slow compared to other hotels in Seoul. Room was clean and well serviced every day. Staff were very friendly. Only thing that wasn’t great was the check out. Was almost to quick and didn’t give or offer a receipt. Kinda felt like we hadn’t even checked out. Also the bar near lobby that only opened in the evenings was seriously overpriced.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent hotel just 100 yards from Myeong-dong Metro station, shopping , street food and restaurants. Very comfortable, clean rooms and very friendly staff. Especial thanks to Mr Lee (Manager) and his team for rheir very personal touch on our stay. Hope to return again in 2020.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is close to Myeongdong Metro and Myeongdong street stalls and shops. A lot of restaurants around this area . Staff are nice and friendly. Room is clean and they give you free bottle of water. But Free Wifi wasn't that good as connection keeping dropping out. You can take metro to anyway, it's so convenience. It's a good location to stay!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is very location nice hotel and the service is the best and very good value $ you can walk around or MRT Bus near by !!! Many restaurants too !!! And from here you can take airport bus pickup and drop off to the airport!!! Love this location
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked a room at Pacific Hotel last November when I visited Seoul for the first time. The hotel has a strategic location since it's just 2 minutes from the Myeong dong market where you can find various resturants where eating and different shops (excellent if you are a kpop fan!). The room was spacious and clean. I did love the shower!!! It was huge and with glass walls.My booking included breakfast too which pleased both european and asiatic taste. I had such a marvellous time there, that I will be book there again next time I go to Seoul.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is newly renovated. The room is very clean and comfort. The staffs are very polite and helpful. Myeongdong Station is just right away in front of the hotel. I love this hotel and will go back again.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 7 nights in a deluxe twin room (2 adults) and we were very satisfied with this hotel. Once we stepped into the room, it was bright, spacious and clean as shown exactly as it was on their website. Location wise was amazing.. 2 mins walk to exit 3 Myeongdong station and a huge daiso just round the corner!. Myeongdong was just across the street and you can access the subway to cross over there. We requested view of the Namsan tower with our room and they did provided. Hotel lobby is grand and victorian class style but the rooms are very modern sleek simple style which they have renovated in 2017, it was bright and room temperature was perfect for February. Over all the hotel rooms had large corridors and provided enough lighting. The beds slightly soft but the pillows were abit too soft for me. Luckily there was 6 pillows for me to choose from on the beds and I found one which was almost to my liking..The hotel staff on front desk provided excellent service, always willing to help when asked. We asked them to book a tour for us, call our cab driver on the last day and they were always willing to help when we ask for directions. Everyone knows english and is very friendly. I also liked the fact that the hotel provided a space in the lobby to repack your lugguage if required while waiting ..there was also a scale to measure the weight of your lugguage which was very thoughtful of them. It was very helpful to know how much your own lugguage weight was on check-out before flying home so you could have time to repack if required!Outside the hotel there are a few restaurants too..and convenience stores and currency exchange places which was very very convenient. Definitely I would stay again if I come back to Seoul, highly recommend too for anyone who is looking to stay close to Myeongdong!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very well located behind the Myeondong Train station. Very near to the Myeondong shopping street. It is clean but simple. Bed is good. WiFi is fast. Breakfast is simple. Hot water is good. Iron And ironing board needs to request upon check in and the iron board is in very bad shape.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First of all I think this hotel is value for money, centrally located, clean and very big rooms. All amenities are located outside ie. foreign exchange, 7 Eleven & a 24 hour Korean bbq lolWe were in Gangnam only 2 weeks before and it was shocking although it was suppose to be in a rich area! Only downside to this hotel is that check in staff are not proficient in English so be patient with them. It’s a 4 star hotel but I reckon I would give them a half star extra!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 7 nights in dec .The room is large enough for three of us, 1 queen and 1 single bed. Room is clean and all appliances are working. We had the view of Namsan tower. Prior to out visit, we had some email communications w the reservation team and they were v prompt with their replies.We had such an amazing experience with the front office too. A shout out to Min, he was so patient with our queries on how to go about in Seoul. Min explained us in details. The only downside is that there r only few English tv channels. We just download Netflix and watched via ourPhone as their wifi is excellent.Pacific is very near to Myeongdong subway station and also eateries. Two minutes walk away from halal eatery too, Kampungku. The airport bus shuttle is only across the road abt 3 mins walk. Cross over n u will see Northface boutique n walk a bit u will see the hotel. Very ez to locate even with our large luggage.I will strongly recommend this hotel. I seriously do.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pacific hotel is centrally located and within 50meter from Subway exit, our preferred choice as we wanted to stay away from noice & crowd though there were some other hotels that are right at the subway entrance or inside the shopping district. Room was clean with decent size, front desk staff friendly & helpful. Loads of shopping, restaurants, dessert shops, hair salons & others... Highly recommended if you plan to stay in MyeongDong area..
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in Pacific hotel for four nights and really enjoyed my stay there. LocationConveniently located, about 50 steps away from exit 3 of myeongdong metro station, bustling myeongdong just one traffic light away, eateries located conveniently around. 2 convenient stores located between metro station and hotel. Airport shuttle bus 6015 stops opposite the hotel. CleanlinessPerfect, absolutely nothing to complain about, kudos to the housekeeping team but do remember to place the do not disturb tag outside your room other than pressing the light indicator on the door. Service Front desk extremely helpful, was given a room on the third floor which was facing the opposite building, went down to request for higher floor room and front desk reserved a room for us the next day. Kudos to the Pacific hotel team, will definitely be back if I return to Seoul.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall, it's a great place to stay. Location is the best, Myeongdong is just 1 minute away, coffee places, shops, whatever you need. Rooms are nice and service is good. We stayed for 1 night only but that was enough to keep this place in mind for the next visit.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the location is accessible to transportation and shopping up to the late night. the hotel is new but the way they clean the room is not good, leaving waste paper around after the morning cleaning, in fact the cups we used was not even washed. i hope they assign someone who can speak english in the counter so it would be easy to communicate, but then many stores here do not employ enough english speaking staff even though their clients are mostly english speaking.but if you are only concern with accessibility then you are in the right place, quiet yet you are at the center.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you’re looking for an ideal hotel in Seoul, this is definitely it. The recently renovated Pacific Hotel is perfectly located—just steps away from the Myeongdong restaurant and shopping area and a short walk to the cable car that runs from the base of Namsan Mountain up to the famous Seoul Tower. The rooms are large, immaculate, and nicely appointed; and the breakfast, featuring numerous western and Korean dishes, is superb. Can’t say enough about the friendly staff, which were always extremely courteous and helpful. Highly recommended.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable hotel with excellent service. Buffer breafast is tasty and has both western and Korean food. Desk staff is couteous and helpful. From here you can easily catch the aerial tram to Seoul tower.Interesting night msrket close by.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, bell boy is awesome, reception met all my request except for high level (most importantly we were given no smoking level).There is gym, pool and sauna, but have not use it yet. There is a currency exchange shop that offer good rates nearby too! Room is fantastic thou it is small, love the window and settee n the room cleaning service too! Price is competitive and it’s worth the value
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Best hotel in Seoul superb!!!! No need to check the room. for checkout and checkin was fast . Request for Highest floor . they all know how to speak English . super near everywhere . Room were very cleaned as expected . The toilet automatic wash is a very nice try it
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked this hotel cos prices was reasonable and it is located in downtown Seoul..I was friendly welcomed..Detailed information given about facilities and my rights..Baggages secured and they complimentarily have given larger room without asking me..Room view reasonable..People all friendly and so polite..And breakfast buffet was so good and people all dealt us warmly..So clean so delicious..Thanks to everybody here.. Zafer
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My daughter and I came for a K-pop concert and shopping for skin care. My daughter chose the hotel based on the proximity to her concert. This is my first time to Korea and it turns out we are in the best location for shopping and site seeing. We arrived Saturday afternoon. We took the train from Inchon airport and made one connection. The stop is about 300 steps from the hotel. Check in was seamless. The staff was friendly and helpful. The valet met us in the parking lot and immediately took our luggage. The room is clean and modern with a large flat screen tv, walk in shower water closet and large mirrored vanity. Plenty of space to hang your clothes and a mini fridge with complimentary water. There is an indoor pool but it is only for men...what’s that about? We were disappointed because it would have been nice to cool off at the end of the day. Anyway we walked to the tower the first night and shopped the next two days. Everything is so close we were able to drop our many bags off and continue shopping!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are tiny, the place is clean, the service was ok and the bathroom was functional. The best thing about it was how close it was to all the major tourist areas. The location is perfect and if you are like me and the city and its activities are why you are there then it is a great choice
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you looking for a good place to rest, clean and comfortable reasonably inexpensive,this hotel is a good choice, location perfect to shop to eat or take train or bus, 5 minutes walk to Myeongdong station, from Incheon airport, after clear custom, take escalator to the lower level, buy ticket for won 15000 each, then walk out the stand #28, if you are lucky, a bus is waiting, there's a marking of 6015 on the bus, about one and half hour you will arrive at Myeongdong, you will see Prince Hotel across the street, walk pass Northface store and Cafe, when you reach the corner, look to your left you see Hollys coffee or Pacific hotel, a restaurant at the lobby, we had buffet breakfast and lunch, the food is exceptionally good, Hollys coffee serve breakfast and light snack, many restaurants nearby for you explore, we were in #808 with a double bed, mini refrigerator and safe, a pot to boil water, bring your own coffee, stay here 4 nights, place fit our need.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very close to Meongdong, just exit 3 of tube station with escalator, limousine bus stop is just over the road. The room is OK, shower is OK, very clean, but very noisy next room until midnight. There is a coffee shop on the ground floor.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms were nice and modern. Very comfortable beds. Staff very friendly.If you are looking to have a drink in the hotel I would avoid the bar. It is most definitely a man’s bar! Not for women at all. Beer and whisky the only choice and very expensive. It’s definitely a man’s world as the gym and pool are for men only.Bell captains were very helpful booking us on to tours.Getting a taxi from the hotel is a nightmare. The taxi drivers appear to be a law unto themselves. As soon as they see you with luggage they keep going. Don’t expect any help from taxi drivers with luggage. They sit still and watch you struggle. I’m so glad that I had friends with me that lifted my case. Having had surgery recently I was not allowed to lift. I digress....that is nothing to do with hotel.The hotel is well situated and the area around it is great for shopping and trying street food. The Seoul Tower is just behind it and that is well worth a visit, especially in the evening.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellente location near most of the attractions of the city, very easy to walk around, Myeong-dong station, shopping, restaurants and attractions, nice hotel, clean and friendly staff always trying to help you with the language barrier, thank you .
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel location just behind Namsan Tower.A stone throw away from station.Very clean hotel.Hop in and out buses just along main road.Cheapest taxi board price is 3000(White Col.) Don't hail black ones.( Hop in 5000. )City tour buses payment collected by driver.There's a spa ctr.at hotel.Sad to see it's for man only.Although alot of restaurant surrounding the hotel,it's still very quiet.A very good hotel.Will be back
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at Pacific hotel for 6 nights. It was simply awesome for the price.Room was massive with great views to Seoul Tower. The bed was very comfortable. Bathroom was great too, it's got an electronic toilet.Location is just perfect. Myeong-dong is definitely the best area to stay. Everything you need is 2 min walking. Shops, bars, restaurants, even one street market.However I've got one bad thing to say. And that's the reason of my rating. They say they offer spa, pool and sauna. If you are a woman you are not allowed to go there. It's MEN ONLY, which I found extremely annoying. This is XXI century, for god sake!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I go to visit Seoul every year and every year I will stay in this hotel, the room rate is reasonable, the rooms are spacious and clean, staffs are helpful and friendly, the location of the hotel is very convenience to shopping area and underground! 100 points!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything works. electronic toilet! clean, comfortable beds. good wifi though unsecured--use your VPN. breakfast the usual fare. Big rooms. Quiet with functioning heat/ac. Would stay here again. fresh fruit in the room!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My friend and I stayed here for total of 6 nights. We were initially given a twin room facing the Myeongdong shopping area. Room was spacious enough for 2 big luggages, amenities were generally ok. During the 2nd leg of our stay, we found that one of the luggages had the wheel broken during storage. Front desk gave us 2 breakfast vouchers as hospitality and service recovery.Overall we enjoyed our stay here as it was near to shopping, subway, and even airport limousine bus pickup/drop off. Staff were helpful and friendly, even the housekeeping was efficient.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location!!The hotel is near the city tour bus stop and have many restaurants nearby. You can go to Seoul Tower cable car by walk from the hotel. You can go to Myeongdong market just cross the street. Recommended
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 2 nights in a Standard Double room. Check-in was a breeze and I was off to my room very quickly. The rooms are of reasonable size, good for a solo traveler like me. This hotel seems to have undergone a makeover recently. The bed was awesome, I had a comfortable night's sleep. The room comes with a study table, safe deposit box, wardrobe and a nicely sized TV with satellite channels. However, the breakfast was disappointing. The variety of food served isn't fantastic.The locality of this hotel is so centralized. The subway station enterance is less than a 5 minute walk from the hotel lobby. So are many nice restaurants. The Myeongdong shopping street is just across the main avenue from the hotel. There are also convenience stores and a 24 hour McDonalds just nearby the hotel. Would recommend this hotel!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed as a family of four in this hotel for 4 nights in December. We found the room very spacious. The 2 double beds were perfect for us, and comfortable too. Room was generously sized, and the toilet was huge with a bath and a large shower area. It was also nicely heated in the cold winter.The room was clean and comfortable. We were very happy with the hotel and would stay here again.There are many restaurants and convenience shops around the hotel. Myeong Dong is also a quick stroll away. You can also get a value for money breakfast at the coffee shop in the hotel lobby.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family of 4 stayed in Pacific Hotel in July 2017 and really enjoyed our stay. In fact we plan to visit Korea in 2018 and will stay with Pacific Hotel again. Pacific Hotel is near to Myeongdong Exit 3 (with elevator). You just need to cross the street to the main Myeongdong shopping area. The hotel is also surrounded by convenience stores, and restaurants. Our favourite BBQ place (On the Grill) is also just 1 minute walk away. More importantly, the airport shuttle is also just across the street. Hence convenience is top here. Perhaps some might prefer to stay in the heart of Myeongdong, but our experience here is far more superior. We stayed in the family twin room (level 3) - new, modern, just renovated, clean and comfortable. Facilities wise - there's everything you need, from small refrigerator to all the amenities. In fact, we have nothing but positive comments regarding the room. There is a washroom at the Level 3 lift lobby area, which is good where at times the toilet in our room is occupied. The common area is also sparkly clean. Lastly, service is what makes Pacific Hotel the best hotel in Myeongdong. We interacted with many of their staff throughout our stay and they are always friendly and willing to help. They speak good English too. Raining? They will pass you an umbrella. Moving your heavy luggage? They will approach you quickly to help you with your bags. Need help with directions? They will search and advice you. They are more than happy to hold our luggage before our check-in dates (because we travelled out of Seoul), and are always prompt and helpful when we emailed them when we make our reservations. Overall, because of their impeccable service, our experience is far superior to when we stayed in another hotel in the heart of Myeongdong. Hence we are more than happy to be staying in Pacific Hotel whenever we are back in Seoul and will recommend anyone to stay there!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family stayed at the Pacific Hotel three weeks ago. What we liked most about this hotel is the location. It is very close to Myeongdong Station and you can find convenient stores and restaurants nearby such as Two Two Chicken and Mc Donald's. More importantly, the place is quiet even if it is located in Myeongdong. We booked a Family Twin room. Overall, the room was clean and spacious for a family of four (4). The bed and pillows were comfortable and there was a small coffee table and chairs in the room. They regularly provided bottled water during our stay. Also, the bathroom was huge and the toiletries provided were sufficient.Breakfast at the hotel was adequate, although there wasn't so much variety, we think it still had a balance of Korean and Western cuisine. Lastly, we appreciate the hotel staff as they were quick to respond to our queries prior to our stay. They were also helpful when we arrived late at the hotel due to flight delay as well as they were efficient when we were checking out at the hotel. Overall, we had a good stay at the Pacific Hotel.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is conveniently located 2 mins walk from Myeong Dong Exit 3 (exit that has an escalator), it is just across the famous Myeong Dong shopping street.There are convenience stores and food outlets right beside the hotel. Rooms are bright, new and clean. Bed is very comfortable so we had very good sleep. Staff are friendly and helpful with good command of english. There is an Isaac Toast outlet (best hot sandwiches in Seoul) right next to the hotel which has no queue, the other Isaac Toast in Myeong Dong has ridiculously long queue! Definitely a huge plus point to stay here.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easy to find when you come from the Incheon AirPort, first train (local train os cheaper) to Seoul Station, the Subway line 4 to Myeongdong, exit 3. You can see the heading of the hotel. The hotel is in the nice condition, rooms are like New, very neat, good breakfast. Good and polite service. There is also a gym and swimming pool, Café and restaurant in the hotel. The Myeongdong shopping areas are nearby and it’s easy to reach any area in Seoul
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My daughter and I had stayed at the Prince Hotel on our last visit to Seoul and the Pacific Hotel is nicer and just a block away. Our family of four stayed here for five nights last week and enjoyed our stay.Pros: great location, just take the subway underground shopping tunnel to enter the heart of shopping in Myeongdong across the street. Easy to find, in front of the Seoul Tower if you get lost walking around. Friendly front desk and valet who kept watch over stored luggage. Recently renovated hotel, rooms looked nearly new. They accommodated our request for two rooms near each other made months in advance and they secured rooms next to each other on the seventh floor. Quiet rooms, didn't hear any street noise despite facing the front and no noise from neighbors. Some minor hallway noise. Very clean rooms, friendly housekeeping staff.Cons: wifi strongest at off hours late at night or early mornings, slow during the late morning and early evening. Think this is a businessman's hotel but not cool that the pool and spa is only for gentlemen. Breakfast not included in our basic rate, not a big deal as there are coffee and pastry shops, 7-11, small supermarket and McDonald's within a block. We paid about $100 night per room per night for a busy time. We thought it was good value for a great location. The Myeongdong train station is steps away from the hotel and the green line is about a 15-minute walk across the shopping area.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed several times there, it is located very close to subway and touristic Myeondong. Who does not like to see lots of people, in particular Chinese, should choose a different hotel.Rooms are clean, staff friendly, breakfast is ok, but nothing fantastic. Reasonable room rate.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spacious, clean and good, quiet location in Myeongdong. Coffee shop, 711 and restaurants right outside the hotel. We loved the two two chicken and the 24 hour korean resto, both restaurants are extremely busy at night.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Due to busy schedule, I was unable to research and cancel booking. So I endured four nights in this useless hotel. Location is good if you die die must stay in MyeongDong. But honestly, I should have cancelled and book something near Seoul Station instead of myeongdong. Service is zero. Only one lady staff can speak average English and is thus helpful. The rest have quite mysterious purpose and presence here. I don't know why they are standing around and getting paid.Tourist who wants to learn about history of Korea should stay here as the thinking they have in this hotel is prehistoric. Only men can use their hotel gym and sauna. Ladies who book here should demand a discount for being denied our rights to use hotel facilities.Upon checking in, my Friend asked if this is a sleazy hotel. Bathroom glass wall and door are transparent. I was so ashamed of a bad booking. Worse - bathroom door is faulty and it takes them 3 days to repair. They didn't offer us ladies a change of room (prob since we're not men).Sound system is bad. We heard our Neighbours moving around their room all night. There's noise from streets too.I will never return to such a chauvinistic and stupid hotel. For Korea to have such a discriminating hotel it's quite a shame.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked the 2 x double bed room and it was great for my family of 4 including 2 kids. The toilet was big and they provided bottled water daily. The room was modern and newly renovated. Location was great. Will stay there again. However, they only provided soap bar instead of shower foam.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Pacific hotel for one week in the triple room. It was truly an amazing experience! The hotel's location is excellent as it is a stone's throw from the main Myeongdong district as well as the subway station..There were also a few convenience stores located nearby. As for the hotel room, it was really spacious! The bathroom was also roomy (and the high tech toilet bowl was a real pleasant surprise). The room was extremely clean and the housekeeping staff were very warm and friendly. The room had a very cozy ambience and the Sealy mattresses ensured a fantastic nights rest- we looked forward to coming back to the room everyday after travelling around and it felt like home :)The reception staff were very pleasant and helpful too- I would like to make a special mention to Douglas, who helped arrange for us to have a late checkout due to our late flight that night.. It was really a nice gesture and it is much appreciated :)Overall it was a great experience and we would go back there again! Thanks very much!
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel caters more to Asian guests then Western ones. My daughter and I were some of the very rare Westerners staying there, which I found refreshing! We shared a standard twin room. The beds were extremely comfortable (Sealy mattresses) and the room felt spacious enough. The location of the hotel is superb, just opposite Myeondong area with all its restaurants and shops, and a 5 - 10 minute walk from Lotte department store. The hotel staff were very friendly as well. Next to the hotel are 2 very good Korean barbecue places. We were the only non-Asians clients there. I found it to be very good value ! The bathroom could have felt a bit more private. The shower cubicle was enclosed in transparent glass with a venetian blind to block the view, which did not give complete privacy.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Situated between Namsan Tower & Myeongdong shopping district.5 mins walk to Airport Shuttle pickup & drop-off point. (KRW 14,000 from airport)5mins walk to Myeongdong train station & Myeongdong shopping street &Myeongdong underground shopping.15 mins walk to Myeongdong Cathedral.30 mins walk to Dongdaemum & Gwangjang traditional marketCheck-in was very quick (maybe because it was already 2330 hrs)Newly renovated rooms/ toilets (Lvl 2) were spacious /clean.King size bed big & very comfyA number of eateries, convenience store and bakery around the hotel.Will stay in this hotel again if I am in Seoul.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 3 nights and was very happy. I would recommend this hotel.Rooms are as they appear on the website, they are big and modern. The room I stayed in (322) was extremely quiet! Great location close to the Myeongdong station and shopping streets with lots of restaurants close by.Big bathroom with nice shower.Room was very clean.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We've been here before for a quick Layover almost two years ago. We really liked it at that time for its nice rooms (got a free upgrade at the time) and the great location.So after nearly two years we came back....this time for a week. We booked a room with a kingsize bed, which was - especially for Korea - a good sized room. Facing the front with some views of the streets of Myeong-Dong. Even it is a busy area, the room was perfectly quiet.Check-In was fast and friendly, the staff overall very professional and helpful. The room had everything we needed. Fridge, nice shower, really comfy and big bed. And a fantastic toilet with more buttons and functions than Cpt. Kirks chair on the Enterprise. All the lights, "Don't Disturb" signs and other functions work by an array of buttons on the alarm clock....in case you don't find the light switch at first glance. The room was perfectly clean, from the floors to the bed to the toilet. There is a mini-fridge with some stock....but still some space in it to store some drinks you might wanna buy from the mini markets just out front (we preferred the GS25 to the 7-11). Flatscreens and free Wifi in all rooms as well. A coffee shop and a restaurant are downstairs. Pretty good coffee if you need some in the morning.Location couldn't be better. The subway is only a few steps away, getting you pretty much anywhere. The shopping district of Myeong-Dong is really just across the street....busy until around 11pm daily. With some great dining options.But the best dining option is actually just besides the Hotel. It's called "Myeongdong Jungil Hoegwan". But there's not english sign. But you can identify it by the phone number on the entrance door: 2-777-3770. There's a similar restaurant just next to....be sure to choose the correct (right) one. If you like Korean BBQ (and meat), the this is the place. Nothing short of brillant! Just on the left when you leave the Hotel.Behind the Hotel is also the Namsan Park and Seoul Tower....the cable car station only a 10' footwalk away. Shinsegae Dept. store and the Namdaemun market are also only about 10' away by foot. So, location-wise you couldn't do any better.All in all a fantastic stay. There's really nothing to complain, great staff, lovely room, perfect location. And all for a reasonable price. Highly recommended!One more thing: The Airport Shuttle Bus (15$ each) stops just across the street.Wanna know more about me and my trips? Check my profile.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 4 nights with a friend. Location is good, right next to the metro station and close to the shopping/streetfood district. Room was okay, the light was bad though, almost no natural light and the arrangement of the lamps was not good. The bathroom is all glass, with a really noisy door. Privacy was a bit difficult. Aircon appeared not to be working, so the room was very warm all the time.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pacific Hotel's location is excellent, just 10 minute walk to the cable car that will bring you to Seoul Tower. It is just a few steps away to the subway and Meongdong shopping and night market. The hotel staff are friendly but it is a struggle to converse with them in English. The hotel is very clean and quiet, hotel rate a bit pricey if not for the discounted rate of booking.com. The buffet breakfast selection in our 5 day stay is the same, wished that they should change the menu daily or at least alternately daily. They charge at discounted price if you will use the sauna and pool. Overall, we enjoyed our stay in the hotel.
hotelName:
10    Pacific Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are first time here and find many good things about it. The location is great, centrally located & easy to go everywhere in the city and even airport train & limo bus are easy accessible. All famous destinations in this area are within on foot distance, namely shopping places, restaurant area & night clubs. The room is big enough & water pressure in shower is good. Its self serviced check in & out can still get nice attitude service staffs to assist. Its restaurant, lounge area, gym, laundry & roof top bar are all well designed and functionally good enough. Roof top swim pool is chargeable. We will be back for the next visit to Seoul. 第一次來可是發現很多這家飯店的優點，地點一流，到哪裡都方便，機場快線和巴士都很容易就到，逛街、餐廳、酒吧區都是步行可達，客房夠大、淋浴的水壓足夠，自助式住房退房還是有態度很好的員工幫忙，他的餐廳、談天區、健身房、洗衣室、空中酒吧都設計的很好而且功能上有一定水準，空中泳池要另外付費；下次再來首爾我們會再來住！
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are currently staying at the hotel and while I agree with many of the comments we are a little disappointed. Almost every request, including one to borrow some salt from the resturant is a problem. In addition, all facilities are extra. You have to pay to use the pool or gym-I did not know this in advance!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stay in here on the last night of our trip. Modern Hotel and location is excellent. Shops and restaurants are everywhere around the hotel. most important is close to Airport subway line and airport bus stop is only 5 mins walk.Inside the room is nice and clean. Everything is comfy and handy.sure will stay in here next time.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is nice and clean. Location is easy to access, nearby Metro Station. Check-in / out process is fast. Staff are very friendly and effectiveOne day our room safe box cannot open. We informed reception and within a few minutes the staff came to resolve the problem.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is super and you can't beat it. 3 minutes walking distrance to Subway Exit 1 and check-in process is smooth and fast. The security guards at ground floor are extremely helpful and polite. Applause!For the downside, as it is the 2nd year I stayed which I am greatly disappoiinted to the breakfast. I did very much impressed to the set breakfast I ate last year which was high quality and delicious. For this time they changed to breakfast buffet BUT the choice is MUCH less and frankly the quality is below average. In my opinion, it is not worth to pay extra for this breakfast buffet. You are suggested to check it out and look around the food first. Overall, I will rate average for my stay this year and not sure if I will book again next time.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I traveled to Seoul on April 9 until April 16 and stayed at L7 Hongdae. The hotel is located in the heart of the Hongdae area and is only 100m from exit 1 of Hongik University Station. Reception is located on 21st floor with guest rooms on the 5th up to 20th floors. On the 21st floor (other side of reception) is the restaurant and also guest lounge which has ample seating to chill out, catch up with friends, play pool, read a book (they had a selection of books available for guests) and play vinyl records (also selection available for use by guests). There's a bar and swimming pool (pool is only open during summer months) located on 22nd floor. The breakfast buffet was very good with a good selection of eastern and western dishes, as well as fruit and pastries, which were all delicious and well worth including in your booking. The staff were always courteous and very helpful (when my wife sprained her ankle, they were great and sent up some ice to help keep the swelling down). Hongik University Station is one of the stops on the Airport Express Rail, so it's easy to get to from Incheon or Gimpo Airports (from Incheon it will take about an hour on the all-stops train). There's plenty of good eateries (cheap ones as well) in the Hongdae area as it's predominantly a university area and during the evenings there's a huge population of students milling around in the area eating, browsing or buying things (as well as doing performances in the area opposite the hotel). The room we stayed in (1612) was great - comfortable bed, big windows which could be opened if you wish to, bidet-style toilet (with heated toilet seat), large shower with raindrop shower and a vanity mirror that never steams up!!! Unlimited wi-fi for the guest who needs to be always "connected". We would definitely be staying at this hotel again and have no problems recommending it to anyone else. Thanks L7 for a fantastic stay!!!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A fantastic hotel! The hotel is 100m walk from Exit 1 of Hongik University Station, meters away from numerous restaurants (there's a seafood restaurant, Indian restaurant and cafe in the same building), as well as it's own restaurant on 21st floor and poolside bar on 22nd floor. There's self check in at the front desk located on 21st floor with guest rooms located between the 5th and 20th floors. If you're considering staying at L7, I recommend adding the buffet breakfast option which includes a good choice of Eastern and Western styles, including fresh fruit. There's a guest lounge on 21st floor which has a view of Hongdae area. The lounge includes a pool table, vinyl record player with some records you can use, and plenty of comfortable chairs to use for reading (there's a small selection of books available) or to watch the world go by. If you're an Argentine tango dancer, you're a short walk from several milongas. The room we were in (1612) was just great - it was clean, big window to look onto Hongdae, big shower, bidet-style toilet and really comfortable bed!! All the staff were great. Will be going back!! Thanks L7 Hongdae for making it a memorable stay.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located right at a very good spot where you get to enjoy great food and fun. Also, it's super convenient to take trains to the Airport as well as to other regions of Seoul. Besides, this hotel is new and cost-effective compared to those in other popular regions.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect location, within 10 minutes walk to airport metro station and 3 minutes walk to metro station, there is a money exchange near the hotel, lot of restaurant around and open until late night, some restaurant even open for 24 hours. Good for shopping, fashion and cosmetic and skincare brand all you named it both can found near hotel.Hotel hardware is new, the hotel is clean, pity that the room is too small, mattress is too soft and pillow is too flat which is not comfortable. Bathroom door also broken, toilet floor all wet after shower. Front desk is helpful and nice.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 4 nights there for our short trip to Seoul after CNY holidays. 我們在農曆年假期後，在 L7弘大共住了4晚。We found the location of this hotel very convenient to connect with subway or even bus routes. Shops, restaurants and cafes are all of walk-able distance. 酒店的位置很方便，很容易到達地下鐵或巴士站。而且，附近幾百米的範圍商店、餐廳、咖啡屋林立，斬時步行可到達的距離。Staffs are really professional, friendly and helpful. We had trouble while self check-in due to the format of our booking name, and the lady at front desk quickly solved it for us. 服務員都很專業和友善，我們在自助 check-in 時遇到困難，前台的一位女仕很快便替我們解決了問題。Breakfast on 21/F was okay, foods and coffee are good only they have not many varieties.位於 21 樓餐廳的自助早餐不錯，食物和咖啡都很美味，只是菜色選擇不多。This is recommended to choose rooms on upper floors if street noise will easily disturb your sleep.如果你也容易被街上噪音吵醒，建議你選擇較高樓層的房間吧！We will certainly stay at this hotel again when we next visit Hongdae.下次來弘大我們也會考慮住 L7 Hongdae 的。
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Used this hotel for a business trip to Seoul. It is not so far from the ICN airport (took 35min by taxi). I stayed at the 19th floor and it had a good view and was very quite that I enjoyed staying there. However the check-in was a bit slow because it was self check-in system, which is useless because I had to get a help from the staff anyway.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Loved the L7. As dusk fell over Hongdae we would quite happily open a beer and gaze out from the huge windows in our room at the city as the neon lights blinked on. Just minutes later we could be in the middle of the melee trying street food and listening to the karaoke wafting over the busy streets. The room was adequately sized with a comfy bed and a table and easy chairs with a good bathroom. The common areas of the hotel are very cool but it can be a little style over substance. The rooftop bar was expensive and we thought it was a shame you couldn't have a wine in the lounge area near the reception which was larger and cosier. As such we found nicer bars elsewhere in Hongdae. Breakfast was fine but the buffet choice was a little on the meagre side. The metro is just minutes away with central Seoul about 20 minutes away with Gimpo 20 mins in the other direction.Would definitely return.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location and the train station and airport express bus is just at next door. Room is clean and tidy. We can just fit in three suitcases for a three beds room, think the room size is same as two single beds room. Would be great if the room is bit bigger for three people. Other than this, everything is satisfied and staff are friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room was reasonable sized with full length window view. Amenities met basic hotel expectations & hotel design was hip and funky. Location was very prime and easy to find. Located opposite the main Hongik shopping area & a McDonalds, nothing to complain about. Traffic can get a bit noisy (Koreans do seem to like to sound their horns quite a bit), however the noise tapers down a lot after 12/1am. Toilet comes with a bidet, a saviour during the winter season. Receptionist staff were conversant in English but displayed general low comprehension skills (they can provide instructions well & clear, however unable to respond to questions/often misinterpret them - for e.g. asking for time to check-in & they may respond with a "yes/no" conclusively - does not actually answer the question). Not an issue as I can speak some Korean however may be an area of concern for non-Korean speakers/tourists. Staff do display typical behaviour of awkward language however I am aware English is not their first language.Observations: Male staff were generally not very hospitable. They do not greet any hotel guests and if possible evade eye contact. The men tend to respond curtly and do not smile at all. Slightly strange for a Lotte establishment (established hotel chain). Female staff were much more approachable however both genders displayed low English comprehension skills.General comments: Despite great location, the reception is located on the 21st floor. Lift algorithms were strange and you often see long queues of hotel guests waiting to either check-in & check-out or guests trying to return to their rooms. Average lift waiting time is 4-6 mins.Request higher floors for less traffic noise & ability to get into lifts from the top (poor lift algorithms mean that lifts may open doors to full lift cabins if you are at lower floors).
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Depending on which room you stay in, be prepared for a horrible experience at L7 Hongdae. There is construction currently happening on the 21st floor. If you happen to have a room on the 20th floor and want to either sleep in late or work in your room during the day, you are going to want to find a new room.Other minor annoyances: -English speaking is not so good if you have a problem-There is no one to help you with bags when you enter the hotel and you have to take an elevator up to the 21st floor to checkin-Checkin doesn't feel warm at all as people help you work through checkin on a touch screen-While walking in the hall, a cleaning lady slammed me in the face with a door. Since there is no way for her to see outside of the door, I can't blame her but it didn't feel so good anywayAfter traveling the world for many years, I can safely say this was by far one of my worst hotel experiences of my life. The only upside was a room upgrade after complaining a second time about how bad the noise was outside my room.Advice to management: Please state that there is construction going on and that there is an extreme amount of noise on certain floors. A good example of a company that does this well is Disney.While my new room is pleasant and I appreciate people accommodating after insisting to talk to a manager, I would steer clear of this hotel at least until they finish construction or demand a room that is not close to the 21st floor.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The downside is too cold to smoke outside the hotel , not like those with indoor smoking area. Apart from that , no complaint to room , facilities n location. Easy to access by all stop train or bus from incheon.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: stayed at this hotel Sep 12- 18 and 21, of 2018.nice hotel very clean, friendly and helpful staffs. everything as described on their website.room sizes as described (normal hotel room size - a bit on the small side), bed is reasonable soft - comfortable.it provide heated and full auto toilet seat and cleaning system - which is nice during winter time.one thing visitors need to know is that their lobby is at the 21st floor, so go there to check in/out instead of trying to find the lobby at the 1st floor.Hotel staff always write down your request and review and reconfirm before you leave, this is especially important when English is not their first language and they take the time to make sure they understand you correctly/precisely.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nearby subway and airport express. Together with friendly staff who reminded me to check out at counter to get tax refund. Thx so much for the kind lady!!! Good local restaurants and street kiosks nearby.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at this hotel for five nights and had very enjoyable and comfortable experience. My first impression of this hotel was how cool, modern and funky it was. The hotel checkin is on the 21st floor and the concierge are friendly and also speak fluent english. I had a corner room on the 17th floor and my room was very modern as it felt like a loft. It had a floating bed, large TV, large showers and bathroom, and a centre island sink. The view was amazing and i was facing the city and could see the busy streets in Hongdae. The gym is modern and spacious; however, i did not get to experience the outdoor rooftop pool because but it was closed for the season. Furthermore, the hotel is extremely convenient for travellers as it is situated only a few minutes from the green subway line and steps away from multiple bus connections. The hotel is also just two small streets away from the busy restaurants, night market, and shops that Hongdae is famous for. It is impossible to be hungry when you stay at this hotel (unless you cannot speak or read korean)!I would definitely stay at this hotel again should I return to Seoul.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I don't usually write a review, but I think my recent stay at L7 deserved one. A great one. I was staying for 4 nights in a Superior Double Room and the room is nothing but comfy. The size, view, lists of TV channels, bed, laundry room, water dispenser, easy check in (where you just need to key in the details in computer-self kiosk) and easy check out (just drop the key at the box), almost everything. The location is strategic; nearby train stations, lots of great coffee houses, walking distance to many restaurants and shops.However, what made my stay more memorable was actually I fell sick during my trip. So badly sick but somehow it was on public holiday, and most of the pharmacies and clinics were closed. I made a call to the front officer with the intention of asking direction for the nearest pharmacy. That was it. And to my surprise, the team (front officer and security guy) went extra miles by checking me the next day, in front of my room 1st thing in the morning just to make sure that I'm fine. They even got a taxi ready just in case I needed further assistance. That was truly remarkable I did not expect this at all. Kudos to the customer service team!BTW, I've already booked for another room for my next trip this coming January. This time around, I didn't even browse for other places. Directly to L7, cause I know that's where I left my heart. Major Love!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The world trend now is concerning on environmental protection, but this hotel is not care about it. The housekeepers throw away the toothbrush, shower gel, shampoo & conditioner (only had been used for little bit) everyday after room cleaning, such a waste of things! They even threw away my own toothbrush!The room is quite noisy caused by the road traffic & signal sound of pedestrian crossing. Better to request the room which is not facing the main road. During my stay, most of the staffs (except housekeepers) were wearing poker face. Others from these, the hotel is quite good. The common area is really nice!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Checked in here for 4 nights while visiting Seoul. Located in a young, trendy part of town, it was still far from many of the restaurants I wanted to visit. My room was small and clean, but well appointed, and a good size for one person. Based on this room, I would check out other hotels in the brand. There is construction next door, so ask for a room located on the opposite side if you are bothered by noise (which starts quite early).
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I love this hotel too much. The location is excellent. Near MRT Hongdae Station. Breakfast has not so much. I think it is ok.Room is a standard for Korea, small but very clean. They provide hair dryer , TV, chiller.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I and my mother stayed at L7 Hongdae Hotel for 5 nignts and we really love staying at this hotel as it has a perfect location, 100-200 metres from exit no.1 of Hongik university station. Moreover, our room is very stylish and has all necessary amenities such as cable TV, washlet, hair dryer, slippers and bathrobe. We also enjoyed free coffee drips, it was nice and hardly find in any other hotels. Auto check-in/check-out from a hotel is very impressive since it is fast and convenient. Staffs here are nice and friendly. We will definitely stay at this hotel again if we come to Seoul next time.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location in myeongdong only a few steps from Hongik station and myeongdong shops with its own taxi stand. Has a hipster industrial feel to the place with touch screen lifts. The check in/check out desk was on level 21, with self check in counters. Also, ask reception for the tax invoice as your hotel stay is claimable at the airport. Level 21 also had a small restaurant, pool table, fooseball table, vinyl cds, and computers all for free usage. It was great. We stayed on level 17. The room was a good size, wasn’t stuffy with large windows. Would be even better if there was a bathtub but that was ok. Water and towels were replaced daily. The bar on the top level was impressive and service was great. The pool cost 20,000 won to use. There is also a laundry with a nice waiting area and tv. There is also a gym on level 5.Overall, our group were very happy staying here. There is also an L7 in Myeongdong. Also recommend the VR place on level 2. It was so much fun!!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice and comfortable hotel...very convenient to the subway system and nightlife around the area. Breakfast is nice but it was the same selection (stayed here for almost a month). Rooms are well kept and staff is very nice...only downside is elevator system...seems to take forever.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here as part of our honeymoon travels in September.The hotel is very easy to find from Hongik University station which is a direct train line from the airport. It is only 5 minute walk from the station.The check in desk is on the 21st floor which I thought was nice at the beginning, but by the end of the 5 day stay I could see how this was a huge annoyance as it creates unnecessary lift traffic.We were given a room on the 19th flood facing out the back of the hotel which was lovely. The front of the hotel can be quite noisy as it is a main pub/restaurant street, but he hotel provide you with earplugs in your room.The room was immaculate, very spacious and cleaned to perfection every day with fresh towels/bottles of water.Check out was quick and efficient, although when asked if we could store our luggage, the two female receptionists started laughing and just took the bags which I thought was quite rude. If you make check out 12pm, you need to allow for easy storage of bags in the hotel as out flight wasn’t until 11pm. The pool on the top floor was nice. There was only 3 other people there when we went, but it is quite small I can imagine for a very hot busy day. It is expensive, and they charge extra to have a seat and a towel which I think is a bit ridiculous. The hotel is expensive enough I think one day should be free of charge at least.We had a very comfortable stay here, but I think the hotel does need to tweak some areas a little bit, hence I haven’t given the 5 stars.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Cute and modern. The perfect distance from the super busy streets that are packed with energized college kids. On a main strip that has great restaurants and shopping. The house keeping was great. Security at the 1st floor where the elevators are AND you need a room key to use the elevators- perfect. The rooftop bar was a little spendy, no cocktails under 20 USD but the service was impeccable and the view was stunning. And, the cocktail, Birmingham Spring was superb. Great modern, fun, clean, casual hotel in the middle of everything.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ease access from Airport by Trains or Bus,reception located at 21st floor and staff are extremely helpful. Room are great for couples but not business partners in one room, Showers, toilet and basin are separated, just a bit open if normal friends or partners.But the bed comfy and spacious. Lots of food and convenient store nearby with 24 hours operation and make Seoul as a No Night City.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had no idea what I was booking when I booked this hotel in Hongdae. I knew I wanted a hotel at a decent rate in a decent area. The rate was approx $100 a night (which is great!) and the location seemed ok. At the end of our stay, I concluded that the value was great for what you get and the location could not be beat. This hotel is brand new as of 2018 ( i think it opened around Feb). I am curious how the hotel will hold up over the next few years.Hotel/Location: IT is located in between 2 subway stops. Right across the street from the major shopping and eating area of Hongdae. It was very convenient to be able to come back to the hotel in between shopping and eating to drop things off. Just know that Hongdae is located outside of the main part of Seoul (Gangnan, Itaewon, etc.), but is a tad closer to ICN airport. The hotel like mentioned before is very new. There is also shopping and restaurants located in the hotel. People have mentioned before that the elevator system is kinda of slow. I will attest to this, but it wasn't that big of a deal. The lobby is located on the 21st floor which is weird. The hotel was decorated in a very hip/chic fashion. Lots of cool art and decor. There is a business/play area (lobby area) that is wide open. Includes sitting area, conference area, pool table, computers, and lounge. I really like this area. At night, you can come and hang out there. View is fantastic. No free drinks or coffee to my knowledge. Is potentially open to outside guests (no need for key card to go to 21st floor). The hotel was clean throughout.Checkin/Service: They try to make checkin via a kiosk. Except the lady had to help both of us with our check in. Seemed to defeat the purpose. Keys were dispense by the kiosk. With that, check in wasn't too bad. Service overall was good. Housekeepers were really nice and quick to bring towels and whatever else you need. There is a gentleman door stairs that will call a cab for you. I did not see any bell man or valet guy.Room: Really nice set up. The basic room is not big but is spacious because there is only a half wall separating bathroom/sink area from the rest of the room. There is no closet, but enough space to set up your suitcase. We somehow ended up with 2 twin beds (not a big deal) that were comfy. There were outlets next to the bed. There were USB chargers on the desk. There is a small fridge (empty). Hot pot with cool instant drip coffee. The amenities were adequate including slippers, 2 free bottle of water, toothbrush, comb, and bath sponge. There is a separate toilet area and shower. Shower had nice water pressure. Internet was ok. Temp control was adequate. I did hear some street noise from the 17th floor. Not a big deal. I did not hear any noise from the other rooms. There was an ice maker and water dispenser on our floor. Hotel Amenities: There were a few restaurants in the hotel that we did not go to. So I cannot comment on the quality or price. There was a really nice pool (roof top) with bar area. They charge for usage of the pool. There appears to be entertainment from afternoon to evening. We went there really late and it seemed like a nice setup. I just cant comment as to how crowded the place gets. I did not check to see if there was a fitness room or not.All in all, a great hotel for business or friends. We didn't spend much time in the hotel and used it mainly to sleep. I think it was perfect for that.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this place hoping that our kids can use the pool, and I have also confirmed this with Agoda when I called the hotline. Upon check-in and to our disappointment we were advised that our kids were not allowed to use the pool. We were also told that there are extra charges to us the pool, to rent a towel and rent a seat and you can cannot be there all day. Also, the elevators are a bit of a hassle as it takes a while to wait and sometimes it opens ON EVERY FLOOR! Anyway, those inconvenience aside, the hotel staffs were friendly and prepared to help, the facilities were modern and clean and the beds were comfy and cozy.What we love the most is the location, it is close to the train station, restaurants and shopping. Everything is within minutes walk and it was fantastic.Overall it was a pleasant stay and we enjoyed our time at the L7 Hongdae.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Proximity to Hongdae metro and shopping outlets nearby. The room is new, clean and tidy. Bed is comfortable and shower head is robust. The only negative thing is that both the reception and the restaurant is located on 21/F, so giving the elevators a lot more traffic. On the day near the check out time (also around lunch time), I had waited for more than 15 mins to squeeze in a lift.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Expect to pay extra for everything!Beware! The pool is not included in the price. Its another 20dollars per person. If you wish to sit down on a chair it's another 5 dollars. If you want a towl its still another 5dollars. And the 20dollars will only get you a segment of the day. Prepare to leave the pool when your time is up.I had a booking including breakfast.Asking for an extra piece if bread is not possible. They then come back saying it is possible if you pay extra. I have never had this experince before, paying extra for a piece of bread.The location is nice but service is very poor. The extra costs make it feel like a cheap hotel, not a 4 star one.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean rooms & nice hotel with great location but the elevator situation is the WORST. Literally takes 10-15 minutes to wait for an elevator whether you’re on your room floor, at the lobby, first floor or on the rooftop. I’d stay at another hotel just so you don’t have to deal with the frustration, almost missed our train to Busan because we were waiting for an elevator. When an elevator would eventually come, it was usually already full so you’d have to wait for the next one. Laundry kiosk was super helpful and the beds were comfy!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Extremely nice room, stayed there with my husband for 10 days and we loved it! Good size, lovely views, wonderful shower, and delicious coffee! Really good cleaning service, everything impecable every day...Super stylish, all little design touches everywhere, really soft great quality linen and towels... plus the girls at the reception are really helpful, providing excellent recommendations of places to visit, eat around and helping with booking train tickets! I will definitely be back in L7 Hongdae!!!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The L7 Hongdae Hotel has become my favorite hotel. The location is great!! Subway stop just steps away. Restaurants and shopping close by. The rooms are very nice and comfortable. The laundry kiosk is very convenient. I love that their is ice and water available on each floor. The staff is friendly, polite and efficient!!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a wonderful one night stay here! Highly recommended for anyone looking to explore the Hongdae/Myeongdong area!PROS:- Location, location, location! The hotel is 1-2 minutes away from the Hongik Univ. subway station (exit 1), and also a 5 min walk away from the Incheon Airport shuttle bus stop.
