LINE/BT21 store is right downstairs of the same building, including restaurants, convenient stores, cafes and more just minutes away. Hongdik Uni and the surrounding shopping streets are also a mere 10 minute walk away.- Wonderful service! Was always greeted with a friendly smile by all reception staff who were spoke great English and attentively helped even when there was a crowded lobby. There are self check-in and out kiosks available as well, but the staff were always ready to jump in at anytime. Also had someone stationed on the 1F to help with doors and elevators.- Rooms were clean and comfortable, albeit basic with no closet (single hanger rack). All the necessities (WiFi, hot water, air-con) all worked fine, and all basic toiletries, hair-dryer and bathrobes also provided. No bottled water, but free water refill station on every floor.- Nice decor around both the 1F entrance and the lobby. Modern, artsy and added to a great atmosphere!CONS:- Elevators sometimes took a while to arrive. Minor inconvenience, but can get frustrating if in a hurry.- Could hear some of the road bustle near the window (even from the 15th floor) - a small price to pay for the prime location, and this did not affect our sleep at all. Super light sleepers may want to pack some earplugs just in case though!N/A:- Did not have time to use the lounge/gym/pool/breakfast, but wish I had! I believe there is an extra charge for the rooftop pool even for hotel guests.- Also didn't attempt to call a cab to the hotel as the subway/bus was just too convenient.All in all, the cons hardly affected my stay, and will definitely be back again!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very clean, modern hotel in a fantastic location. The staff are very friendly and speak basic English (which is excellent relative to Seoul!)There is a great VR place on the second floor. We didn’t eat in the restaurant upstairs as prices were ridiculous. The only negatives are there is a building site next door and across the road which woke us up most mornings. Also the pool wasn’t in use which we only found out when we arrived. Annoying as one of the main reasons we chose hotel was the pool so no swimming or relaxing for us. One final thing is there is absolutely no storage in the rooms for clothes.However overall I would definitely recommend.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What I find interesting about this hotel is the value you get for the money. Opened a few months ago, the L7 Hongdae hotel is a stylish and hip hotel in the center of Seoul's hippest and coolest neighborhoods Hongdae. Literally, I was surprised by how close everything is from this hotel. All the cool places you see on YouTube about Seoul, Hongdae didtrict with its clubs and restaurants and bars; the instagrammable Giheung Line Park which is a onve trans siberia train line transformed into a gorgeous linear park and Ehwa University with its beautiful gothic buildings. There is a subway line literally 10 meters from the front door to all of Seoul.Our room was stylish and modern with an oipen concept bath that made the room seem sacious and very mod. Loved it. Can't wait to come back when the water goes into the rooftop pool with a stunning 27 degrees view of the river and mountains surrounding Seoul.Like I said, best kept secret. Kinda want to keep it ti myself. LOL.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in L7 Hongdae during 12-15 Apr 2018. Perfect location as metro station and the Hongik shopping area are only 3 to 5 minutes walk from the hotel. Everything in the hotel is new and got a modern and cozy feel. Big room and great view from the hotel room. The hotel staff are friendly and helpful. I would like to express my sincere gratitude to one of the front desk staff, Miss Rella Min in particular. I checked out on 15 Apr (Sunday) and I got some postcards to mail. I found it difficult to purchase stamps in town since it was a Sunday and Post Offices were closed. No such service is provided by the hotel itself. Rella personally helped me to send out the postcards, she was willing to go above and beyond her job duties to provide extra help to guests which is highly appreciated! Thank you again for her kind assistance. The only minor area that can be improved is that water spill out easily during shower since there is no shower curtain at the bath tub.I would certainly stay in L7 Hongdae next time if I visit Seoul again!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed in the Hotel during Apr 11-13, it was very convenient to stay there coz it’s just few minutes walk from subway exit 1. The hotel itself was stylish, they provided self check-in and check-out service, which was very different from other hotel. We enjoyed the check-in process, it was fast and easy, the staff was there to assist us for the whole check-in process. As my room was paid to the hotel directly, i could able to get VAT for my paid room charge, it was nice. The room was well equipped and comfortable, we were assigned to stay at the end of the corridor, but it was a nice room with great view, as the windows size was a bit wider than others, coz we can enjoy a private corner view with the extended wider window design. I would recommend this hotel to my friend and will certainly come back to stay.It was convenient to go to the airport by the subway from Hong Dae university station, it was cheap and easy, although there was a bit walk, around 10-15 mins from exit 1 to the airport rail line, but there was escalator and walkway all the time, no need to use the staircase, so it was not difficult to bring along with your luggage, the travelling time was about 50 mins, which was faster than taking bus to airport, and no need to worry about the traffic if taking bus.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 6 days in a triple-sharing room and concluded that it is nice and memorable experience. This hotel allows for early check-in and late-checkout to suit their customers. The fittings in the room are trendy and working, for eg, different voltage plugs to suit devices from varous regions. USB sockets are plentiful and some next to the beds. It is situated near Hongik University station of the Seoul metro network so no problem moving around in the city. It will be better of the glass partition of the shower tub be removed and replaced by shower curtain to prevent splashing out of tub and have a metal bar on the left side to allow safe stepping-out of tub. Other than this, the triple-sharing room is near perfect.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a new hotel. Rooms are very well designed. New fixtures and fittings and spacious with the layout. I like the bed which is comfortable to sleep in. Strategic location which is just across the hongik uni. Station. You can take 1 train from airport to this place directly.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our airbnb apartment in hongdae was so dirty that we left and booked this hotel imemdiately after checking in. Price was reasonable. Room was super clean and toilet was clean too. The most important thing is that the shower head had no residue on it and it was comfortable to shower after a long day. The hot water was a bit unsteady and it came in waves of hot and cold but it was not a big issue. Room was quiet even though it was a room facing the hongdae street. View from room was great. We got room on the 10th floor. Free lounge on 21st floor was great with pool table and chess tables. 24hr gym on 5th floor very clean and new. 24hr Laundry on 5th floor is also great. But the buttons should be labelled in english next time for foreigners to understand. My pajamas got burnt from drying too long (50 mins). Check in was easy and fast. Check in is on the 21st floor though, not 1st floor. There will be staff waiting at the lifts to guide you up. Check-out is self check-out very fast and easy.Hotel accessible from hongik university station exit 1. Very near hongdae street. Lots of restaurants and shopping nearby. Will stay again!
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 相機吃的很飽，每個角落都讓人驚豔！街頭塗鴉風格正好為樂天年輕系列做了很棒的區野，從簡單但風格十足的一樓入口到接待處，餐廳休憩區的黑膠區我好愛喔！馬上推薦好友來入住，也期待自己下次再來。（忘了說交通十分方便，走2分鐘就弘大一號出口）附近好逛又好吃！！Street art style is my favorite,not only trendy but super comfortable, the bathing 、amenities are all nice. I especially like the stationery part and the smell of the body wash. The hotel location is awesome,2 mins to MRT exit 1.Perfect!!お洒落どきれいな、好き！交通も便利ですよね。2分まで地鐵 。( ^ω^ ) まだね。
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is very new and very clean.The reception staff was very friendly with great service mind. We had arrived a few hours before the check-in time and she was trying her best to help us check-in early so that we get our rooms. The hotel location is also super convenient with the airport limousine bus stop only 5 mins walk and Hongik Subway station within 1 min walk.Though one down point is that the shower room has no hook nor shelf for us to at least put our towel in the room which makes it quite inconvenient.
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very nice and new. There are in the shopping area. In room has big window that can see beautiful city view. The reception is very cute. They can speck English well and good care of us. :-)
hotelName:
11    L7 Hongdae
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a hassle free hotel with staff who speaks good English. The breakfast (especially coffee) was very convenient and decent price for the quality you get. There was also a fine Korean touch to this mostly continental breakfast (corn soup, Korean sweets and pastries).As a little plus, our room had a view of the Namsan Tower!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just spent our 4 nights at this hotel. It was so nice and clean. The mattress and blanket are super comfort. Mr Ju Hong at the front desk was so professional and helpful. We will definitely stay here again in our next trip to seoul.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The perfect place for a city trip: Practical location; nearby grocery stores and public transport stations; good continental breakfast; friendly staff; fully equipped and clean room. All of this to a very good price.As an added bonus, we were allowed to check-in several hours earlier, thanks to the goodwill of receptionist Linda Song. This was very appreciated, especially after an exhausting trip.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I only have good words for this hotel. The interior and facilities are very modern. Excellent service and very nice staff. Our 5-day stay in G2 Hotel was super amazing! Very close to the shopping district and lots of coffee shops and restaurants nearby. Will surely book this hotel again when I'm back in Seoul.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel location is excellent! Just 10 minutes walk away from Myeongdong shopping district and 5 minutes walk from 2 subway stations. The room is clean! The staff are very helpful! They speak English very well.Would like to special thanks to the Front Desk staff, Jay Park for his great hospitality!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First time at this side of Myeongdong shopping street. It is less busy and very clean. Helpful staff. They speak english well. Clean beddings and towels. Light ambience. Cool AC. Good ventilation. I go back again.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose g2 hotel for our family vacation in korea and we didn't get any disappointed. The hotel was really good, the room was clean and the bed was so very comfortable. Their staffs were really friendly. Thanks to Ms. Lee for giving us the best room.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was so good, the bed was so comfortable and the cr was very clean. Thier staffs were so friendly and easy to approach especially Ms. Lee, thanks for assisting us and giving us a good room. See you soon.. :)
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This Hotel is close to the subway and easy to locate. The check-in was breeze. Though we arrived couple of hours before the check-in time and was fully booked, they managed to give us our room in 30 mins. The room was modern with latest facilities. Toilet was clean. Bed linens and upholstery were also neat. Myeongdong is just a couple of blocks away - a 7-10 mins walk. The best part of our stay was the breakfast. Just excellent. Loved it. Hospitality and warmth of the staff were awesome. Highly recommend.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: For my business trip I choose G2, and it was very good choice.Ms. Lee helped me with check-in. gave me free upgrade room on high floor.staffs are friendly and they speak English well.Room condition and location was good. What I liked about the rooftop garden (smoking area) is I am able to see N tower.Specially at night it's so nice.When I am back in Seoul, I will definitely choose G2!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really amazing Hotel, super clean, nice helpful staff, beautiful rooftop & in general an amazing experience. Everything is in walking distance and you can go anywhere from there! I will definitely come back here when I’m in Seoul again.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable bed and excellent customer service. Room is clean and facilities provided are also in good condition. The location is considerably near to myeongdong street, although it takes about 10 mins of walk but generally still consider good location especially if your prefer somewhere with more quiet environment. Plenty of convenient stores and food places surrounded the hotel and you easily fill your stomach anytime.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 5 nights in late May and really enjoyed my stay. Hotel room was absolutely spotless all the time. My partner spilled banana milk on the sheets one night and it was promptly changed the next day after we came back to the hotel. Location: hotel is situated between 3 main train stations - Chungmuro, Eulji-ro-3 and myeongdong (all about 5-7 mins walk away from the hotel). It’s located in a quiet neighbourhood so you don’t get the hustle and bustle of myeongdong which is great but you can always pop down for a quick walk for some street bites. There is a nearby fried chicken place that is great but I didn’t manage to try :( only found it in my last day. A number of convenience stores are also located nearby making buying any snacks Amenities: they provide the usual - toothbrush, comb, tea, coffee packets etcExperience: Both the check in and out experience were seamless. They had a strict check in policy time of 2pm so they didn’t allow us to check in early when we reached (understandable). They also provided umbrella when it was raining.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: とても清潔でアメニティーも申し分ないし、ホテルのスタッフの方も親切でした。アーリーチェックインにも対応してくださいました。ホテル内ですれ違う時笑顔で声をかけてくださりとても良かったです。また、24時間空いている屋上がカフェの様にオシャレで南山タワーもよく見えました。大満足です！またぜひ利用させていただきたいです。Thanks to very kind staff (especially Mr.Jay Park), It was very good stay in this hotel. I wanna stay again!!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location, convenient to transportation. The room was very nice and comfortable. The breakfast was great. The staff was very helpful and was able to assist in a couple of special requests that I had.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay at this hotel was by far one of the best hotel we have stayed at counting all the countries we have been to, G2 hotel is on the top of my list if ever we go back to seoul. I recommend this hotel especially for families since it is in the heart or seoul, so close to myeongdong shopping area and street foods. Lots of great restaurants just around the corner near this hotel. The hotel is new so everything is clean. Has a laundry area which is a great deal to us since we stayed for more than a week. I would like to especially thank Ms. Song for accommodating us throughout our stay. She is very friendly and easy to talk with and very helpful too. Thank you for the WINE AND GIFT!!! So thoughtful of you! ❤️We are definitely staying at G2 hotel again the next time we visit seoul.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose G2 Hotel because of its close proximity to the Myeongdong shopping district. I'm glad we chose this hotel. It was very well located and everything from the lobby to the room felt new. The staff were extremely nice and spoke excellent English so it was very convenient to ask them for tips on our itinerary. Great value for the price we paid. The hotel didn't blow me away, but not in a bad way... just a simple, very clean, consistent hotel. I would stay at this hotel again considering the price.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When we stayed in G2 it was lovely - we got our room upgraded (a nice surprise!). The room was spacious, clean and modern. The bed is so comfy, and the rooftop is beautiful. The staff were friendly and accommodating. I would recommend.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location - a very short 7min walk to the heart of Myeongdong. Near 2 train stations. Lots of restaurants & a nice cafe "Luft Coffee" around the corner. Convenience store a minute away. Personally I'd rather stay here, away from the lights & noise of Myeongdong. You could take the Airport Limousine (no.6015/6001) directly to T-mark hotel & a very short walk to G2 Hotel.It wasn't a hassle at all with our 2 big & heavy luggage bags. You could also take the public train from Incheon airport to Seoul station & transfer to either Chungmuro/Euljiro 3-ga station.G2 Hotel - Top class. The staff are incredibly polite & helpful, all of them spoke fluent English. Reception is open 24hrs. And that marble interior at the reception area, so lush & beautiful! The room itself was sparkling clean, especially the toilet. It felt like we came back to a new room everyday after house keeping. Everything looked brand new (this hotel is apparently 2 years old). They provided Innisfree toiletries which is a bonus, hair dryer, coffee & tea, kettle, mini fridge, TV, hangers.We really appreciated the heater/air conditioner in the room. It was a cold 0 degree Celsius outside but the room was nice & cozy at our selected temperature of 20. This feature is what older hotels in the heart of Myeongdong lacked, a lot of those hotels have centralized air conditioning that doesn't allow you to alter the temperature of the room. G2 hotel has a controller built into the wall, so you can increase/decrease the temperature as you please. Rooms are quiet, because you're away from the heart of Myeongdong's chaos, you'll get yourself a quiet night's sleep. Blackout curtains allowed us to sleep in a little longer too. I really have nothing but high praises for G2 hotel. I would book this hotel again in a heartbeat on our next trip back to Seoul.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would highly recommend this hotel for its great location, spacious rooms and most importantly, for its excellent customer service even during a last minute cancellation.My mom & I booked this hotel for 6 nights. Unfortunately, due to a family emergency, we had to fly back much earlier and could only stay 1 night. We had booked months earlier and only gave the hotel 24 hours notice about having to cancel the remaining 5 nights. We arrived around 11pm on a Sunday night and had to leave at 5.45am to catch a 9am Monday morning flight.In spite of the short notice, the hotel was extremely professional and promptly processed our cancellation in a fuss-free way. We paid for the 1 night we stayed and 1 extra nights’ charge as a cancellation fee, but otherwise the hotel waived all the charges for the remaining nights. We thought this was fair given the extremely late notice. We had bought some gifts for our Korean friends but could not pass it to them as we were leaving early. The hotel was kind enough to let us leave our gifts with the front desk for our friends to pick up.Special thanks to the manager, J Y Park, who helped us. Overall, we were really grateful for the excellent and thoughtful customer service during a stressful time.Although we only stayed 1 night, we had a really good experience during our short stay. Our room was spacious and had all the needed amenities (toiletries, coffee/tea making facilities, TV, hotel safe). It would have been a perfect base from which to explore Seoul! I think the hallmark of a good hotel is whether they provide great customer service in a difficult situation. In this regard, this hotel impressed me and has gained my trust. Definitely hope and plan to return to this hotel next time I visit Seoul. Thank you again for all your help.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location that near to 3 subway station on 3 different subway line. It make more convenient to travel by subway. Airport bus is 7-10 mins by walk from hotel. When you have many luggage on your return, this might not be good to travel with airport bus. Anyway, thanks to Jay Park, I able to manage this. Self service laundry is very essential for people who long stay like me. Great location for shopping and local food hunting.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for a few nights in March 2019. The hotel really is great value for money. The lobby is modern, minimal, and gives a great first impression. The location of the hotel, just a short walk from Myeongdong and two main subway stations, is ideal for exploring. We stayed in a room on the 12th floor. The rooms are simple but modern and functional. The level of cleanliness was great and the daily room clean was clearly thorough.The lobby staff were polite and helpful, even helping to send some postcards on my behalf. They were also keen on helping us organise our onward travel to Busan. My only drawback was the fact I arrived at the hotel very early, around 7am. When I enquired about the possibility of an early check-in, the receptionist said it wasn’t possible, despite the hotel looking half empty. I understand that this is subject to availability, but even when I came back at midday, I was told I had to wait until 2pm. Other than that, a great experience and would definitely recommend.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 4 nights - visited as a large group and the hotel were very accommodating with putting us on the same floor. Front desk staff were all very helpful, with a special mention to Jason Park. Only a few minutes walk away from the airport bus stop and a short walk from 2 subway stops. Short walk to the main Myeongdong area. Great location. Did not have the hotel breakfast. There are a few cafes nearby and convenience stores for things we needed. Great value for money and spacious enough rooms, will definitely stay here again for our next visit.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room 810 situated away from lifts - no noise. Bathroom amenities ok and plenty of open hanging space - easy to check if you have left anything behind. Very clean and bed super comfortable. Flat screen easy to view from bed not easy if sitting at desk.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located near the main shopping area in Myeongdong and offer a nice relaxing room for a very good value. Staffs are very good in arranging transportation, particularly praising the service of Jay Park whom has helped arranged taxis at numerous times. Would love to stay at G2 again if visiting Seoul.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Family of Four travelling to dream trip to Korea. Hard time finding American size double Queen bed hotels. This place was recommended and fantastic! Clean, newer facility, English speaking. Continental breakfast little of Korean and traditional continental. Bacon and Eggs! Our sons loved it. Right across from Police Station. Near everything (Subway, Starbucks, eateries, 7-11). Very safe to travel in and around this area. Can't wait to return.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is very stylish and luxurious compared to the size of the hotel. Acess is good because location is near three subway stations. The best thing is the service of the staff. all of the front staffs are very friendly and helpful.Especially,Jay Park has provided early check in service with consideration of us who were tired from long distance trip. When I come back to Seoul, I will definitely stay at G2!!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location, near shops, restaurants, convenient stores, police station, and public attractions. The hotel very clean throughout with very good service. Jay Park at reception was courteous and helpful. Will stay again.Keep up the good work guys!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I'm sorry this review is really late, but the G2 Hotel was excellent and they deserve the credit. Check-in and check-out were easy, the bed was great, and the toiletries were the best hotel toiletries I've ever had. (They're by a S. Korean company called Innisfree and they were amazing, especially the hair conditioner!) Location was convenient to a few different metro stops and the airport bus. I would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. Near a couple of train lines. Walking distance to myeong dong tourist belt. Good affordable eating places in its surrounds. Hotel well kept. Clean and nicely decorated common areas. Customer service is also excellent. Rooms a bit small but that’s what you get in central Seoul anyway. Love the innisfree toiletries. Will definitely recommend stay at this hotel.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely clean hotel. South Korean people are very humble and gentle. Staff was awesome, Obliging.. Hotel nice central location, clean, good buffet breakfast, Outdoor markets nearby as well as shopping. Not on main route but not far from transit
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel and the room were very nice and clean. Most importantly for me, hotel staff (fronts and maids) were very friendly and helpful. Front officers here were the best! Would love to go back to G2 and recommend this place to others who go to Seoul as well :)
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in the Quadruple room of G2 with my family for 3 nights, the room is both spacious and modern; and the bedding is so comfy especially the duvets that make us want to know the brand! Very nice hotel service and great thanks to Mr. Jay Park who arranged early check in for my family after the mid night flight. We have a wonderful stay in G2 and will definitely visit again very soon.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: seoul has been a frequent 6mthly ~ annual short getaway for me and my family. G2 hotel came up on the agoda website prior to us booking our regular hotel that we usually frequent at. stayed a total of 4 nights at this young hotel that was just recently built. plus points for the hotel is:1) situated between chungmuro and euljiro 3(ga) subway station2) 10-15 minutes walk to myeongdong street (entry via the myeongdong catholic church)3) a lot of cafes and local authentic restaurants all around it. G2 hotel staff:a real pleasure to meet and greet the front desk staff as they welcome you with a really great smile. housekeeping does a wonderful job everyday, and amenities are topped up daily to meet our everyday needs. environment:its design is potrays a "very clean" concept with its white and black design. hotel lobby is spacious and has a large meeting table available for guests to have a rest while waiting for check in. rooms:small, but enough to get by and sleep in comfort. love the bathroom the most, because of the bathtub! quiet area - not must noise as well.overall, I would like to thank the staff for their hardwork and effort in making our stay enjoyable and relaxing! This hotel has raised standard of what a 5* hotel should be! I hardly say this on my reviews, but this is a hotel that I would definitely like to come back to visit again. Keep up the good work and happy holidays!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: G2 Hotel is an excellent place to stay. Located close to public transport, it is walking distance to Myeongdong Shopping District. Restaurants and cafes are also very accessible as they are just round the corner from the hotel.The rooms are clean and cosy, with friendly and helpful staff, ever ready to provide assistance to make your trip in Seoul hassle-free and delightful. The staff speak good English too! Look out for the handsome Mr. Jay Park at the front desk if you ever need anything.Affordable and cosy, we would definitely be back at G2 on our next trip!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We choose this hotel due to its central location, within walking distance to the famous Myrongdong street as well as easy access between Chungmuro & Myeongdong stations. We took the airport train from Incheon Airport to Seoul Station, then transit to Chungmuro Station (Line 4). Make sure you choose exit which heading to the police station. Average room size. Practical toilet layout with bidet. We were given complimentary Innisfree face mask, which really was a nice touch. The toiletries were Innisfree as well. Breakfast was more or less the same everyday. The free self-laundry service was a plus since we were staying there for quite a while. We booked the DMZ tour from the hotel, it was easy breasy. Overall, it was a nice stay.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in the business double room for 8 nights and hotel provided us with a crib for our baby. The hotel is convenient as it is close to three stations and serves as a good starting point for exploring Seoul. The walk to myeongdong is about 10minutes. If you are coming to Seoul purely for shopping, you may perhaps find it is a little too far out. Lots of restaurants nearby and away from the madness of myeongdong. Nice rooftop garden and we always had the same view from our room. The room itself was spacious and clean. There is a washing and dryer for guests to use in the basement free of charge. This was helpful as we were travelling with a young infant. Good value for money and certainly exceeded expectations of a 3star hotel. Hotel does not offer transfers but organised a taxi to the airport for us. It cost 65,000won which equals to about £45. Overall we enjoyed our stay as it was an excellent base for exploring and the room was clean and comfy. We would recommend this hotel to others.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My 2nd time flying to Seoul and this is the 2nd hotel I booked. Close to the Myeongdong District probably around 10 minute walk. There are a bunch of restaurants near the hotel. Room is big and tidy! A bit of a hassle with the reception as they don't attend to your queries that important. Had my room up for cleaning but did not clean when we get back and got a reason of because there is a cut off (we had the room for cleaning ready by lunch) for letting the housekeeping know you'll have your room cleaned. This is my first time hearing such a thing. They did clean the room after a few exchanges.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First time in Korea, was glad that hotel receptions could converse in English as compared to my unpleasant experiences with the restaurants and transportations. Staff were helpful with the requests and was impressed that they held multiple roles as operator/reception/Housekeeping assistant. Spacious hotel room equipped with the necessities and surprisingly comfortable bed for a 3-3.5star hotel.If you do not mind walking, MyeongDong is about 8-10min away. From Gimpo Airport to G2 via airport limousine bus was a challenge as the bus driver was not helpful due to language barrier, and often late broadcast of the upcoming stop as he sped past it as soon as I pressed the bus bell. Taxi is recommended for ease of mind.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We arrived in the hotel at 7am and were allowed to enter the rooms already. They were very understanding of our needs. We had a nice clean and comfortable room! We truly enjoyed out stay. The only downside was that we had to cross a major thoroughfare to get to the main shopping area of Myeondong. Nonetheless, it allowed us to have a good night's sleep!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Seoul was the last stop on our Asia trip and for that reason we decided to book a hotel. For the price we paid, about $100 USD a night, we got the service, amenities, and comfort that far exceeded that amount. Comfort: THE BEDS WERE AMAZING! I always have a hard time adjusting to hotel beds and never sleep well the first night. But this time, I passed out immediately every. single. night. The sheets are also extremely comfortable and high quality. Free innisfree bathroom goods, hair dryer, slippers, advanced heating and cooling system. Free washing and drying but you do have to pay for detergent (2000 won), which is very fair. The hotel is gorgeous, spacious, and spotlessly clean (goes without saying but I said it anyway). I was transported my own zen zone every time I walked back into my room, which is critical after a noisy and exciting day in Seoul.Service:Very charming and lovely concierges. We didn’t ask for much behind calling a cab and taking a photo for our group, but each interaction left me feeling happy.In short: This is the best bang for your buck for excellent service and upscale comfort.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We did have a great stay at G2, staff is very helpful & friendly, over expectation!!! The property well located in Myeongdong, really hidden gem. The room is in a good size with great toiletries, full amenities, Bedding is very comfy and clean. The hotel rooftop is something you can’t be missed. Value of Money!!! We defo go back ;D
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 6 nights in September 2018. The room was clean and as in photos. The roof top garden was a fantastic place to relax and enjoy a morning coffee or evening beer. Location was excellent, being a short walk to several useful subway lines, but slightly removed from the chaos. However, the hotel really exceeded expectations through the courtesy of its staff. One staff member even went above and beyond by walking my wife to the pharmacy across the street and assisting with translating for her. Thank you G2 Hotel for a great stay!
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: G2 Hotel in Myongdong is a very new hotel that opened in 2017. It is situated between Metro #2, #3, and #4, and just 7 minutes walking distance away from the infamous Myongdong main street. The location of the hotel is very convenient to get around and travel. Whether you decide to go left or right from the hotel, there are many local Korean eateries, cafes, and convenient stores that are just a few steps away from the entrance.The room is clean, spacious, and comfortable. The amenities are excellent: Innisfree shampoo and body wash ( I ended up purchased few bottles home), Osulloc green tea and Camelia tea, coffee, a refrigerator, and a water kettle. There is also a free laundrymat with minimal cost for detergent.After a day long of sightseeing or shopping spree, I enjoyed returning to this quiet and safe hotel (right across from a police station), away from the hustling and bustling, to relax.Last but not least, Mr. Alex Min, Hotel Manager, and his team were execeptional. They were always there to help and made my stay welcoming and memorable. The first day I arrived at G2 Hotel, Mr. Alex Min, pointed out several Myeongdong's point of interest. I really wanted to try korean fried chicken, and he mentioned that the staff can help me place the order. I ate Kyochon fried chicken twice.I highly recommend this hotel, and I will definitely stay at G2 Hotel when I visit Seoul in future.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed this hotel a few days and I enjoyed this hotel as this hotel has good bed and cozy room. They were kind and I speacially appreciate to Jay Park. He care anout us with warm heart and tried to assist in good way. He is true friend. We had good time in this hotel . I would like to visit this hotel again.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in the Triple Room August 19 to August 21 for our family trip.Room was spacious enough. Even the view was wonderful. We can see the N tower from our room. And Also rooftop in the 16th floor was amazing.Location of the hotel was very convenience.There are many restaurants nearby. And Its just 7min walking distance from Myeongdong. I would specially like to thank reception staff, Adela Lee, She was very helpful when making a reservation in restaurant. We was really willing to help. Definitely will recommend this hotel to anyone and will stay at hotel again.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is on a side street with walkable distance to the Myeondong shopping area. The street is quiet but safe as there is a police station nearby. There are also many restaurants and a convenience store nearby A bright, clean and nice lobby. We were greeted by a lady receptionist who was very polite, helpful and with good spoken English. She listened to my requests and questions. She was very well groom and with smiles. It was sweet they gave presents to female guests (2 face masks).We booked a deluxe twin for 2 nights. It had a good room size although I previously stayed in a nearby hotel with bigger room. Our room was very quiet (the receptionist listened to my request) with good decor and comfortable beds. The amenity were all from Innersfree so I tried their conditioner which I normally left alone. Their room rate was very reasonable US$85 per night and they provided bath robe and disposable slippers with this rate. The gym’s a bit smaller but adequate. The receptionist Mr S Hong was very helpful. He was very polite, spoke very good English, booked a taxi for us and helped us with our luggages to the Taxi trunk. The only reason I give a 4-stars instead of 5 was because there were 2 tennis ball-liked objects stuck on the carpeted floor between the window and my bed (room 1006) I kicked into them accidentally a couple of times when I tried to open the curtain and it really hurt my toes. I suggested those 2 tennis ball-liked object should be removed as soon as possible to avoid similar accidents for other guests.I highly recommend this hotel and will definitely return for my next visit in Seoul.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had an awesome stay at G2 hotel last week. We were greeted by hotel staff Jay Park. He was really nice and friendly. He offered us an early check-in as we were very tired from the overnight flight. Also, recommended us local food options. The room was spacious and clean. Location of the hotel is in between 3 subway stations and easy access to the airport Limousine.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel staff greeted us and spoke very good English. Mr Jay park took care of us and made sure we knew the area and made us feel welcome. The hotel room was clean and stocked with innisfree products. I would highly recommend this hotel.Only con if any is that it's a 10 minute walk to the closest train station and about under 15 min to myeondong. Which in my books still isn't bad.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 6 nights in G2 Hotel, the staffs were very helpful and friendly. I wrote them emailed few weeks before I landed Seoul to request for early check in, they reply within 24 hours and arrange it for me. We were greeted by the warmest and friendly smile from the restaurant Manager Edith Kim every morning when we stepped into their restaurant for breakfast. She could remembered our preferences of drinks and foods although they were many guests stayed at the same time. The hotel was clean and I like the rooftop view overlooking N Seoul Tower. The hotel located about 10 minutes from Myeongdong night market. I will definitely revisit next time.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at G2 for 5 nights - was an excellent stay. Would highly recommend.Pros :- hotel service is top notch. They would pick up the calls within 3 seconds, Staff’s were very forthcoming as well. Special mention to Jay and Lee, who were extremely helpful and sincere in their service. Keep it up.- value for money. Good location, walking distance from subway Myeongdong Cons:- breakfast was rather mundane, being the same everyday. A slight variation would be very much appreciated.- about 10 mins walking distance from the heart of Myeongdong shopping district.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: G2 hotel was clean, the staff were friendly, and it was in a good location. There was a rooftop with an impressive view, and the breakfast was great if you're the kind of person who needs a western breakfast.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic hotel in myeongdong, very convenient to get from Incheon Airport. Stayed for 2 nights. Loads of restaurants by the hotel. Only 20 minutes walk from namdaemun market and 10 minutes from the busy myeongdong shopping streets. Very lovely team going above and beyond to keep our stay comfortable. Will definitely be back on my next visit
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Breakfast is a bit expensive. Would be good if special discount offered to in house guest.Female staff doing my checkin on 23 May was very friendly and helpful. Extremely patient in answering all my enquiries. Clearly introduce hotel facilities. She is definitely the hotel ambassador.
hotelName:
12    G2 Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You get what you pay for. Not crazy expensive and we found it to be totally ok. Amazing breakfast and right in the middle of Myengdeong. Lots of great eating places - a 5 min walk from the hotel. We recommend it.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here 3 nights after a long flight from Sydney via Hong Kong. Check in was quick and friendly. Hotel room although on the small side (which is standard across Seoul I have noticed) it was very comfortable and the bed very large compared to other hotels we have stayed at. Bed very comfortable as well as pillows. Toilet seat and bidet water warm (great for this cold winter weather) and 2 bottles of water provided free every day. Did not have breakfast at this hotel but many options close to hotel. This location is excellent. We enjoyed the street food available in the surrounding streets, very safe to eat for those that are wary. Close walk to train station. We also stayed in Gangnam and would say I prefer the Myeongdong area to stay. Highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Check in was fuss-free and staff was really helpful in giving directions. Shuttle to airport provided great convenience. Room was clean and spacious. Lots of eating places and shopping in the vicinity. Will certainly stay in this hotel again.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: stayed at room 1015 for 7 nights! NIce place to stay. Housekeeping is great and very helpful. room has lots of space though no view at all. carpet needed to be replaced as they are stained and looked dirty even after being vacuumed.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Royal Hotel for two nights before flying back to Toronto.Room 3/5Super small and tight room, way too tight for two people. It was a standard room so I’m sure you can get a larger room. There is a heated seat in the bathroom and that was pretty cool.Location 5/5Exactly why we picked this place, it’s in the Center of the Myeongdong shopping district.Service 3/5We got there around 12:30pm and were told come back at 2 because that’s when check-in starts. Ok that’s fine but the place is massive so I find it hard to believe they didn’t have a room ready.When our room was ready we had to carry our own bags which I’m cool with but they have signs everywhere that it’s a ‘Michelin’ hotel so I thought they’d do more.Value 4/5For the location the room is not a bad price. The food is grossly overpriced.We were able to take a free shuttle to the airport provided by the hotel (~30 mins away) so that was nice but there are only two times per day (no exceptions).Food N/AWe didn’t eat at the hotel because they only had a buffet breakfast and a 3 course dinner option. Neither we were willing to pay for given the really high price. Go get some Korean BBQ instead.We did try the patisserie...The Mont Blanc Is insanely delicious!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here 10 days in a club room. The service checking in or out was very quick.there is no bellboy who deliver your luggage to your room. The rooms are very small in western standards, but we managed. Their restaurant on the 21st floor, served excellent food, but this Michilin star restaurant has the prices to equal quality food. There are hundreds of restaurants close by. The happy hour was early in comparison to other places in Asia, the food on offer was extraordinary and no need for dinnerafterwards. I can recommend this hotel and book a room with executiveprivilages, it is worth the extra
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My stay with my wife at Royal Hotel Seoul was excellent, although the room is slightly small, we booked the room with access to the Executive Lounge. The lounge was fantastic, the light refreshments and drinks were great especially the happy hours with free flow of drinks and food. The bird eye view from the lounge is wonderful and the service is great. The location of the hotel is one of the best with direct access to the heart of Myeongdong.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: In Seoul in business and did a mistake to book the Royal. Royal is for well off Asian tourist with kids and other noisy elements. The lobby is really nice and One would hope that style. Was followed through in the bedrooms but they have not been refurbished for some years. The service is okay but that is all.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Family of 3 adults. Royal Hotel in Myeongdong is in a very lively part of the city, centrally located. They offer a welcome soft drink upon arrival. But: very quiet inside! They do offer free airport transport, but limited times. When we arrived in Seoul (evening), we'd missed the free bus, so we took public bus 6015 from Gate 5B - which dropped us off at the corner, near the hotel. It cost Won 13,500 and took 40 minutes. We bought an 'AmazingPay' card (similar to Octopus Card in Hong Kong) for Won 50,000 each (including Won 4,000 fee) at the airport. We used it everywhere and you can top up at 7-11 and other outlets. Well worth it. The hotel also runs a free bus from 11am every morning around the city with 4 drop off points. The 'family room' was a squeeze :( - with the double bed being pushed up against the wall, but it was OK with all freebies, like percolated coffee, free water, hair dryer, slippers, bathrobes, etc., and a free 1/2 bottle of a nice red wine when we arrived. The hotel bar prices are expensive, given its' location - close to other bars and clubs. They should reduce their prices to be more competitive. Also, the breakfast was OK, but didn't have a fresh noodle section, which we had expected. We only ate there once. Overall, the hotel was clean (except the bedroom carpet), staff were lovely (but not always understood our English) … but was in a great location - with Myeongdong street stalls, street food (all delicious), local shops (H&M, Zara, Nike, Adidas, Uniqlo etc) and very close to good transport links around the City. I would recommend the Royal Hotel as a very convenient location with good services.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Got to stay 4 nights with my spouse and my tour mates. Never got to interact much with front desk since our organiser was the one facilitating giving our keys etc. Lobby was modest ,to say the least. But it was beautiful inside. I’m not saying it was luxurious but it was more like it. Our room was on the small side , a little hard to move around and even unpack your luggage. A/C was centralised . It was spring season . And it was on heat/ warm mode. So ended up opening a small part of the glass windows for a little cool breeze to settle in. But amenities was , it was good. Loved the huge flat screen LED Tv . Loved my comfortable bed. Even my bathroom. Loved the toiletries and the automated bidet. The breakfast buffet at the top most floor serves a nice selection. Liked the bulgogi and the international selection. But menu choices in the buffet doesn’t change. I hope that there are variations in the selection somehow. Wireless internet was complimentary, and relatively fast. Rarely encountered some spotty areas. There’s a gym , I’m not sure if there’s a swimming pool though . There’s a nice spa, and I sort of missed having my own treatment. But the biggest advantage of this hotel is definitely the location. Looks like it’s in the pulsating heart of Myeongdong. It’s an out of the door into everything feel. From the vaunted street food karts , cosmetic shops, designer stores, convenience 24/7 outlets , fast food places , retail, everything. If you are into shopping this is one of the hotel that should be considered.By the way communicating in English is not a problem. Talked with operator she was somehow fluent in her dialect .
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location great, quick walk to subways, right in street food area. Quiet, good breakfast selection. Comfortable bed and good over bath shower. A smoothly organised calm place. Airport shuttle good on way back but only goes once a day from airport which didn’t match my flight. Limited room service menu of that is important to you. Overall recommend
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed there for one night. The location is good, “welcome drink” was just juice from the pack, breakfast was ok. Personal was a little bit inexperienced, but ok. The major problems are the room lights. We could not fall asleep because half of the lightning simply wasn’t able to switch off. The hotel stuff spent almost an hour to resolve the problem at midnight... the technician was quite unfriendly and really inexperienced. Finally the cut off some wires and we could sleep. As a result, one hour sleep stolen by the hotel and no excuses from the stuff...
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for one night as a free stopover with Korean Air. We were initially offered Grand Hyatt Incheon but wanted to experience Seoul so requested to change. A free shuttle was waiting outside and took us directly to the hotel in about an hour. The Royal Hotel is in the most perfect location in central Meongyang in walking distance to tons of restaurants, shops, and nightlife. The dinner that was included wasn’t great, would recommend eating at one of the many restaurants in walking distance to the hotel instead. The room and bed were comfortable and clean and breakfast was great too. Overall we had a great time and would definitely recommend staying at Royal Hotel!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I first stayed here courtesy of Asiana Airlines en route from Sydney to London, and liked it so much that I have since stayed here twice more at my own expense. I stayed here for a week ending 9 April, but had to pay for shuttle bus 6015 because the hotel’s free shuttle bus runs only at 6:30 pm and this time did not suit me.My room (no. 1318) was very comfortable and had everything I needed, including a comfortable bed, very good free wifi and TV with some English language channels (BBC and CNN only).I had breakfast here on the first day only (I wrongly thought it was included) and had to pay 25,000 Won, which I consider too expensive as I had only cereal with milk and yoghurt, grapefruit juice and coffee. Not many travellers want to fill up on bacon and eggs, omelette made to order, cheese and sausage etc; it’s healthier to have a light breakfast, but they will still charge you 25,000 Won.Myeongdong is a very nice area with a great ambience and lots of restaurants.The Royal Hotel is quite expensive unless you can get a better rate, and on my next trip to Seoul I plan to stay at the nearby Metro Hotel.If you come here by shuttle bus 6015 it’s best to get off at the Ibis Hotel opposite the Lotte Department Store. If you get off the next stop, which is closer to the Royal, you will have a steep walk with some broken pavement to negotiate with your luggage.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is nicely located in Myeongdong. Everything that you need from food, shopping to cosmetics is just within walking distance. We had the triple room and it was decently sized with enough space for all 3 of us to open our luggage in the room with walking space. The room we were in had a split bathroom and toilet which worked really well since there were 3 of us in the room.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you are going to Seoul for the first time this is the place to go, best location everything you want is there the restaurant,shops,cinema,malls and the streets are full of trucks that sells everything thing you want The maple tree a barbecue place on the right side of the hotel is top place for beef and YG cafe also a place for food is so good , if you go in winter don't miss the strawberry Ps. The only thing is missing there karaoke pars its in another place but I won't recommend it everything in hangul ( Korean language) we couldn't do anything or choose any song .
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here during an overnight stopover. Caught the free shuttle bus to the hotel that was on time although only had the set times so didn't get it back to the airport, however they made me aware of the times when I booked so not a problem. The staff were friendly and room was comfy.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I picked up Royal Hotel Seoul because it appeared on search engine that they have Free Shuttle Bus to/from Seoul Station and to/from Gimpo/Incheon airport. So I thought that in handy. I straight away booked a room for 3 nights.After I booked the room I sent message to the hotel saying that I would be arrived at Seoul Station and departed from Incheon and I would need the Free Shuttle Bus and asked them to confirm. I did this on 30Nov18. Didn't get any response from the hotel until the day I arrived in Seoul 30Dec18.I was wondered around the train station try to find The Royal Hotel Seoul Free Shuttle Bus pick up point but could not find it. I called the hotel. Then being told that the Free Shuttle Bus from/to station is no longer available. Very very disappointing. More over becasue the hotel staff who answered the phone didn't even say sorry. Is this a language limitation?Still - they should have response the message I sent.I finally got a taxi from station to Royal Hotel Seoul.Check in was straight forward. After check in done I mentioned again about my disappointment regarding the Free Shuttle Bus and the check in Staff just went silent. Is this nother language imitation?Royal Hotel Seoul looks very WOW. It tries to keep the statement of its name on Michelin Guide I suppose but is the overall review of the hotel worth the list?The room is a bit tired - it can do with some refreshment touch. Especially the bathroom - a shower with a dirty look curtain doesn't go parallel with the pretentious lobby. I'm sorry. Wooden selves in bathroom is just so decades ago interior.Another thing I found out was the robe - it has the sewing torn out. Another thing that doesn't go parallel with the WOW lobby. I took photo of this as a proof if the hotel contacted me ^_^ Also the hotel could invest with some new robe as the two provided in my room was both 'hard' - washed out, worn out.Shampoo, conditioner, shower gel - Good Lord - amenities in a small tube/bottle is also another decades invention. And also squeezing tube is not very Royal, isn't it? Nowadays a lot of hotels provide amentities in a big bottle which I believe for good reason - reducing packaging waste! More environmental friendly!And I personally would suggest Royal Hotel Seoul to provide amenities which is Made in Korea. Be proud of your own products - Korean amenities well known for good quality. Support the nation business/economy. Why is it needs to be amenities from UK?
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were sent here on a Air Asiana stopover flight, and whilst they said it was five star, and it wasn’t, it was still very good. If you are flying through it’s worth bearing in mind that it is right in the middle of Seoul. That means in reality that it’s about an hour door to door from the airport, which if you are with two kids and a load of luggage is a hassle to get to and from BUT the upside is that, with only four hours or so to spare we got up and out early and saw one of the palaces and a couple of other tourists spots and though I don’t think it would be fair to say we ‘did’ Seoul, we got a flavour for it before heading home and that was a nice bonus.The hotel itself is nice without being over the top, it has a gentle Korean vibe, wooden fretwork behind the TVs, some quite cool lantern lighting and of course the absurdly multi-function toilets that are ubiquitous, our rooms were not huge, but we were there for one night and the were FINE.Important to note: the breakfast here is GREAT. It’s at the top of the building and includes a mix of western and Asian food, and I have nothing negative to say about it. If you have stayed at the Four Seasons or Anantara you’ll know what five star is, and this isn’t that, but it’s still pretty impressive.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Got in after being up for 24 hours, and pleasantly surprised at very nice room! Located on a main 4 lane road but it was so quiet and the room was very nice. Especially LOVED the warm toilet seat!! Very close to loads of shopping, eateries, subway etc.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Royal Hotel Seoul during a 23 hour layover through a booking by Asiana Airlines. We are stunned by the great hospitality and location! It is right in the middle of the Myeongdong district - you are a walk away from street vendors, stores, and anything you can possibility need for a fun night out. Our room included many complimentary travel items (toothbrush, sewing kit, etc). and there was a bottle of wine waiting for us at check in! The pillows were also very comfortable and to our liking. Lastly, we had to leave for our airport shuttle at 6 AM, however breakfast did not begin until 7 AM. While we were informed this at the front desk, my spouse and I discussed briefly in private on how we would miss breakfast to make the shuttle. The next morning at check out, the hotel had TO GO BREAKFASTS in bags ready for us to take!!! We did not ask the hotel to do this, but somehow they knew what we needed and took that initiative! We were blown away. We plan on coming back for a real stay in Korea. Thank you!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location can’t be any better right outside where the Myeong-dong Street market starts & where all the Korean products shops are! 5/5 for location! The room is a bit small - no space to put your luggage apart from in the wardrobe but otherwise, king bed is comfy. 4/5Bathroom is actually very small; only enough space for 1 person & has no exhaust fan, so, it fogs up when you have a warm shower. 3/5 The main issue with the hotel is the super slow lifts & because it’s super slow & small, you would need to wait for the third lift to have enough space to squeeze in especially if you have luggages. We paid AUD290++ per night. Buffet breakfast is ok. Overall rating: 3.8/5
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very good for tourist. Night shopping street is just right in front of hotel. Staff is very helpful though their English is not fluent. The bellboy in front of entrance enthusiastically helps us for the luggage both in and out. Room is a bit small even to open big luggage. The in room carpet is a bit dirty with spots. There is no cleaning service (which mean no change bedsheet) and you get 2 free soft drink. The hotel answers my question vie email very quick prior to my arrival.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 7 nights with my family of 2 adults and 2 teenage children. Family room was functional and offer good space. All the action of Myeongdong is right at the door steps. Every morning there is a complementary shuttle from hotel to bring you you some of the nearby tourist locations(you should use it). Last but not least, the train stations are nearby, but we did not take any trains cos it’s more worthwhile to take a cab since we have 4pax. See you next time royal hotel Seoul!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic hotel with an amazing location. When you walk into the hotel lobby you are greeted with such respect. The hotel lobby is amazing. We took their airport shuttle which took a bit over an hour but it's worth it. The staff was very friendly and accommodating and you can walk right outside into the main heart of Myeongdong shopping centers. The only issue I had with the hotel is that there was no cooling in the room. But it was worth it despite this. The bathrooms were amazing and the rooms were large and luxurious. I would recommend this hotel to all my friends and family.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a nice stay in this hotel. The staff was friendly and accommodating. It is a great location, right in Myeongdong. There were endless shopping, coffee shops, restaurants right outside the hotel. It was easy walking distance to the subway and bus stations. The coffee in the room was also wonderful. We had a great time!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: - The shuttle bus from Incheon airport took over an hour but it was well worth it cause as a one night stop over visitor to Seoul it allowed my family and I too gain a glimpse of what Seoul had too offerand we were well impressed with what we saw!!-An amazing hotel situated in the heart of a busy shopping area which was a bonus for me as I am one who likes to shop. -The customer service and facilities provided at the hotel is amazing which ticked all the boxes for me !!- very clean- the presentation of the breakfast bar I would give it a 10/10 . - I wanna thank the evening and morning staff that were on duty on the 29/10-30/10 for a wonderful job of been helpful to my family and I during our one night stay !!- I would definitely recommend this hotel to others .- I would definitely book this hotel again when I next visit Seoul !!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: "Fantastic hotel, no cooling in rooms "I loved everything about this hotel except it didn’t have cooling in the room! The hotel is lovely in an absolutely fantastic location near markets, restaurants, shopping centre, tourist attractions everything you need. The club level lounge was very nice with snacks and drinks throughout the day and nice beer, wine, spirits and bubbles for happy hour in the evening. Breakfast in level 21 restaurant was plentiful and loads of variety. Very professional staff from the time we arrived till we left. The room on floor 19 was small but had everything you need, a very modern bathroom with ‘flash toilet’ and all amenities supplied. We found the room too warm and couldn’t turn the aircon down, spoke to executive lounge concierge who advised only heating was available in rooms. They quickly organised a fan for us but this wasn’t overly effective. We made do, if it was warmer weather we would have looked at moving hotels. I’m so disappointed because this hotel was 98% perfect for us but we wouldn’t rebook and I can’t recommend to friends or family- unless we/they visit in winter.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed in a junior suite on executive level. It is slightly more expensive, but you get a very comfortable room, with great views. The room is on a smaller sideby the US standards, but acceptable. You also get access to the lounge on the top floor,with even better views, free breakfast, and food and drinks throughout the day. You do not need to spend money on food. The location is great: you are within walking distanceto lots of interesting places. They even have a shuttle to the Incheon airport and the main train station (not frequently, though). We have enjoyed our stay a lot.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Travelled in a group of four, friends chose it because of its location. Location is excellent and suggest to try the korean congee shopr right opposite to the hotel. The hotel itself is quite old and unpleasant smell from carpet is so strong in room and corridor.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very comfortable (small) double room, tastefully decorated. Shower over bath, nice toiletries, kettle and supply of tea. Spacious foyer with a pleasant bar/ cafe. Breakfast served in the restaurant offered a very good choice. My only quibble was that the staff were focussed on telling us that breakfast finished at 10 rather than welcoming us. Staff at reception were very friendly. Would stay here again.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff is very attentive to the guests needs, you’d always see someone at the hotel lobby looking around if anyone needs help. It was a rainy day when we stayed and the hotel had free umbrellas for the guests which I thought was really nice. Even though the rooms are a bit small, we had a perfectly comfortable stay as everything we needed is in the room. The hotel is located very near the shops and restaurants, a convenience store and Starbucks is right across the street as well. We’d really love to stay here again if we come back to Seoul.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is located just a few steps from Myeongdong night market and lots of shops. Breakfast buffet is good with a beautiful view of the surrounding area from the 21st floor. Rooms are spacious enough. Myeongdong cathedral is also nearby. A highly recommended hotel in Seoul.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I also got stuck there due to a delay on Asiana Airlines, which is another story.This hotel was surprisingly nice, and the breakfast buffet is excellent, esp. for the small scale of the restaurant area. It has a nice view of the Myung-dong and the Catholic cathedral on one side. I hadn't been to Korea for over 15 years, but the view of the neighborhood, and the location in the heart of Myung-dong, which is a fun metro area, was quite enjoyable.The only problem I'd like to mention is the hand-off and communication between Asiana and the hotel. When the staff at Asiana and the hotel refer to it as a "limo bus" to the airport, it's confusing. Some staff told me to come to the lobby and wait there to be called for the "limo bus", but then when I asked in the morning, they said to basically walk to the other side of the block to basically catch the city bus to the airport, which is what we ended up doing. No problem finding and taking the bus, but both Asiana and the Royal staff should just call it what it is -- a "city bus", to avoid confusion, esp. for travelers who are already off schedule due to an airline problem.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is tiny, possibly the smallest executive room I have ever stayed in! Location is great, opposite the hotel is great restaurants, just below the hotel is the shopping streets, street food and behind the hotel the grocery stores, ginseng shops plus so much more. But the room and its layout is just so small that for 3 adults would be so cramped that I truly cannot accept. Rather inflexible that the suite room which is bigger is not allowed to add in a bed. I was on a trip with the company so I just bear with it since I did not want to be a nuisance to the rest of the people I was travelling with. Otherwise, I will exchange a hotel due to the size of the room. Btw there is no connecting room. I tend to agree with the reviewer that there is no bell hop for the luggage when we checked in and little assistance during our stay, except for the concierge. The state of the hotel is good, but absolutely not for smokers who wish to have a sit down place to chill.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the first time I stay this Hotel...but;I travelled many places and stayed many hotels..And almost every hotel i;Welcomed at the Entrance..Some drinks offered...Some places showed to rest..Luggages at care and transported to room..May be I used to and expected some kind of this lovely warm attitudes...I surprised first to see nobody cared me at Gate..Then nobody welcomed me at the reception..My shock getting bigger every time cos people behaved me coldly and showing no respect nor care to me..They were behaving me as if i am not wanted in the hotel..Just give me money we don’t like to see and serve u attitude..I hope i finished my stay without beaten cos hotel money just grabbed from me at first without respecting anything on my side..I advice this place nobody...Better find urself more humanly and friendly places..Zafer..
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is in a good location and lobby looks nice. Rooms are on the small side. Had two rooms for a week. English of the staff are poor and nobody helps you to get a taxi at the entrance of the hotel. Cleaning standard so so and my bed sheet had a whole in it, see picture, was not changed for a few days. Lighting in the bathroom was poor but the Japanese toilet was nice to have. Overall an OK stay but not sure if I will stay there again.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: veru nice room in a very well situated area. everything you need to visit seoul. at the heart of major sites. modern and confortable. A block away from the airport bus. A definitely good choice with welcoming staff.
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel acted high and mighty. I and my friends took the shuttle bus to Gimpo Airport. But the bus took us to Incheon. You know… they confirmed the reservation when you booked、boarded. The bus driver shouted us and let us went Gimpo by ourselves. The worst is that the manager told us the hotel had thing wrong ,they will pay the fare to Gimpo. When we back our country , the manager told us that we booked a shuttle bus to Incheon , it’s our fault. they didn't apologize . Anyway, the hotel is irresponsible. They will go back on their word. 出爾反爾的飯店與飯店經理，明明確認過幾次的飯店接駁將我們送錯機場，司機無禮外，經理說願意負責，等我們回國後，再把錯推給我們。
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Went there last week and stayed 4 nights. I booked premier triple room. Supposed to get a nicer room. At the same time, my friend is staying at the same hotel in a lower floor.First night, the AC vent on the ceiling was dripping water. After a long day, i had to call the front desk to address the dripping water issue. A guy came to took a quick look and said, it is an AC! my husband asked if this is supposed to happen with your AC? he said yes. And he said he will sent a technician to my room anyway. Tech came to confirm, it is fine, suck it up. will stop in an hour. After an hour, 1am, i hear some indoor raining, got my suitcase wet. Called again, they moved me to a suckier room at lower floor. On the 2 second morning, my husband went to try congee for breakfast. I took my daughter to join my friends for hotel breakfast buffet. My friends room came with breakfast. Food was ok, but selection is limited. The bill came, they charged my friends full amount. Even tho they already took their room number and confirmed they are covered. Have to tell them again and they removed it. My 6 yrs old paid USD18 to eat 2 pieces of watermelon, and she wanted to leave. I called my hubby to get her. As my hubby entered the restaurant, the lady told him that buffet was closing in 10 mins, so cannot serve him. He said, i am just saying hi to friends. She said ok. He came to my table, the manager guy, rush to my table and said, you have 2 adult and 1 kid. i said no, he came to pay and leaving now. Manager said ok! My gave my hubby my daughter and my bill, told him to pay. The lady who told him cannot serve him, added extra adult cost. He said i just came in, and I told you i am here to get my girl and say hi. She didn't care. Manager came, my hubby goes off on him. And he finally agreed to take off the charge.Great lodging doesn't make the trip any different. A bad hospitality at the hotel, however, ruined the whole trip. So thanks Royal Hotel Seoul!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a very nice hotel just at the edge of Myeongdong Shopping Streets. As a matter of fact, the placement is just where the street-food market stalls starts in the evening! Starbucks, 7-eleven as well as global ATM are all just across the street and lots and lots and lots of resturants are in the immediate area. Easy access to both busses and subway as well as walking distance to a lot of places :). The hotel itself is very nice and clean. Hotel room felt fresh and spacious, even though our previous hotel room in Gangnam was bigger, this felt more spacious. We did have a few complaints though.. as we had booked 3 adults and 1 child of 16 in a 3+1 room, we asked for an extra down comforter, but was only given a very uncomfortable blanket. This room was marked bookable for 4 people.. so it would have been nice if it had had the "gear" for it too.Another thing was the cleaning of the room, my son felt sick a few days and stayed at the hotel trying to sleep, and was almost in a fight with the cleaning-lady. In the end, she didn't bother do room-cleaning the last day and I had to call reception when we came back from the shopping tour to ask them for new towels and to take out trash as we were packing to leave the next morning and were "minimizing" what we brought with us, a.k.a. unwrapping and unpacking some boxes. I would not recomend breakfast at this hotel. I would strongly suggest anyone to go out and have something on the street instead! We tried breakfast once, and it was bland and pretty boring! I don't know if it is better in the executive area as we didn't have that kind of room. The bad breakfast kept us from booking a dinner at the hotel as it was the same resturant.. All in all, this IS a very good hotel in the best location I can imagine! I will absolutely return to this Hotel next time I am going to Korea :).
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at the Royal Hotel Seoul in mid December and January which was very cold. The airport shuttle arrived on time to pick us up and drove all the way in front of the hotel. The check in was very smooth and timely. This hotel is literally the centre of Myeongdong, was very easy to shop for hours and let us run back due to -20 degree temperature.. Although the train station is 7mins away, taxi cabs on right in front of the hotel while they have frequent shuttles that go to Seoul Station. This was a good service as it made it easier to plan our trip to Busan. This would definitely be the hotel to choose when staying in Seoul, I am extremely happy to be coming in next week to this hotel again!
hotelName:
13    Royal Hotel Seoul
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: convenient location to lotte deparment store and the korean small local rice noodle shop which queue up from 11am to 7 pm and not understand the reason for the queuing but if hungry at 2am, it is 20 steps from the hotel door. Royal hotel is a standard japanese style hotel but not like okura or nikko which greet you in a japanese majestic way at all times to everyone, here regular customers might find them having a better welcome than ocassional room room rental customers. Royal hotel seoul is the one hotel that is very exceptional, the hotel is genuine, very good with their standards, they will never give you anything extra, as a hotel guest you will not have discount to the restaurant and if you want late check out,you need to pay hk $70 for an extra hour even on a Monday. This is really a fair deal and this hotel is strict and not count on any customerrequest, need or expectation - no extra and only money. The toilet uses marble, it is grant!
