We had to pay separately for breakfast, which had a good selection but does not come cheap. The hotel staff also responded quickly when our toilet was choked. Repair was done while we were having breakfast. The only thing to note is that there is no porter service to help carry luggages.
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located at Gongdeok train station. From Inchon airport, you can take KAL limo bus to the hotel. It's about 1-1.5 hours bus ride, and the cost is KRW 16K.Many restaurants are nearby, so one does not have to worry about where to eat. Several MRT lines are connected at Gongdeok station so it is very convenient if you want to move around in the city via trains
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. Subway station beneath the building. Great hotel restaurant plus couple other in foodcourt downstairs on subway level and a supermarket where you can get everything you need. Very friendly staff
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Seoul tour was great experience.Also I could enjoyed my stay at lotte city mapo.The location is perfect for tourists. Also there are a lot of restaurant around hotel.Great service, nice staffs, clean room, everything was great!Would come again.
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is second time for me. The first reason that I chose again is the friendly staffs.Last time I lost my purse at restaurant, when I need someone's help, hotel staff gave my hand sincerely. The second stay was also really satiesfied.
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easy and quick check in which was much appreciated after a long overnight flight from Central Asia. Room very quiet, beds very comfortable. Location above a subway station is perfect, supermarket a couple of levels below the hotel. Would stay there again.
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel seems really simple. No bell service, no room service. BUT that made my trip perfect. I didn't need to care anybody. I could relax greatly by myself.If I asked some favor to front desk staffs, They helped me right away,Thank you all and I really enjoyed my staying.
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I could stay with nice view. All of the staffs offer great services. The facilities in the hotel were quite new and well maintained.High speed wifi, delicious breakfast with reasonable price. I would recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
14    Lotte City Hotel Mapo
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 6 nights. It is about 8 mins walk to Dongdaemum Design Plaza. Look for Hyundai City Outlets for entrance to hotel.Every level has a common kitchen. Level 14 has the main lobby, a 24-hour mini mart and self-service coin laundry machines.There’s shuttle bus services to other Skypark hotels. Only managed to take it once as bus service was unavailable on 2 other occasions.We booked the twin residence room and was allocated Level 20 (The mum’s level). Very spacious for just 2 of us to put our shopping stuff and luggages.Wifi connection is quite terrible.Will consider staying here again.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in SkyPark Hotel Kingstown at Dongdaemun during my trip to Asia with family. It is situated in the very heart of the shopping district in Dongdaemun. Close to the Pyong-Hwa wholsesale market, and malls Migliore and AM-PM. Also surrounded by the great number of delicious Korean restaurants, in 1 min walking distance. It is Clean and even has the Kitchen on every floor.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at this hotel from the 22 April to 28 April after travelling from Osaka and caught train to Seoul station for free shuttle bus to hotelDriver of shuttle bus was the most obnoxious little man I have ever come across being very rude and not offering any help what so everThe shuttle bus driver from the Marriot hotel helped us out re instructions about the shuttle busWe had the same obnoxious man on the following day taking us to Kingston 3 and other passengers to the airport at 11.30amAt first stop doors opened and suitcase fell out the bus and went to drive off and only stopped because everyone was yelling at him.My self and another passenger put the suitcase back on the bus without any help from the driver.He also tried to close the door on my wife and pulled out in front of traffic with the traffic behind him beeping their hornsUse the shuttle if you want a terrible start to your holiday and a bad experience during itThis driver reflects badly on the Hotel re customer service .Re the hotel it self the staff are very professional and courteous but the the internet speed is extremely poor and continually dropping out and the 13000.00won breakfast very limited in choose.Good cheaper breakfasts outside HotelUpon arrival at the hotel was given a toothbrush and small tube of toothpaste for the entire six day stay .I don’t know about other people but I like to brush my teeth every dayThe hotel is in a great location with good proximity to to the subway station and food places Generally in all my reviews I like to stay positive but I would find another hotel in the same area which there are plenty of.The concierge was very helpful in rectifying a booking with a tour company which they had denied us makingDon’t use Seoul city tours because they are incompetent and I will be making a complaint to the Korean tourist bureau about them
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is 5 minutes walk from Dondaemun metro station , short cut from open-air car park. Dondaemun historical Park station is on the other side, also within 5-10minutes walk.Dondaemun is an area which is less busy and crowd. There are numbers of wholesale shopping malls in the district, though I visited only one for few minutes. Some of the shops for retail as well.Many eateries, mostly Korean food, around the hotel and district.Hotel itself, we, 3persons stayed in Residence deluxe, which is very spacious and adequate facilities, modern and clean. Only around USD150/night.The lobby is on ,14th floor, and ground floor with waiting area and concierge.A convenient store on lobby floor.Definitely recommend to everyone, as it's good location and value for money.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you looking for a simple hotel with access to the mall, then this is the hotel for you. Outside you will find easy access to the train and different places to eat. The hotel staff is nice and friendly. The room is okay for that area. I slept really good at this hotel. Please keep in mind, during the winter time, you will only have heat (no air) so the room can get very warm at times. But I had a nice time at his hotel and I will come back again!
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Never happen on my experience. Write an email request and remind I booked twin bed but front staff rejected and just say not twin bed!!! I was telling him and show him my email and he rejected to see. At the end , he might find it and say ok, then twin bed!! I say we also requested to combine the bed and extra pillow and he didn’t answer! Bad service and bed experience on Skypark. Sure will not back anymore!
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in this hotel for 5 nights with breakfast. Hotel room was simple but clean and bed comfortable. We actually have two separate showers and a tub. Our room was facing the courtyard so not much view. Breakfast was also simple and not much food selections. If ever I will stay again maybe I will just skip the breakfast option. Location was superb for night shopping. Transportation is also convenient and accessible. Restaurants are all over the place. They have free shuttle but you need to reserve and only operates on specific times. There is money changer at the ground floor with reasonable rates. Once you have enough loads of shopping, it's easy just to drop off the goods and go out again to shop more. Will consider this hotel and location when vacationing in Seoul again in the future.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We checked in at night around 8pm on the first night of our trip. We stayed only one night as we will move to Myeongdong at the second day. The Front Office lady is not really welcoming. Even she’s telling you for the upgrade to upper category, her face and voice isn’t telling you they are happy to offer you. Room is quite reasonable may be that’s why the price is quite high compared with hotels nearby. It is just right next to Hyundai and it was the best location if you planned to shop at night in Dongdaemun!
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is very good but the facilities is too simple. No shaver for man... The view of standard room is not that good... if you want to have good view , may be need to ask the staff first when check in or need to book luxury type of room...
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is good and staff are polite and helpful. The money exchange machine located at front desk floor is very convenient and the rate is not bad. The most appreciation is each floor has a common kitchen for the visitor to use. It is equipped (but without seasoning) and can make a simple meal. Highly appreciated.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: VERY GOOD Near two metro stations Many departments stores and restaurants nearby. Children have entertainment facilities few flior down the hotel. The hotel is surrounded by shopping centre. And it is nearby the chicken street. Food and shopping is fantastic.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You can find baseball stores around the block.. mall n outlets is nearby.. easy to find food The Hotel privide shuttle bus to myongdong for free n to Incheon airport (@20.000 Won)Bus station n subway just 2 minutes walk. Hopes I can go back to Korea n spend the night to your hotel again
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This review is made from my personal experience staying here with my aunt from 29 May-1 June 2018 and 4 June-8 June 2018.The good things about this hotel are:1. It is easy to go anywhere because there is a walking distance train station and bus station2. The hotel staffs are helpful3. There is a convenience store and coin laundry in the lobby (TIPS: it is better to do laundry better and cheaper than buying clothes in the street) 4. For smokers, there is a smoking room in every floor5. They have communal kitchen in every floor so you can get some ice and refill your water bottle there, and even you can have hot water for your instant cup noodleThe not so good things, I would not say bad because it is still acceptable:1. Most of the staffs can speak English but sometimes it is a little hard to understand2. There is bad smell in the bedroom after it is being cleaned, maybe because of the cleaning liquid or the unclean mop is used for toilet3. When we were about to leave, we booked a taxi a night before in the lobby but the next morning when we went down to get the taxi., the staff downstairs (the concierge) said there wasn't our names but they took a prompt action to re-book and the taxi came 10 minutes afterwardsOverall, the hotel is an nice place to stay especially for the location.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is convinced next to shopping mall n food court but hotel’s own facility is not good enough for example no swimming pool, room service is not clear, any other facility for the guests, no ads for how to use the hotel facilities, WiFi is not secure n not stable.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall a good hotel, will stay againPro: 1) big comfortable room2) very clean 3) there is microwave in the common kitchen4) kingstown skypark is better and bigger than the myeongdong skypark5) connected to Hyundai mall and lots of restaurants nearby6) friendly and very efficient receptionCon:Wifi not stable, need to be improved
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is relatively new and located close to alot of food and amenities.The rooms are spacious for 3 beds and it comes with bathtub. The service of the concierge at level 1, manned by 2 old gentlemen, is extraordinary.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice service from the reception counter, all facilities are good, easily to access, all traffic convenience.Only thing should noted, ask customer acceptance for a disable room type or not.Good location for shopping.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location,good service,very tidy!The bed is so comfortable.Free shuttle bus to Myeong-dong and Seoul Stationis convenience for my family trip.There are so many nice restaurants next to hotel. I will book this hotel again for my next trip.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the 2nd time I stay in this hotel, last time in November and this time in May, It seems that he air-con is not enough, especially in the middle of the night (although at hh mode), it will be much more hotter in mid summer!Still happy to stay here (location good and the staff are helpful) I will choose it for my future trip to Seoul!
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is super good and the hotel has free shuttle to Seoul station and to their other branches hotel. Although I did not have chance to use the free shuttle, it is quite a good service that the hotel offered.The room is tidy and comfortable and spacious, there are both bathroom and shower room.Their staffs are very nice and friendly. I have contacted them for help before my trip, they reply emails very quickly and very helpful. I will definitely stay here again next time.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Only 2 mins walk to station. Hotel staff are helpful. This hotel provide shuttle to airport which is very convenient with reasonable price. I will definitely choose this hotel again in my next visit to Seoul
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was the second time to stayed here. It is very good location at Dongdaemun. You can easy to find place to eat and shopping. Also nearby MTR. I loved to stay here to enjoy my trip. Their staffs are very friendly and helpful, Hotel room are tidy and comfortable.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Generally it is a good hotel but the followings should be improved: -1.) Hotel Staff is able to speak English but they did not take any notice of the customers' request and no explanation given to the customers. You may check it;2.) There is only one scale on the ground floor for all customers. Suggest to install a scale at each floor;3.) Hair dryer is not strong enough to dry up hair;4.) no bathing cap for ladies;5.) no coffee machine and capshuse inside room;6.) the last shuttle bus to airport is at 1600 hrs only. Suggest the shuttle bus service to be extended until midnight. Hope the Hotel can improve it.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: For business or pleasure this is a good choice. Easy walking to Dongdaemun plaza and also close to the Marriott for business meetings. Well connected to transit. Fair pricing and helpful staff. A good choice for the frugal business traveller.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A convenient hotel located in the central in Dongdaemun with regular shuttle bus connecting Seoul station, Myeongdong and Dongdaemun! You can enjoy free round -the-clock shuttle service from the above mentioned places , especially when you just land off to Seoul and take the airport express to the Seoul station , and take this shuttle from Seoul station to the hotel afterwards.The location is very very good and easy to find , it just take you 3 mins from the metro exit no.14 to the hotel ! The room is tidy and clean , help desk is located on 14/F and there's a shopping mall downstairs in the same building ! There is a common kitchen with utensil for guest to cook !Staff there are so nice and good at English , they are willing to help and answer your enquiries ! Also , there are a lot of 24 hours restaurants and convenient store nearby , you won't be hungry at night !........................................................
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: we checked in twice, one after busan. the first room was princess room its girly and huge room for the three of us with big closet, second one is great right on top of lobby on the 16th floor. we had the two bathroom (per request) but not as big as the first one
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very convenient, many restaurant nearby, but the Wi-Fi is too slow, it should be improved. Shuttle bus service to airport is very good, even though my booking slot only have two person to airport, still provide shuttle service. Therefore, overall service is good.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Even prior to our arrival customer service has been wonderful. Replies to my email inquiries regarding our booking and airport hotel transfers were replied to almost immediately. Upon arrival the hotel had booking issues due to peak season and we were upgraded to a family residence triple room free of charge. Room had a king sized bed + 2 twin beds. A full functioning kitchen with microwave hot water pot and sink. It had 2 bathrooms! You need to put it a deposit for kitchen utensils which was fine. Room was very clean and provided robes for four! New fresh towels everyday. Add location...it was conveniently located in between 2 subway stations equidistant from the hotel - less than 5 minutes walk - which will allow you to conveniently travel to any part of the city by subway. This was a good thing especially in winter when it’s below 0 outside. The hotel sits above a mall - Hyundai City Outlets - which was on the lower floors and right beside another popular shopping mall - Doota Mall. Dongdaemun street market just a few minutes walk away. Lastly, as busy as the hotel was, they allowed us late check out until 2pm. Awesome!
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I originally booked a twin residence room with my friend. When I got to the hotel, the staff was very helpful and nice and he offered to upgrade us to a triple residence room for free. The location of the hotel is very convenient as it is the same building as Hyundai City Outlets and next to Doota Mall. It's just around 5 minutes walk to the Dongdaemun History and Culture Park subway station and there are a lot of nice food nearby. The hotel also offers free shuttle bus service for hotel guests to other Skypark hotels, Myeongdong and Seoul Station which is very convenient for us with heavy luggages. There is also self-laundry service at the lobby of the hotel which is very convenient for us to wash our clothes any time we like.One thing that I didn't really like about this hotel was their central heating system as I felt very hot and stuffy if I turned on the heater and the temperature has to be set at a very high degree celcius (such as 26 or even 30 degrees) and I couldn't regulate the temperature on my own to fit my needs. I had to turn off all the heaters and open the small windows to have the room with better ventilation. Another thing about this hotel is that when you close the door of the hotel room, there could be a gap and the door may not close properly. So if someone outside passes by or if the wind blows, there could be noise coming from the door. Overall, I did enjoy my stay at this hotel and would most probably consider staying in this hotel again for my next visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is an excellent hotel. We should stay here for longer.Clean, comfortable, friendly staffs, good location, bright room. Walking distance (~10mins) to airport bus 6002 which fare is just 10000 wons.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We (wife and 13 year old son) were visiting my daughter in S.Korea and included a few days in Busan and Seoul. I found Skypark to be a convenient and functional hotel. The beds are a bit on the small side and the rooms small but not less comfortable though. We did not opt for the breakfast option so I do not have an opinion of the breakfast spread.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place to explore Seoul n Dongdaemun. Free shuttle service is good, but didn’t have Chance to use. Simple 24Hr convenience store and coin laundry at lobby was handy during winter. Only thing is coming via airport limousine have to walk a couple of minutes.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of the Hotel is excellent you can get everythings.Room is clean and tidy. The view is very good.There is a public kitchen on each floor, it is good!Staff is very nice and helpful.We will stay in this Hotel next times.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, lots of shops and restaurants nearby, very convenient.Subway station is 5 mins walk from the hotel.Dongdaemun Design Plaza is just cross the street, you can take the sightseeing tour bus from there.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: overall is soso, pillow is dirty, the door is very noise when there was someone walk through. And I saw a review before that front desk staff can help us order take away chicken but the staff said they should not and cannon help us to order, it makes me very disappointed.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked 4nights standard room and 2 nights residence in this hotel. Total stay 6days in this hotel. Hotel is clean and convenient but difficult to ask the taxi driver drive to the hotel only can stop in Doota. The residence room is cheating not cooking ware and kitchen ware not allow to cooking inside the residence room. The staff very unhelpful and look cool, no greeting and just ask you provide passport or room card to check out. Overall no service in this hotel.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We just spent 7 days in Seoul. Our enjoyment and low level of stress had a lot to do with the Staff of Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun. First, although by heritage I'm 50% Korean, I can't speak or write Korean. Language was not a problem. The Staff was accommodated us. Second, the shuttle service from Seoul Station was very convenient. It saved us a lot of money and time. Third, the Front Desk was friendly, professional, helpful, and patient. Absolutely no issues. Fourth, the consierge service was excellent. I cannot stress this enough. They provided directions, called taxi service, and generally did whatever it took to make our stay enjoyable. Fifth, if you like shopping, you'll run out of days. Options everywhere (literally). Don't overlook the stall in the buildings around you. Sixth, the cost is very reasonable. Seventh, food? I need to laugh out loud. There are so many vendors around you, food and drink will never be an issue. Eighth, I'll put my money where my words are, we plan to visit Seoul again. We will stay at this Hotel.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Visit last month with my wife For choosing this hotel was the location very close to many shopping buildings and foodsBut grime nearest subway station entrance takes about 15minutes and very bumpy on the way so not easy to walk with suitcaseLobby is on the 14th floorTo enter the hotel need to go behind the building of Hyundai outlet.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Big triple bed room, it is clean and comfortable, great city view, have coin loundry, there is good customer service , can speak chinese and english and good public transport, love and good experience
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The price is reasonablethe location is nice, near railway station and shopping mallThe room is relatively big compare to those in myeongdong However the washroom air circulation system is poor. It’s quite smelly to me
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We checked in 2 times. The first time we are allocated to the Very Mom floor. The room is pretty. but I don't understand why only hot water is coming from the tap... So, I have to wash my face with hot water..... The second time we are allocated to a 3-bed bedroom. The room is very big and there is separate bath and shower room. The location is great, very near to subway. Lots of shops and restaurant nearby. A very convenience place. The English of the staff is very good. Some of them may be internship? They do not smile at all. I am impressed that there is one staff who can speak English & Japanese very well. The hotel will not help to make a call for food delivery (like fried chicken). So, you have to call yourself and pick up food from the first floor. (They cannot deliver to your room). When I asked them to send postcard for me, they charged me KRW 1000 for one but actually it is KRW 430 only. So, you better go to the post office yourself.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is the best (just behind Doota and next to the Hyundai Outlet mall. Big room (got the one good for 3 people for 2 adults and 2 children) and the other facilities such as the free shuttle bus, coin laundry, convenience store, restaurant) are great for families. Not too far from the subway, maybe a 15-minute relaxed walk.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I'll come back again, great location, comfortable room, everything is good. I'll highly recommend to stay this hotel when you come to seoul. It's also nearly to shopping, Doota shopping mall just in front of this hotel.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 1. Room cleaning standard needs to be upgraded, we found the bath room was not clear probably. 2. Shower cap was not enough for a room for 3, we only found 1 shower cap, we need to request at the front desk. 3. The pillows were too soft.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Its location is nice and you can take hotel shuttle to go Seoul station easily for AREX or Lotte Mart. But if the shuttle can offer more time periods, it is excellent. The hotel view is excellent and you can see Seoul Tower.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel room is nice, for 3 person size is good and large, 2 bathroom is good for family using , nearby has many 24hrs restaurant, bar restaurant and also still has some shopping mall for shopping in midnight! That’s so convenient!
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: (1) Location : very convenience, just 3-5 mins walk from the Dongdaemun History Park Station, where you can take Line 2, 4 & 5 metro. (2) Facilities : that's supprising to have a fitness centre while the room rate is reasonable(3) Room condition : new, clean and spacious(4) Service : so good to have free shuttle bus going around the main shopping areas ; cleaning lady was always nice and helpful More to say : I was quite satisfied with this hotel except one thing. While I was making reservation online, it said "members reserve rooms online will get upgraded. subject to availability, breakfast ticket will be given instead.". However, when I asked about this at the front desk, the staff said rooms were fully booked. Then I expressed I would get the breakfast ticket instead. The staff told me breakfast also couldn't be provided to me. I was quite disappointed with this feedback while I was expecting something.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: clean the room in good time, CU is convenience to buy food in midnight.subtle bus is helpful to go through Seoul Station, Dongdaemun market, and Central market.flexible to catch up the subtle bus in any hotel within the Hotel Group.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel, clean and large room for 3personsThey met my requested for higher floor and city view, my parents are very like this hotel,also it is very quiet room to get sleep even in shopping area.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very clean and tidy! excellent services! Have 24hrs store open at lobby but go out ok street isn't far. Very convenient places.Toilet fan is very weak, need to improve.Would choose this hotel again!!!
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A deluxe twin room we selected to stay in the hotel is very large, clean and with newly comfortable bed. One dissatisfied point that the window view is for the rooms, so we can't open the curtains. However, we recommend it and we also consider stay it again if visiting to this city.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is just a stone's thrown away distance from the Metro Station. As compared with other neigbouring countries, the services provided by this hotel is second to none. Amazingly, the spacious Triple room with living room accommodates three persons comfortably. Thank you for the staff at the hotel.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Kingstown is very convenient to the market. I can travel to Myeongdong and Seoul station by shuttle bus, but must'vepay attention to time schedule. The only disadvantage is that some passage to the main road are blocked and need to turn around some streets.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A perfect location for shopping of clothes and close to the subway, easy go to elsewhere of the city. Hotel concierge is not initiative to help guest to deliver the luggage. Breakfast buffet at 7/fl., do not have many choice, and wondering they do not supply sugar for coffee. Hotel room is small but enough to open 2 suitcase, a small tips that better to book with the room with balcony as you pay a little bit more then you can enjoy with a nice outdoor balcony that can have enough place to enjoy the nice view of Dongdaemum. Room is clean, house keeping service needed to improve as I request for the toothpaste to be refilled everyday but eventually I have to ask for it everyday. Hotel have shuttlle bus go to Myeongdong and Seoul station, this is another merit of this hotel group, however, better to book it early and get the seats tickets in advance as the seats is limited (16 seats shuttle), another good point are: there is pentry (supply ice and water) and smoking room at each floor which is very convinient for the guest, In general, this hotel value for money.
hotelName:
15    Hotel Skypark Kingstown Dongdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable rooms, small - but well appointed. Excellent location which is walking distance to Seoul Station if you are catching the KTX. 2 min to plenty of restaurants and shopping. Across the road from Market.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Positive’s--Hotel is very centrally located - within walking distance of most major tourist attractions. Extremely close to the Myeongdong district - known for its shopping and street food. Also, it’s only a few minute walk to a hop-on/hop-off bus stop-Very safe area-The Reception Desk Manager (Steve?) was very helpful with a last second problem I had upon leaving. I’ll spare you the details, but he went “above and beyond” to fix something that was totally my stupid mistake. That is true customer service at the Floral Hotel at ShinShin!-Water pressure was good - hot water was plentiful-Reception staff spoke good English-Reception staff was very helpful in setting up tours-Heated tile floors were nice-Cable TV had many different channels, including many English speaking-Views outside of the windows were very cosmopolitan – we never closed the curtainsNegative’s--Hated that the bathtub/shower was in the open part of the room (the bathtub/shower did have a curtain, but still it was awful)-There was a coffee/tea maker in the room, but no coffee or tea bags were provided (you can get tea bags from the lobby area coffee machine)-The thermostat was near impossible to control - it didn’t seem to respond to any changes I made-Breakfast buffet was just OK. The scrambled eggs tasted a little like fish (and I don’t like fish). The waitress there was very helpful with tourist recommendationsNot a Positive or a Negative--Room was small, but that’s normal in many Asian countries-Check-in / reception is in the building next door in the basement-It’s a very tall but thin hotel - only three rooms per floor-Toilet is controlled by an electronic panel - luckily there’s an arrow pointing to flush. Don’t know what the other 15 buttons were for
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 5 nights in April 2019. Easy access to places of interest especially by bus, the bus stop just about 2 minutes away from the hotel. There is also airport bus available at the bus stop.The subway station is also not far away, about 5 minutes from the hotel. The room is a bit dusty when we checked in. But it was cleaned after our first night stay. The bed is very comfortable. Room is big enough for two people. There is a long table at the window side which can put a lot of stuffs.As we booked a room without bathtub, it was surprised to see the shower bath does not has a rack or something to place the amenities such as bath gel, shampoo and lotion. The items were placed on the floor, which is not convenient when taking bath. Can imagine it will be difficult for old people or pregnant women to squad down to take the amenities. There is no side table and electric socket at both sides of the bed, which I feel it is not convenient at all. The wash basin is just located right after the room door, which is a bit weird. The lighting in the room was quite dim, difficult for ladies to do their make up. Overall, satisfied stay but just a few issues above.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 5 nights in March 2019. The room was very small, with no coffee. Navigation to our room from the front-desk was a challenge also, as there are 2 buildings involved. Those are the negatives of our stay. Everything else was great. The room came with a complimentary breakfast at the buffet on the ground floor. It was simple, but adequate. Scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon, rice, breads, cereals, and beverages. The best part of the buffet was our host, Chan-Im Park (spelling??). Chan was great with our 3 year old daughter who became very ill during our stay. Chan was extremely helpful, and took it upon herself to not only find a good hospital (Severance), but call them on our behalf. We took our daughter to the hospital and it was a great experience with the care we received. We want to say Thank You to Chan for her caring assistance. Our daughter also threw up on the bed in our room, and housekeeping got right on the clean-up, without making us feel bad or embarrassed. The staff made a tough time for our Family much easier to handle, and we thank them.The location of this hotel is great also. You are within easy walking distance of restaurants and shopping areas.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Recomended to those like to stay in city. Easy access to all interesting place. Transportation to anywhere just infront to hotel. Room is very clean and mattress bedding is superb comfortable. Long bathtub in room with full ammenities provided. Towel is very clean. Seoul here i come!!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent service especially to front office Cindy, Manager Steven and Bella..I stayed there for 7 days..Lucky I got upgraded and complimentary breakfasts too over an issue..My wifi didnt connect to my device.They went out of there way to fix it..Ordering a taxi to seoul station was no a problem.Close to many attractions.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I just needed a simple room for some business travel, and Hotel Shin Shin was a perfect place. The room was cozy, not large by American standards, but perfectly adequate. All of the amenities with the hotel were excellent, and given the price, the value was fantastic. Cindy at the front desk was especially kind; I was extremely fortunate to meet her, and I thoroughly enjoyed speaking with her and learning more about Korean culture. I would happily stay here again and look forward to doing so on my next trip.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a lovely little hotel in the heart of trendy Myeong dong,,minutes fronmShinsagae Department store which has great restaurants in the basement with a very good but expensive supermarket. The bus to the airport is a 3 minute walk and the metro is a 5 minute walk. The rooms are small but very comfortable, very nice hotel robe,slippers and hairdryer are in room, it is extremely reasonable ,the front desk speaks excellent English ,there is a coffe maker in the lobby and all around there are tons of restaurants and 7-11 stores to grab fast snacks. I have stayed 3 times and very happy with this jewel of a hotel!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a good hotel placed few minutes of walking distance from City Hall metro station. It is located in the heart of Seoul with main shrines and temples few metro stations away or by walking if you like to do medium distance walkings. Around hotel is full of food options and the direct bus to airports is just around the corner (ask reception for timetable). Rooms are silent, just about the right size, and cleans. Free coffee and cookies are offered at reception area around the clock. Good price for this location.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 4 nights Mid October 2018, the rooms are very clean (may be small for some standards) and the staff very professional.The location is great in the center near myeongdong area and N seoul tower is within walking distance. Same for city hall.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is not easy to find because it is tucked in a quiet corner at the heart of Myeongdong. I chose this hotel because it is not far from the subway stations and also not far from Seoul Station where I took the Airport Express, Unfortunately I heard they may stop the Airport Express.Food is easily found in this area and you can just walk to the shopping malls. 7-11 and convenience stores are all nearby etc.The hotel lobby is one floor down from the street entrance which may confuse first time visitors.Otherwise the hotel is fair value. It is a rather budget hotel but well maintained. The toilet is a bit cramped. Yes, the hotel room is small but other that that, it is a good hotel.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in this hotel from 10/18-27/18. The best place to stay when your in Seoul, walking distance to Myeondong, shopping malls are nearby as well. Nandaemeun market is on the other side of the road. There are lots of restaurants, bakeries and cafes around the area . The staffs were very accommodating.. We will stay here again on our next visit in Seoul.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at Hotel ShinShin for 5 nights at the beginning of September with my husband. Check in was quick and easy and the staff were friendly and helpful with good English skills. They even made a restaurant reservation for us which was super helpful as the restaurant is a popular and busy one so it was nice to know that when we arrived we had a table. The rooms are on the small side (but that is to be expected in the middle of Seoul) and featured a very comfortable king size bed. The open shower area is a little weird but if you are travelling with your partner no big deal. Perhaps not ideal if you are travelling with a friend! The environmental policy is great - you leave a card on the bed if you don't want your sheets changed and only want the bed made. Fabulous on a multi night stay. Towels were still changed even though 'hung up' as requested to save on water/power but that seems to happen in most hotels anyway- not sure why! Breakfast at Dinehall is obviously convenient but at 15,000 won per person pricey for what it is, though the quality is ok. They let you pay as you go which is good as we only used it a couple of mornings. The Ubiquitous Paris Baguette is just across the street and open at 7 am so that was a great, cheaper option. The hotel was tricky to find at first (we arrived via the Airport Limousine (Namdameum Martket stop) and spent ages trying to follow Kakao/Google maps to get there. Basically, get off the bus and cross the road as soon as you can (through the underground market is safest!) and look for Ediya Coffee shop (blue signage) on the corner and walk up a few minutes and you cant miss it next to the swanky Sotetsu Splaisir Hotel. Definitely an awesome location as the city hall metro station services 2 lines and there is also a stop on subway line 4 close by too (Hoehyon station I think) Plus you can walk to heaps of places as we did, and you won't be short of food/shopping and market options. Would definitely recommend and stay again. Oh, and they offer a free phone with internet with each room to help you get around. We didn't use it as we had organised a WIFI egg with 2G of data daily (only $5AU per day) to see us thorough our whole trip which we picked up at the airport on the way in, so can't comment on how well it works but it is definitely a useful bonus.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were treated with great kindness and respect and all our needs were met with the front desk staff being very accommodating even with us not speaking Korean. The hotel is in a great location to more shopping then you could ever want. We got taxis to visit anywhere we wanted. They exchanged money for us. When it came time to leave. The airport bus was just around the corner. For things they could improve-They could use up dated music in the lobby, Maybe some K-popReplace carpet outside the rooms All in all we are going to stay there again when we return from Jeju as we could really ask for nothing more.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Check in was smooth and staff was always very helpful. The room was very clean and modern and also bigger than i expected. The hotel has a very good location, close to many traditional restaurants, shops, city hall,etc. It is also very easy to take any kind of public transportation, so moving around Seoul was very simple. A plus from this hotel, is that they always have cards with the name of the hotel and instructions on how to get to it in both English and Korean, for you to give to your taxi/uber driver.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay was almost perfect. The room was clean, the stuff super friendly, the location perfect and the price was fine. Two things to reclaim:- The rooms are very small especially for bigger luggage. We needed to improvise and we didn’t had that much. - Breakfast was awful and way too expensive (I’ll write a second review for Dinehall).
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Friendly and helpfull staff, clean room and quiet. Optional breakfast was nice. A little difficult to locate the hotel but once found, the location is good and central near large shopping streets and night market.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location to markets, shopping centers, restaurants and the subway! Right by the airport bus drop off and pick up location making it super convenient!! Walking distance to many attractions and city bus tour! Best part, they offer you a free phone with internet so you can take it with you to use Google Maps, etc.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The price is reasonable, and the location is in the central area near the Namdaemon marketplace. However, it’s very basic and nothing memorable. Rooms are decent but again quite ordinary. It’s a little bit hard to find. Staff are helpful when asked.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've previously stayed in another hotel in Seoul with really straight forward train/subway directions to get there. When I contacted the hotel in advance to ask for directions, I was given very vague instructions. Such as, you can take line 1 and get off at city all. That's all. On top of that I was sent half a dozen of limousine bus and cab options. It was not clear and not very helpful.I got better instructions from the airport information counter. The lady at the airport insisted that I take the limousine bus instead as it would stop closer to the hotel. We did as suggested and got off on the opposite side of the main road and had to cross using the underpass without escalators. It was a bit of a workout but we made it across and walked another 150m up an alley to get to the hotel.Ignore the large building before you reach dinehall and a sign with tripadvisor logo. You then walk into the alley next to dinehall. There wasn't an open lobby, we instead had to enter a door behind dinehall and take the elevator down to a basement lobby.Arriving a couple or hours early, we were asked to leave our bags at the lobby and come back later. Reception staff was not very welcoming, it was unpleasant to arrive to faces like that. I was going to assume they didn't speak english, but they did. I got a rather stand offish vibe from them.We left in search of coffee and to explore the area a little. Again, no suggestions from the hotel staff.The room was a little tight but the bathroom wasn't a closet. The bathroom doorknob was broken. Sleep was okay.Sheets and towels were clean.We missed breakfast the first morning and caught a bite the next. Food was basic, not a great spread. We left quickly after.We didn't spend much time in the hotel aside from sleeping.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Even before I left for Seoul. I was EXTREMELY IMPRESSED with the staff's PROMPT communication when I emailed them the with questions prior to booking. Once I arrived I found everyone to be helpful in any needs I had during my 10 night stay. I stayed in a deluxe room with a king size bed. My room was on the seventh floor, I had a great corner room with a great view. The mattress is firm but comfortable. There is a TV but I didn't watch it. Rooms were small but clean- perfect for the solo traveler or a couple.The bathtub was deep enough for me (I'm 5'3) to soak in. The shower had nice pressure and I never had an issue with the hot turning cold.Toilet-Separate with a bidet featureThere is plenty of closet space for hanging clothing. I did need extra hangers, which the front desk was kind enough to find for me. You will find an emergency flashlight inside the cabinet and an emergency escape ladder under the bench. The room comes with a hairdryer, and basic shower gel, shampoo, conditioner and lotion. I was sad to see there wasn't an iron. You might have to bring one if you don't want to send your clothing out to be cleaned or pressed. There is a price list for dry cleaning in the drawer of the desk. The room also has one 110V and 120V outlet. You have full control of the heating and cooling system in the room. Wifi worked well.The hotel supplies you with a free cell phone for your stay. I HIGHLY recommend adding the NAVER MAPs app in English for getting around Seoul. You can make free calls to North America with the phone. Breakfast was pretty much the same every day, with a few occasional exceptions. Toast with jams and peanut butterScrambled eggs, Fried Rice, Sausages, American Bacon, Korean soup or porage. Fresh fruit: grapes, pineapple, oranges, kiwi, cherry tomatoesPlain yogurt - I usually added a little jam to mine but I think there was honey or canned peaches. There also was a homemade granola.2-3 Dry Cereals1Green salad (plain) and then one with some type of dressing and meat or seafoodOccasionally there were fried stuffed peppers, Korean pancakes, or fried dumpling as well.Coffee and JuiceThe selection was healthy and diverse enough to start the day. There is also a number of coffee and pastry shops within a block if you're looking for something more. You will also find coffee, tea and cookies in the lobby. Location was the best part of the hotel. It's easy to get around the entire city via the buses or trains. I personally walked everywhere and used cabs a good deal. The hotel staff will help you get a taxi when you need one. (BTW-only use the orange, yellow, white or silver taxi service- the black ones will cost you a fortune). There are several Korean restaurants nearby. 2 convenience stores. A number of coffee shops and cafe.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: +Completely free to use smartphone with calls and internet to bring with you outside (massive help during my stay)+Clean+Great quiet location in the middle of the city+Close to many tourist attractions+Pleasant staff with good English+Flexible room cleaning+2 free water bottles every day+Comfy bed+Great shower+More spacious than expected in a double room+Very good value for the price+Close to City Hall subway station exit 8 and other transportation+Floor heating and toilet seat heating+Closed curtain completely blocks out all light from outside+TV with many local and international channels+Easy to get to from airport+Good wi-fi included in every room+Tourist advice in a folder in the room+I checked in after midnight without any issues after booking online and notifying the staff about my late arrival beforehand-Air conditioning a bit loud-No shower amenity refills (I didn't ask for it though so might be my bad)-Shower water can leak out into the room a bitWill definately stay here during future visits and I'd highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was here with my wife for 1 week between 23/05 - 30/05.Lets write a list of pros and cons in the order I remember them.+/- Airport bus transfer to the hotel took approx 1 hr. The bus had extra wide seats so it was comfortable.+ Check in was quick and painless. As we were on the 10th floor in the opposite building, a member of staff was nice enough to walk us over and into the lift.+ The hotel had catered for our requests and put us in room 1002, which is pretty much as quiet as it's going to get being so central. In the night though, you can still hear traffic from the main junction (especially bikes), but it's bearable even for light sleepers.+ The king size bed was comfortable and takes up most of the room.+ I like how the toilet is in a separate room to the shower.+/- Overall, the size of the room is compact. For a couple it's okay and workable.+/- Immediately I see under the seat was a safety box for use if and when there's a fire and you have to get out via the window (10th floor in my case). It's a kit that you strap into to lower yourself down to the ground. It made me think seriously about what to do in case of a fire and I was glad that the hotel has also considered this.+ The main selling point to this hotel is its location. It's easy walking distance to loads of places, the metro, the market, myeongdong center, the high street for breakfast etc. At least a couple of convenient stores literally just downstairs.+ Housekeeping was always timely and immaculate.- As we were in the other building, we didn't see reception after we checked in apart from the 1 time on the Sunday when we couldn't find a local pharmacy that was open. After consulting with reception and the guy went online to check, he confirmed that pharmacies are not open on Sundays. This turned out to be untrue as we came across several during the course of the day and was able to buy what we needed. I guess reception needed better local knowledge(?)+ The area felt safe and you need to use your key card to access the elevator so no random person can come off the streets into the hotel (or can they if they used the stairs?) Anyway, I felt safe while I was there. Yes, even the small alley behind the restaurants.+ Free use of safe and internet. It's expected, but you'd be surprised how many hotels these days still charge you extra for either.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We came here last August 2017 and we had a great time. Room is just enough for 2 people and the complimentary breakfast is already enough to satisfy your morning cravings. Front Desk staff are very friendly. Very close to Myeongdong and nearby places of interest. I will surely recommend this place.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent a week here, lovely friendly and helpful staff, fantastic location near lots of food streets, near Myeongdong main shopping street and night market. Close to public transport. Excellent free coffee from their coffee machine. Rooms are a good size for Korea. near the airport bus pickup point (5 minutes) for those flying out.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in August but completely forgot to write my experience! Hotel Shin Shin was the place to stay in South Korea, Seoul. it was near the major train station and close to attractions, food, and coffee! I was also able to book this hotel with a third party website and got free breakfast along with our stay. Initially getting there, it was a little tricky, but google map was a huge help. The room we got was a standard double. It's smaller than American rooms, but it's still comfy. We didn't spend much time in the room so the size didn't bother us. Just a place to sleep and shower :)On our first full day, the staff was great with helping us find our way around Korea. We asked them for directions and they were able to provide that with no problem. They also provided us with a card stating their location and phone number and told us to keep it with us at all times in case we decide to call for a cab and need to get a ride back - this would allow our driver to know where to go without having any confusion.Overall, amazing stay! Would definitely stay here again. Great for couples! Breakfast was amazing! Staff was awesome. Thanks Hotel Shin Shin!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is at the back of a café. if you see the hotel's youtube you won't miss it. Another short way from the CityHall station, you can walk through a underground shopping (between exit 6 & 7), walk through the shopping area to exit 4 (you will see Starbuck) then turn left at the corner go straight ahead keep left for 200-300 m. You will see the hotel. Hotel surround with restaurants and groceries shops (7/11) and 10 min. walk to Myendong shopping area . You can also use the underground (near starbuck) reach to Myendong The receptionist were very nice and helpful. Room is tiny you can't open 2 big luggage at the same time but decoration is good
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have to say I was quite disappointed, I’m not sure if it’s because I expected to much after reading & seeing the trip advisor reviews / scores or if I’ve been spoilt during my travels. It didn’t live up to my expectations.It is in a fantastic location, near Namdaemun market & close to 2 metro stations (city hall & hoehyeon). The room was ‘compact’ to say the least, the bed however was very comfortable & the shower was good.Attention to detail is missing... They provide a kettle & cups, however no actual tea or coffee. They also provide a handy phone with map facilities for you to use free of charge. Ours however had no charge on it... did ask if they had another we could use with charge, response was no. Staff are polite but not overtly helpful / friendly. Would I stay again or recommend it... sorry but no.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nicely located - clean and modern. We would definitely consider staying here on our next visit. Very well appointed rooms and comfortable bed. At first we found the breakfast a little pricey, but once we checked out the larger hotel next door's buffet, priced at about the same $$, we came back the next day to ours as it was more quaint and fresher food.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were only in Seoul for a few full days and wanted to be within easy walking distance of the Metro, Airport transportation, and attractions. Hotel ShinShin was perfect! We easily got to and from the Airport, the metro was a short distance away as well as the underground shopping pathways. Myeong-dong is basically across the street and everywhere we wanted to get to we could walk or jump on the metro. Namsan park is a short walk from the hotel as well!Staff was very friendly and the room was cozy. We are also obsessed with the restaurant - Dine Hall that is associated with the Hotel. Even though some may think it's pricey, we ate breakfast there almost every day just because it was so good.We would definitely stay here again!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice room, not too big. Very comfy beds! And that is special in Korea... There is a nice restaurant for breakfast with a big variety of food, all fresh and delicious. Staff is friendly and helpful. At arrival in Seoul we didn't find the hotel directly. The hotel is in a smaller street, therefore less noise.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was first time in Seoul and I'm glad I chose Hotel ShinShin. I was warmly greeted at the front desk, had an easy check in, and then led to my room. The room a little small which is not a big issue for me as a hotel room is really just for sleeping. Some may find the open bathroom concept an issue if traveling with friends, but I had no problem with this.Location is central as it's within a two mile radius of many main attractions including the palaces and markets.Issues: When I arrived, the shower would not drain. They sent someone to repair it immediately which resolved the situation for a day, but the issue happened again. Again the fixed it immediately. On one night we lost all water, but fortunately we were out partying until 3AM which didn't really affect us, but it is worth mentioning.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is good, 10 min walking to shopping paradise Myeongdong and close to metro stn City Hall. Hotel also close to airport bus 6015.Check-in was fast and breakfast was simple but adequate. But things can be better for providing toiletries and coffee/tea packets in the room. Pillow and bed are too soft for comfort. Air-con did not for 1 night during our stay.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is not too far from Namyeongdong market where there’s a bargain hunt experience and plenty of places to eat. There are many coffee shops around too! But most of all, the staff is very helpful and accommodating. We arrived before the actual check in time (9am) and they let us check in early! The room is quite small but the bed is very comfortable:) The hotel cafe is open for breakfast too.. food is great! Overall, I think this hotel is very reasonable.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean, comfortable. Staff friendly, efficient & knowledgeable about nearby good places to eat. Amazing breakfast buffet including home made yogurt & delicious home made granola plus an inspiring selection of salads (as well as the usual cereals and eggs bacon etc). Breakfast is served in a delightful cafe next to the hotel that gets the morning sun. Free tea, proper coffee & cookies are available in the foyer. Tea in room. Enormous comfortable bed with luxurious bedding. Everything you could wish for apart from a shelf for clothes and maybe a few extra hangers- we used the case shelf. Perfect location being close to Namdaemun market, South Gate and walkway.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: i can say the best hotel ever across the Nandaemun Market and just few steps to Myeongdong. hotel from outside looks small and budget type compare to nearby hotel, however, when you checked-in to your room, its just super comfortable, with all the amenities provided including hairdryer, kettle, 2-drinking water bottles, fridge, and the beds (mine is twin bed rooms) are super comfortable, and the room also super CLEAN!. i can say it spotless during my stay. I had the room with bathtub and the sink is just next to the tub, open space design, and toilet is separated from the sink and tub. Room also super quiet, busy area, with full occupants, but you hardly can hear any noise from outside even inside your room. Do not hesitate, just booked, you won't regret. Convenient store 24 hours is at your right of the hotel. Superb hotel!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I arrived in Seoul via Incheon airport from Kansai airport in Japan. I took the KAL airport limo bus and got off at the Plaza Hotel stop as advised. Make sure you watch their YouTube videos on how to get to the hotel from the various airport bus stops or from the subway. They are perfect and spot on.I followed the directions and found the hotel with no problem.Check in was easy and the room was clean. I was a solo traveler in a room with two twin beds. I did not have the breakfast so I cannot comment on that. There were plenty of good bakeries around Seoul so I would always just grab something.The location is great. Close to all the areas a typical tourist would want to visit.I would stay here again!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for three nights in a room with a kingsize bed. Contrary to other reviews, I did not find the room particularly small, especially not compared to other hotel rooms I have stayed in in Seoul. The room was very comfortable. The location of the hotel is great, walking distance to both city hall, Myeongdon and Namsan. The staff was very friendly (especially at breakfast!). The breakfast was limited in options but very good. Two days a week it includes Bibimbap, and on other days there are eggs, sausages and bacon next to fruit, yoghurt, cereal and toast. We would definitely stay here again!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: One of the best hotels I have ever stayed. I booked the twin room for a week and it was an amazing experience. Staff of the hotel were extremely attentive to our needs and were very polite all the time. The room was nice and well furnished. Supplies were provided every day.Location is also great :) Loved the hotel and staff; will definitely come back there!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Found the hotel right away after taking Airport Limousine Bus at Namdaemun Market, walk is around 5 minutes, as we had to walk further down to be able to cross the street (It is faster on the way to the airport via limousine bus since there is no need to cross the street). We had our room upgraded to a corner room, above the Dine Hall, as it is brighter, and have a nice view of the Bank of Korea grounds. Room is on the smaller side, but comfortable for two people. The water heater is hard to adjust, as it has a tendency to be so hot. There are many good Korean restaurants nearby, 2 convenience stores, cafes. I like the feel of the neighborhood. It is near the shopping area, Myeongdong, around 5-10 minutes away by walking. It is also walking distance (15-20 minutes or more) to other interesting areas like the Chongyeonchon Stream, and Gyongbeuk Palace. Hotel breakfast included was adequate for me, but am sure for others, it will be considered not much variety. On our last day, it took a while for them to replenish the scrambled eggs and rice. I also have to note that the coffee served with breakfast is too watered down for my taste.I general, the hotel staff were great and helpful in giving out directions in English. Had one incident/misunderstanding with a front desk officer, Steven Yang, as he was very impatient with my queries. Will not elaborate on this review, but I already wrote management about the said incident.. He was rude, but apologized afterwards about his actions. I also got a letter from the management apologizing about the said incident.Overall, it was a good stay.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at Hotel ShinShin for 4 nights and would definitely return if in Seoul again. The room itself was very clean, modern and had a very comfortable bed. Staff are friendly and helpful and there is a small restaurant that is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. In my opinion there was not a large offering for breakfast but then again to be fair, the price for the breakfast wasn't that steep either at £7.The location is very good, however finding the hotel was not easy and might require some forward planning. The hotel does provide information such as maps, instructions and the address in Korean. You get all this in an email before you arrive and also in your confirmation.All in all a very pleasant stay and would definitely stay here again. Apart from the limited offering at breakfast no problems at all!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I selected this hotel for 4nights in Seoul based on rating in booking.com.Hotel is clean, front office staff were very helpful.even gave free breakfast for our teenager niece.Location is also very good.you can go shopping on foot from nandaemun market all the way to Myeongdong. There are lots of restaurants, coffee shops and bars around the hotel.Only downside is there are other bigger hotels which look better from out side even in greater location for roughly the same rate.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed five nights at the Shinshin and had a wonderful experience. The staff, the room, and the location were all great. It is close to the outdoor market and plenty of other shopping. The room was clean and quiet. The only challenge was finding it. We took the bus from Inchon to the Plaza and tried to follow the online directions. Thankfully Koreans are a helpful people and we were successful in the end.I recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a good experience at a reasonable rate.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: True as what it mentioned it is an ideal settling to relax and wind down after a busy day or night out. Centrally located yet able to provide tranquility environment.Strategic location as it is very near to subway stations, myeongdong main shopping street, N Seoul tower, namdaemun and many more. We do not have any difficulties traveling around via walking and subway with the map that provided by the hotel itself. Staffs being polite and ready to answer all the questions you had. There's also underground shopping center around which you can explore. In short, it's a pleasant stay!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice boutique hotel... Everything from service, to comfort to cleanliness to location was great. Its situated in a popular shopping area with lots of food options. It was walkable to the main palace as well. The only fault was the perhaps the view and the breakfast. Food quality and selection was extremely basic, but overpriced. The standard room I booked was completely blocked by the other hotel 's other building in front. With the said, you can pay extra to an upgraded room in the front building.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel Shinshin is a great place to stay if you want to explore Seoul. It has easy access to the train stations (City Hall / Myeongdong area). The hotel has minimalist style. It has a great location with awesome food surrounding it. The best part of it it is that, it is tucked in a quiet place even if it's the center of everything. They prepared our room even if we arrived earlier (10am). They also provided us directions on how to navigate our way towards the hotel, this is very helpful as Seoul's train system can be very complex. We fully enjoyed our 10th year anniversary here. Breakfast was also provided. If there's just one suggestion I could give is that to have more variety of food serve during breakfast... if that's settled, for sure I will give 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located near Meyongdong shopping complex, maybe just 10 mins walk, very convenient. And thus a few mins also from the Cityhall subway station. The service is very good. Just room is a bit small and they don't provide toothbrush and pastes.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Can see why this hotel won its 2016 #1 TripAdvisor award with a good and easy to find location, nestled among more expensive and larger hotels. Breakfast was a fair choice of salads, fruit and couple of hot dishes. Was bit disappointed that it wasn't opened for happy hour drinks on weekends. Vicinity was safe even when walking back at midnight, and there is a street with plenty of late night snacks operating out of stalls just behind, or cross the street to the flea market. Wine bars are firmly in the nearby 4star hotels. Note that this hotel provides toiletries but not toothbrushes and shavers. There were robes and slippers, and kettle. The metro station is also a major one with two major lines crossing. A comfortable stay with polite and informative reception staff. No fitness facilities but wifi and tv works perfectly.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very smart hotel near to Myeongdong shopping district. Stayed here for 4 nights and found it to be perfectly situated to get around the city. There are a number of subway stops within a few minutes walk and it's only around 5 minutes walk before hitting the first of many shops in the Myeongdong area (same time in opposite direction for Namdaemun market)Hotel itself is clean, well looked after and whilst the room wasn't huge, the bed was a comfortable delight and there was ample room for 2 travellers plus luggage to go about their routines before/after a day of exploration.Staff were really helpful and spoke good English which made things very easy for two non Korean speaking tourists.Definitely recommended
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel, the location is handy to the everything. a few minutes walk and you can take your pick into the underground market, or Shinsegae or myeongdong area. The airport bustop is also quite close in front of the Bank of korea headquarters (this is the 6015). THe service in the hotel was great. Vivian Kwon was really awesome, she was friendly and accomodating and english wasn't too bad. What I truly like about the hotel is also the offer the laundry service and also free phone which we used to help us get around using the wifi hotspot. the decor of the rooms are also great but reception was a bit akward as you need to go down to the basement first. if you ahve a lot of luggage be prepared to lug it around as I dont think they have porter service.Room was a bit small but comfortable and clean.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed on a combination of business and pleasure for 8 days in the Neo Traditional Suite - brilliant stay, Very helpful staff, fantastic location and lovely Dinehall restaurant.Hotel location is fantastic - located on a sort of 'building' island minutes walk away from the major roads, subways and bus stops. This had the added benefit of making our room on the First Floor very peaceful - no noise - even with sliding door ajar at night. As well as the Suite being a lovely room with wooden floors in the bed/living area, black granite type tiles in the large bathroom, all with underfloor heating, the blissful thing was the two sets of almost floor to ceiling sliding windows you could open to half the width of the window. Billowing net curtains with the delicious breeze meant there was no need for air con with the cross ventilation these open windows provided.The living area at least equal in size to the sleeping area had a comfortable 70s style black sofa, smoked glass topped coffee table and blissful black pouffee to put your legs up on. A long desk area running the length of one wall which has a captain's style chair - very comfortable for working on next to the window. This living area made all the difference for a longer stay made a comfortable and relaxing return from a day's sightseeing or business.The bathroom had a substantial glass door framed with metal with a heavy duty black out curtain that could be pulled across to give 100 per cent privacy. The ample shower space had it's own opaque glass door and the japanese stye toilet also had it's own opaque glass door. Ample area of washstand surface in black granite with two basins and a separate bath. The bath was small but perfectly adequate. Bring your own bubble bath though - hard to find in Seoul. All very clean.The Suite was a luxury that made all the difference.Kettle, mugs and water provided. Fridge. Ample storage space in one wardrobe and another single full length wardrobe a glass door and drawers. Another full length glass storage space with glass shelves and fridge/kettle. Additional two cupboards under the desk Large wall mounted TV. Fast and consistent wifi.We were also offered complimentary laundry - two items a day though think this was linked to the Suite and the use of a brand new looking smartphone free of charge - though heavy penalty if you lost it. Near reception sitting area with complimentary tea, coffee and biscuits - all airconditioned. Great waiting area if you have a later flight and there are two very large spotlessly clean single toilets on the same floor that can be used for changing in very comfortably.The Reception area is in the basement. Recommend you leave your heavy bags upstairs while you check in in case you need to carry them back up again.Dinehall restaurant - great. We paid for the breakfast and were very glad we did and felt it was good value. Despite other reviewers saying there was plenty of alternatives - I did not see them. Buffet Style. There are the daily staples of cereals, locally made yoghurt, fruit and toast and juices and a daily change of local Korean food - simply delicious - and the salad ingredients and fruit so fresh. Coffee or tea - as much as you can drink. We ate here on two nights, there was a good atmosphere and despite a fairly limited menu everything we ordered was freshly prepared and well cooked. Can recommend the Box Chicken - very ample servings for two people. Pizza as well very good and was freshly made. Only problem not open on Saturday night.7 Eleven and 'With Me" convenience stores within 3 mins walking. Hotel staff very good at ordering taxis that arrive punctually.
