ATMs in the convenience stores. You can buy Sim Cards here - I bought a Data only sim. Though if I came again I would buy one in the SK Telecom at the Airport, or in the shop near the Hotel as they do it all for you. Getting my Egg data only sim working I bought from the convenience store I found challenging.We took a 'local' taxi (cheaper than the black limousine taxi) directly to the Hotel and it cost approximately 50,000 KRW - a 45 minute to 1 hour trip. Economies of scale made it a luxury well spent. When you come out of the airport avoid the 'black limousine taxis' and go for the local taxi which is cheaper and very comfortable. My husband used taxis to get to his conference and they were very reasonable and waiting for him every morning.Recommend you watch all the You Tube links the Hotel will send you on how to get to the Hotel as useful for spotting landmarks and signs on how to get to Hotel. If you are thiking of getting the subway from the airport, take note of the 3 long flights of stairs to get to ground level.We bought a T Money card - stored value travel card. You can buy them in convenience stores (7 Eleven and With Me 3 mins from Hotel). They were invaluable - use on underground and buses. Recommend you download a Seoul Subway App - invaluable - plans trip for you - tells you how long it will take and much it will cost. Extremely re-assuring for anyone visually challenged as the subway maps on the stations the writing is too small for me! Very easy to get around. Google maps or some reason will not give you the 'walking' option but if you press bus it will give you a map and will also give very accurate and easy bus information It will also follow the route as you are on the bus so you know when to get off. Without it use of buses would be challenging! Learn from my experience and make sure you get on the right side of the road!If you think you would like to visit the absolutely stunning Palaces - buy a combination ticket for 10,000 KRW - very good value. Palaces also offer free guided tours in English but would recommend you arrive before the start of the tour and have a good look round yourself first as not much time for taking photos and drinking in the atmosphere and buildings on the tours.We absolutely loved our trip to Seoul - such an unexpected delight - made all the more comfortable and memorable because of our stay in wonderful HotelShinShin.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed at Hotel Shin Shin for 5 nights during our time in Seoul. The hotels location is perfect! It is 5 mins from City Hall metro station and 10 minutes from Myeongdong Street mall. It is also 1 minute walk to the airport pick up/drop off bus stop. We stayed in the twin room and it was a good size for both of us. the room has good heating/cooling and even the floor is heated. The staff were really pleasant and spoke good english. They always greeted us with a smile and always willing to help. Vivienne and Bright helped us is booking tickets to the theatre and showing us which transport options were suitable for activities. Complimentary tea and coffee is available down stairs near reception. We also ate at the Dinehall which is next door to the hotel. The prices were good and food options were plentiful. 2 convenience stores are located either side of the hotel, and the tourist police station is just down the road from the hotel. We felt very safe staying at this hotel and would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Cosy yet modern hotel in a great location. The staff were friendly and helpful and although the rooms were small there was enough room for the two of us. Also the bed was massive which was definitely a bonus!
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Was lost after wondering around Shinshin and decided to call hotel. The sweet young receptionist ran out to look for us, it was such a relief to see people came to help us as we are v tired by then. A great place and highly recommended. Its just ard Bank of Korea anyway.
hotelName:
16    Floral Hotel Shin Shin Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Skypark Hotel Myeongdong III was in a great location, very short walk to the Myeongdong shopping area and within walking distance or short taxi ride to Seoul Tower, Namdaemun, and the palaces. Hotel also provided free shuttle to Dongdaemun and Seoul Station. There was a 7-eleven and Paris Baguette which was very convenient. Many great restaurants nearby when you finally get tired of the street food lol. The quad room was big enough for a family of 4, the bathroom was very clean, there was a full bathroom plus a separate shower stall, which helped, and was nice to have a bidet! Housekeeping cleaned daily and provided nice shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, and lotion. Staff was very nice and friendly. The room had 110V plug, so I didn’t have to use a converter. Would definitely recommend!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is conveniently located next to metro and airport shuttle stops. We went to the Myeongdong market with hundreds of food and clothing booths a few blocks away almost everyday. The room has both 220V and 110 V outlets which helped with our recharging cell phones and wheelchair every night. The room and the bathroom were very clean and the cleaning service was prompt and meticulous.The staff was extraordinarily helpful and friendly. One night a staff member helped fix my wheelchair front wheel with an Allen wrench. Another time a different staff member helped tighten the handle bar. On our day of check-out, yet another staff member pushed two of our suite cases to the airport shuttle stop. We are grateful for their help beyond the normal duty.If we went to Seoul again, we would definitely choose the Skypark Meopngdong III.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my 3rd time staying at this hotel. I like the location of this hotel, the subway is just in front of the hotel. Many shops and restaurant nearby. There is free shutter bus to Dongdaemon and Seoul station. The staffs can speak good English and they are friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easy access by train. Location is great. 3 mins walk to Myeongdong shopping street. Provided masks, toothbrushes and others. Enjoyed our stay in this hotel. Staff is friendly. Will book again next time.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was with my Sister sharing 1 room. We had to take turns to open our luggages as the room was pretty small. Great location, staff at the hotel were polite and helpful. Great for travellers who want a hotel with easy access to train and airport limo.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is in an excellent location with it being just steps away from a subway station, only a very short walk to the Airport Limousine Bus stop and it being in the Myeondong shopping area. That shopping area is very interesting to stroll through with all the stores and all the open air food stands that are grilling everything from corn to crabs. The room was very clean and the staff are very helpful. Will definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Solo traveler ~Stayed in skypark lll for 4-days , I would say it’s really convenient! The hotel is located just right in front of myeongdong subway station exit 10, airport express bus stop is located within walking distance in minutes !
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Whenever i travel with family these qualities are my priority when selecting hotel: cleanliness, comfortable bedding, staff manners, close to public transportation, eateries, shopping. Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III has it all. I am very very satisfied with this hotel. All the staffs were nice, good manners, and very helpful. Exit the subway and you will find this hotel, airport bus stop is also just 50m away, very convenient with big luggages. A few steps away and you will get to the heart of famous Myeongdong shopping and eateries. Will stay here again if i visit Seoul again and will recommend to all my friends and relatives.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location in Myeongdong and convenient for transportation. Hotel located on main road and subway is right in front of hotel. However poor attitude of night shift front desk guy, no greetings or welcome at all. When we had inquiry, the guy seems unlike to answer to questions.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is location in an excellent location. Smack at the entrance is the entrance to subway. Flanked by multiple convenient stores. Bus stop for the airport limousine is only 30m away. And if Myeong-dong is your hang out spot, then this is the place to stay.The rooms are basic and clean. But do be aware that the standard rooms are small, very very small. This is the size of the rooms in the area, they are this small, count your self lucky that u can still walk around the room and open up your luggage.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We picked this hotel as it was conveniently located. Five steps from the entrance of the subway train and right next to the pick up point for the shuttle but to Pyongchang. Also, it is a very short walk to the shopping streets of Myeongdong. Perfect for my family travelling with small kids.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: ProsGood location in Myeongdong and near the shopping streetRoom is comfortable and price is affordable.ConsThe male receptionist (without spectacles) who checked us in and (unfortunately) checked us out was super arrogant. His attitude made me feel unwelcome. This kind of service should not continue and the hotel should improve.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The area of the room could be larger. Also, it is a little bit difficult to adjust the water temperature of showering, it would become very hot or cold if I turn the tap a little bit. I sleep very well but the function of blocking sound from other room have to be stronger. Hope keep on becoming better! Thank you so much!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very attentive and helpful staffs, very nice to upgrade one of our room to deluxe. Location was great for Myeongdong shopping and airport bus stop is only few steps away. Standard room is rather small and simple, however deluxe room is good.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Definitely will be back there again. The room is good size. However the room is queen bed. The bathroom is clean. Good washing and dryer machine available. Great for me to stays over 10 nights. Best place to stay and do shopping.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Arrived in the morning and was able to leave luggage at the concierge smoothly. Checking in was smooth. Room was not big, just comfortable for two and two luggage but good enough since we will only be sleeping there. Coin laundry was awesome, ₩2000 per wash or dryer with dispenser for liquid detergent at ₩500 each. Managed to get a clean and dry load of clothes after 1.5hr. Hotel is also near pick up/drop off point of a few tour activities so its very convenient, especially during return where we can easily drop our things back at the hotel before coming out again for dinner at myeongdong.Overall great location and value for money! However if you are one looking for full suite of hotel facilities, this may not be the one for you.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel's biggest plus point was that Exit 9 of Myeongdong station is right in front of it. Very accesible for us since we always use the subway as means of transportation. The Myeongdong street foods andxmake up stores are also a stone throw away. If you are here for shopping then this is the highly recommended hotel. A botvpf a downside was that the room itself is small. If you open two luggages (like in our case), you'll have to walk on your beds. I believe the heater is also centralized during winter. We cannot control the temperature. Sadly, we were not able to try their laundry. Would have been easier for us. We will definitely book here again when we come back.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is at good location, there is a coin laundromat that allows me to do my daily laundry is a wonder! it's a waste I could not get to stay for my full trip as the quad room was not available throughout my stay in Seoul and I had to switch to another hotel without laundromat. However, the room ventilation gets a little stuffy as there is only central heater during winter and I had to open the small window for cold air to come into the room. Otherwise, it's a good stay.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is our second time staying with Skypark III. This time for 7 nights. The Quad room was just nice for 3 adults and 1 child. The heater remote control was in Korea but easily accessible. The Double room is a lil small but it’s okay. Housekeeping was good and concierge was very helpful with our inquiries. I would def be back here on our next Korea trip!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just a few steps away from train station, Airport Bus... Myeongdong Street ..Taxi Stand is just outside the hotel...There’s Paris Baguette and 7/11 down the hotel.. so if you need something no problem! Beside is Family Mart too.They clean and change the beddings and towels everyday... thank you skypark III!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is right outside myeongdong station exit 9. The airport buses 6015 and 6001? stop very near the hotel. Very near the myeongdong shopping street. Hot water shower + bathtub and heated toilet bidet. Room slightly small. Coin laundry at the basement. Will recommend
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff are polite and helpful. Hotel located near the airport bus stop and also myeongdong station exit 9 which can arrive within 5-10 mins, the myeongdong shopping street is in 10 mins distance. How's convenient!! The room is tiny but a bit smaller than anticipated. The restroom is clean and large. I love it! I will come back next trip
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Surprised to have an additional shower place apart from the normal bathroom that speeded up queuing for shower after a long day out. Location is no doubt so very convenient right at Exit 9. Airport limo station is just few steps away. Room size is good enough for 4 adults with 4 twin beds with 4 opened suitcases too. Staff was nice and room was clean. Good value for money.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location, easy access to subway and shopping area. There is a few storey high Daiso opposite and next to the hotel, has 7-11 & bakery. Not much choice at 7-11. Staffs are impolite. Room is small for 2 person. Easy access to and fro Incheon airport via luminous airport bus. There are better hotels surrounding. Won’t recommend to friends and will not stay there again if going to Seoul.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is very strategic! Very close to Myeong dong shopping center and train/bus station which is our starting place for our booked trips to Nami island & Everland. Service is excellent. Rooms are cozy. We will definitely be back.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: great location. on top of exit 12 line 4 of myeondong station near uniqlo and airport stop. walking distance with all the shops and restaurants. room is a little bit small but decent. can store luggage after check out. has weighing scale and entrance for people with luggages. 711 and paris baguette are downstairs
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in Skypark III from 18 - 22 August. Hotel is well located next to Myeong-dong station. Hotel staff are friendly and helpful. Hotel provides free shuttle bus to Seoul Station, Dongdaemun etc. There's also a 7-11 and Paris Baguette at ground level. Hotel room is relatively spacious. Stayed in a triple Princess room. So pinkish! Like that there is a separate toilet and shower room. As there's 3 of us, we can use the shower in the toilet as well as the shower room concurrently. Time saving for us.Will definitely return. Value for money!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel location is very convenient, next to Myeongdong subway station and near by the airport bus stop. Staff are nice and helpful. They are good at English so easy to communicate. Even the room not very big, but it's very tidy and comfortable.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel room is small, but clean. There is an exit to the metro right outside of the hotel entrance hotel and is walking distance to the shopping belt of Myeongdong. You can also take the free shuttle bus from Seoul station to the hotel
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel. Rooms were clean and staff were friendly. Subway station exit is just outside the hotel so it’s very convenient. Airport Shuttle Bus station is just a few meters away. It’s centrally located, shops and restaurants are just nearby.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is a bit small, but it is a convenient hotel to move anyway. Limousine bus stop from the airport within walking distance, within walking distance to Myeongdong, convenience meal next to the porridge is also convenient.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is really convenient, next to the exit of the metro station. Really accessible and near to the Myeongdong shopping street. It is also clean and quiet although it is near to the shopping street. Will recommend others to stay here.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would totally recommend Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III because:1. It is very clean and neat2. Myeongdong station exit 9 (stairs only) is just at the doorstep of this hotel.3. Board /alight from Airport bus just a street (50m on the same side) down.3. 7-11 and Paris baguette are beside it. Buying breakfast and top up T-money is so much easier.4. Myeongdong shopping streets are around the corner.5. There is a 5-6 storey Daiso building opposite.6. Japanese style toilet bidet.7. A safe in the room (do bring passport out as tax refund requires you to produce a foreign passport)8. Ask for tea/coffee cups, stirrer, disposal toothbrush and toothpaste if you require.9. Night wear, kettle, air purifier, shower gel and shampoo provided in room. Water (including hot water) dispensing machine at corridor.Note that they provide 2 soft pillows which your head literally sinks into it. Might be a concern if you are used to hard pillow.Overall a very convenient and affordable hotel in this area!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very average hotel, nothing to write home about. Location is good, literally right next to an exit of Myeongdong metro station. If you use another exit on the same side of the street, you can use the escalator which is especially handy if you have luggage. Very easy to get to the hotel from Seoul Station. Myeongdong shopping district is very close, just a few blocks away, but if you don't like crowds and the noise, it's easy to avoid it. Namdaemun is within walking distance, Dongdaemun just a few metro stops away.Rooms are typical, quite small. If you're lucky, you will have a window with a view but most likely you won't. Free wifi worked well and the staff was friendly and helpful. Apparently they offer breakfast for an additional fee but it's served in the Paris Baguette next door.My biggest complaint is that the beds are quite uncomfortable. Way too soft and the pillows are really mushy as well. Had my first neckaches of the trip. The hotel is rather quiet but you can hear people talking in the corridor. Our room as not facing the street and there was no traffic noise.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is very good and the room size is acceptable. However, the electric kettle is uncleared since I found some precipitate at the bottom of the kettle. The wardrobe is dusty. I found two bottles of water in the fridge and do not know what is the price.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about the hotel is great especially the location and the water dispenser on each floor. There was only one thing that bothered us, and it was the very warm temperature of the room at night time. We were there right smack in the middle of a cold wave when we were in Seoul but we were sweating at night. It was not just war, it was hot!! We definitely turned off the heater, and I asked the Front Desk if there was a way to adjust the very warm temp but no AC was understandably available as it was still winter. I will return to this hotel in the summer but having second thoughts on going there again in winter. Other than that, I love this hotel.Tip: Myeongdong Station Exit 9 is right in front of the hotel but it is all stairs so its a killer if you have baggage. What we did was go out using Exit 7 which has elevators or Exit 1 (across the street from hotel) which has both elevators and escalators. They're both a little bit farther away from the hotel compared to Exit 9 but the lifts definitely make up for the extra walking, if heavy load is involved.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, nice people who can speak english. Very accommodating. There's a 7/11 right beside it and subway is just in front of it. The night market is 5mins away where you can do your shopping and eat to your heart's content.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location for people wanna take public transport. Easily accessible restaurant and shopping. We have a good time spent at shopping street just stone throw from hotel. Staffs are friendly and room are clean.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff are very friendly. Housekeeping is very detailed. Rooms are bit small but it's practical because being in Seoul, you should be out site-seeing rather than staying in the room all day. All the basic necessities you need for a comfortable stay are catered for. Accessibility is just too ridiculously convenient as it's on a main road to catch taxis, and it's directly infront of the entrance to the Myeongdong train station. Excellent experience.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: first of all, the room is soo small if you are bringing more than 3 luggage and you are big.. It can be a bit stressful to pack your stuff and to walk around ( 2 ppl in a room) I feel that if u stayed there as a solo traveller it may be a bit better, we came there at a (-8) to -15 celsius so , sleeping at night ( the air from the window really makes the room so cold.. Its like we were freezing while we sleep ( there is no heater .. ) that really makes us feeling uncomfortable. ( this would be a reason why i wouldnt recommend this place. )However, the service here are excellent , the hotel ppl are so nice and verbal in english. Its just a matter of the hotel building itself. Its very convenient having 7eleven and a bakery cafe connected to the hotel. ( i highly recommend the rooibus tea) the place is located strategically not far away from myeongdong street ( its just behind the hotel..) if u want to be more near to all the shopping area i would recommend to reside at Skypark 2 , the place seems more bigger ( i think) The other plus point abt this place would be having the shuttle bus ( 6015) 2 mins walk from the hotel ( just near to standard charted bank walk a lil further) the bus will take u to incheon airport for (15 000 won and u just pay the driver directly no need to buy a ticket in advance ) and it comes often like every 20 mins so u dont have to use the hotel van or bus ( it costs more plus additional charges for luggage. So really just take the airport bus. ( i also want to add that, myeondong underground shopping is located at exit 8 and the exit 9 infront of the hotel is to get to a subway train and no underground shopping ( it doesnt connect to the underground shopping)
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location of hotel is good and the service is excellent. We booked a quad room for our family of 4. There is a bathtub and separate shower cubicle which is very useful. Only minus point is that the room is very small and there is very little space for our luggage. If you have 4 persons, it will be more comfortable to book two rooms.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Recommended by a friend. Truly accessible to various places of interest via subway. Subway station is just right in front of hotel. It's at the fringe of myeongdong and hence avoided loud noises and convenient to do drop off and pick up. Hotel has 3 bedders that come with 2 showers which was convenient to family or friends. We were very impressed with the staff's services. The housekeeping is excellent and coin operated laundry at the basement is a plus. There's a confectionery and a 24 hr seven eleven within the same building. On one occasion when I had to bring my kid to A&E after midnight, the duty manager sent us through and fro and acted as our translator. We really appreciate his help. Overall the location, cleanliness of room and excellent service deserve 5 stars from me.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Tidy and clean, close to subway exit and fews mins walk to main shopping area. There is a convenience store next to the lobby, very convenience. The location is the best of the Skypark group hotel. I always choose this when I come to Seoul.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is clean, subway was just beside Airport Bus is just right infront of L7 This hotel is Just beside L7 Very Good LocationBook the Ettude Room.There were 2 bathrooms in the roomVery Suitable for Family
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in their quad room meant for 4 persons. Although it is small with limited wardrobe and walking space, the convenience of its location, reasonable price and comfort definitely make it a worthwhile stay. I will not hesitate to return to this hotel for my next visit again.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros:(1) Easy access from Incheon airport - take bus 6015. Travelling time is about 70 mins subjected to traffic condition. The bus was comfortable and had announcements in Korean, Japanese, Chinese and English upon arriving your hotel. Bus stop is only a stone away. There is a ramp next to the front steps of the hotel for luggage. (2) Paris Baguette Cafe at the lobby level if you are a coffee lover; not bad at all. They also sell Korean style breads and cakes. 7-11 at the back of the corridor for quick snacks and emergency items.(3) Nearby attractions - Myeongdong shopping for beauty products and lots of eating places around the area. Walking distance to Namsan tower cable car station(Uphill all the way). Highly recommend the newly opened Daiso just opposite the hotel. Eight levels of gadgets and stuff that you will adore.(4) Metro Myeongdong Station Exit 9 is outside. Warning: not for people with bad knees as there are many steps to climb. Can try to use exit 7 which has an escalator but some steps are still required.(5) Good Wifi speed. A hot/cold water dispenser at each level and ice machine on level 2. Business Centre at the basement; two old PC's and a printer. It is better to use your own device in your room. Cons:We had a twin room which is very small. Cannot walk through with the suitcase opened. The wardrobe is tiny too.Pillows are too soft for me.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is simple yet it provide all the amenities that we need. It has a bakery and 7-11 beside the lobby. It also has a coin operated laundry in the basement. It’s location is the best, it’s in myeondong shopping district yet it’s far enough from the noisy crowd. Myeondong station exit 9 is less than 10m away from the lobby.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staff were just fabulous as well as the rooms. The staff were very helpful and they can speak English well. I took Airport Limousine Bus from Incheon Airport to the hotel and it was very easy! The bus stopped just right in front of the hotel. The receptionist was very helpful and friendly, and everything about check-in had been settled in less than 5 minutes. I requested for an iron + iron board and an international power adapter. Excellent location of the hotel as it is located in the center of Myeongdong Shopping Street. The subway (Seoul Metro) station were just right in front of the hotel (Exit 9). It was also easy to take bus from here (I took bus to Namsan Seoul Tower). Since it was located at the Myeongdong area, we didn't find any difficulties to find Halal Restaurants at night. Our favourite were Busan Jib and Gurkha Restaurant. There were also some Halal street food. Walking and shopping at night around this area was very safe especially for ladies. No bumpy pavements, 7 Eleven was connected to the hotel lobby. Room itself was well equipped and comfortable --bathroom with separate toilet and shower room, toilet with bidet, bathrobes, enough space to open our luggage, TV with many channels, bottled water, kettle+ coffee & tea set, complimentary toiletries (shower gel, lotion, shampoo, conditioner, toothpaste, toothbrush).It was very easy to book taxi as the taxi will stop just right in front of the hotel. I recommend this hotel to everyone, who is looking for a good stay and great hospitality!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: everything is about average, very convenient location as it's just next to Myeongdong metro exit 9, is also nice to have shuttle bus service to seoul station which is linked to airport expressBUT i got bug bites all over my legs, itchy and red spots on my skin :(
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located above Myeongdong subway, it is easy to access. near the Myeongdong shopping streets, you just have to love this hotel!Excellent front desk and room staff! The staff are helpful!Clean and spacious rooms!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I travel to South Korea at my first time, I will prefer to live in a hotel which is near the train station. The location is great. It is near the Seoul. However, the room is terrible, once I open the door, I find out the room havn't include the window. Since my room between the two walls, I even can't see any view through the windows. The room is really hot (room temperature over 34"c) due to they offer us a heater when we are travelling in winter. We required to have a Air Purifier, however, they told us too much guest required, they can just offer us a fan. This is the first experience I sweat when I sleep in those few days. I try to required the change the room, but they rejected us twice time. I would not stay at this hotel once again.
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Walking distance from underground metro exit 9. No elevator though at this exit. 5min walk to Airport Bus (15KRWpp). Excellent location would stay again. Breakfast wasn't include in my room. Everything about the room was great. Used the safe and A/C. Internet was good. They even have drinking water stations available to use. Coin laundries was avail I didn't use it. 7-11 store downstairs, close to restaurants, shopping, and metro. The price was just right for the convience
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Convenient as just next to Myeongdong station exit 9. The room is a bit small but still able to open suitcase and still got space. Room is tidy, clean and quiet . Although my room is with window, but actually it is only a hole without view. Disappointed on this. Otherwise, everything perfect
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This review is for two separate stays in Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III in May17.The main categories I will cover in my review are as follows:Location - The hotel is relatively easy to reach via the airport shuttle bus, which I took directly from outside Incheon Airport. At the same stop, you can catch a shuttle bus to Gimpo Airport should you require a flight out to perhaps Jeju. Apart from the ease in getting to and from the main airports, this hotel is mere steps away from a subway station which makes it super duper convenient as a base from which you can hop on and off the subway to explore the other areas. Do note that the entrance to / exit from the subway station right outside the hotel requires you to climb steps. Hence, should you be moving luggages or have elderly folks with you, try to locate a different exit with lift services or an escalator. And if that is not enough to speak volumes about its convenient location, for all you shopaholics, Myeongdong market is right at your doorstep. Indulge in all the shopping you wish, snack on street food, drop off your loot and repeat the cycle. The hotel is also located within walking distance to the cable car station that will take you to Namsan Tower.Hotel services - Hotel staff has relatively good command of English. Check in and out is fuss free. House keeping is of usual good standard. What I like is that the hotel is able to hold on to your luggages while you take off for a few days to neighboring areas like Jeju / Busan. That said, I did have a second leg of stay with them. Hence, that may be why they were able to hold on to my luggages. It would be best to check with them beforehand should you require luggage storage services. Hotel room - Room itself is pretty compact. Not much space to move about but it is functional enough in my opinion. Standard luggages can be opened up, with covers propped against wall and not fully laid flat on the ground if you get what I mean. Not a problem as I can deal with it. All in all, a good and fuss free stay with Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III!
hotelName:
17    Hotel Skypark Myeongdong III
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel needs to update /add additional outlets for devices.Difficult to charge devices. No outlets bedside. Hotel should have Cafe open earlier so guests can have coffee other than 7-11 store. Only other place for coffee is buffet

review_body: Stayed 2 nights while relaxing in Seoul. Hotel is within easy walking distance to many attractions. The Hoehyeong subway station is right infront the hotel. If you are traveling light, it is within walking distance of the KTX Seoul Station. Staff were polite and helpful.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located right across the market, super easy to get back and forth to the airport and anything else you need to get to is very close by through subway. The staff was very helpful and the general area feels very safe to walk around at night.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Well situated hotel just a few minutes walk from Seoul station, nice coffee bar in the ground floor (Burger King also) and across the road from the market. As with all Korean hotels in this price range good bathroom and air conditioning.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I read some positive about the hotel before travelling to Seoul. Though i still had some doubts when on the plane, the hotel far surpassed my expectations after staying there during my trip. Travelling to and from the hotel was super convenient — there is an airport limousine bus stop right outside the hotel. It is also situated above Hoehyeon Station, so travelling around by subway is no hassle at all. Across the street is Namdaemun market, turn right and both Shinsegae Department Store and the main Myeongdong shopping area are within walking distance. The hotel was also visible from Seoul Station / Lotte Mart; it goes without saying I will try walking towards that side on my next visit. Front desk staff were very helpful — there was both Chinese and English speakers so communication was not a problem at all. The room was clean and spacious, and I had a view to N Seoul Tower, though soundproofing wise it could be improved as i could hear the doors of the other rooms closing in the mornings. One thing i was most impressed about was the housekeeping — I went out after 11am on one of the days during my stay, and though I returned to find my room not yet made up 3 hours later, when I went out after a short rest and returned again perhaps 4 hours later, the room was already made up! I also felt it was very sweet of the housekeeping staff to keep the water bottles out of the freezer for me from the third day onward; they had picked up on the fact that I don’t like to drink ice cold water and prefer some at room temperature for drinking. My room did not come with breakfast, but that is perfectly fine as there are plenty of food options close to the hotel.Overall a very pleasant stay. I will no doubt shortlist the Tmark Grand Hotel again for future visits to Seoul. :)
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is very close to Namdaemoon market, Myeong-dong and Seoul Station for train.Subway is right front of the hotel #4 subway that can guide to Daehak Ro for a lot of plays and musicals.I used Center Mark near Insadong a week before my package travel by Hana and switched to TMark Grand Hotel. (Very Happy with Center Mark too.)

review_body: Stayed at 1638/ family suite, with view to Nam San. Was perfect for our family. Included breakfast but the menu should change as was same for every day... and we got tired of it. Overall, best value for amenities and location for us.

review_body: The only bad point was the air conditioner which doesn't really allow us to adjust the temperature. It goes back to 23.5/25 even if we adjust it cooler. Theres a 7eleven within the hotel building at lvl 1 which is great when you need some last minute fixes. The rooms are comfortable and clean.

review_body: UI like the loved the location. Opposite the market and direct public shuttle (limousine bus) from airport, stops in front of the hotel. Breakfast buffet was excellent except the room/facility looks a bit cold and unfriendly. Service could be better especially during breakfast. Rooms are rather small and my room hasd only a very samll window facing a wall on the left and view to the back (little view, hardly any view). Rest of hotel fine, basic facilities/function but overall fine..
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong

review_body: This is my first time to Korea. No knowledge of which hotel is good but chose Tmark Grand by its location and price. With this price I think it is good. Compared to the hotels I have been to in other countries, Tmark Grand is one of the best. We feel very comfortable and well respected. Staff are very nice and helpful. Although we do not speak Korean, we don't feel lost in this hotel. Staff's English ability is great and able to communicate with us well. There's a subway entrance right beside the hotel making it a very good location. It is also close to other attractions where they are within walking distance.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very convenient location, a walking distance to Myeongdong station and Seoul Station. You can take limousine bus from the Incheon Airport (Route 6001) and stop at the main entrance of the hotel and Route 6015 just opposite side will take you back to Incheon Airport. It makes you less hassle to find the hotel location.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong

review_body: Staff was nice and helped when need to know how to get somewhere. Room was clean and fresh. Lots of onsite food options. Nice view of the city. ATM in lobby. Close to lots of fun shopping areas. Would stay again.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel to stay in Seoul. Very friendly and helpful staff. Clean rooms with good views. Convenient location close to shops, restaurants and main station. We stayed four nights here and it was a very pleasant experience.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable and convenient. Close to Seoul station, Namdaemun, the subway, and more. Excellent room, a nice breakfast, and good quality hotel. Close to a lot. Just wish that the fitness facility wasn't an extra charge.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked 3 family twin rooms for 6 nights at this hotel due to an excellent rating in Agoda and TripAdvisor and yes, it was true! Got the rooms with Seoul Tower View.Location : Excellent! Airport bus 6001 just stop right in the hotel and for going back with bus stop across the hotel by airport bus 6015. Paid with transport card for KRW 13000 instead of 15.000/adults.Wanna go to Hongdae? by bus 604 and wait at the bus stop across the hotel. it would stop at Hongdae around 16 stops.Install Kakao Maps or use Google maps as navigator to ride the bus.Namdaemun Market just across the hotel, so many stalls to buy souvenirs, food, clothes, etcMyeongdong could be reach by foot about 10 minutes walk or by bus (1 stop).Near MRT Hoehyoen entrance 3 (couple meters at the left side of Hotel)With bus 03 (wait the bus right in front the hotel), we went to Seoul Tower.Rooms : Clean, spacious, comfortable and complete facility : safe box, iron board, hair dryer, coffee and tea maker, etc.Hot and cold shower with bath up worked well.7-11 and Burger King in the Lobby.Fast Check-in and Check-out.Really recommended
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked 3 rooms in this hotel for 3 nights with family, train station is just accross the property, restaurants around the area, 7/11 and night market with variety of street food to choose from. Burger king in the lobby is a great help for an impromptu snax or late night dinner! The english speaking staff were helpful and accomodating, wil recommend this hotel to our friends going to seoul.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in an excellent location. Airport bus 6001 from Incheon Airport brings you right in front of the hotel's doorstep. And, to get back to Incheon Airport, airport bus 6015 across the road brings you directly there. If you plan on taking the subway, Hohyeon Station exit 3 is just a minute's walk. away. Namdaemun Market is across the road, and the hotel is between the Seoul Station (where Lotte Mart is) and Myeongdong. In terms of location, this is about the best that travelers like me without a rental car can ask for. The rooms are also very clean and beds are comfortable, and the staff is friendly and speaks good English.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I paid extra for a room with a window . My room was modern -shower no bath. Breakfast room was old and limited to a Chinese style breakfast and toast. Tea and coffee available all day which was handy. Reception staff and housekeeping were polite and helpful. I prefer the Ximen or Ximending located hotels better for convenience of food, restaurants and being in the happening areas of Taipei.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We love staying in this hotel. A lot of improvements since our last visit 2 years ago. We got our room facing N Seoul Tower. The bus terminal to N Seoul tower is just in front of the hotel. So clean, respectful hotel crews and another plus.. my favorate Burger King is in the ground floor of the hotel and the 7-11 for our 24 hour needs.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very pleased with my choice to stay at Tmark Grand. Hotel is at super convenient location. Easy access from and to the airport by using the airport limousine bus. It’s practically right in front of the bus stop. I requested a nice room with a view as it was my first visit and they gave me a room on a higher floor with perfect view of the Seoul Tower. We stayed in a twin bed room, beds are extremely comfy. It’s very quiet too, the only thing is when people close their doors we sometimes can feel the vibration.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong

review_body: A pleasant stay in this hotel. The rooms were spotless, staff very pleasant and helpful. The hotel is set in a good location, close to places of interest with restuarants and bars close by. I would definately recommend a stay at this hotel.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong

review_body: Excellent. Helpful staff, great location. Tmark Grand Hotel is the best place to stay with your family very convenient to shop and walk around to the garden bridge and see the nice place of myeongdong
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Took 6001 bus from Incheon Airport to Namdaemun Market, bus stops right in front of hotel. To return to airport, just grab 6015 bus opposite the hotel.Short walk to exit 3 of Hoehyeon Station.Namdaemun Market opposite hotel, lots of eateries around.There's a 7-11, newly opened Burger King, and a cafe inside hotel (all at ground floor). Few other 24hours mart around & within walking distance i.e. CU store, Gs25 etc. You can get T-money card easily. A pharmacy behind the hotel. Myeongdong shopping street is about 15-20mins walk; by train, one station from Hoehyeon. Namsan Tower cable car / tunnel is walkable.Room is comfortable, air con is available at night during my stay.The staffs are accommodating and helpful, from their front desk to housekeeping, always ready to help.Got a room with Namsan Tower view, just amazing.I'll be back to Tmark Grand again. Till next time!
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, close to everything. Walk to Myeongdong, Namdaemun and many shops and restaurants. Staff was great helping us with our cabs and luggage. Staff spoke English as well. Nice clean rooms. No complaints here.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My second stay in Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong was as pleasing as my first stay. This time, I booked a family twin room for 4 nights. We were fortunate enough to have given a room with the Namsan view (and of course the N Seoul Tower). The housekeeping were courteous and did their job well. The room was almost spotless despite the towel and the bedding were a little worn. And I loved that there was a window in the room so that I could feel the fresh air and outside temperature. (Perhaps we were lucky, unlike other reviewers' experience, we could adjust the air-con temperature, and there were pencil and notepad in the room.) The receptionists were responsive and efficient. The janitors were busy cleaning the lobby very early every morning. The convenient store on the lobby floor was a plus especially when we needed to top up our T-money cards. The grill house closed down, and is now replaced by a Burger King store.Myeongdong (the shopping malls and many shopsss), Seoul Station (Lotte Mart!) and City Hall are all within 15-minute walk from the hotel. Airport bus 6001 stops right outside the hotel entrance (within 10-second walk). Besides the nearby metro station (Oh right, the elevator at Exit 1 was closed when we headed back at night. Perhaps that at Exit 4 is more reliable), there was also direct bus from Hongik University that stops right outside the hotel.With its central location, I chose not to pre-book the hotel breakfast but enjoyed the various local eateries in Namdaemum Market. There are very nice coffee, chicken soup, fish cake, pig knuckles, noodles, buns, fish pots in the market, not to mention the bewildering array of products available there. If location matters to you, and you prefer less hectic and more local ambiance, this is the right hotel for you.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I don’t usually review hotels during my trip but this hotel is an exception... i cant believe I am actually wasting my time writing it instead of enjoying myself out there. But I believe this is a must!Pros & cons:Pros:* close to Namdaemun* close to shoppingCons:* room temperature! No adjusting... apparently this is only controlled by the building management. They decide how hot or cold you’re room will be. During my stay, it’s 28’ in my room while it’s 27’ outside. Maybe their policy is to just pretty much match whats the temp. Outside...? So basically no room air conditioner. Might as well just open the window. Its cooler that way.* no LOTION! have you ever heard of a 4 star hotel without lotion? And when I ask for it, they seem shock that I need some. They politely send me some but... a small 1oz bottle and that is it! I guess they figure you don’t need lotion since you will be sweating and be pretty moisturized with your own sweat with the heat inside your room due to poor air conditioning.* no face towel, no bar soap! Again have you beed to a hotel with no face towel and bar soap? They give you this liquid soap dispenser but since no towel to use to scrub yourself, you have to use your own hands to lather yourself up!* they advertise they have a swimming pool but get this... you have to pay to get in! Have you ever heard of a 4 star hotel that charges to use the pool? i feel its like those budget airlines... i e saying you get what you paid for... but I thought I paid regular price.* no ethernet cable! They have the sockets in the room but apparently if you don’t have your own cable, you are out of luck! They said they don’t have cable at all... the whole building don’t have cable! Only wireless.* the room is small and dusty!* we booked and paid for a double room. When we checkin, they said their out of it, so they gave us a 2- twin room. I have to sleep in separate bed with my wife! In the next 3 nights! How can this be... then I ask reception if I can be transferred to a double room when its available. She said it is not likely that they will have one. * their bath robes is like 30 year old robes. It looks old!* their in room sleepers are almost made out of paper...* no pen or paper in the room. So if you want to write a love letter or something... you are SOL!I think this is enough for now as my stay is not over yet. Lets see what else can happen.... So if I were you, will you still be staying on this hotel?Like I said in the title... Unbelievable!
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Large hotel, quick check in and out. Great service. Good location with metro station and bus stops just a few steps away. Directly opposite the market. Room was fairly sized but was dark due to the colours and furnishings used.Overall, a nice place to stay.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I always enjoy my time staying in this hotel. The market opposite has lots of shops, restaurant, local food and cafe. Very convenience! I have been staying there more than 10 times. No matter stay there with the other half, with family or friends, all recommended.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is pretty big! There's a 7Eleven and bakery right inside. The staff is professional. The rooms are clean, the beds comfy, and well decorated. The hotel is located in the shopping district so there is a lot you can get to by walking. Tons of great shopping, cafes, and restaurants. Itaewon which is known for nightlife is only a short cab ride away. The aiport bus stops right across the street! It costs 15,000 won. It was super convenient. Make sure to checkout Shinsegue for food options while you're there. My bf and I loved this hotel!
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Best location. Bus stop from and to the airport is right there. Korean food all around no other choice, however Burger King is opening next door 20May!! Wished there was an award program for continuous guest. You wont be disappointed, walking to everything is easy.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for 3 nights with my familiy for travel. I resquested a seoultower view when i check in, the girl named beth?(i can’t remember) approved my request for me to stay. I really appreciate it!! Concierge service YE Kim and Mike always greeted to my family whenever we go out and in. The cafe is also good with a reasonable price so i always bought coffee there. It’s near to the hoehyeon station. The airport bus is dropping off direct to the hotel and pick also up to the incheon airport opposite to the hotel. So it was really convenience staying. if i visit seoul again, i will find here. Thanks.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is right across the street from namdaemong market, right next to the Hoehyeon subway station, walking distance to Seoul Station and Myeongdong.The rooms are decent and at a decent price and has a 7-11 inside it
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros: - Tmark grand Hotel is accessible, conveniently located beside Hoehyeun station and right across from Namdaemun Market. -- bus stops right in front of the hotel and taxis are constantly passing by-- airport express bus stop is also across from the hotel -- friendly, helpful staff. They gave us directions to where we needed to go and even recommendations on local eats! -- clean room, new sheets everyday CONS: -- I was disappointed that access to the pool is only reserved for guests staying on the 18th floor (Executive Level Floor) and it costs 16+ for all of the other guests. This in a city where spas cost less than that. --- it would've been super convenient if guests were offered a flat fee breakfast. Granted the market was only across the street but having breakfast available to guests in the hotel goes a long way. All in all, it was a great experience. Highly recommended!
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Many hotels will have Myeongdong in their name when they are actually not that close. Tmark Grand is a 5-10 min walk from Myeongdong and right across the street from Namdaemun Market so the walk is full of stops and sights anyway. For the price of this hotel, it simply can't be beat. It was very easy to hail a cab from the front of the hotel, the coffee shop downstairs has great coffee to start the day and there is a 7-11 in the lobby that sells all kinds of necessities, including alcohol. Had a great stay with friends for a long weekend!
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Over all was good the only thing that I truly feel bad is the air condition that goes off every nights and I woke up sweating every nights. The breakfast is the same every morning. I would like the food to be changed so we don;t have to eat the same kind of food every morning.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room comfortable and size quite good for two person, very close to the train station, can walk to Myeongdong and Namdaemoon, very close to the bridge to Seoul Station, the bridge have a good view and comfortable to walking
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All staff members were friendly and helpful. The room was clean, comfortable, and modernly designed. The location was also very convenient; there were multiple subway entrances, major shopping centers and multiple markets close by.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just great, very convenient location between Myeongdong & Seoul Station. You can walk, take subway or taxi. Numerous eating places all around, no need to eat at hotel although it is not too expensive too. Eat out and experience the local food. A market is nearly for bargain hunters. Hotel is clean and rooms are good. Staff are friendly and can speak English.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is good. It's just few mins walk from the nearby train station and walkable distance to Myeongdong. Room is spacious enough. There is a big shopping area right opposite to the hotel, and lots of restaurants and convenient stores around. I would definitely come back again :-)
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I thought hotel was nice, clean, friendly and helpful staff, good facilities, but only two items i recommend the hotel add. 1-Firmer pillows in the room, and 2-classic buffet items like, pancakes, waffles!
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room was great for the location and price. Was worried about some of the reviews about aircon issues but my friend and I didn't experience this. Close to all the shopping - Myeongdong and Namdaemun markets. Would definitely stay again if I was to go back to the same area next week. Very easy to get around and it felt safe to walk around at night.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is excellent for the good location and super convenient to travel around Seoul. The subway and bus station is just in front of the hotel. We took airport limousine and reach the hotel doorstep in just 30mins. It is located just in between Myeongdong shopping district and Seoul Station. I had a triple room and it is spacious with a nice view of Namsan tower. We were there during the Spring season however the air condition was not turn on and felt bit stuffy. Good thing is that there is a button to open the side window to allow fresh air to flow in. The staff were friendly and we had no issue in communicating in English with them. I would definitely book in this hotel again when I visit Seoul next time. Strongly recommended.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The concierge (Baek and Kim) were very helpful when the taxi driver forgot to give me back my cellphone after putting the hotel name on his Waze app. The desk officers were courteous. The room bed was very comfy. I wish they have welcome drinks and fruits for the guests.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very clean (beddings were replaced and made and so towels renewed daily).Nice location that central to almost everything and lot of street foods from Namdaemun and Myeongdong market. The hotel is just outside of that just 1 stop from Seoul station or about 15 minutes leisure walking from Seoul station.There is a 7-eleven right inside the hotel so I could get any top up or drinks for late night snacks easily
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Convenient location coming from and going to the airport. Friendly staffs and a very clean hotel. Close to subway and right in front of bus stops. Walking distance to shops and restaurants. Will definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The good points are the location which is fantastic right opposite the Namdaemun Market and a 5 minute walk to the centre of Myeong-dong. The standard of the room is also very good with nice touches like robes. Most hotels I have stayed in allow a slightly earlier check in especially when guests have been travelling for over 15 hours. We were told the hotel was full so this was impossible so we went for a walk for a while. This however clearly wasn’t the case. The staff waited till the clock exactly hit 2pm to check in customers leading to a long queue of guests who could have checked in at 1:30-1:45 etc. It just seemed a bit mean and petty. Secondly the air con didn’t work and the heat in our room was saying 28-29oC during the night. We had to open the window and put cold towels on us! Not really very good as it made it very uncomfortable. If these two issues were solved I would rate a 9/10
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a good experience, staff was friendly and they provided a baby bed. We also had problems with our luggage at the airport and they helped us solving it.It is very well located and the restaurant despite the price was really good.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Love the location, we travel around on the bus every where with a T card, very convenient. The airport bus 6001 from airport stop right outside the hotel. Myeongdong market is very close we go there most night.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The best thing abt this hotel is the location. Subway, airport bus, Seoullo, shopping and food are right at its doorstep. The room is comfortable and spacious. However for my room, there was a bad smell that got progressively worse as the days went by. The walls are thin so you can hear your neighbours quite clearly (and vice versa). There's a bar next to the hotel so at night it can get a little noisy. So it might be gd to request for a room further away fr that side of the hotel if you're particular.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in this hotel for 3 nights. Room was lovely and comfortable. Bed very good and all neat and clean, including toiletries.Breakfast was excellent with both Korean and Western dishes and great variety.Big disappointment, as many others have stated, was excessive heat in the room, (reached 30 Celsius, at one point), and doesn’t allow for any control in the room. When I complained, hotel immediately sent a large fan, which helped a lot. Windows do open, but that makes it noisy.Also had a defective light which kept turning on and off all night. When I told the desk, a technician came immediately and disconnected it. So, all in all, hotel was very nice. Would I stay again? Not unless I was forewarned about the heat and prepared to have a solution.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There's nothing to complain with the room and the facilities. Everything is perfect, but...!First of all, the people from the cold countries must understand those from the hot countries that "We don't want to stay in a warm room, I mean - too warm". The only problem of this hotel is that the temperature in the room is not adjustable according to the guests' requirement. They have a temperature control unit in the room but it does nothing, except turning it on and off. When we first arrived, the temperature outside was about 15°C so the hotel turned on the heater which made the room warmer - too warm. My friend's room temperature went up to almost 30°C!!! The problem was solved by an electric fan!!! By the way, I was told later that the window could be opened and that helped solving all the problem. I just simply left the window opened and turned off the temperature control. That seems to be a minor thing but considering that you paid a lot of money to buy comfort during your trip, this can disturb your mind. The location of the hotel is good and everything else is just perfect!
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel located at great location, easy access to under ground transportation. Feeling safe to walk around even @ late hour.Hotel room need to have updo for better,Breakfast need to have more selection,Best customer & housekeeping services.Love to stay @ Tmark Grand on our next visit Seoul.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel location was great! Airport limousine 6001 from incheon airport reaches the hotel's doorstep (namdaemun stop), and when heading back, just take 6015 from across the street! Nearest metro stop (hoehyeon, line #4 exit 3) is within a stone throw distance, and is connected to major stations like myeongdong, dongdaemun and seoul station within 1-2 stops distance. we stayed for 8 nights and it was really comfortable and clean! room space was good enough for us (2 ladies w lots of shopping, opps) to open up both our luggages yet still have space to move around! there's a nearby CU (after exiting from metro station), as well as a 7-11 right below the hotel where you can get drinks and snacks etc too. would gladly come back to stay again, next time we visit S.Korea~
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ideally located, good service, very comfortable furniture. Taxi, metro station was very easily reachable. There were a number of restaurants and cafe at the hotel. Breakfast was very delicious with local and European dishes. Room was cleaned every day. The only problem that I've noticed was heating system - despite my efforts I failed to adjust proper room temperature - all the time it was below 23 C, when I asked to help, they brought portable heater to my room and it helped.
hotelName:
18    Tmark Grand Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were impressed and would stay there again. Neat and clean, helpful staff, very central location for shopping, street food and transport for airport bus and city trains. A Michelin star restaurant just across the road from the hotel door.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Right in the heart of Myeongdong and easily accessible via the airport limousine bus no. 6015 then a 150metre easy walk. Stayed 4 nights in a twin room.... comfortable double beds, plenty of pillows the best hot water shower... lovely bathroom products and a great electric toilet for a laugh! Staff very helpful and friendly. Just avoid the breakfast... very ordinary for the money!
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed three nights in Solaria Hotel. Excellent location in Myeong Dong in the midst of all the shopping and food. Very near airport bus transfer as well. Staff was friendly and approachable during check in. Room was clean and had humidifier. Love it that they have water refill stations on every floor. Will definitely stay here again on my next visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I’ve been here three times over the past few years and have always loved the hotel- great location next to airport bus transfer and train, right in the middle of myeongdong shopping district - great service. I couldn’t find my tv remote on checking in and the staff came to my room within 5 mins to check and pass me a new one- super clean and spacious- self heating toilet seat with bathtub and shower - fabric deodorant and humidifier in each roomHighly recommended
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have made friends with the electric toilet. Every time I need the loo I simply walk past, and it lifts the lid and says hi. Then when I'm done, I walk away (to wash my hands) and my friend, the electric toilet will flush itself and close the seat cover. I drink gallons of water just to have this experience cos it's so amazing! And the seat is warm!!! Everytime I brace myself to sit on a cold seat but it's never cold!OK enough about the wonderful electric toilet. Let's start with the location. Smack bang in the middle of Myeongdong - it simply cannot get any better than this. There are so many, like, ridiculously many places to eat, drink and shop at within 5 metres of the hotel, it's really ridiculous. Also, the room itself is clean, the bathroom so new (the silver goods are sparkling, I don't know how they maintain it so I guess it's all brand new) and the bed so comfy. They provide 2 bottles of water daily, the TV shows superb (I love Korean TV but they have English channels too) and most importantly, it just felt so so good to come back to every time! Would definitely recommend, and I would love to return one day. Oh and my husband mentioned it was our anniversary, so upon check in the staff handed us a bag of goodies!!! And they gave us early check in! Seriously wonderful service wonderful hotel!
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location for shopping. Just below the hotel you can find great cosmetics shops and about everything you need. Restaurants and coffee shops around the area as well. The hotel is also nearby the train station.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located very near the centre of Seoul. It takes just 10 minutes to go the centre. The room is super clean. Moreover, the receptionist and the cleaning staff are very nice and friendly. I had great time in this hotel.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Last minute booking for the hotel. Never tried or stay in this hotel. Location in Myeongdong. Super convenient. Was impressed with the beautiful lobby. Staffs are very friendly. Rooms are big enough and there are 2 arm chairs in the room too. Toilet and bathroom are separate so it’s very good. Room is clean. Overall, I am very satisfied with the hotel. Breakfast was good although varieties aren’t wide as compared to the bigger hotels.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a great place for shoppers as its located right in the heart of Myeongdong. Opposite the main entrance you will find the famous Myeongdong Kyoja Restaurant (famous for its dumplings and noodles) and lots of shops selling beauty products, jewelry, clothing, snacks and street food (from late evening to late night), cafes and etc. The hotel staff are very friendly, helpful and they can converse in English which was great for us.The buffet breakfast was nice, though maybe lacking on variety but it was still nice and tasty. Our rooms were very clean and also spacious to fit 3 of us and our luggage as well. It is very near to Exit 8 of the Myeongdong Station, just about 5mins walk from exit 8. Generally I would say all the staff from front desk to the housekeepers have very good customer service and also smiling when approached. I would definitely recommend to try this hotel. Do take note that the hotel is located on a pedestrian street so vehicles are not allowed to enter from 10am to 11pm.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room is nice, clean and comfortable but a little bit small. Location is very convenient as it is located at the heart of myeongdong.The hotel staff is also very helpful and friendly. Will stay in this hotel again.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in this hotel for 4 days 3 nights over December. Room was small but functional. I liked the separate toilet and bathroom and considering the smallish size, I was impressed with the deep bath tub they had in the bathroom space. The shower area was also a good size. I was especially pleased that I did not have small little tubes of conditioner or shampoo that I had to squeeze from, instead the hotel provided decent bottles of shampoo, conditioner and body wash which were refilled regularly. The bath towels were a little thin but the bed was comfortable and there were enough pillows. But the big plus must surely be the wonderful location. Situated within 7 min walk to the train station, the area comes alive at night with food stalls that sold everything from twisted potatoes to beef rice to lobster on a stick. The night life was vibrant with food stalls as well as shopping stores which sold SGD1 socks to SGD10 backpacks. The location was really a big plus for a newbie to Seoul as I was surrounded by food and shopping and convenience.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Situated in the heart of the shopping district of Myeong Dong, just 5 minutes walk away from the nearest metro station. Stayed for 7 nights and enjoyed every single bit. Room was spacious and comfy, being on the 13th floor, our room has a fantastic view facing the Cathedral. Breathtaking when you get to see it snowing in the morning.Amenities are everywhere, you have tons of convinience stores everywhere, a mini supermarket nearby, lots of korean eatery around and at night, street stalls are open selling scrumptious korean street food.There is an ice machine on our floor so getting our drinks chill is not a problem at all. The machine doubles up as a hot/cold water dispenser so drinking water is not a worry.Truly enjoyed our stay, highly recommended and definitely will revisit next time we head to Myeong Dong.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nearly everything met our expectation1. location was walking distance to train, shopping, eating areas, etc2. Hotel had a bathtub (ideal for those who need bath instead of shower)3. Nearly everything that you need, they have thought of and provided.4. Separate automated toilet from the bath (definite plus for twin or triple room)However, there are 5 things that would have made this hotel stay perfect1. Newer bath towels. The towels looked and felt quite worn. Especially after the nice bath, you want a nice bath towel to dry. Hotel should review their towel replacement cycle.2. The rooms are fairly small. Hence, it is ideal for travelers with smaller bags or single user in room. For twin or triple, it might get a little tight. Should have booked bigger premium rooms for triple share.3. Hotel should have warned us about no access by car from 10 am - 11 pm everyday. This means that if you are not a light traveler, you will have to drop off somewhere near and walk with all your stuff to the hotel. For those intending to take the train and walking there, this is ideal.4. Static electricity - you will get a shock if you tap on the door lock with your card immediately. You might want to touch the door to earth yourself before unlocking with key card.5. Buffet Breakfast - most of the time, you will not be bothered by this since there are so many eateries around the hotel. However, if you do not want the hassle of going out for breakfast, the breakfast was fairly poor for KRW22,000. For this price range, a better variety to accommodate the different travelers choice of menu. Hotel should review either the variety or the price.I think point number 3 should have been highlighted earlier so that travelers coming by car would not be surprised and have a negative first impression trying to find the hotel while lugging the bags.Overall, I think I had a bad first impression because of hunting for the hotel after a long day. Arriving to static electricity when first unlocking the door and finding the room small for my luggage. But at least, there was enough positive during the stay at the hotel to recover from the negative impression. I believe if the 5 points were taken care of through some improvement and managing of expectation, the stay at this hotel would be perfect.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: One of my favorite hotels in Seoul. Unbeatable, convenient location. Close to shops & eateries. Good room size. User-friendly room setup - table & chairs, mirror, luggage stool, spacious bathroom, separate toilet. Bright view (higher floor).
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very modern interiors. Clean and awesome room. Little small in size. Comfortable beds. Very good amenities. Located at the heart of myeongdong walking street. Plenty of restaurants around to eat. I would recommend this hotel. Till now my best choice in Seoul.
hotelName:
19    Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Seoul Myeong-dong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed here for 8 nights and it had been quite a wonderful stay.The location had been ideal since it was located right in the middle of Myeongdong and it was easy to go around shopping in the area.
