One way is to take the KAL airport limousine bus 6701 (16,000 KRW one way) that stops opposite the hotel amongst several other stops. You then have to drag your luggage down the stairs into the underpass that's loated to the right of the bus stop and then up the stairs again. Upon exiting the underpass on the other side of the road, Aloft Myeongdong hotel is just to your right. You could also walk a few metres to the left of the bus stop and take the underpass that houses the Myeongdong Underground Shopping Centre. Another way is to take the taxi (about KRW 85,000 depending on traffic conditions) or private chauffeured services. As for going back to Seoul Incheon Airport, I purchased the KAL airport ticket from the hotel reception (who will give you the time table) and took the KAL airport limousine bus at 5:54am (bus was only quarter full) from the same bus stop opposite the hotel that drops passengers from the airport (journey took about 70 minutes). Alternatively, if you don’t want to drag the luggage down and up the underpass, you could also walk about 5 minutes to the Ibis Ambassador Seoul Myeongdong Hotel (same side of the road as Aloft Myeongdong) and then take the 6015 limousine bus to Incheon Airport (one way ticket costs KRW 15,000).Hotel staff: For me, the helpful and friendly staff really stands out. After I booked the hotel on the internet (as a SPG member), the Front Office staff (Rachel, Selina, Ann) promptly replied to all my queries on the transportation from the hotel to Incheon airport. On that check-in day, as I stepped into the arrival lobby on the ground floor in the early morning, I was greeted by a friendly lady staff who checked me into the system and placed my luggage bag in a secure area. When I came back after my tour in the evening, I went to the circular reception desk on the second level where another smiling and friendly lady English-speaking receptionist at the Front Office welcomed me and formally checked me into the hotel. She was also helpful in my purchase of the KAL limousine bus ticket from the hotel, the timetable for bus departure and the directions to take the bus.Hotel room: When I stepped into the modern Aloft Studio Room, I could see that everything is maintained so well (that it could be mistaken to be a new room even though the hotel opened in 2017) and very clean. While the bedroom is compact but the creamy white walls makes the room appear more spacious than it is. The bedroom comes with 2 single beds and the usual amenities - a wall-mounted LCD TV, safe, iron, ironing board, sandals, kettle, tea and coffee making facility etc. The bathroom does not have a bathtub but it has toiletries and a hair dryer that’s placed in a bag that’s marked “Hair Dryer”. I liked the colourful designs on the wall “painting”, the curtains, the carpet and the bolsters (yes, this is the first hotel that I stayed that has bolsters). I also enjoyed a good night’s sleep due to the comfortable bed and the good sound insulation from neighbouring rooms as well as from the Namdaemun Road that my room faces. The Wi-Fi speed is fast too. While the workstation desk, luggage storage platform and a sofa are all arranged in a straight row next to the floor-to-ceiling window, the size of the sofa and the workstation desk are too small. Hotel restaurant: As I have to catch at 5:54am KAL limousine bus next morning, I did not eat the breakfast at the Nook restaurant.Overall, I had a pleasant stay in this hotel with its excellent location and easy reach via bus from the Incheon airport. It now opens up another competitive choice to the IHG hotel that I usually stay when I visit cosmopolitan Seoul.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just came from a week stay at the Aloft Seoul Myeongdong and the hotel exceeded all my expectations.From the location, to the rooms, the meals and most importantly the staff were A+++A special thanks to Jessica and Rosie in the W XYZ Bar for making the stay even better!I would highly reccomend this hotel to anyone going to Seoul!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Aloft Seoul Myeongdong. The location is premium. The Myeondong alley shopping and street food along with premium stores and restaurants are only about a 5 minute walk. The subway stop is even closer. The airport limo bus stop is also a convenient 5 minute walk. GIMPO to Myeongdong by airport limo bus is only 7k Won/person while Myeongdong to Incheon is only 15k Won/person. There were plenty of available seats to and from the hotel. Note that ICN terminal 1 is a long ride from ICN terminal 2. Don't be alarmed. Just make sure you know at which terminal you need to be.The hotel room is excellent. Before getting to the hotel, I tried to upgrade because I realized the square footage is smaller than our hotel in Kyoto and we thought that was tight. Aloft was fully booked so couldn't. I was pleasantly surprised that the room was well planned and provided more walk space than our Kyoto hotel, feedback I mentioned on my Kyoto hotel review. Aloft also has high ceilings. The room is well-appointed with light switches on both sides of the bed. The bed itself and pillows were nice and comfortable. The bathroom is modern with American Standard toilet and sink. The hotel provided nice toiletries. Staff was pleasant at the front desk who checked us in efficiently and helped me find a good spa for myself and my husband, at breakfast where we were accommodated an extra 30 minutes when we arrived just as breakfast was ending, and the concierge who helped us find a good BBQ restaurant on our first night in Seoul. Housekeeping competently cleaned our room and made our bed regardless of the time we left the room. The hotel has an electronic DO NOT DISTURB sign, which is convenient for housekeeping I imagine. They were also pleasant when we passed them on the hallway. There are only 2 elevators for 21 floors. I did not mind it because even when we waited sometimes, it didn't take that long. In addition, the elevators were programmed to apologize for the wait. That's a nice touch.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is centrally located to all the shopping and food trips you can do in Myeongdong. The rooms are impeccably clean and spacious. Just a comment on the customer service though. Just two days ago, on a Friday afternoon I asked the receptionist for help in getting a taxi going to Gwanghwamun, since the Kakao Taxi app I downloaded couldn't find a taxi for me. The response of the receptionist was, if I couldn't find a taxi thru the Kakao Taxi app, she also couldn't find a taxi for me since she also use the same app and she suggested that I just walk. It is a very peculiar response which I didn't expect coming from the hotel, to not offer any assistance at all. Then I asked her about the feature in Kakao Taxi app which would require a local Korean number, if that might help in getting a taxi, and if she can help me with that, her response is the same and it seems that she is not willing to help at all. She suggested that I should just wait outside the hotel and flag a taxi... at that point it was getting to be on my nerves at how unhelpful she is. So I shrugged this off. The following day, I asked again about the fastest way to get to Gangnam and again, there was no good answer except that I should just call a taxi on my own. It is really quite surprising that the great hotel from Marriott would deliver such appalling service. It made me more than a little bit disapppointed considering that the hotel has such high standards in everything else. Would appreciate if the receptionists are better trained to handle similar concerns like mine and I'm sure there would be other guests who would need the same help.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Title says it all. Couldn't have found a better location, right next to the Myeongdong area. Staff and rooms were great. Breakfast was actually very decent, and overall we had a great stay. Walk in any direction and you'll find stuff to do. No complains really about our stay.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The best thing about Aloft is it’s great location. Lotte and Sinsegae are just located opposite and the famous Myeong-dong shopping area is around the corner. The staff are friendly, helpful and polite. The rooms are clean and of decent size. The bathroom amenities are good and the best feature of the bathroom must be it’s automatic toilet using the brand American Standard. I also like that the room has plenty of plug connections and usb chargers. The only downside is that there is only 2 lifts for 20 floors which sometimes could take awhile to wait for the lifts.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here in the first 10 days of April, ‘19 with my wife and daughter. The hotel gave me a very warm welcome by very courteous and helpful staff. They went out of their way to make me feel comfortable. They were also helpful in recommending places to visit in Seoul. The hotel is modern and well designed. It’s location is perfect and central to most iconic places that one would want to visit. Highly recommended.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in a great location close to subway station shopping restaurants and markets. The staff a very friendly and helpful. The amenities are good and the room is extremely clean and comfortable.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 地點座落明洞，很方便走五分鐘都沒有就到癬大使館。但請注意地鐵站附近沒有升降機,拿著大行李的話要好好規劃路線。前台經理ms.Eille為我們提供了一個很好的登記入住體驗！負責我們樓層（14樓）的房務女士帶著親切笑容，溫暖的問候我們。如果我們下次旅行，我們將再次選擇這家酒店!!感謝您照顧我們。下次見！Good location in Myeongdong! Just Be care that no lift nearby the subway station. Front desk manager ms.Eille provides a good check-in service to us(Thx for upgrading us)!Housekeeping lady who in charge our floor(14/F) have great smile with warm greeting. If we travel next time,we will choose this hotel again!!Thank you for take care of us.See you next time!!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for Seoul marathon.It was not so close to the start point but the location was so convenient! Anything can be done around the hotel.There are many restaurants and Shinsegae department store is right in front.And room and service are all nice.Will stay there again!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I originally booked the Urban King room for a 5-night stay, but had to extend one more night due to a minor change in our travel itinerary. The front desk staff was kind enough to help us keep the room that we were staying at (it was supposedly booked by another guest on our original check-out date).The room was clean and cozy, bathroom was kept tidy and the water pressure was strong. It was also stocked with CO Bigelow Apothecary products which we got to enjoy! The sheets and the pillows were pristine and the AC unit worked perfectly.Room Service, on the other hand, needed more selection of breakfast food. Nonetheless, we enjoyed big servings of food (each serving is good for 2!) everytime we ordered.The hotel's location was great, a few steps away from Myeongdong Shopping Street, a 10-15min walk to Myeongdong Station and a 20-25min walk to Namsan Cable Car boarding station (N Seoul Tower). Very close to 2 main department stores and several convenience stores. It is best to board the Airport bus no. 6015 to/from the airport since the bus stop is just a few blocks away from the hotel. It was a great stay, overall and we would definitely book this hotel again when we return to Seoul.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros: Stayed for 4nights recently and room has been good. Location is literally next to the Myeongdong shopping street (turn right as you exit the lobby), walk less than 5mins and you're at the shopping area already.Across the street, there's Lotte Young Plaza & other shopping centres. In terms of shopping, you'll be spoilt for choices.Cons:Ordered Samgyaetang on one of the evenings and it was a real disappointment. No taste of ginseng at all and doesn't taste that great. Not cheap at 25,000krw. Better off, going out to grab the street food.Breakfast was nothing to shout about. The standard fare and the same thing for the few days I was there.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at the property for a night. Check in process was seamless and quick. Rooms were well decorated and modern. Staff go out of their way to help. When I asked for a car to the airport at 5:00am, the person behind the check-in desk helped me first check out and then walked me down to the car and made sure she communicated where I was going to the driver. Further, she didn't leave until the car drove away and also offered to help with the luggage (which I refused of course)..
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: YES! Finally I ended up at a hotel which gave me a great hotel experience again, been a while since last time.Checking in was a pleasure. The room was not prepared so I was asked to wait for 5 minutes. They had reserved a high floor room with a nice view, that's why I was asked to wait for some minutes. A free drink in the bar was offered in the meantime. So to Linda at the front desk, great welcome and first impression, thanks !!The room for sure had a nice view. And it was pretty big as well. Clean and nice, top quality all the way. The batroom has a bathtub as well as a separate toilet and shower.Breakfast was also very nice with a big variety of food. And very friendly staff.The hotel is located in the center of the Myeongdong area with lots of shopping, restaurants and sight seeing spots close by. Also check out the shopping markets in the undergrounds, lots of nice and cheap shops there.I am very happy that I picked this hotel. Excellent and friendly staff, excellent location and excellent value for money. Highly recommended !!!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at Aloft Myeongdong on 14 Jan for 2 night. Selina in Front desk very polite. She was so kind and know i am tired for the overnight flight, outside is so cold as well. She arrange me early check in and let me take the rest. Great location for shopping as well. Aloft staff were amazing, my partner birthday is coming on 16 Jan. The staff was so nice and super cute to draw the wording on the mirror. Really surprise us for the service. I hope that is not too late to send you guys the comment. Busy on work and the Chinese New Year. Wish you guys all the best and definitely will choose Aloft again in future.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed several times with this property and definitely one of the best Aloft! Great platinum recognition and efficient FO staff. I think the management did something right. A few steps away from Myeongdong main shopping area and there is a gym on 3F (They should mention in the elevator if possible). Rooms are a bit small but bright and comfy. Recommend for couple and solo travelers.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in the Breezy suite again and this time everything went smoothly in comparison. From my last visit i thought i would never stay at Aloft again but Danny convinced me to give them a chance to redeem themselves, and he and his team far outdid themselves. From the airport till check out everything went smoothly, dare i say better than smooth it went perfectly.I thank Danny and Elle for helping me throughout my stay and making sure it was a perfect one.The staff have improved in experience dramatically since i first visited, when it had just opened, they were very helpful and always willing to help, the concierge was great at helping me getting to my meetings with various companies by writing the address in Korean as Taxi's find it much more convenient. The main reason i love this hotel same as last time is the location, you can't go wrong, there is shopping, street food, cosmetics, department stores everything you could want all within 5 min walk, taxis are easy to get as it is on a main street. You have two metros within 5-10 min walking distance. Thank you again Danny for everything and i will surely be visiting your property again for my next trip to Seoul.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A great hotel with a great location. The service is impeccable. I was so well taken care of during my stay. The buffet breakfast was with good selections. I enjoyed the freshly cooked eggs and the Vietnamese noodles!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've been staying at the Aloft Myeongdong a few times a year since it opened, and it has always been a great stay. The location is great, the rooms are clean and compared to similar level properties in the area, this hotel is by far the best. The level of service is where this hotel truly outperforms the rest. From managers, front desk team, concierge, housekeeping, in-room dining and etc, all areas of service at this property is exceptional. Among other higher tier brands in the area I would still highly recommend this property
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I travel frequently and try to stay at the SPG/Marriott properties when I do. Highly recommended this hotel among the SPG properties in Seoul. The hotel's location is right in the middle of Seoul, conveniently located near the central shopping area Myeongdong. The hotel has the key essentials of what I look for in business travel. The staff has been friendly led by another friendly staff, Elle Lee of the front office. They were also very accessible across my several stays. Rooms are quite new and clean. Overall, I've found the rates to be attractive for the value proposition.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Aloft Seoul Myeongdong never fails to impress me upon my return visit to this Starwood property 1 year later. Check-in was a breeze and the room is exceptionally clean. What I love about this hotel is the location as it is extremely near to the main shopping streets in Myeongdong. I would also like to commend Jen and the front desk staff for their outstanding service. Additionally, the Metro is only less than 5 minutes away! I would highly recommend visitors to Seoul to consider Aloft Seoul Myeongdong if you are looking at staying close to Myeongdong.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my 2nd stay since the hotel's opening in February 2017. The hotel is situated very conveniently in Myeongdong. Myeongdong Shopping Street is right next to the hotel, Shinsegae and Lotte Department Stores are across the road and Myeongdong subway station is a 5 minute walk away. Service from the staff is impeccable and they take note of your Marriott/SPG status. I've been upgraded on both stays.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located near Seoul Metro line no. 2 and 4. There is a airport bus stop near by within 5 minutes walk, which is extremely convenient. There is Myeong-dong night market nearby. The staff are very nice and helpful in answering our questions. The buffet was quiet good. We had a nice experience in these three days. Thank you very much. During the trip, we wished to celebrate my son’s birthday. The decorations were very attractive and gave us a surprise with birthday gifts. They said happy birthday and hoped us to have a nice journey. On the last day, the staff helped us to call for a Jumbo taxi as we had three luggages. They assisted us to put the luggages into the taxi. They were really helpful. It is a wonderful hotel and highly recommended to visitors in Seoul.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel. The hotel is centrally located at the shopping Mecca of Seoul. Walking distance To branded stores like Louis Vuitton, Gucci, Burberry, Hermès, duty free etc to fake goods :) and also all kinds of restaurant and streets foods are only 1 block away. The breakfast buffet was also amazing. Their soups were so good. Different kind of breads. The customer service was also amazing.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 4 nights during the cold winter. Very startegic location, in the heart of myeongdong, easy to find good restaurant, shops and cafe. The hotel is clean, service was good its just the breakfast is so-so with the amount we paid. And they have camping tent for the kids, they loved it
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 6 nights at the Aloft Mengdong, the overall comment for the hotel was excellent and the front-desk team performance was beyond our expectation! We checked in late on the first night and unfortunately encountered the system error that the rooms were fully booked. In less than 3 minutes the Aloft reception gave us a quick and satisfying solution, which helped us settled down in another hotel nearby shortly. It was rather amazing that the Aloft Assistant Front Office Manager, Elle,a nice lady, accompanied us all the way back to Aloft the next morning and expressed sincere apology for the inconvenience caused. We had encountered similar situations before but never had thought that the Aloft would be so concerned and would handle so well. No doubt that the rest of our tour was very much inspired. Not even need to mention the hotel facilities - well equipped, fully prepared for our needs and enables us to have lovely city views.What impressed us most was their excellent hotel service even though it was our first visit to this hotel, and sure enough that there will be more and more visits after because of the charming smiles and remarkable efforts depict from every Aloft staff.Five starts are definitely undeniable for the rewards of Aloft Meyongdong!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed 6 nites on high floor, facing road could hear noise at nite. Room not sound proof could hear passing by guests' noise.Small room but comfortable, except lack of space to put things, cupboard is quite small since we have thick clothing need more hangers to be more organised. Guess short stay 2-3 days ok, but longer stay the whole room became crowded with own belongings & shopping bags etc... Location is convenient to subway Euljiro 1 station, Myeongdong & airport shuttle bus stop. But need to wait for longer time for lift as there is only 2 lifts! so need to be patient, make sure u don't forget anything before step out room else waiting for another round of lift can test your patient...Didnt really feel the hospitality of hotel staffs, came back with shopping bags on both hands, but no one help open hotel door :( & where's the greetings? When checking on how to go to a place, staff print a small map with exit no. without further instruction on how to walk from station to the place. Since we first time visit the place, clearer direction would be much appreciated as we don't want to waste time on finding the way as limited time to spend before leave for airport.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's the 3rd visit to Seoul this year, and stayed there 3 times. You can't beat the location of the hotel - walking distance to Myeondong, the shopping and food area, as well as train stations to other places. Service is ever so friendly and helpful. Rooms are well appointed and comfortable. And the best of all, rates are reasonable. There's no reason not to choose this hotel!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Aloft Seoul Myeongdong was very conveniently located near the Seoul Metro subway as well as the famous Myeongdong shopping street which was only a 2-min walk. There were plenty of eating and shopping and everywhere was easy access. The hotel itself was very new and modern. Rooms were big and spacious as well. Bedsheets were clean and the bed was very comfortable. Staff was always courteous and willing to help and most of them spoke English. We had a good stay at Aloft and will definitely come back again.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a great time staying here. Location was good and nearby to all the shopping area. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Train station is just 2 mins away. Definitely a good hotel to stay in Myeongdong area.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is a stone throw away from the busy street of Meongdong but offers a quiter area if you like to take a little retreat. Hotel is fairly new, clean and modern. Good Service as well. You can loop the Myeongdong area and end up in another exit and still be close to the hotel.It is also near a subway terminal and a good short walk to the base of the Seoul Tower.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Travelled with my family for our first visit to Seoul. So glad that I made Aloft Seoul Myeondong as my home for 5 days/4 nightsAs a Marriot/SPG Platinum Premier Elite with Ambassador status, I have stayed at numerous Marriott (SPG) brand hotels and am impressed with the high hospitality standard of this hotel. Aloft Myeondong is absolutely a fabulous hotel and well beyond my expectation.Excellent location for visiting Myeongdong area and Seoul. Walking distance to EVERYThing you want to eat/buy/experience.Conveniently located next to major subway lines, I use it as a base for day trip around Seoul.Starting from arriving at the lobby - Helpful bell desk and front desk. Smooth check in process by Daniel and greeted by Elle Minhee personally. I had a room at high floor overseeing beautiful Xmas lighting from across. Luckily, I got offer an upgrade to a bigger suite starting on my 3rd day. Not ideal moving room in between my stay but hey, it’s an upgrade to suite! Excellent housekeeping staff: keep my room fresh and tidy every day!Restaurant wait staffs: all helpful and friendly. And also the cook makes good noodle and eggs!Tip: Be patient with elevators during peak hours, there could be a short wait :) there’s another elevator going just between lobby, concierge floor/road exit and restaurant. Use it accordingly.Tip: Breakfast: Try it! Good Varieties from pastries, hot food items, made to order omelets/eggs and even noodle soup! And don’t forget fruits (sweetest grape and kiwi!), juices and coffee/cappuccino. it's that good.Tip: Convenience Store around the corner and a Starbucks, not my cup of 'tea' but wife wants a Soy Milk Latte every morning so that’s perfect location. Most important Tip: Chat with Concierge! Do yourself a favor, ask for local good eats restaurants, shopping spots, anything you want to know about Seoul. (Thanks Daniel :) My daughters said she would come back to visit just because of your hospitality , ok.. I would tag along too :)
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is very good location hotel for everyone, and my reservation was upgraded by friendly staff. They are very focus on every detail when we stay. Not only service on clearing work but also greeting are very professional. I wii make a reservation again for next Seoul trip.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I went on a trip to Seoul for travel. This hotel has a close distance away from the shopping area. The service of this hotel is great and it is value for money.I would recommend to anyone who doesnt want to spend a lot of money but would like to stay in Seoul for travel.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel location is very convenience, all staffs were very nice, especially housekeepers on the 7 floor (sorry, I didn’t ask for her name.) she was very mannered and polite. And special thanks to Ms.Elle Lee AFOM, for very warm welcoming, hope to stay here again next time!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in a Breezy Suite on our visit to Seoul during 19-24 October. The suite was very new, clean, spacious and had a separate living room which was nice. It even had a walk-in closet that was sizable enough for us to easily keep our two luggages and two carry-on bags. The bed was very comfortable and the pillows were just perfect for my liking. The bathroom was spacious and the towels were nice and thick. We booked a bed and breakfast package, and were not disappointed with the quality of the food. Although not as many selections as you would find in a typical hotel breakfast buffet, it was good enough for us. The biggest downside was that this hotel did not have bell services, so you had to carry your own bags up to your room. It would be fine if you do not have too many suitcases, but could be a problem for guests with many bags or for the elders who many not be fit enough to carry their own bags. Another downside was that the bedroom glass windows were very thin, meaning you could hear very clearly the sound of cars and activities outside the hotel. I had some trouble sleeping on some nights due to this noise. If you are sensitive to this or are a difficult sleeper, beware. Location was hard to beat, literally five minutes from the main shopping street in Myeongdong. Overall we had a good stay and would rate this hotel as good value for money.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at Aloft Seoul Myeongdong again. This is my fourth stay at this hotel and the hotel still feels brand new although it's more than 1 year old now. Check in was smooth and the assistant front desk manager Elle greeted me warmly and gave me an upgrade to a suite with my SPG Platinum Ambassador status. It was really a big surprise as I've never got a suite upgrade in any of the 20+ Aloft I've stayed over all these years. The suite is not huge but cozy enough to make the stay more special. Location is unbeatable as it's right in the heart of Myeongdong. Food are everywhere within 5 minutes walking. Would definitely stay here again. Special thanks to Elle who patiently answered all my questions and offering me a suite upgrade.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Special shoutout to Erica, who was very helpful. She promptly mailed out my son's driver's license when he left it in his room. great staff, clean hotel, nice amenities, and prime location! thumbs up!
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about this hotel was perfect! The rooms were spotless and the bed and pillows were so comfortable. The staff were all very accommodating and helpful in anyway they could be. Breakfast was included, and we found it to be quite good with a good variety of Western and Asian foods. We loved the location. All in all it was a very good value, and perfect for our 4 nights’ stay in Seoul.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was my 4th trip to Seoul and my second time staying in Myeongdong. The Urban room was generously sized, spotless and quiet. The staff are friendly and efficient, checking in and out took us less than 5mins! The hotel is located along the main thoroughfare and conveniently located between 2 subway lines, which allowed us to get around more efficiently, without too many change of lines. Many food options are available within walking distance - restaurants, cafes, foodcourts. The conceirge was patient and helpful and their friendly greetings make us feel welcome whenever we return to the hotel. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and we look forward to staying again.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are spacious, modern and comfortable. The staff is friendly and helpful. Elle Lee, the front office manager was gracious and really made us feel welcome. The breakfast service is the best we encountered during our Korean trip. We really enjoyed staying at the Aloft and the location is just perfect, in the heart of the Myeongdong shopping area.We will definitely stay there again on our next visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were originally consider another Marriott/SPG chain hotel just few blocks away. However Aloft was only half price of another hotel, we decided to give it a try. It turned out Aloft was really great.The check in was easy on the 2nd floor. When we checked in, the hotel was already assigned our room and met our request to provide a high floor. As a platinum member, we got free breakfast which was good. The breakfast was probably not as fancy as other bigger hotels, but there were plenty of food.The room was new. The best was the location very close to the night market but not too close to get bothered by the crowd.There is an airport bus with a stop across the street from the hotel which is convenient. The bus driver is really on time on every stop. If the bus is early, the bus driver will still wait until the time to leave. Sometimes each stops waiting time is quite long though. It means you will never get to the airpot early due to less traffic. You will be alway either on time or late by taking the bus.
hotelName:
21    Aloft Seoul Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very helpful and kind staff. Food was great in the lounge. Sauna was kinda small but well maintained. The only desired was that the swimming pool was closed at 6pm for the bbq party. I really wanted to enjoy jacuzzi in the evening. Other than that, I would highly recommend and come back for the next trip.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Returning to Seoul after 15 years I took a nostalgic tour around where I lived and some of the sites including the every green "Grand Hyatt" which continues to sparkle.With so many new and fantastic buildings and hotels constantly opening the Grand Hyatt remains "grand" up on the hill towards the peak of Namsan and overlooking greater Seoul. Beautiful tree lined drive in to the great front and opening to the expansive and impressive lobby lounge where it would be a pleasure to sit all day.Terrific restaurants, shops and of course Hyatt service at its best.Still a world class hotel
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good hotel. I does not matter on what side your room is. The view is nice. At night a band plays in the lobby music. I the lounge you have a awesome view on the city Seoul. The rooms are a little bit small, but well equipped and clean.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the moment I stepped into the grand lobby I was treated like royalty...or at least like a very valued guest. The room and the view exceeded my expectations. The service, quality and selection of food at the Grand Club exceeded my expectations. I had a fabulous weekend at this property. I’m going back...soon.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It seems there's construction. stay away from any noise room. But the overall quality is really good. there are inside and outside pools. many choices of restaurants. The vicinity area is quiet and good for looking around.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you don't mind the location being away from the hustle and bustle of the city, Grand Hyatt Seoul is the place to be. Perched up on the hills, it offers great view and charm that will impress any discerning traveler. Food is fantastic and so are the hotel facilities.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was my first visit to Grand Hyatt Seoul.The location is great and convenient to night life as well as the business district. The rooms size is big enough with coffee set and iron set. The room is in perfect condition,perfectly clean, choice of pillows and very convenient control system. gym bar, full breakfast and pool make the stay convenient and with excellent value for money.I will defiantly return to Grand Hyatt Seoul again as my choice
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I must admit our staycation at Grand Hyatt Seoul was enjoyable. The weather was perfect for a day at the outdoor pool with the family. The only downside was the fact that we were given the room adjacent to the elevator shafts and the noise kept me up all night the first night. When I requested for another room the next day, they were nice enough to switch us to a quieter room while we spent the day poolside. While the experience was good, I wouldn’t go as far as the value exceeded the price.Breakfast buffet was fairly decent as well... but, once again, comes at a hefty premium.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: wonderfull journey in korea awesome hotel with very professional staff good connection to the airport and itaweon streetcame here twice on a business trip and willing to come back asaptrully recommend
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Grand Hyatt Itaewon is such a magical place. It reminds me of living in a secret garden. I have come to Korea 6 times in the past few years and have always stayed at this hotel. It has been such a joy and I would highly recommend this hotel!
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This trip ended up being better than expected. Our only regret was that we did not go to the DMZ. We did most of the other tourist attractions in Seoul. Be prepared to shop until you drop . My biggest joy was having my daughter and her friends at the fish market choosing their dinner for the night out of fish t And then having it excellently prepared and a restaurant on site.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have you ever imagine staying in a flooded room for a few hours and the hotel insist to charge you a full night?Can you imagine the Front Desk Manager saying to you "If you don't like the room, I'll have to ask you to leave"?Well, when you say "this hotel is so cheap" and the Front Desk Manager can reply "you can say so", this is absolutely unique for Grand Hyatt Seoul!
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was very glad with my stay at this hotel ! The room was great, the night view was amazing, the staff was very competent and friendly. I highly recommend this hotel and I, personally, will come back without hesitation.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: just finished renovation. nice breakfast and outdoor pool. room condition has been improved comparing to my last visit and river view room was still great.most of hotel staffs were also kind and nice. overally satisfied
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We just spent 5 days at the Grand Hyatt Seoul and it was a truly excellent week! After work we enjoyed the facilities, food and hospitality of the staff. The entertainment on the main floor and JJ Mahoneys was superb. The views were spectacular. Out door pool is a true secret in Seoul. Can' wait until the next trip!
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you want to spoil yourself then book this hotel. The breakfast is over priced for sure but the views are spectacular. The spa is 5 star as the staff physically and mentally take you on a journey to wellbeing bliss. Lots of spa ceremony which i love. Recommend using the Sauna facilities seperate to the Spa. The plunge pull is a brave but worthwhile choice. And you must experinece the traditional Korean scrub with no pomp or ceremony you leave fully scrubbed revitilised. As a vegan i worried about Seoul but the extensive buffet options made it easier to eat meat-free. Much Korean food is veg-based. Remember to check the food outside of the main buffet - bbq vegetables and plenty of korean veggies. Cant wait to return.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: An exceptional hotel in every possible way! Dedicated, friendly and well informed staff, beautiful and mostly renovated rooms, excellent food and a stunning view over Seoul. Namsan Park is on the doorstep of the hotel and just a short walk downhill is the famous party district. It is not centrally located or anywhere close to shopping, but the location is unique. The Club Lounge is well appointed.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Eveyone was very helpful and the hotel is beautiful. The view cannot be beat. You can walk to Namsan Park which I highly recommend. The staff assisted us in retrieving cabs and they have some restaurants on site if we didn't feel like leaving. We coulnd't have asked for a better place to stay.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Grand Hyatt Seoul was exceptional. The location at the Namsan Park was perfect. We enjoyed the excellent Club Lounge. My only negative comment would be that the beds were a bit hard for my taste but otherwise my stay was faultless.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The renovation of the rooms at Grand Hyatt Seoul has been quite well done. Structure of the great former interior design has been kept, and new additions make the room comfortable and good looking. The biggest improvement is the bathroom which looks now very elegant and open, though being small for a hotel of that category. Food at the Club Lounge was very nice ; not a huge choice, but all of good quality. For many clients the main frustration would come from the pool and the sauna. If the pool looks great, there are far not enough sun beds around it for a hotel that big. The reason is that a big business is done with the pool restaurant, and tables are preferred to sun beds for the clients. It's very early 6pm closing time confirms it. During summer the rule is that you can access the pool only once during your all stay ; that's insane and will prevent me to book again during that period. But again it's understandable considering that restaurant seems a priority there. Last noticeable thing is that the access at the sauna is charged if you're not booked into a Club room ; this is totally unfair. So the hotel is very peasant and comfortable, but some rules might prevent me to book there again.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were staying one night in a executive suite on the last (20th) floor. The room itself and the Namsan Tower view are absolutely great.However, I did not bring my mobile phone with me and my battery was like 5% in the morning so I called guest service and asked if they can borrow me a charger. They said they are unable to borrow it (seriously?...) but can only sell it to me for 15$. I said yes. After further 10-15min. of waiting, I was told all chargers are sold out. So the only option is to bring it to concierge desk for charging. That was really bad option because at this moment I was waiting for a very important call. It was kind of unpleasant and strange experience, one would expect to get a phone charger at the 5-star hotel after paying nearly 600$ for a room. Also, there are a lot of small but kinda annoying hidden charges in the bill making around 100$ in total (service surcharge, VAT, service surcharge on room upgrade, VAT on the service surcharge on the room upgrade and also 10$ for parking fee). Come on, are you serious to charge me 10$ for parking after spending 600$ for the room, food and drinks? Not that it hurts my wallet, but it looks pretty stingy and ungenerous for a such plush hotel.The rest of experience was very good and I will definetely come back again.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Usual Hyatt quality keep it up Nice location in Seoul with suburb views over the city but fat away to be quiet and comfortable Good shuttle bus to 2 locations Well used by locals and not so localsWould recommend for business or holidays
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice worker here, when I checked in , my finger got hurt and bleeding, a lady worker name “RYUE”? Can’t remember her name . she got me medicine and bandage cover my finger. Really appreciated ! Good view in my room , Namsan tower just right in front of my window. Ordered room service next morning, food tasted so good , better than I expected! Will definitely come back again next time.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Views are fantastic and close Iteawon Market. Hotel rooms were very clean and comfortable.Pools and tennis Very Good. Food and Drinks on the high end but great entertainment to go with.Breakfast was outstanding. Convenient Bus to international airport and local shopping.One of the best hotels in Seoul.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great view of the city. Friendly customer service and comfortable room. My wife and I stayed here for a mini-getaway while visiting Seoul. It was conveniently located by Itaewon, so we were able to explore Itaewon and relax at the hotel.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a Great hotel. It offers Great service. The newly updated room is Great. They provide a Great gym, and a Great outside pool area. It is seated on a Great location with good views from all rooms. I highly Recommend the Grand Hyatt Seoul.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Consistently one of the best hotels in Seoul. Brilliant service at all facilities, rooms are excellent and the location cannot be beat.Highly recommended. Some rooms are currently under renovation so things are only going to get better.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent the weekend at this hotel in Seoul. It’s right there near Itaewon and it’s a short walk of taxi ride. The hotel amenities are nice. Lots of restaurants. The hotel grounds are beautiful. We also had an amazing view of Namsan Seoul Tower from our room. The concierge service was outstanding. They helped us find attractions and also gave us cards to give the the drivers so there was no confusion about where to take us or what hotel to we were going back to.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Grand Hyatt in Seoul is the hotel to stay in while in Seoul. Great location for trips of any purpose, staff are outstanding, property and grounds immaculate. There are newer hotels in Seoul, but none have the combination of location, luxury and service compared with the Grand Hyatt.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Every thing was nice and perfect. We like the property. The staff members are very friendly and accommodating. Also, Ms. Bae So Yeon, General Manager is very kind to us. Only the problem we experienced was that the room light came on the night due to some construction problem.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Didn't know much about this particular hotel but we've always had great experiences with Hyatt so decided start our Korea vacation here. Far exceeded our expectation. Property was in the middle of renovation but didn't affect us at all. Newly renovated king bed room with Han river view on the 18th floor was great. The room was little bit on the smaller side but it was clean, comfortable with the spectacular view. I usually don't pay extra for a view but I was glad I did with this one to get the Han river view room. All staff we ran into were welcoming and professional. Breakfast buffet amazing with variety of selections of western style and some korean items. Used the indoor pool with my kids and loved it. The property is located on the hillside so you have to take a shuttle of taxi to get to the city or subway station but it was only 5-10 minute ride. Overall it was a great stay.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a very ‘grand’ Grand Hyatt. Lavish and comfortable foyer and lounge/bar on entrance. Rooms are modern and very comfortable. Nice choice of good quality restaurants on site. And hotel location is great with spectacular views across the city. Service is excellent (especially concierge who organised me a city tour and restaurant reservations). Highly recommended for business and/or pleasure.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this hotel during the second leg of our seoul vacation. Beautiful location, nice and secluded. For some, it can be a little secluded and away from all the “action”. But if you want high end service at a beautiful location, the Hyatt can’t be beat.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are old and not perfectly clean as you can expect from such a 5* hotel. Judging by the price I’d 270000 Won I also imagined to get a high class service but I didn’t. The Shilla Hotel is much better.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed over for a weekend and at check-in we were informed that there might have some noises during the day because of undergoing renovations (on a weekend?!). The morning after the noises started at 8.15am (We were told 9/9.30) and it was just unbearable. The drilling was right next to my wall. For that amount of noise they should have closed the room or at least provide earplugs ! (I wish I could post a video to show how noisy the place was) The pool was disappointing and we were told we had to pay extra to go to the sauna... Everytime we asked something to the staff there answer was: “no you have to pay extra” wether it was to have a quiter room, sitting next to the window at the almost empty lobby lounge, access to the sauna...” It had a very cold and unfriendly atmosphere, not worth the price and would not recommend!
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Only upon arrival did we realize that the hotel is actually under going renovation and whilst this was indeed in hindsight mentioned on the confirmation (towards the bottom) I believe they should have been more fore coming with something as large as this ! Severe drilling and construction noise from early morning till 5 or so mend that being on the room during the day wasn’t an option. Not nice after an overnight flight and they should not have sold this particular room knowing full well the noise disturbancesFront desk staff seems to be overwhelmed and by the (what must be) daily complaints from guests expecting more Inside the assigned room : toilet didn’t work properly , aircon didn’t work properly ... basically management choose $$ over guest experience which is disappointing from a brand like Hyatt ! But my personal biggest issue The amount of plastic inside the rooms is a sign of a lack of 2019 management awareness of whats happening in the world ! Plastic water bottles could be replaced with glass bottles Plastic shampoo bottles could be replaced with refillable bottles saving tons and tons of single use plastic Overall a disappointing experience from the Hyatt brand on numerous levels On the other hand: Korea is amazing and spotlessly clean.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Grand Hyatt is a marvellous venue. Its friendly, kind and attentive staff will make you feel very comfortable. This feeling is enhanced by the tranquility of the place given its location near the mountain and away from the hustle and bustle of the city as well as the beautiful music - live or recorded - that plays in the lobby. I couldn’t recommend more.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent hotel, great service. Grand Hyatt Seoul never fails to deliver service beyond expectation. The hotel is near to most places ... taxi ride can take you to most places conveniently. Near to Namsan garden ... excellent for morning jog
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Room are clean but a bit small. Overall pleased to stay. Food are good. Location a bit far from subway station but have shuttle bus every hour. Nice park near the hotel. Beautiful city and hill view. Enjoy the pleasant stay.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Grand Hyatt Seoul is currently undegoing a renovation (which was written very small when you book the hotel). We got to the hotel in the morning after a red-eye flight and was given a room around midday. We tried to sleep but of course because of the renovation it was a hard thing to do. The room also got really hot so we asked about the AC and heating system -- we ended up getting a fan in the room. When you are staying in a hotel room, you obviously use the toilet. In this case, our toilet was not working properly (the hotel toilet has different feautires like in Japan). Because this was our holiday and we wanted everything to be nice (or at least functioning), we reluctantly called front desk and asked if they could fix it. The next morning, we were offered a different room because we booked the room for 3 nights. We gladly accepted the offer since it was a bigger room, everything seemed to be working and it was slightly away from the floors that are going through renovation. We then unpacked again and left to explore Seoul. The next morning, we went out again to see the temples. After a long and tiring day of doing all the touristy things, we came back to the hotel trying to rest but the room was not cleaned. We called and asked why. They said they thought we checked out already. We were then offered some free beverages at their club lounge when the room is being cleaned, but we refused the offer because we just needed to rest and be in the room for the night.Overall, this was quite an unpleasant stay with a 5 star hotel. You'd expect a big name such as Hyatt would deliver their best service to their customer.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the best in Seoul! great service, friendly staff, although hotel is a little old fashioned, the young dynamic team and the good service make you feel comfortable and at ease. You have a wonderful view on Han river and the garden and outdoor swimming pool are super combined with spectacular views.Please also visit the Spa : a unique experience!
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect services - polite and very kind staffGood location : quiet place and Nice garden Nice meeting rooms - good technical staff ready to help if necessary Grand salon : good food and excellent service
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel, only quarrel is that there were renovations going on during my stay, so there was noise and distractions. Aside from this, all else was great. Our room had the perfect view of the N Seoul Tower.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed here several times for business. It has good food, great views, a fantastic gym / spa area, and extremely helpful staff. The executive lounge has a great happy hour and decent breakfast. Also - a short walk from Itaewon nightlife and restaurants (fantastic area!)A bit on the pricey side, but not bad for Seoul and the quality of everything.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Keep away from renovating period as its very noisy in the morning. I had to wake up around 09.00 on weekend. The staff was nice and friendly. Macaron here is very good, do not forget to get a box at bakery shop.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is finally undergoing a refurbishment of the bedrooms which was a little overdue. Soundproofing between the rooms is not the best. Lobby area is really stylish, and the breakfast room has an amazing view over the city, so get there early for a window seat. The staff in the breakfast room are the best in Asia.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is nice and has beautiful views, but the staff was extremely rude and unpleasant to interact with. Regardless of whether we were checking in, asking the concierge for advice, or trying to make friendly conversation in the elevator, we were made to feel as if we were inconveniencing the staff. The hotel is also not particularly close to a subway stop, so trips to/from the hotel can take longer than expected.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Service spectacular. Room great. Can not say enough. Would come again. Location close to station. Meiji Shrine is within longer walking distance. Breakfast on club level was amazing, with Japanese and western selections.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent 4 nights here in March. The refurbished rooms are small, smell heavily of glue and are very hot. The bathrooms are OK but finished using very cheap fittings (I had to fix the loo seat 3 times during my stay). The hotel is a fair distance from other restaurants, and nightlife, so a taxi or Uber is essential. The hotel, in general, is of a high standard, but the restaurants are wallet wiltingly expensive. I was staying on business expenses and simply couldn’t bring myself to order anything other than the cheapest items on the various menus.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location in Seoul- excellent services by all hotel staffs, room was very clean and comfortable. The restaurant, bars, foods were all excellent - quality of live music in bars was good. Will consider this hotel for future visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We always use this hotel when we go to Itaewon.Staff are very polite and attentive.Breakfast is delightful and the restaurant staff are excellent.We had a newly renovated room which was very tastefully decorated. Plug sockets are all universal international socket and take any plug.Sleep on the second night was badly disturbed by noisy neighbours coming in from their night out at 5am. Not the hotels fault, just inconsiderate people.We will go back when we next have a visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Although I never fully take advantage of the hotel's facilities which is unfortunate, I always love to stay there. Sleek decor, impeccable service, awesome facilities whether it be restaurants or recreational and some nice Hyatt touch which I love such as the floral arrangements and the live jazz band in the lobby bar. The neighbourhood of Itaewon down the hill is always interesting and offers varied and fun dining places, trendy troughs and interesting shopping. In short: my favourite hotel in Seoul and on many occasions the best price/quality/experience ratio of all 5 stars that I know in the Korean capital city.
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Would like to thank the Grand Club staff again to making this a great stay. Rachel and team were fantastic. Thank you Judy, Heather, Heidi, Hailey and Liz!Even though the hotel was undergoing renovations, the sound was minimal and the staff took extra care to keep us informed and away from the noise. Couldn't even hear it!
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I stayed at the Grand Hyatt Seoul as part of our wedding anniversary trip to Korea, and this is definitely the best of the 3 hotels we stayed in. It’s a beautiful hotel, luxuriously appointed and with lots of historical charm. The hotel is undergoing renovations when we were there, and we do see the need to upgrade some of the technology niceties like TVs, USB charging points etc. We stayed in the Grand Suite with a beautiful view of the river, and last but not least, we experienced excellent service from the hotel staff - during check-in, concierge, Terrace restaurant, Grand Club and check-out. Thanks Hyatt
hotelName:
22    Grand Hyatt Seoul Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is perfectly located in the heart of Myeongdong. Surrounded by eateries, convenience stores, shops, street food - all within steps of its front door. Yet taxis are able to drive right up to the hotel to pick up and drop off despite being located in the middle of busy Myeongdong alleys.Service is impeccable - all the staff spoke fluent English and were prompt in helping with all kinds of reservations and bookings. The standard Queen room was spacious and well-maintained and fitted with good modern accessories. Most importantly, the room lighting was perfect with day light options as well. Most hotel rooms tend to be poorly lit making it difficult for the ladies when it comes to applying makeup.Had a wonderful week-long stay in this beautiful hotel and would definitely return.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms are quite quiet considering all the hustle and bustle outside. Clean, modern, relatively spacious rooms. Free mini bar fridge restocked daily. Laundry facilities on top floor. Courteous service. Fluent English speakers at desk. Only minor complaint was the air conditioning fan. Kept the room nice and cool but would rev on and off like the hard drive on your computer.They also do not have any drawers for clothes they only have a coat rack, however this was the same case in the other 3 hotels we stayed in Korea and Japan. So perhaps just an asia thing.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice clean rooms, great location. Service was excellent and staff was very friendly. Loads of eateries around and only a short walk from a lot of attractions. Definately worth a visit, would highly recommend.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel have everything you need even a gym.Located in the middle of shopping area. You could shop and unload your stuff in the room and shop again!! Staff are nice and can speak english very well. Recommend this place.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very unique hotel with the warmest welcome I've ever received at a hotel. Rooms are compact but comfortable with all that you need provided. Great location in the heart of the shopping area with lots of other points of interest nearby.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in the hotel for 5 nights in the family twin. Room was clean, bright, modern and chic. Mini bar was topped up daily. Hotel is located in.a central area and just few mins to the subway. Food, shopping is readily available just from the exit of hotel. The staff in hotel are all very friendly and responsive. Spoken english is good too!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was a great stay for my entire family, especially after a day of shopping, we can go back to the hotel to freshen up before continuing our shopping spree along the street of MyeongdongLocation - Just one street from the heart of Myeongdong (Can see Lotte Departmental store from the main street in front of Hotel)Room - Well maintained, clean and tidy. There are three level of rooms, if you are intending to book the corner suite, please book it early to avoid disappointment.Check in - At level 6, staff are friendly and speaks in fluent EnglishConcierge - At level 1, staff are all ready to assist and greets whenever the guests go out or comes back.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I couldn’t ask for more. The staff was friendly, the hotel was clean and charming and perfectly located. Plus everything in the mini bar was free! (I probably paid for it in my room charge but still it was a nice surprise)
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you like the hustle and bustle of Myeongdong and multiple options of dining, pick this hotel for the location. Also pick this hotel for the cleanest, most accommodating staff I've ever experienced in hotel business. Upon our arrival, we were escorted by a nice man to the sixth floor to their reception. Their receptionist are so gracious and accommodated us in perfect English. When we check out a nice young employee helped us out to get a cab and at least three of them assisted us, even a young woman in pencil skirt were running to the street to us the cab. The room is another thing worth mentioning about. The room is amazingly clean, fully equipped with STOCKED FRIDGE FOR FREE! It also came with teas and NESPRESSO! A Nespresso!!! Bathroom was large with bidet and a separate shower and amazing bath tub! Crisp white linen, amazing mood lighting, and a sitting room! We are in love with the hotel, definitely comparable to 5 star hotel we've stayed before.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel 28 is an unique hotel in a busy fried chicken alley. It has a movie theme and a founder’s gallery. The location is Super convenient. We stayed in a connecting room with my Daughter for 5 nights. Room side is just nice, is clean and the plus point is they provide free mini bar with beers and drinking water and it is refilled Everyday. The staff are Super polite and helpful especially when we approached them for directions to our destinations. The only improvement is that they could consider change the curtain access to the toilet and showers to a glass door or wooden door in the connecting room with twin beds. As we need to open and close the curtains to the toilet countless time each day it would be much more hygienic if it is a glass or wooden door so the handle can be cleaned. Overall I would recommend this hotel
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is centrally located to the subway as well as in walking distance to many sites. There are plenty of restaurants to choose from directly beside or in the same building and some even offer discounts when you show your hotel keycard. We stayed in a room with a king sized bed which was very spacious and clean. The fridge is stocked daily with complimentary water, beer, and soft drinks. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I would not hesitate to stay here again on a return visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was exceptionally impressed with this hotel. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful (special thanks to Alvin who remembered my name every day and always seemed excited to see me. The rooms were large, exceptionally clean, the beds were comfortable and the showers had great water pressure. This hotel is found in the heart of Myeondong - you couldn’t ask for a more central location. Restaurants and stores are all around in this area. I will be coming back to Seoul in September and plan on staying at Hotel28 Myeongdong again! Thanks again to Alvin, who was always helpful and exceptionally friendly.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay was very pleasant the staffs are so nice and accommodating. We will definitely stay again at Hotel 28. Also they give discount coupons in some of the nearby shops and restaurant when you stay there.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff were really polite, always greeting us and always helpful. It was raining on the day that we checked out and we had already left the hotel and were walking to the airport bus stop, and a staff ran after us with an umbrella to shelter us from the rain - exceptional service! They provided a free mini bar, with Nespresso machine. There were English channels which were great! Do try to get high level floors though because the hotel is right in the heart of myeongdong and opposite a busy street with fried chicken shops and it can get rather noisy till late depending on you, but was alright for us. Location of the hotel is also great- it is easy to get around the city and there are also many good restaurants around. We stayed in the deluxe king room and the size of the room was very comfortable, with a large bath tub and bathing amenities provided and always replenished.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Well location in shopping district Myeongdong. Service was great with free mini bar and WiFi. Rooms were clean and relatively quiet. The only sound I can hear most of the time is only the aircon which is slightly louder than usual ones.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Started our mother/daughter trip through Korea here. Hotel 28 is absolutely a lovely place to stay! Everything you need to be comfortable and ready to go out and about. Best location for all sightseeing, restaurants and shopping! The staff is friendly, very helpful and goes out of their way to be accommodating! The rooms are uniquely charming, they utilize the space perfectly. Breakfast was a buffet, it was delicious! Thank you to all the staff, you made our first visit to Korea delightful!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is superb good service with this hotel, all the staff are with a good smile and greet us everytime we enter or exit the hotel. The receptionist named Hikaru brought us to the room after checked in and introduce the room and free mini bar to us. Their service is extremely good and will be back again. Worth it！
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We love this kind of hotel. Ideally located and full of charm and personality. The design of the hotel is enjoyable and has character. The city is buzzing outside, and inside it's rather private. The free minibar is a nice add-on, but we didn't use it much. We would have preferred connecting rooms when traveling with kids, but ok, we managed. The breakfast restaurant was ok, but not fabulous and the messy desk at the entrance doesn't fit the hotel and the style. However, the service and attention from the staff were excellent all week. Even the restaurant tips were exotic and different (e.g., the raw grab place in Gangnam was an experience itself). We loved the markets outside around the corner and the many places we could walk to see. We can highly recommend the bicycle tour as it's a great way to see the city center and the main attractions. We enjoyed Seoul and the hotel and are expecting to come back one day.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel28 is the best hotel!! Me and ma girlfriend really enjoyed this hotel.All the staff is polite and outstanding in their work. Location is also perfect,very center in Myeongdong. Movie theme makes more special and gorgeous. We really want to stay again if we have any chance to visit in Seoul. Thank you Hannah,Alvin & Lily
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We came to Seoul to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday and had an amazing weekend. Hotel 28 has wonderful staff who helped us immensely with recommendations for what to do and where to eat. We loved Myeongdong, especially the fried chicken places right opposite the hotel!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for 4 days and it was the best hotel I have stayed in Korea. The staff especially Chloe and Lily were very helpful and friendly. They went out of their way to make my stay the best it could be.I will come back again.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel 28 is one of my favorite hotel in Seoul. The greeting from the first floor with man and we can see the concierge who assists us to the reception.It s our 3rd time to hotel 28 and i saw staffs who i knew Joon, Emily, David, Lily.Friendly staffs, good organic amenity, early check in, free minibar, funny hotel movie theme.Also, we went to the rooftop and there was a walk way with beautiful flowers.I love this hotel!!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chanced upon Hotel28 while researching for a hotel for our stay in Seoul. It turned out to be an excellent choice! The hotel was located right in the heart of Myeongdong and gave us easy access to the vibrant shopping streets of Myeongdong. As guests, we also enjoyed special privileges and discounts at many participating merchants around the hotel. The amenities were awesome and the minibar was free! We had free alcohol every night! The only thing was that because the hotel is relatively new, not many taxi drivers were aware of it and we had some difficulties trying to guide the driver to the hotel. However, the services by all the staff of the hotel more than made up for it. They were very sweet and prepared popcorn and children amenities when they realised my kid was staying with us.But nonetheless, we had a great stay and we will definitely go back to Hotel28 again!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The best thing going for Hotel 28 is the location. It sits in the heart of Myeongdong among restaurants, shops and night market, yet it is rather quiet. The staff is very helpful and friendly. Free minibar was a nice touch. On the negative side, the furnishings in the room were showing lots of wear and tear and the bed was not comfortable. The “cinema” inspired furnishings and decor in the common areas come at the expense of other amenities such as comfortable seating and brighter decor. You feel the darkness and austere sense especially if you are there more than one night.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had a very pleasant experience when I stayed in the hotel during my first trip to Seoul in April 2018. And when I started planning my trip this year, I didn’t even bothered to compare other hotels in the area. First of all, I have to comment on the speedy response of the hotel to emails. I made a mistake by booking a double bed during reservation. As I am traveling with my 79 years old dad and being a light sleeper myself, sharing bed will means a week of sleepless nights for me. As I made my reservation through Agoda, I am not able to cancel or rebook and Agoda is not helpful at all. I wrote to the hotel with my request to change the room type and received a response within the day. Upon arrival at the hotel, I noticed they have more staff now compared to the same time last year. But they have maintained the high standard in all of them. Everyone could speak fluent english and were really helpful when you need them. The check-in was fast and efficient. Everything in the room looks exactly the same. The mini bar is well-stocked with beers, coke and drinking water all the time. And the beds were really comfortable. Unlike other hotels, they seem to have a fixed schedule for housekeeping. As we left early in the morning and had pressed the button for ‘make up room service’, we would think our room should be made in the morning. We were taken by surprise when we returned to a messy room at 2.30pm. Subsequently, we noticed our room will only be made at 3pm everyday. This is not a big issue as we can also chill comfortably at the cozy lobby. Overall, we had a good stay. We will return to this hotel if we are in Seoul again.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of Hotel 28 Myeong-dong could not be better. The staff was unfailingly polite and helpful. Rooms are small (standard ones anyway) but very well appointed. Price through Agoda of about one hundred fifty US per night seemed like quite a bargain. I'd definitely return.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A small hotel themed on making Movies, the location of this hotel is superb, although it can be a little difficult to find on the first visit. Once there though it proves to be at the centre of where you’ll likely want to be in Seoul. The rooms are compact but very clean and well appointed. The bathrooms are especially good with a fabulous surprise for westerners unacquainted with certain luxury washroom fittings in the Far East as well! Be slightly mindful that rooms overlooking the street can be a bit noisy until around midnight due to the hubbub of diners outside the multiple restaurants opposite. But probably the key attribute that makes the place so good is the attitude of the staff. Every single person we interacted with - and there were many - was friendly and helpful in a genuine way. I especially commend the breakfast crew who were wonderful. Our family interaction with them was as good as it could be - rather special. I loved their honest displays of real personality which enabled connection in a friendly and down to earth way, always underpinned by a desire to get things spot on for guests. It’s a good value small hotel run at a personable yet accomplished level. If you don’t really want the aloofness of a 5 Star joint, this is a very good substitute.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am moslem and travel with kid. This hotel provides many choice of transportation so we could go anywhere in seoul with no difficulty.
