Also we got halal foods near by, such busan jib, eggs bread and halal gimbab, but please be careful, not all halal food in Myeongdong street is really halal. The ambiance of the hotel is so cozy and luxury, and I love coffee smell once we enter coming from cafe next to the hotel. Definitely we’ll recommend this hotel to our friends and relatives.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've been in Korea for 3 times now and it's first time I've ever received poor service by an employee in a hotel. His name was Alvin.He didn't let us talk and had a rude attitude when we asked for help. He didn't listen to what we have to say and just talk. Sometimes it ends up me and him was talking at the same time. First time we asked for help another employee was there, Hannah and she seems very nice.Second time when we had our check out it was only Alvin and his attitude and rudeness was still he same from the day before. He shouldn't be in the service industry.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 3 nights in Hotel28. A perfect location close to airport bus station, subway, all hottest spots in Myeongdong. The deluxe room is not big but fully equipped, modern decoration, stylish furniture, clean, high quality bed and pillow, perfect sound proof, free mini bar, lovely bathtub. The staff all speak English with good attitude and pleasant. The fried chicken opposite to hotel is great! Will definitely choose Hotel28 if back Seoul. Good for adult couple. A real SLH.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is unbeatable - basically right in Myeongdong with lots of eateries around.We took airport limousine 6015, alight at bus stop in front of Ibis hotel & in just 5 mins will get you to the hotel. Service is impeccable, every staff we met is so friendly, check in & out is a breeze. We booked a deluxe double bed room that comes with a separate huge bath tub which is nice. Room is big too considering Korea standard.Will definitely come back again :)
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is great and the hotel of a good standard. What we were particularly grateful for, however, was the impeccable service of the staff. My partner had injured herself when we were in Busan and hotel staff helped us locate an appropriate medical professional. Thank you.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed two nights - Deluxe Twin Room Good:Location - Bang in the middle of Myeongdong.Shower - water pressure so goodBed - very comfy and nice clean linenLarge sink outside of the bathroom - don’t need to wait for the other person to finish bathing :)Free mini bar refilled everyday - good soft drinks and a couple of beersVery very very helpful and kind staffGood sized roomComfortable bedSpeak multiple languagesMultiple plug types including UK/Europe and USBThe central light control next to the bedLots of shelves to put things on - I find it very consider for the travellers :)Neutral:Toilet - automated flushing and tinted glass door without lock was a bit too fancy for me but it’s not a big dealView was just chicken shops. It’s quite interesting to see people come and goNot so good:The noise from outside although it’s not too badOverall - really enjoyed the stay. Better than most of 4 star hotels!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My family and I stayed for two nights at Hotel28 Myeongdong. The service staff and housekeeping were excellent. The rooms were modern and very clean. Hotel is located in a great part of Myeongdong in the heart of shops and restaurants. The only bad part was that the hotel is right opposite fried chicken restaurants and if you have a room that faces these restaurants, you can smell the fried food even with the windows closed. It can be pretty noisy too.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location was perfect; room was of adequate size and the service staff are excellent. Added bonus was the free minibar! Arrived at the hotel and discovered my luggage was damaged but not obvious at airport baggage collection point. My compliments to Emily and Joon for their very friendly service at check-in. Emily went to great lengths to help me sought out my complaints with Korea Airlines regarding my damaged luggage. I would definitely stay at Hotel28 again and would highly recommend it to my friends.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really enjoyed our stay at hotel 28. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The location was in the middle of the city with easy access to the subway and tons of restaurants nearby. It was clean and there is complimentary water and beer refilled daily. Would definitely recommend.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything is on point at hotel 28. The staff are attentive, helpful, and anticipate every need. Spacious rooms and comfortable beds. Awesome interior to keep it interesting and a great location in the heart of Seoul
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you wish to be surround with good restaurants (Andong Jjimdak, Migabon, Bhd Chicken, Myeongdong Kyoja, Paris Baguette and etc ) this is the hotel you must choose to stay. The location is excellent whereby airport bus limo services is only 2mins walk. Right in front of the hotel is the local famous fried chicken streets. Lotte department Myeongdong is only 4 mins away from the hotel. You have no worries of getting food and to shop for cosmetic. All staffs from the hotel are very professional, friendly and warm. Thumbs up to the team at Myeong-dong. The rooms are very clean and neat. You will simply love. For sure I will return to Hotel 28 Myeong-dong for my next trip to Seoul.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Didn't realise it was a small luxury hotel when we did the booking. Such a delight! Convenient location yet still accorded privacy. The hotel staff were warm, friendly and welcoming. Great attention to detail; definitely guest-centric. Complimentary mini bar was a surprise though we consumed only the water, green tea & nespresso coffee. We will definitely return again and would recommend this hotel to those who want to be in the heart of shopping yet still clamour for some privacy, away from the maddening crowd after a long day of shopping & sightseeing.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is located in the center of Seoul, in the center of Myeongdong. You can eat everything you want, you can buy everything you want from the front of hotel. You can always feel the warm hospitality from all staffs, and they are always ready to help. We liked everything from the hotel like as very comfortable bedding, beautifully designed rooms, spacious bathrooms, and amenities which are organic items(they are caring our skin too :D). Staff mentioned that hotel theme is movie, so we've gotten popcorn gift upon check-in(so sweet!!). It was a pleasant experience, and it was so good that I received the best service.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel 28 is a clean and safe hotel. It's located in the heart of Myeongdong which means you could go eat, bar hop, or visit other touristy denstiions in Seoul while being in the center of it all. The interior bathroom is clean and there's a small gym inside as well. Service was great as well. The only down part is that you have to walk to this hotel from the train station; as the streets are packed with people and cars can't really reach the hotel.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very happy with the room, location was great inside Myeondong shopping area.Popular fried chicken stores are just downstairs of hotel. Hotel staffs were very friendly and speaks good English thus no communication barrier.Room was very pretty, very comfortable stay. Beers/drinks inside minibar/fridge are all complimentary as well. Can’t find any fault with this hotel. Will definitely stay this hotel again when I’m back to Seoul.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 4 nights, couldn't wait to review Hotel 28 Myeongdong because it deserves to be discovered and appreciated by more potential visitors. Our plan in Seoul was to visit as many local restaurants as possible, and since unfortunately many of them do not support online reservation, we need Korean speakers to give them phone calls. The reservation process was back and forth with more than 10 emails, but the front desk staff were very patient and friendly all the way, can't be more grateful.Their staff were helpful during our whole stay, and I would say they're one of the most precious assets of the hotel. You can tell they have a great atmosphere among themselves, which delivers a positive vibe to visitors. Room was great, service was great, location was great can't be better. Highly recommended if you're looking for a place to stay near Myeongdong.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Love the interior and modern feel. Importantly, the staff can speak English well, are very helpful and friendly. This is my second time to book this hotel. Would book again as the price is very reasonable for such a great hotel.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Friendly staff, good service.Breakfast spread and quality is great. Specially loved the local themed breakfast dish specially the bulgogi and bibimbap.Rooms are new, modern and clean. The hollywood theme gives a glamorous feel to the stay.The complimentary mini bar is a welcome addition to the perksOverall I really love the stay here and will definitely be back.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My partner and I stayed in hotel 28 for three nights. I have to say it’s one of the best experiences so far. What’s the best about this hotel is the people. They are passionate and happy. It’s not uncommon to meet professional staffs but uncommon to meet professional staffs who truly enjoy their work. Great service from the staffs! Thank you! It happened that it was my birthday during the stay and they got me this birthday surprise! Everything has been exceeding my expectation. Ah they can communicate in English well which is even better! The other thing that we like about the hotel is the bathroom- the toilet bowl is warm and the shower is gentle and comfy. Their toiletries are organic products. Can tell the owner and the team are thinking from the customer’s perspective. Their complimentary mini bar is very good too! There’s beer which is perfect for fried chicken at night. Thanks for the hospitality again!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A super urban hotel in the grooviest district in town. Ideal location and serious about service. Complimentary mini-bar, spacious shower, and the best street food 2 minutes away. Everything walking close. Very agreeable team, eager to help. Didn't try the restaurant, but all-Korean menu looked good. An excellent base of operations in a happening city.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed at the Hotel28 for 1 night on a business trip to Seoul, Korea. We found the hotel perfect for our needs. The lobby and room was very clean with a comfortable king-sized bed and the drinks in the minibar are complementary - something we have never experienced before in any hotel. As an added bonus, the bus to Icheon Airport is only a 1 minute walk away for a cost of about $15.00. You can buy the tickets from the hotel directly and it leaves every 10-15 minutes.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I just returned from a fantastic 4 night stay at Hotel 28 which is in the heart of busy Myeongdong. Although not quite a "small luxury" hotel, it is the nicest hotel I have visited in Seoul for a long time. As mentioned by others, the hotel lobby is on Level 6 and there is only 1 elevator which was not a real big problem....relax you're on vacation! The hotel is one street away from the green inner circle subway line which is convenient to most tourist places. I would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends.....
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: location is excellent. just a stone's throw away from subway.amenities are great. bed is comfy, hot shower and strong water flow. clean bedroom.excellent service from the concierge, carried our luggages to the airport limousine bus stop in the cold winter weather.thank you so much for the excellent experience!
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location 5/5Amenities 1/5Staff 5/5Cleanliness 5/5PROS - Great Location - close to Department stores , food outlets & market stalls. 20-30 minute walk to Palaces - Beautiful Rooms - comfortable large bed, free standing bath, heated toilet, large rainfall shower, free minibar, robes & toiletries provided - Quirky features - each floor has a "museum-esque" vibe with original set pieces and equipment from the 20th century - Friendly Staff - Affiliated with many stores and restaurants providing discounts - Free Wifi - Free Minibar (drinks only) CONS - Lobby is located on level 6 which can be quite confusing; ensure that you enter via the main street next to the Italian Restaurant or you will have to drag your bags up stairs to reach the Concierge on Level 1 - No Hotel bar - told by staff that there is a bar at the restaurant on Level 6 but was then told that they don't have a bartender so that was why their drink list was so limited. (e.g. gin and tonic, vodka orange, bottled beer or rice wine - no other variations) - No soundproofing - could hear road work at 2am - Sensitive sensored entrance light to room means that when people walk past your door at 5am the light turns on inside your room. - Small gym with limited equipment - Rooftop "bar" not open in winter and is only an extension (extra seating) for the restaurant on Level 6 - Limited Room Service Menu - No view from rooms (look at walls mainly) - Limited storage space (small "wardrobe", no drawers)
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The stay at Hotel28 has been an excellent start to the year. Hotel design is beautiful, strong character and despite the dark interiors, the warmth from the people shined through. Kudos to Manager Jay Kim and his team for the lovely birthday surprise and handwritten letter. Definitely worth a stay =)
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is situated 3 mins walk from airport bus shuttle stop in Myeongdong.Rooms were nicely fitted and bigger than similar hotels in the area. Great customer service.Just downstairs are access shops and restaurants.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms have thin walls and doors don’t block any sound/noise. If you can pick a floor, 5 is better for privacy, and 6 for elevators...visiting your level the most because visitors go to floor 6 for the lobby and restaurant. Enjoy your comp mini bar items. It was perfect. And make use of the coupons that come with your room. They give discounts to restaurants on other floors. If you visit in the winter, the room gets cold fast because they use the eco room card activation. Tip - leave one card in the slot to keep your room warmer and then take the other with you for the door and elevator.
hotelName:
23    Hotel28 Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were disappointed in the lunch and dinner options in the hotel so much so that we ate at the attached Burger King. The included buffet breakfast had many options and was well done, but only a buffet in the same restaurant as breakfast was the only dinner option.Our room on the 19th floor was quite and clean. Always a the bidet toilet and was pleaseantly surprised to find one there.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: TMark Hotel Myeongdong is a clean and simple (no fuss) hotel within two minutes walk to Chungmuro Station.The room is small but adequate. The breakfast has a good range of choices but the food quality could be better.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose this hotel because we arrived in Seoul at 9:50pm and took airport limousine bus that stopped at the main road, 3 mins away from the hotel main entrance. The location is quieter than Myeongdong street but it is near Chungmuro Station, which makes travelling so convenient. Only thing negative is the room is very small for two travellers who had 26" luggages and despite having a window, it cannot be opened, so i could see dust particles landing on the comforter instead of getting fresher air. Maybe the room should have air purifier to absorb the dust.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: it has a cozy atmosphier , very close to 2 line of subway and meyong dong districtin overall all thing was good but breakfast could be more better ,for example there was no cheese on the counter and varity was low
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel good location, clean, food places, convenience stores, shops,and subway nearby...10 minutes walking to Myeongdong shopping street. But go at night to try all the street food too. Can see the N Seoul tower from the main street. Will stay at this hotel again.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this hotel last minute (literally the night we got to Seoul) and it saved our trip. The lady on front desk advised us that rooms were available and to book through a website to save money and the room would be ready within 20 minutes. Surely enough when we booked and came back to the hotel with our bags the room was available. After a long day this was fast and efficient customer service. The room was perfect. Comfy beds, good heating (very cold outside) and great amenities. The bathroom was spotless and had both a bath and shower. The rooms have strong WiFi and TVs with a wide selection of channels for different languages. Can not recommend enough and thank you to the staff.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Im very grateful to the concierge staff who went the extra mile to help me solve my overweight luggage issue. It is the Korean New Year today, the hotel staff will help me mail back to my home country. Its greatly appreciated. He also patiently answered questions I have. Please help me convey my heartfelt thanks. Lastly, the prime location where the hotel is nestled provides great convenience for shoppers. Its one stop away from Myeongdong. Opposite the hotel is Namdemum market. Overall, a good stay! I will stay in this hotel when I return to Seoul.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The best thing about Tmark Hotel is that it's close yet far from the bustling Myeongdong shopping area, which means that you can seek reprieve from the chaos in the quiet area that surrounds the hotel. And yes, that means that you can choose to walk to the hotel from Myeongdong (I highly recommend exiting past the Royal Hotel; it's much closer) if you enjoy the exercise. If not, the nearest metro station, Chungmuro, is only a stop away from Myeongdong itself.As for the hotel itself, it has all the basic facilities you'll need and, really, if you're in Seoul, you'll be too busy exploring outside of the hotel so there really isn't much to say. The beds, however, were very comfortable and not annoyingly soft like other hotels I've been to. I also liked that you're able to open the small windows for ventilation during the winter and that there's a semi-auto repellent screen to keep any pesky insects away.My only gripe is that the washrooms were very small. Or rather, the addition of the bathtub to the tiny bathroom makes it seem cramped. If the hotel plans to undergo any renovations, I suggest that they remove the bathtubs and have showers-only for their smaller toilets — it will also help with the puddles of water that form on the ground and not risk any damages to the electric toilet.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Over all, it was good, breakfast is just fair they could have more variety, the reception was very helpfull and polite, hotel is close to everywhere you want to go, variety of eatery and shopping, site visited and temple.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I booked my hotel on the same day online and when we arrived at the hotel, they accommodated us right away. The room is very nice and the beds are soft. It is near the Chungmuro Station and if you walk for maybe 5-10 mins. you can reach the Myeongdong shopping area.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. Very closed to the subway train station and attractions. There are lots of local restaurant in the neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay very much. Staff was able to give lots of information regarding sight seeing.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: No porter service available which is no good if you are travelling with two old parents. Then. When i asked for late check out. They say all the room is fully booked but then quickly added that should I pay a surcharge, we can extend. How ironic The receptionist is either unfriendly because she cant speak proper English or cannot understand, or she is simply careless.They arent nice at all. Very robotic and as a matter of factly. We are just numbers not customers.. sad
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel experience was one of the best I have had in my life. The reseptionists were nice and welcoming, and we were taken good care of the whole stay. The rooms were perfectly clean and had everything we needed. Also in love with the bidet toilet. Only 2 minutes away from the closest subway staition, Chungmu-ro. And also many restaurants, cafes and convenient stores nearby. My friend and I will warmly recommend the chicken place on the corner just a few meters away from the main entrance of the hotel. The owner was so nice!!!Make sure to book this hotel at your next stay, because we surely will.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great experience during our stay. Room is very clean and the customer service is excellent. I would highly recommend this place. Very accessible to mrt, shops, and restaurants. We also enjoyed the tours that are offered by their partner travel agencies.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel was perfect for our short stay. It was one block away from the subway and while it was in Myeongdong it was not in the center of the market (which can get crazy at night). The staff spoke very good English and were very helpful. The airport bus stops around the corner about 2 blocks from the hotel. The room was comfortable and clean. I would recommend this hotel if you are looking for something centrally located that won't break the budget.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at this hotel in June 2017 for a business trip. We have a trouble when changing room. But the staff of hotel is very nice and helpfull. I had to say thanks to them when check out hotel. Room is cozy but a litte bit small. Hotel located in the down town. 5 minute walking to myengdong market.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very well located, just one block from Chungmu-ro Metro Station. Rooms are acceptable, but that is just it.Staff is not very helpful, western options for breakfast are scarce.Cost is high for what it offers.There are better options around the same area, with a better relationship cost/benefit.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is in a quiet neighbourhood and quite a walk from the Myeongdong shopping area although it's a minute walk to the subway and airport limo bus stop. Lots of small local eateries around. Breakfast is disappointing as the menu is almost the same every morning. Totally regret choosing the breakfast option when booking. Also, it ends at 9am!Room is clean, comfortable and small but does not come with basics like toothbrush and body lotion. Wifi is good. There is a sensor light near the entrance which can be disturbing in the night as it lights up whenever someone goes to the bathroom.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place provide value for money.Customer care is fine and helpful staff.Can enjoy the food.located at a convenient place with nearby shopping and restaurants. Room quality and clean is maintained well. Thanks a lot for making my stay comfi and nappy
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We are about to leave but our stay here was interesting. Our second night we went downstairs to the corner fried chicken and beer joint across from emart. Delicious late night food. We were chatting and going about our night when a lady runs from the hotel to right across from us and vomited all over the floor. I get it, its normal, you drink, you get drunk sure... Until I realized she works at the front desk of the tmark hotel. A man came out afterwards to aid her but ended up arguing with the owner of the fried chicken joint. The owner asked him to clean up her vomit as it interferes with his business, its considerate as we don't want to have to see or smell that. It's gross. After arguing awhile, 2 more ladies came out from the hotel to separate the 2 that are arguing. Finally they left and the man came back to pick up the vomit (good for him). I just find it troublesome that they represented the hotel and to be drinking in the hotel then come out to vomit. Lol. They could've went elsewhere to drink or don't. It's unprofessional. We also had a leaky sink that was never fixed. They were unhelpful when we asked her to ask our driver how long he was going to be as we needed to leave to the airport. We only speak English, chinese and minimal Korean. Other than the above, the rooms were fine... House keepers was great...
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was close enough for my wife and I to walk to Myeongdong and to 3 of the markets. There are lots of local restaurants in the area as well. The rooms were clean, and of a reasonable size and the beds were comfortable. Two bottles of water every day during our stay was great due to the hot weather. Finally, the staff at the front desk and on the phone was very responsive and courteous. Would chose to stay at the hotel again when in the area.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is located near Chungmuro station, 10-15 mins walking to Myeong Dong area. The airport limousine bus just around the corner, 5 mins walking.The hotel also provided free shuttle bus to Myeong Dong and Seoul station. I didn’t try at all as my timing always didn’t match with the shuttle schedule.Hotel is clean and size is decent. Bathroom size is fine too. I booked non smoking room but when I entered the room there is slight cigarette smell, however I opened the window and the smell is gone, not big deal. Overall, it was fine experience with Tmark.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Book from Agoda course our myeongdong studio apartment email us saying the government closed the Electric Long Story.Tmark hotel surprisingly in expensive this hotel is a good choice,very clean and modern with excellent bathroom beds were comfortable.we stayed 5 night.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I carelessly left my personal belongings in my room on the day of check out, and only found out when I was flying back home. I called the hotel right away when I landed, it turned out they had already found my belongings before I called, and kept them there for me. It was good to know they had my belongings, but I was still worried about getting them back. Mr Peter Kim helped me with getting my belongings shipped to me. He was very helpful, and patient with my inquires, he followed up with me constantly to make sure I get my belongings back. I really appreciate his help and professionalism, and would like to thank him and everyone who helped me at T Mark Hotel. I highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easy to locate , nice location but the opening is not on the Main road. Its quite close to most sight-seeing places & main shopping areas. Taxis are easily hailed & bus stop for the Airport is close by .Has an impressive facade , open & large reception area opening into the restaurant which is spacious & well organised. In fact , the restaurant opens to the main road.Friendly & helpful staff making checking in a breeze. Checking out was smooth too.Corridor well lit, kept & marked for direction as that can be a bit of bother in a big hotel.Room was pretty big, with white decor with big window making it bright & cheerful. It was adequately appointed with comfortable bed &appropriate sitting arrangement. Attached bathroom had all that is normally required though a bit small.Break fast in the restaurant was basic . It catered more for the Koreans than people like us. Restaurant did not allow signing for the meals & drinks , asking for spot payment. Cannot quarrel with their policy but I would certainly prefer being billed to be cleared at the time of checking out.I must repeat that staff at the reception was warm & friendly. In particular the Manager, Mr Paul Moon helped & guided us taking time on computer in his office to work out our itinerary. ( Thank you , Paul ! )Our two days stay in the Hotel was comfortable & enjoyable.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Nine Tree first, did some travel, came back and Nine Tree was booked so we booked TMark Hotel for a slightly higher price and were disappointed. Dirty sheets, smelly shower curtain (which 4 star hotel still uses them), air condition not working, no water re-fill station like the other hotel, rooms not as new. Considering these hotels are not far from each other I would not opt for TMark.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything about this place is good. Great location, direct airport bus, good service. Room is clean and they provide water, coffee and teabags in the room.The only downside which is quite important to us was the wifi speed. It is really slow considering how fast wifi is in Korea. It is even slower than my wifi back at home. Hopefully they can improve that.The air con / heater is also uncontrollable in the room so it can get stuffy and bit annoying sometimes not being able to control room temperature to your own wish. I got a namsan tower view which was very nice.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is 3min away from Chungmuro station and a 15-20min walk away from the Myeongdong Shopping Street. Convenience stores and restaurants surrounds the hotel as well! Airport Bus station is 5min away however, the driver did not announce the specific stop hence, many of the passengers on board were brought to the last station at Myeongdong Street where we had to find our way to the specific hotel.Booked a Deluxe Twin Room for our stay in November. Room was really cozy and kept us warm such that we did not want to leave as the weather outside was too cold for comfort. Bathroom came with a bathtub, showerhead and heated toilet seat. I must say I loved the toiletries provided by the hotel especially the shampoo (Can you tell me if this could be bought anywhere?) as they smell so good and kept my hair really soft without the need of using the conditioner! We opt to go greener and thus, only requested for room to be made up. Housekeeping was really nice to hang up clothes we left on the chairs and even folded our jacket/sweater nicely and place it on the bed. Bottled water were refilled everyday as well! Overall, it was a worthwhile 5night stay at the hotel which was less than $100/night! Will definitely come back to Tmark the next time i am back!
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: overall very good, the location is very good, the room is clean and tidy, very convenient walk to the hotel from the subway, we can walk to the Myeongdong downtown in 10 minutes, there is also some nice restaurant near the hotel
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's my first time in a Tmark Hotel and I am thoroughly satisfied. I will choose their chain again.Pros: Excellent staff; Close to transport hub; Quiet location; Clean room; Modern and well-equipped bathCons: NoneThanks Tmark Hotel Myeongdong for being my temporary home.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Booked at this hotel and stayed during 29th March to 7april. Total of 9 nights. The staffs are really helpful and friendly to help me and and my family . Travelling with a infant of 17months. Located near the heart of meyeong dong and with so many subway stations nearby, travelling around Seoul has never been easier. If the hotel staffs are reading this, we would love to say thanks for the hospitality you had given us. We are a family of 3 from singapore and my son always give you guys at the lobby a good bye kiss whenever we are out. Thanks once again.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Exceeded our expectation. Great location, very convenient to transportations, shopping and foods. The room is very clean, spacious and have very comfortable bed. The staff are very accommodating and always have smile on their faces which makes our stay more pleasant. the wifi is reliable. overall stay is great.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed their with a big group. The room is very clean and comfortableThe breakfast with variety of asian food as well as their professional service made our trip to become the memorable trip in Korea. Definitely come back and stay here
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Couple days before my stay in this hotel, I went for check-in my luggage first as I am going to Busan before back to Seoul. The receptionist that attend to me was a nice & friendly lady named Kim (if I am not remember wrongly).To my surprise after I back from Busan and come to this hotel for check-in, she greet me with my name. Imagine as receptionist how many people she have to meet daily however she could remember my name & greet me. I am impressed. As a foreigner, it feel good when u are greet by your name in overseas. With her smile even make me feel like home. ^^After the check-in procedure, the room was another thing that impressed me. The room was clean with modern washroom. All toiletries are provided.The only 'feedback' I have is they don't provide any room service. As I was fall sick quite badly, I couldn't wake up to go to the restaurant. When I call to front-desk they told me they don't have room service. Hence, I need to order food delivery from outside and because of security purpose they don't allow the delivery boy to send the food to my room and I have to walk down. Hopefully they can consider to have room service so that the sick traveller like me won't 'suffer'. =)
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is centrally located with 2 subway lines to choose from. The subway station is ~5 minutes walk away. Super convenient. Can walk to Myeongdong's popular shopping area in ~10 min. Can also walk to Namsan and see the North Seoul Tower if people are up for doing a walk. It's not far at all and a very nice walk on a nice day. No shortage of food options around.The room was clean with modern washroom. Sound insulation between rooms can be better as we were disturbed by the next door having a party till past midnight. However, called the front desk and they resolved the problem right away. Very responsive. The hotel is very close to the Airport Bus Station as well, so it's a great and cheap way to head to the airport after you have overweight your luggage from shopping too much. I would stay here again when I visit again!
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Near to chungmuro station exit 6. 15minutes walking to myoengdong market.room very clean.Smell good once u enter the hotel lobby.Friendly front desk also the housekeeper too.So for my next visit to korea i will stay at this hotel again.kamsahamida.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel smell very good. Fast check in&check out. Location so strategic at Chungmuro station.3m walk to Chungmuro. If you love walking can enjoy city view along chungmuro to myeondong market(10m walk).only few station to tourist attraction. Near namsangol hanok village. 10m walk. Staff very nice. Room clean. Room Temperature very good. Have heater. Everything was so excellent. Have a pleasent stay. Will come again coz have good memory here. No regret. Will come again next year..
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had a complicated reservation, as I needed 4 different rooms for portions of two weeks,and the staff at Tmark Hotel helped me to make my reservations. The hotel was a bit small, but was clean, and nice to relax in after a long day of walking around Seoul.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located at between the main shopping areas Myeongdong and Dongdaemun and its just 1 min walk from Chungmuro station, very convenient and easily accessible. Room is very clean and bathroom is provided with shampoo, conditioner, body wash and other necessary utilities.Staffs at front desk are extremely kind and helpful, especially Ms. Cha Jihyun, who treated us warmly during our two nights stay in T mark.Buffet Breakfast has limited food variety and we had to wait for a long queue. Breakfast hour til 9am is too short, should extend to 10 or 11 like other hotels.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed with family. 11 of us had 3 rooms. Beds were comfortable. Bathrooms are spacious. The tub is a little small. What makes this hotel special is the staff. Especially the female receptionist at night. All of them are great. Always with a nice smile and would always go the extra mile to help us out. Location is great to, 10 min walk to night market. A couple of convenience stores around the area. And a few steps away from Chungmuro station and bus stops to the airport and other attractions. Would recommend. I'd stay here again if I'd go back to Korea.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was a 3mins walk from chungmuro station. Very convenient and accessable. 10 mins walk from myeongdong shopping area. Hotel staffs were very polite and friendly. I booked two rooms for 5 pax. One room for 3 and the other for 2. The room was 3 was a tad too small. But im not complaining as it was clean and tidy. Toilet seat came with bidet and warmer. Plus point during winter. I love it.Only suggestion, is to have a coat hangar in the room. There wasnt anywhere to air our coats during winter, especially after eating korean bbq. Other than that, i would recommend this hotel to other guests. Theres a convenient store right outside the hotel as well.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very good location, in between Myeongdong and Seoul Station. If you don’t mind walking, you can go from one end to another of the shopping district. And it is in front of Namdaemun Market, bargain shopping area. The rooms are comfortable and clean, very well maintained.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my wife stayed at TMark Hotel Myeongdong for about a week in early December 2017. Overall we had a very good stay. The location of the hotel is probably the strongest point. It is located literally just steps from the Chungmuro subway station which provides easy access to the remainder of the city via subway. The hotel is also a 10-minute walk from the busy Myeongdong shopping street. It's far away enough so that your hotel stay is quiet, but close enough that it's a comfortable stroll to reach there. However, there's lots of little restaurants within the vicinity of the hotel if you're looking for a more quieter eating experience. Great coffees and cafes nearby! In the end, I only gave the hotel a 4-star rating because there was nothing really exceptional or any services provided that went beyond the call-of-duty. In fact, other than check-in and check-out, I don't think we interacted with the hotel staff. They kept our room clean everyday, and I suppose that's all that we could ask for. It was a very good stay, and it would be an easy recommend.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located near lots of little restaurants, bars and grocery stores and is also easy walking distance to the mt station. The room was ok, the bed was large and comfy, but it was just a little tired and dated. We ate in the hotel one night, there was a deal on the buffet, unlimited food (and beer!) which was good although some food was lukewarm. The hotel had an artificial smell throughout, some sort of air freshener, which was a bit overpowering at times.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed for 5 days and was happy! Great location very near namdeamun market( just cross the street) walking distance to Myeongdong market too. Very clean, good room sizes, my view was the Seoul tower(colorful night lightings) temperature was a bit warm for me but I could open the window a bit for ventilation. Over all it was a great hotel I would recommend.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for a week whilst in Seoul on business. The beds are super comfortable, with very comfortable pillows and decent sized rooms for the city. The bathroom had a bath tub that was a good size for me. The location was great right near the subway and an easy walk to markets or the Mt. Breakfast needs some work. An egg station would lift the breakfast from a 2 to a 4. The food was confusing and a mash up of last night's left overs and just boiled egg that ran out very fast if you were not early. I would stay again.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very clean and the WiFi is decent as well. Furthermore, the staff in the hotel are very friendly and patient, and I would like to thank Mickey Lee for his meticulousness in guiding us to our destinations and recommending shops with tasty fried chicken
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: bad policy by not allowing guests to turn on the air condition during winter time. the room I stayed is extremely hot and suffocated even with the heater turned off and tiny window opened.I still have 4 nights to go, unfortunately.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Tmark here is well located within walking distance of Myeongdong, the subway line, heaps of restaurants and bars, some attractions etc. When catching public transport, it was never too far from anywhere we wanted to go in Seoul. There are convenience shops located close for drinks and snacks. I cannot fault the staff. They were all very professional and helpful at all times. The rooms were clean, well equipped, a good size and we even had a view of Seoul Tower which was lovely. There was always a nice smell on the hotel floors when we exited the lifts. We ate breakfast in the restaurant each morning. There was a wide variety of foods available so you can always find something to suit you. We had a buffet dinner in the hotel one night. The food was fresh and delicious, There is a rooftop with a gorgeous night view which is worth checking out. We never looked during the day but check it out it you get time. I would stay here again. I cannot fault this wonderful hotel at allThank you Tmark hotel :)
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I did recommend this Hotel while i was staying here when the night was yet young? But as the we realized late at nite the Air conditioning was very poor as we were told that is central? So the it was not a pleasant sleep. The B'fast buffet is not bad but can the food be Warm plz. Ohhhhh and plz have more staff in your Tour de caffe as we waited 20mins for a coffee. one person is not enough.Will look forward on my return for Part 111.????
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: How to get to the hotel from the Seoul Main Train Station get e metro blue line to station named: Chungmuro. (third station from Seoul Station), than the hotel is in the Exit 6 and more 200 meters of walk. Easy, fast and cheap.Gret location.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Its a decent hotel near train station, with comfortable bed. Room is spacious which is rare for hotels near myeongdong. It is still relatively on the pricey side considering the location is not really myeongdong. Concierge service is rather lacking, staff should be warmer & able to speak & understand english better
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here in the triple single room. The beds are small and there is no way two small people can sleep together. Overall, the hotel is clean, well though out. We liked how close to the subway the hotel is. It is about 7-10 minute walk to Myeongdong. There are some convenience stores right outside for snacks and some restaurants within 100 yards as well. We thought the buffet was not very good or worth the money, you can do better. Views were nothing special. They did store our bags during the day while we shopped after check our, so that was nice.
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is near Myeongdong. Take around 10 minutes walk to reach the shopping district. Close to Chung muro station.Receptionists are professional and friendly. Can converse in English and Chinese. Very helpful when we are for directions too!Hotel room is clean and spacious. Wifi signal is acceptable.Few 24 hrs shops just a few walks away. Convenient!
hotelName:
24    Tmark Hotel Myeongdong
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great stay at Makers and would definitely recommend this place for anyone seeking a clean place in a great location. The market opposite is great and the entrance is right outside exit 4 of the subway. The staff are excellent, friendly and very helpful. We would stay again!!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is in really great part of town. It’s right next to an area where there are a lot of little restaurants and shops that were created out of Hanoks. They are so cute and every restaurant I’ve tried is delicious! The people at the hotel are amazingly helpful. They bend over backwards to help you find where you’re going, find a solution to a problem you’re having, or just help out in general and cheer you up. I liked it so much that I canceled one of my other reservations and booked another four nights there. The rooms are clean and simply laid out. It’s one of the favorite places that I’ve stayed on this trip.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pretty impressively cool and consistent design all around, the building itself, decos, reception area, rooms, and even amenities and stationeries, well detailed and designed. Also location is superb just out of the exit 4 of Subway 5 Jongro3-ga station, right in the middle of old Seoul area. Staffs are professional, friendly and courteous trying their best to cope with customer’s request. All in all, it’d be a good choice to stay in this cute and hip place if you’re to stay right in the center of old Seoul.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pretty impressive cool and consistent design all around, the building itself, decos, lounge area, rooms and even amenities and stuffs, in a hip but sophisticated manner. Location is superb im the center of the old Seoul, right out of the exit 4 of subway Jongro3-ga station. Staffs are professional, friendly and courteous trying hard to cope with the customer’s demand. All in all, it would be a good choice to stay at this cool and cute plave if you’d spend a night in the center of ild Seoul.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is very easy to get to from the airport by subway. The stop is in front of the doors. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Their English is good. Hotel was clean and is next to a lot of restaurants and coffee shops. It's about a 20 minute walk to downtown sites
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very cool location next to metro station in restaurant area and street markets in Ikseon Dong / Insa dong area. Quiet rooms (we were on level 9) in very cool looking little boutique style hotel. The beds are maybe a bit hard but you can ask for a topper if you need. (We didn’t need in the end)
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in this hotel for 4 nights and would stay here again. If you are looking for a hotel right next to public transport and need simple but stylish accommodations, this is for you. It is next to Jogno Sam 3 station (exit 4). You need to transfer if you want to go to Myeongdong, alternatively it is about 20 minute walk. There are lots of restaurants nearby. Insadong is also close.We had a small room with twin beds but it was sufficient for our needs if you have medium sized luggage. They had storage space but it lacked hanging space. Bathroom was a decent size too. Each level didn't seem to have too many rooms which was good and room came with a simple breakfast on the lower ground floor. Hotel is decorated in a hipster style.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel’s location is superb! Right in front of Jongno 3 ga station EXIT 4. This exit has escalator so very convenience. Lots of restaurant, convenience stores in this area. The small road opposite the hotel is worth to explore! Beautiful cafe and shops all along the road. The hotel is well designed, clean and comfortable. Everything looks exactly the same as in its website. Staffs are very helpful and speak English fluently. Room is bigger than expected. We can open 2 big luggages on the floor and still have lots of spaces in the room. Bathroom separates between dry zone and shower zone which is great. You have everything you need. Big towels, small towels, toothbrush, shampoo, conditioner, soap, lotion. They also have bathrobe and slippers in the closet. Small refrigerator and safe are provided as well. One thing we want hotel to improve is bed quality. It is too hard and you can feel the bed spring when you lay down on the bed. Making your back hurt sometimes.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The simple question: Would you stay here again? My answer: Absolutely.This was my first visit to Seoul, so I wasn’t sure what to expect or where to stay. I picked the Makers based on location and the look of the hotel online.On arrival the lobby/reception area was kind of funky with the feel of an industrial apartment like you find in many parts of the world.Check in was speedy and friendly and soon enough I was off to my room.Rooms are smallish if you’re used to Australian or American hotels, but on par with lots of what you’d find in London. The great part though is that they’re super well laid out so you won’t feel cramped at all. The one thing I would have like was a bit more hanging space for clothing.After settling in I headed back to reception where I was given a bunch of info about both the hotel and things I might like to see and do nearby - awesome and super helpful info - be sure to check out the book in the lobby which has cool places and all sorts of info.Finally, a special thanks to Sally! Absolutely made my stay and time in Korea so much easier and more enjoyable! Warm and friendly, answered all of my silly questions and gave me great advice on perfect English! Thanks again!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: RoomSuper like this boutique hotel. Bed is on platform. Bed is hard not soft, which is fine for me. I like to sit on the platform rather than the chair in the room. The hairdryer is on the wall of the bathroom. I stayed on the highest floor. The water pressure is good. Hot water is good. The towel size is normal. Some tripadvisor forum says that the some hotels provide very small hotel towels. This hotel towels are normal size. There is no air-con, only heater. So I had to open the window slightly. LocationFantastic location. Purple line exit 4 is just in front. If travelling by train to hotel, follow the guide from the hotel website. Don't stop at Seoul Station, stop at Gongdeok station. There is both upward and downward escalator at this exit. There are escalators all the way through so I didnt have difficulty managing my 17kg luggage. If going to Seoul station, reception will recommend exit 3. There is no escalator at this exit. The one with lift is at exit 7, which is just across the street. The area has a number of food places and tent food stall that open till late. So may be noisy for some people. Drivers in Seoul like to honk. The location is on a small street so this wasn't a problem.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really pleasant experience at this hotel! The location is just amazing. It is located just right beside the Seoul Metro station Jongno 3-ga, which is an interchange for 3 lines. The hotel is also within walking distance from Myeongdong shopping street. It is really accessible to go anywhere from the hotel and very convenient to get back to the hotel as you won't have to walk much after exiting the metro station because the hotel is literally right beside the station. They also had great service. The hotel staffs are really warm, kind and friendly. They greeted me and my family everytime they saw us and tended to anything we needed. The rooms were also really cozy and clean and there are convenience stores, eateries and restaurants around the hotel. Overall, a really great hotel and a great experience! Will definitely stay again!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All was ok until we had a Very bad experience checking out. We had to also pay a deposit that upon checking in which is not informed until you reach the hotel. On the last day when we checked out, we left our baggage at the hotel lobby and went for a short day out before heading back to collect them and head to the airport. The hotel staff then told us that we were smoking in the room as the room smelt of smoke. The both of us do not smoke at all and was shocked of this accusation. We asked to inspect the room and also for evidence like cigarette buds whick they may have found of which they were quick to respond that the room had been cleaned and a candle was lit to remove the smell. Clearly, they could not produce evidence and was on the defensive the moment we asked for them. Funny thing was they could have informed us while we were outside and clarified with us upon finding out but they chose to do it upon us coming back and were rushing for the airport. We left very angrily and will continue to monitor the credit card charges in case there are any fraudulany charges made or that the refund of the deposit do not happen. We are unsure if this is a scam. So beware.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location was incredible,about 20 footsteps from Exit 4 Jongno-3(sam) ga. Very accessible and perfect especially during winter when one tries to avoid being outdoors as much as possible. All staff were exceptional in English & helpful & detailed in any instructions given. Room was reasonably sized with a good-sized bathroom (bigger than most boutique-hotel bathrooms). Heating system & hot water for baths was always enough & meets your expectations.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is a very convenient base to move around Seoul. The entrance to the subway is right at it's doorstep, and it's possible to walk all the way to Myeongdong and the Dongdaemun area, though I would recommend taking the subway or bus. Food is readily available around the area; just in front is a street full of fusion/ western cafes/ restaurants and further down is another food street with local fare.The deluxe suite with bath is very spacious; the bathroom has a lot of counter space, and fits a large bath. The living area also has a nice sitting space with storage cabinets and a small safe. Everything seems very new and well-maintained. It wouldn't hurt if they could include some luggage racks in the rooms.The breakfast is rather basic, though sufficient, if you're looking to have an early start to the day and hit all the major tourist attractions once they open. This is provided for at their cafe, The Common, which also hosts occasional events there was a jazz quartet playing while we were there.Staff are generally very helpful and polite, though fluency in English varies.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Right above the purple line #5 subway stop is Makers Hotel, an old industrial building renovated to be "trendy." Good prices, good mattresses, small rooms. Easy to walk almost anywhere -- or take the subway!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Upon stepping into the hotel, it feels as if we have just entered the wizarding world of harry potter. Reaching our floor where our room is, it feels as if we are in a sci-fi movie.The hotel is nicely decorated and value for money based on it's centralized location.Surrounding the hotel have many convenience shop and restaurants, making it more convenient to grab any late night snacks.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel reception is decorated as if it’s a hipster coffee shop in Shoreditch rather than a hotel in Seoul. A lot of effort has obviously gone into the very fashionable design of the hotel. The location is perfect - right next to a subway entrance. The subways are easy to use and very inexpensive. Lots of food venues on your doorstep including the very fashionable old part of Insa-dong opposite. However, if you want better food at at much more reasonable price, turn left out of the hotel and walk under the tunnel to the new part of India-dong. Great shopping as well there. The rooms are small, but perfectly adequate. The hotel, like the rest of Seoul is immaculately clean. Reception staff are very helpful. The beds are very hard. The room was a bit style over substance. Instead of having seating, bizarrely with a tv behind it, more storage would have been preferable. A few shelves and a half wardrobe with four coat hangers is not adequate for two adults on a ten night stay.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The interior of the hotel was nice. The room was small but i guess that’s common in Korea. Several metro stations are close by. In the evening small tents are set up in the street nearby the hotel where you can eat street food. Across from the hotel there’s an area with small restaurants in narrow street. I didn’t eat breakfast in the hotel.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We chose Makers Hotel for our Seoul trip and couldn't have made a better choice. Perfect location, immaculate rooms, excellent service and nice breakfast, we'll stay again there if we go back to Seoul. Highly recommended
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I came across Makers Hotel on a hotel booking website while planning our trip to Seoul. Initially I was hesitant to stay in the "tourist area", since I imagined something like Khao San Road in Bangkok. The price was also very reasonable -- and inclusive of breakfast -- which made me wonder if it was too good to be true. But the photos looked great, the website looked great, and the reviews were good, so I booked. NO REGRETS!!! We stepped into the lobby late in the evening, and the look and smell of the place were perfectly charming and restful and took away the exhaustion of the trip there*. Mike who checked us in was very friendly and efficient, and was patient with our questions. The room was small and simple but thoughtful and comfortable, with a nice work desk, a firm bed, a bench for sitting and placing luggage, a safe, slippers and robes, and lots of storage space in the closet. The bathroom is modern and very functional, and the toiletries smell GREAT. And everything is insanely CLEAN.But our favorite thing by far was the breakfast. We had expected a crowded, chaotic, bare-bones kind of setup -- too many stays at the Hampton Inn! -- but instead we entered a dining room that was beautifully designed, so clean, and had jazz music playing. What a great way to start the day. The food was wonderful too -- cereal, Korean rice, ham and cheese, breads, coffee, soup, salad, and more. Thank you Makers Hotel, we will definitely stay with you again when we're next in Seoul!*One word of warning: if you're taking the Airport Express train, be sure to get on the 5 Line to get to station Exit 4. We got on the 1 Line and got to Exit 3, since that's what Googlemaps and Naver Maps told us to do. We ended up lugging our luggage through REALLY long, winding subway passages, sometimes up and down stairs since there were no options for elevators or escalators. And it's a longer walk from Exit 3 to the hotel too. Good thing the lobby was such a welcome sight -- took the exhaustion and crankiness away instantly!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Having been to Seoul a number of times and each at different hotels, Makers is definitely one of my top stays so far. Huge fan of the stylish decor in lobby/reception/cafe bar, the rooms are modern, clean and economical, some people might not make full use of the desk/office area but I found it fantastic for travel research and photo editing. Super friendly and helpful staff tops off a fantastic stay in Seoul.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Makers Hotel is located quite central in Seoul, literally next to a subway station. It is a walking distance to Samjigil-street for viewing some stores and a much longer walk to Gyeongbokgung palace (easily reachable through subway). The hotel itself looks neat and has AC in all rooms.The semi-double room is small but works well for 2 people. Sleeping however can be a problem; personally I cannot stand much noise when I sleep, and considering the location the nights were rather loud. Earplugs were my friends!I never spent much time at the hotel because of plans so I cannot comment the food or services. Overall, a good hotel to sleep in but you might not want to spend more time here than necessary. The price is fairly good for what you get and it is even better if street noise is no problem for you! /SL
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Hotel is very stylish and well themed, from the minute you arrive the staff is super helpful and polite. Mike (one of the guys) made sure that every need of ours was catered for and was available until last minute. He went the extra mile at any chance and made loads of interesting conversation.The Hotel is in a very useful location, right next to the metro station and you can walk to almost every place nearby. Don't miss the back alleys in front of the hotel, very charming!What can be improved is the distribution and decoration of the rooms, some are too basic and some are noisy (make sure you don't get one next to the maid's room!).Otherwise, very recommended.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Awesome hotel - everything you need and great staff :) Fantastic area also - a pumping street with a cute lil trendie area too the north for coffee and dessert! Would stay here again for sure! Actually we did! Haha
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You couldn’t wish for better hotel service. The staff are so knowledgeable, wonderful and helpful they make The Makers! Our room is a large twin bedded on the 9th floor with great views across the city, The hotel is ultra modern and very clean. The breakfast is simple but adequate. I would thoroughly recommend staying here.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 1. 조식이 저렴하다. 저렴한 가격에 적당한 메뉴.Cheap Breakfast. Enough menu compared to cheap price.2. 깔끔한 디자인과 방, 친절한 직원.Clean&neat designed room, nice staff.3. 접근성(길건너 익선동 한옥마을, 조금 더 걸으면 북촌/경복궁/쌈지길이 나온다.)Accessibility(Ikseon Dong Hanok Village across the road. Gyeongbokgung Palace, Ssamziegil, Bukchon Hanok Village about 10 minutes walk.)4. 종로 3가 역 4번 출구 앞.In front of Jongno 3-ga station exit 4.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I spent nine nights in the Makers Hotel. The staff was friendly and helpful. Most of them greeted us warmly each time the saw us enter or leave the hotel. They gave good advice on things such as using the metro and getting a bus to the airport. For us the best aspect of the hotel was it’s location in the heart of the historic center of Seoul. There is a lot to see in the city and from the hotel it was a short walk to the World Heritage palaces and most of the other important sites of Seoul. Another big plus was that all of the staff spoke English well. The rooms were rather small but neat, modern, and well appointed. Our nine day stay was separated into three separate bookings. For one of the bookings we were put in a substandard room with some concrete walls, a tiny window, and an electric socket with wires exposed. We were quite disappointed, especially my wife, who is claustrophobic. We asked for another room but had to endure the small one for two nights because the hotel was full. I think it was inappropriate to offer such an ugly room in a hotel with such a good reputation. I recommend that anyone staying here be sure to request a room with a normal size window and painted walls. The breakfast was nothing special with a minimum of selections available, but you could get a healthy and filling meal if you chose the right items. The breakfast was also exactly the same every morning. This wouldn’t matter to someone staying one or two nights but for our nine-day stay it proved to be rather boring. I recommend the Makers Hotel as a friendly, reasonably priced hotel in an expensive city.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Super friendly and helpful staff, great English skills. Rooms were basic but nice, definitely enough for a solo trip. The breakfast is very nice with surprisingly large variety and the dining/café area is super cozy.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Easy to come from ICN airport by Airport Line and transfer to Line No.5 and The Hotel at front of Exit no.4Best Location for everything!!! All Staffs are very kindness and helpful in everything that I want.Thank you very muchRecommended !!!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great design, functional and clean rooms with some nice touches. Excellent location right outside the subway and across the street from lots of hanok restaurants and bars sellinf local ales and beers (bar 3.14 and brewbar)
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Lovely reception, great location with very good transport links. Lots of food choices right outsie the hotel, not so good for veggies but then nowhere in Korea is...The rooms very fairly small and basic but very clean and did the job, nice bathrooms. The best thing about Makers is the staff working there. Thye cannot do enough to help. Met 3 different staff over out 3 nights stay and they were all super friendly an spoke fantastic english which is not something I have found in other small hotels in Seoul. Travel there once or twice a year and this will be my first choice of accomodation in Seoul from now on
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location in the middle of everything and near a very nice pedestrian zone with lots of restaurants. Lobby is extremely nice and cozy and the service and kindness of front desk staff is amazing (best of bests is Mike!). The impression is of a boutique hotel with very good value for money.Breakfast is ok, in a very nice basement zone, which makes it even more enjoyable.The point to improve is that our triple room was very very tiny and hopefully we decided to split the 3 of us in 2 rooms. Our room had no views (to a wall) and was not decorated, so was very cold. The double rooms we saw were much better. More cozy, well decorated and warm. Another thing to consider is that during night, the rooms can be a little bit noisy.But overall very good value for money, best location and extremely good and friendly service!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were so pleasantly surprised when we popped out of the subway right in front of the Makers Hotel. So convenient and surreal! Thanks to TripAdvisor, we were ready for the masculine decor and emphasis on innovation.Loved the lobby, breakfast lounge, and bathroom, but the room lacked any sense of coziness. I wish that there was a comfortable couch in the living room suite, that invited one to sit casually vs. in a stilted way. A couple of art pieces would also have warmed up the walls.The bedroom was much improved when they responded to our request for a pillow top mattress. Their options are limited, but it made a world of difference to have a softer sleep. Thankfully, the room was quite quiet, so we were fortunate to feel like we were in a private space away from the energy of the city.Beyond a few discomforts, we felt right at home and loved our ability to head out on our treks and return to such a great neighborhood. Our kind hosts and hostesses were incredibly gracious and we would love to see them again.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Makers Hotel is the ideal sweet spot of a hotel that is difficult to find - it's a budget accommodation that does a good job of making itself look like it isn't. And I mean that in a good way.Makers lobby is cozy and stylish, like your cool uncle's cigar den. Hallways continue the theme with dark finishes and accent lighting. Once you're inside the room the flash and bang disappear and you're inside a very basic hotel room that is just enough to get the job done. I'm a fan, especially with hotel prices in Seoul being so outrageous in many cases.The bed is a bit on the hard side, but that's pretty common in Asia. Not a ton of space in the room but you're better off spending your time enjoying street food or exploring the various neighborhoods in one of Asia's most dynamic cities, so who needs room in the hotel? Shower had great pressure and constant hot water. Again - pretty bare bones but still not a hostel. The hotel's location is close to many sights you'd want to see, tons of great food nearby, and a short walking distance to many of Seoul's biggest attractions and shopping destinations. Overall a great option for those looking to enjoy the city without spending all their vacation money on the hotel.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I truly enjoyed my 5-night stay at this stylish jazzy hotel, situated right outside Jongno 3-ga Station (Exit 4). Very convenient and centrally located, as Jongno 3-ga Station is connected to subway lines 1, 3 and 5. Walking distance to several attractions such as Insadong, Jongmyo and Changdeokgung. Right across the street is Ikseondong, a quaint hanok neighbourhood with lots of modern boutiques and creative cafes. Head there for lunch or dinner!The area comes alive at night, with locals drinking and chatting in street food tents (pojangmacha) right outside the hotel.Only downside is, the hotel rooms are not really soundproof, so it could get a little noisy at night.However, I would like to commend Chris who helped me switch rooms at midnight, as the travellers staying next door were too noisy.Overall, it was still a pleasant stay, and I would definitely come back for my next Seoul holiday!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Need not to see the designer has put a lot of thoughts into this boutique size hotel. The pictures say it all. It is clean and simple inside. It has a jazz show on some evening. The lobby is cute though I just walked through it. The location is a heaven. Lots of food options. Nagwon-dong, Jong-myo are in walking distance depends on what you would like to see. Subway exit #4 of Jongno-3-ga is just right in front of the hotel. The only downside - the breakfast is not attractive but it was OK. I would come back to this hotel and would recommend friends to stay here.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Near attractions, clean room, polite receptionists, food and convenient stores in front of the hotel. The only problem is probably the flushing/sewage system is not that perfect but I assume this is normal in Korea. Excellent place to stay for your trip!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's so convenient for my wife and I to make our way to Makers Hotel from CHINATOWN: just take Line 1 Incheon Station, and alight at Jongno 3ga Station, in 1 hour 21 minutes. (We took the A'REX and subway to Chinatown.) At the Sinpo Market(신포국제시장) in Chinatown, our great Korean food adventure took off to a good start: tasting the famous dakgangjeong 닥강정 (deep fried crispy chicken glazed in spicy, sticky, and sweet sauce). For eight nights (7-14 March 2018), we stayed at the tenth floor (top) floor, overlooking a Hanok village. It was quiet, so that we could sleep well. For the buffet breakfast, Makers Hotel varies its soup, providing soup of the day (corn, potato, carrot etc.), so it's not boring. Besides, it puts healthy food on the table: salad, fruits, egg and yogurt. Makers Hotel has satisfied my key need: location, location, location! It's a great go-to base to many tourist attractions: GARDEN OF MORNING CALM: Gyeongchun Line, Cheongpyeong Station Exit 1; then take Bus 31-7 (running at hourly intervals) 30 minutes' journeyLOTTE TOWN MAIN BRANCH: Euljiro-1 Station Line 2 Exit 8 CHEONGYECHUN STREAM: Jonggak Station Line 1 Exit 5NAMDAEMUN MARKET: Hoehyeon STN Line 4 Exit 5. Over there, we thoroughly enjoyed the "galchijorim갈치조림 (braised cutlass fish, called 刀鱼 (in Chinese). Not far away, we savored the strange-looking, never-seen-before but delectable sea-squirt, called “mongae” (Korean) or海鞘 (Chinese), which was sold by an "ajuma" who had been in this business for over 30 years. It tasted like a weird kind of octopus or squid.YOIDO FULL GOSPEL CHURCH 여의도 순복음 교회: Yeouinaru STN Line 5 Exit 2GYEONGBOKGUNG PALACE: Gyeongbokgung Stn. Line 3 Exit 5PAJU PREMIUM OUTLET: Hapjeong Station Line 2/6 Exit 1; then, take Bus 2200, journey taking 45~~60 minutesITAEWON: Itaewon Station Line 6 Exit 1NATIONAL HANGEUL MUSEUM: Ichon Station Line 4 Exit 2NORYANGJIN FISH MARKET: Noryangjin Station Line 1, Exit 2MYEONG-DONG: Myeongdong Station Line 4, Exit 6/7INCHEON AIRPORT: board from Seoul Station, Line 1If you have to lug a heavy luggage from the Hotel (which we had to, after making our 'trophy' purchases to bring home) to the subway Line 1, the shortest way to it is Exit 1 (street level), which was wisely suggested by Todd (Makers Hotel's staff). As it turned out, that was a most helpful tip, because if we'd used Exit 4 (the one nearest to the Hotel), we'd have suffered, on the last day of our tour in Korea, a most wearisome time to pull up our big luggage over lots of steps!Our only grouse about Makers Hotel was that it takes some time for us to get used to getting up from the floor-level bed! And then, it's time to go home-sweet-home!My impression of South Korea? It's very clean, and Korean people are so helpful with giving direction!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From gimpo airport domestic flight take the purple line to jongno 3 (sam)ga exit 4 . Got escalator all the way up , no problem carrying luggage.Front desk speaks English and check in & out was smooth . Room was comfortable and modern . Lots of restaurant & convenient store nearby . Walking distance to gwangjang market & insadong , to tapgol park west gate to take the Nami island shuttle bus at 9:30am . I have a early flight and the metro station open at 5am and metro arrive 5:40am sharp towards to gimpo airport (42minutes) . Overall a good stay
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was needing to find a place to stay last minute and came across MAKERS HOTEL online. I've lived in Korea for years and didn't want a traditional motel. This place reminds of my accomodations in Brooklyn, NY. The staff are brilliant. The rooms are wonderful.
