The aesthetic is very non-traditional Korean and placed in a happening neighbourhod right beside the subway station. It's a trendy boutique hotel that I would recommend to anyone staying in Seoul. Thanks for the time, Makers. Excellent branding.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location & easily accessible from both the airport and Seoul station. Lobby area is super trendy and rooms are great value for $. Skip the breakfast (especially if you’re vegetarian/vegan. Friendly staff & excellent service. Would stay again!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a surprise to find such a nice and unique hotel like that in Seoul. The room was very comfy and warm, the breakfast was the best in Asia (so far) and they have a fantastic crew working on it. It was such a pleasure to spent our days here!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of this hotel is outstanding - right by the subway and very easy to find. The receptionists were always very friendly and helped us with all our queries. The room was simple but clean and had everything you needed. There is a lot to do nearby and I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I came from Norway, and met up with my mother in Seoul. She found Makers online, and our choice to stay here had a big influence on the experience of the weekend!! We stayed in one of the three person rooms, which wasn't very large but not too small and had everything we needed.... including a cute welcome package with some treats! We really liked that we were provided with bathrobes and slippers, as well as the fridge,kettle and tea in the room for the mornings. We did not have breakfast at the hotel during our stay, but we visited The Common for coffees and it was very cozy. Our weekend was made extra special by the fantastic service we received from the hotel staff. I must make special mention of Mike - he went above and beyond to help us with any questions we had, ordering taxi services for us, and giving excellent recommendations of the neighborhood. He made us feel so welcome, taken care of, and his service was more attentive than the concierge service at 5 star hotels!The hotel is located directly across the street from the Bukchon Hanok village, which is an excellent place to spend your afternoon wandering around. If you are looking for directions, just ask the front desk and they will print a map of the area and show you exactly where to go!We were in search of dinner relatively late one night, and Mike sent us across the street to a tiny restaurant which is popular with locals and loved by bloggers - the food was fantastic and we never would have known about it if not for the suggestion. The metro stations is literally ten paces from the hotel door, which is incredibly convenient.We loved our weekend at Makers and will definitely be staying here again in the future.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is a great location, just by exit 4 of the subway, it was really easy to find. The staff speak excellent English and were more than happy to help. The room is very clean and comfortable with modern decor and amenities like fridge, hairdryer, kettle etc. The reception area is also really nicely styled and matches the extra attention to detail that this hotel provides. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is well located right next to metro station. Many restaurants and convenient stores nearby (open 24 hrs!) The room is small but it's ok for few nights, however there is lack of clothes hanger in the room... the aircon/heat control is very confusing (all in korean), it's either too hot or too cold.the hotel locks its door 1am, i think it's because there are lots of drunk people at night in the area... could hear them screaming/ yelling in the mid of nightDo check out the area opposite to the hotel, it has lots of cafes and bars !
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent 6 nights in Seoul and had a very comfortable stay at Makers Hotel. The staff was extremely helpful and courteous. The room was clean, very well-maintained and wifi was reliable and fast. Its location is also convenient. At the doorstep of the hotel, there is a subway station entrance where you can access three lines. Aside from plenty of restaurants in the vicinity, there are also a few pop-up food hawkers at the adjacent street, set up during evenings. Overall, this hotel is definitely value-for-money. This will be my go-to accommodation during my next visit to Seoul.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel looks exactly like the photos! The interior deco is beautiful! So much detail to everything even the lift!Location wise, it's directly in front of Jongno-3-ga station, exit 4 (connects to line 5). It's convenient enough since Jongno-3-ga is a transfer station for 3 different lines (line 1, 3 and 5). There's a CU convenience store right opposite the hotel and loads of eateries (some 24hrs ones) around the hotel too!The only downside is, the escalator to the station from exit 4 is very narrow (only fits 1 person) (but that's not the hotel's fault) so be mindful if you're carrying big luggages! Also, there are stairs leading to the train platform (no lift or escalators at one point)!However not to worry as there's a direct bus (6002) to incheon airport and it's only a 3min walk! 10,000won and it comes every 10-15min!The room is spacious enough and very clean! There were only 5 rooms on my floor which makes it less noisy :) toilet was clean too and toiletries were provided :)I want to commend the exceptional service provided by the staff! All the staff at the reception are well versed in English and are extremely friendly!On my first night, I discovered that my toilet was choked at 12.30am (the reception closes at 1am) and I was panicking. (I might have used too much toilet paper previously lol) anyway the staff on duty that night came up to my room to help me unclog the toilet bowl and when he returned with a new floor mat for me, he even prepared a little packet of snacks for me!!!!! So thoughtful and sweet! This little gesture was enough to give this hotel a 11/10 rating!!!!Price is extremely affordable and reasonable as well! Definitely will return and stay here again if I come back to Seoul! Thank you Makers Hotel and the kind guy at the reception who helped me with the toilet (sorry didn't get your name!!)
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at Makers Hotel for two nights with my wife and 3yr son. Transportation is very convenient. There are three subway lines (Line #1, #3, and #5) and many historical sites near this hotel. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Most important of all, the room (double single beds) is very clean and special for 3 people family. Although this hotel is a 2-star hotel, it offers a 3-star level of service quality for customers. Highly recommended. Will stay here once again in the future.
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great rooms! Really great people! Close to everything! Would definitely stay again. The front desk staff is very helpful and kind. Kudos go out for Mike and Ally!! Thanks! The palaces are in walking distance ... the village is across the street. And right off the line 1 metro
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Makers Hotel located right above subway Jongno Sam Ga Line 5 Exit 4 with eleavator is a fantastic place to set as base to explore Seoul..definitely worth a return visit!Location : excellentAmbience : nice old charmBreakfast : adequately comfortableLocated within 10-15 walk to Insadong, Bukchon Hanok Village, Ikseandong,Samcheongdong
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is located right next to a subway station (with escalators) so finding it was really easy. Check-in was really smooth and customer service was top-notch throughout my stay. I loved my room, it was really spacious and really comfortable. Bottled water was replenished everyday and tea & kettle were provided. TV had over 100 channels including English channels. Bathroom was really clean and large. Toiletries were provided as well as a hairdryer. I had breakfast at The Common twice because it was so convenient! The food was good, served buffet style nice & hot. Lots of choices including milk, juice & coffee. Absolutely loved my stay and thank you for making my trip to Seoul an amazing one! Just a small feedback: A full-length mirror wouldn’t hurt! :)
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel’s location could not be better, right off the Jongno-3ga stop of line 5, and this hotel is amazingly well-branded and so cute! The beds were very firm, which is not my favorite thing, and the neighborhood was noisy into the night and early in the morning, but the friendly hotel staff, location and appearance more than made up for those. The room was clean and the bathroom was beautiful and the shower was great, and I would stay here again in a heartbeat and am planning on returning! Well done, Makers!
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Another hotel that I would like to recommend in Seoul. The Makers hotel was situated just next to subway from Jongno 3 ga, Exit 4. From here, you can easily access to Insadong, Myeong-dong area etc. There are lots of restaurants surrounding the hotel, at night, there are many street food stalls that you can try it out! Staying here, I can experienced the local life of Korean, as part of this area is still very ‘old town’ feel...The room was very nicely designed, cleaned and equipped with very nice amenities. The bed was bit ‘hard’ for me, but the pillows was comfort enough. Overall, it was great. The only comment is about the air-conditioner, whereby during the time that I stayed, the weather was started getting cold, and the hotel has turned on the central heater functions, hence, the air conditioner was unable to function in the room, only heater. Actually, I have no issues to open the window for the fresh and cool air, however, the only downside was during the night time, there were lots of street stalls that operated till late night, bit noisy if I open the window, but feel stuffy if I didn’t open the window, since only heater is turning on...Would like to kudus to the hotel front desk staff, Ally, that provided me all the useful information and assistance. She spoke very good English and was really helpful, tried her best to assist me on everything, included the heater issues, though the issue was not fixed, but I can still feel the efforts she put... She makes me feel good! Furthermore, when I asked for some recommendations on the local food, she not just verbally told, but even printed out the map, circled out the exact restaurant and translated to the English as well. Her kind assistance is greatly appreciated.All in all, I still having positive experiences while stayed with Makers :)
hotelName:
25    Makers Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent place you have there. I believe all participants Inclusive of myself had a wonderful experience at the hotel. This was coupled with the fact the food was deliciously exquisite and the ambiance very marvelous.❤
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Before arrival, I sent an email to request for early check-in but there was no reply at all. When I arrived at 10am on the day itself, sure enough I was rejected for check-in. The receptionist told me that they had received my email but I had to come back at 12pm to check on availability. If only they had replied my email beforehand, I would have made other arrangement!! The terrible experience continued because when I came back to the hotel at 12.45pm, the same receptionist continued to tell me that no room is available and I can come back at 3pm which is the normal check in time. I was obviously exhausted but he did not give any alternatives or show any empathy. I had to suggest to pay an extra night in order to get a room immediately. I am a business traveler and had meetings to attend in the afternoon. The whole poor communication continued with him not understanding my request at all and telling me that they give me a complimentary upgrade which cost 50,000won. Is that even complimentary? I was nevertheless eager to pay and end my misery. When I clarified if 50,000won was for the whole stay, he led me to believe so but eventually, I was presented with a bill of 110,000won, i.e. 50,000won is for per night BEFORE TAX. As a frequent traveler, I had never experience such poor communications at check-in in an international branded hotel before.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A nice Novotel located in a tourist part of Seoul. Facilities are good but the hotel dining is very expensive. Room key needed fixing every day which was inconvenient having gone all the way to the room to then have to go back down to reception to get the key cut. Has an executive lounge which was packed on the weekend and I couldn't get in.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for a business trip to Seoul. The hotel has a welcoming lobby where you can find a nice bar with live band.The rooms are typical Novotel. Clean and all facilities are there.Around the corner you can go to station street, where you can find loads of nice bars and restaurants for the evening. I will go back to this hotel in 2 months.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located at the heart of Gangnam, 5-7 min walk to train station.Room is nice and modern, great professional gym for full workoutBasically, nothing negative I can think of.It was my wife 's birthday during the stay, and the hotel kindly arrange a birthday cake delivered to the room at midnight, which was a pleasant surpriseThis is my second time staying here, and it will not be the last for sure
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed their for almost 2weeks. Smooth check in, warm welcome. The location of Novotel Gangnam is truely amazing, and one big reason why i always stay here. Not only that, but i always enjoy the personalised warm welcome by Front office manager, Mr Jeong. Thank you for your hospitality and look forward to seeing you in the next few konths again!
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is excellent - near train station and food street but still quiet at night. The service is even better. Hotel staff did everything they can to help. Nephew forgot his phone in taxi. The staff tracked down and got his phone back. Will definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a wonderful stay at the Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam. Staff was courteous and very polite and went out of their way to make you feel welcome. It is always a difficult balancing act trying to cater to both families and business travelers, but I believe they did a great job., Rooms were well appointed with good amenities, a bit on the smaller side but to be expected. Please note for families, that you will require two rooms if you have more than 1 child. Breakfast was included in our rate and a great way to start each of our day's in Seoul. We also had a chance to use the pool facilities which were immaculate and a good way to ensure rest and relaxation in between sightseeing adventures. From a location perspective, the hotel is very convenient to subway and bus lines and is centrally located near many restaurants and shopping.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place to relax and enjoy Gangnam area. Their breakfast is fantastic and their dinner buffet, as well. Transportation and tours of Seoul are easy to obtain. Rooms are very clean and spacious. For those enjoying great Korean food, multiple restaurants are available everywhere and nearby. Across the street saunas are available. Front desk staff are friendly and speak good English. I like their interior design and the Paris Eifel tower replica. For the best and wealthiest people in Seoul, this hotel is the place to stay but at a reasonable price.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I like to stay at Novotel Gangnam during my trips to Seoul. The rooms are nice and clean, the service is good, the breakfast is yummy. This time, however, they somehow forgot my Accor Le Club membership.Not a bit issue so I'll still book my stay at Novotel Gangnam for my next trip.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very beautiful Hotel, breakfast, swimming pool is very good the Concierges, Oscar Jang and french girl, are very efficient and very responsiveThey help us to find good shops and goods restaurant, it's was very pleasantthank you very much, I will come back
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location, with all buses direct to the airport, and metro linesVery good, spacious and modern hotelVery large sauna and spa facilities; one of the best way to relax after long tiring daysVery good service, and special attention, esp. as I was during my birthday :)For business travelers, they have a good executive lounge too
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I chose this hotel because I wanted convenience and easy access from/to Incheon airport because I had tight schedule and this hotel has a stop for the airport limousine bus. I really did not expect much, I just wanted convenience and zero hassle on my escape from everyday work life. lMy return flight was quite early so I needed to take the first bus that is scheduled at 4:42. I checked out at 4:30 AM and waited at the bus stop that is located right outside the lobby. A bus came at 4:40 AM but it’s written Gangnam/COEX so I was not completely sure it was the bus to the airport, and it didn’t stop, and then some staff came out from the lobby making an X sign with his hands to the bus driver so it left. Then I waited a few minutes but no bus came so I asked those staff that made the X sign whether the bus that came earlier was the bus to the airport and IT WAS!! I was so shocked. The staff told me that he searched the lobby beforehand and he found no one so that was why he made the X sign. Okay, so I was wrong because I waited at the bus sign outside the lobby -not inside-. I ended up having to take a taxi in order to reach the airport in time. So I had to pay for the taxi (it’s expensive) and of course I lost the money I paid for airport limousine bus ticket. I felt so regretful at my return journey like I wish I told the staff I needed to catch the bus, or I wish I waited inside the lobby instead of diligently waited at the bus stop, or I wish I just run screaming “airport???” to the bus driver.Other than my regretful return journey experience, other stuff is okay, maybe average. Room is fine, it’s clean, sometimes I heard noises from outside at night, but it wasn’t a problem. I could sleep well. I didn’t use any facilities because that was not my purpose of staying here. There are alot of convenience stores around it’s easy to buy stuff you need. Access to the station is okay (7 minutes walk), but there are closer hotels with cheaper rates that I wished I chose since I had to pay for the taxi anyway.Anyway if you decide to stay I guess it’s not a bad choice but I do recommend you to proactively ask / talk to the staff in order to receive great service. I read another review here that says he did not get anyone welcoming him when he arrived and it was true, the check-in receptionist was the first person I talk to after I dragged my suitcase to the desk. And since I ended up paying much more for the taxi I wish I used that money to stay at a more expensive hotel nearer the station that also has the airport bus stop because I saw a staff waiting outside the lobby to get your suitcase, so maybe I didn’t have to experience such regretful return journey just because I didn’t say hi to the concierge.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Average hotel. Nicely appointed rooms but very average staff. Arrived late evening. No one came out to greet me on arrival. In contrast an Accor exec was met by 6+ staff the following morning! Staff more concerned about managing up than looking after their guests.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location, one hour from the airport when no traffic, close to a very lively street with numerous ressautants and bars, walking distance from a metro station. The choice for breakfast is large and good, but for the croissants and pains au chocolat. It ha stp be noted that there hasn’t been any welcome drink nor room upgrade on presentation on a Gold ACCOR card !When asked why, the answer is we do not apply that....The restaurants offer a good choice but the prices are very high, when you ca get the same in a much better ambiance and half the price in a close by street.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent hotel with very good service and friendly staff. The hotel is very well maintained and even though it is apparently an older hotel all rooms feel fresh and new. Recommended if you need to be in the Gangnam area.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Every time I have a Business trip to Korea, I always choose this Hotel. Excellent service, staff are very accommodating , good food, good location. I will surely comeback and recommend to my colleagues.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I recently spent a few days in Seoul on business and placed myself at the Novotel. The hotel was very nice and well appointed. The staff were friendly and helpful, it has a good location and walking distance to a lot of good local places to eat.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The price is reasonable. The room is very clean and the size is up to standard. There is only a bathtub in the bathroom but no shower tub. There is not enough hooks in the bathroom for hanging clothes as well.Improvement is needed in the lobby concierge, the attendants there calculated the amount of payment wrongly twice during my stay. The first time was during checking in and another time was during checkout. It is unacceptable.There was no bell ball to carry my luggage and open the hotel gate. It is weird in a 5-star hotel.There are numerous bistros and bars in the hotels but it is also weird that the bar closes during saturdays and sundays. I can hardly have a drink at night during my stay.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good rooms, excellent breakfast. Gym with good fitness machines, they also provide you cloth if needed. Nice surprise in the bathroom -just play and discover Hotel has a pub with daily live music. Bus from and to Incheon airport from Korean Airlines. Great service. Just 16k wons (around 15 dollars). Located at walking distance from Gangnam square. Had great 4 nights.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I've been staying in this excellent hotel for the past three years and they very good service and they are very efficient. I have memorable stay every time. I invited friends and my family to experience hotel amenities.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel staff; specially Mr. Park, Ms. Anna and Mr. Aron from concierge were very efficient and have gone all efforts to facilitate all needs.The were very proffissional and super helpful. Will definitely come back to this property when I come back to Seoul.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice hotel about 2-3 blocks away from the main street in Gangnam. Two metro stations are 5-7 mins & 12-15 mins away respectively. Lots of food options starting 5 mins away from the hotel. Airport bus comes directly to the hotel every 30 minutes. The room was decent size and the bed comfortability was just okay. The hotel lobby was nice and had many things going on. Quiet in the hotel room. Breakfast buffet is $40
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall, I had a good five-night stay at Novotel Gangnam back in August. The room was well appointed, cozy, clean and bright, with a comfortable bed. Breakfast was superb, with Korean and American-style options. I got the impression that there was a good mix of business people and families on summer vacation. Room service pricing seemed to be somewhat high. The first day I had a small bottle of Pellegrino water at the hotel cafe, and was charged around USD10. Later I was told by locals that this is pretty much standard in Korean hotels. Regardless to say, I became a regular of a nearby cafe that offered “normal” prices. Location of the hotel was great, with tons of restaurant options in the surrounding area.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You can take airport but from Incheon airport to this hotel easily (the bus will arrive at Lobby). While the hotel is not too far from subway (Sinnonhyeon exit 4). The hotel has big gym which provide sport wear for you (just take only sneaker) also with indoor swimming pool (have to take your own swimming suit). But the sauna and shower - require extra charge (which I think the hotel should not charge on this).The room is not big and still heard some noise from beside the room.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I did not appreciate my stay. this hotel is not rewarding accor hotel club members and were rude about this at reception desk. This neve happens in any other accor hotel i went for business in the world. i was very upset and dissapointed.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was well situated, a stone’s throw away from food street with a a lot of options for dining. Gangnam shopping street was also nearby. It was start of winter and they had switched off the air conditioning. Room was extremely stuffy and hot. So we were left with 2 options. They could bring a fan or we could open the windows. We decided to open the windows. The street noise was quite unbearable. With people shouting til 5am each day. The comfortable beds were with questioned but could not really rest well wit h the noise. But hotel facilities were good.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My son fell very ill on the 3rd day of my family vacation and he needed to see a doctor urgently. Mr Daniel Baek of Guests Relations personally brought us to a clinic nearby and helped us with the translation when the doctor was examining my son as I do not speak Korean. He helped us collect the medication from the pharmacy and sent the medicine to my room. In addition, I had to cancel my skiing plans to Alpensia and he helped me handle the room extension as well as the cancellation of the bookings at Alpensia. Throughout the whole episode, he was caring and patient, always assuring us that things will be ok. My family is very thankful to Daniel for going the extra mile and he definitely did a big part in saving our vacation from becoming a total disaster. Besides Daniel, I met many others in the concierge team who helped me call up clinics, hospitals, and many other things to help make my stay comfortable and easier. I congratulate the hotel for putting together such a great service team and the management must be doing something right. Lastly, I would like to say a big Thank You again to Mr Daniel Baek. My family cannot thank you enough for what you have done for us during our stay.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed 2 nights in this hotel and found it to be a good base from which to explore the Gangnam area. The gym was also large, clean and well equipped, visited mostly by locals who are members of the hotel's health club.However, I was unimpressed by the lukewarm showers (even after a room change) and gaps in the service. For example, I was offered a welcome drink for Accor Plus members at the check in counter (instead of being offered a drink voucher), which turned out to be a gimmicky syrup in a shot glass. The TV controls were also entirely in Korean with no user guide, which made it very difficult to watch any television - a pity considering that the hotel had smart TV. Refinements in these areas would make for a better stay!
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed there night for business trip. Good quality and service. Breakfast well organized and variuos type of food. Suggested at all not only for Business but for tourism, too. Pay attention to the dinner, good quality but high price. Best solution have dinner in Gangnam zone.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s so clean and comfortable but air condition no air out just heater so that why the air is not flow. But in general it’s good. My wife very like this hotel it’s so near from subway and 강넘 shopping zone
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice place with many nearby night activities and friendly staffs. However, the room is a bit small without bath tube. Not much shopping place around the area so suggested for relax only, otherwise, must take taxi to go to other places.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nicley located Hotel ,breakfast is OK for 4 stars hotel ,rooms are also ok ,it is small but it is fine for the rate we go with the bkft ,you can not ask for better deal,hotel staff as every where in korea super professional and friendly ,it is my first time there but wont be last ,i love the hotel ,,but i wish i could have next time bigger room.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel close to the main shopping area of Gangnam. Staff is friendly and diligent. Excellent breakfast and I really appreciated to have soy milk for my coffee. We stayed 3 nights and we went every evening to the swimming pool : quiet place and with all necessary amenities and stuffs.Special mention for the room service: food is delicious (I got Korean set menu and also udon soup).There are a few negative points, which can be considered very personal: room (premier executive twin) is a bit small and I could hear the traffic down from the road (I am a light sleeper) even thru my earplugs. Anyway this hotel is an excellent choice with an elegant Frenchy touch.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything was just perfect also in my 4th stay here.It is one of those hotels where management and staff take care of every details in a pleasant way.Clean spacious elegant bedroom with a nice sight of the city. Extremely comfortable mattress and cushions. Quiet with no noise whatsoever, notwithstanding it was full.User friendly lovely spacious shower.Large breakfast area with plenty of dishes. Lots of fruit, both freshly cut, and whole. Local delicious food, as well as anything a western visitor would like to eat.Friendly and very helpful staff.The only item I can criticise is the liquid soap that was too aggressive on my skin, so I used the shampoo instead. But that is all.Fast lift (never have to wait for the lift, nor spend ages stopping at all floors).Fast internet connection.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The experience was fine. The rooms are clean, the beds and pillows are comfortable. One small matter is the drain of the bathtub because is not evacuating the water smoothly. As for the breakfast, it is quite complete. The service in general is fine.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed a few nights for business and leisure. Those taking the airport limousine bus would find this very convenient, it stops right at the hotel driveway.The staffs are all extremely helpful, friendly and speaks good english.the location is also quite convenient to subway (Sinnonhyeon 4mins down slope and Gangnam 10mins).One can find food easily everywhere even without going over to Gangnam central area.But i was shocked by the baby cockroaches in the carpeted room, esp near the curtains.The tub and vanity tables are also not the cleanest I've seen in a 4-star hotel.Definitely overpriced.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice staff and welcome. Lobby is nice and warmly . Best crroissant in Seoul from the small cafeteria. Rooms comfortable. I did not have the opportunity to use restaurants , so I can't judge , but the lobby bar around the Eiffel Tour is great for a casual meeting. Location ideal !
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel in a perfect location with easy metro access! Gangnam is around the corner with great restaurants and bars. Everyone was extremely polite and professional. Concierge helped with tours and maps! Breakfast was delicious. Would definitely stay again if I am ever in Seoul.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had stayed 10 day in Novotel! Is good location! Thanks for free upgrade to superior room Hotel room is clean, modern & comfy . Staff is good & helpful ! It was good stay !! Will be bck again .
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the second time I've stayed here. The last time they were renovating and I had an older room which was tired and there was noise from the renovating. The rooms have all been updated now (to my knowledge) and it looked smarter and fresher. The bed was comfortable and the room was very clean. International adaptors were in the room which are great for international travellers and I liked the small side couch seat which gave a nice alternative to sitting on the bed or an office chair. The breakfast was excellent as well as the buffet lunch, the conference facilities were very good and things ran smoothly. It was a convenient location being just 150 meters from a metro station and the main road of Gangnam shops etc.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good amenities and service in a convenient location near the Sinnonhyeon subway stop. This hotel features an extensive fitness centre. I found the restaurant and room service offerings a bit limited, but the hotel is a block away from a bustling restaurant and bar area.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I went there one week ago with my family and my friends.The hotel is in Gangnam and it’s clean and the rooms are comfortable.It’s a little old.The only thing that I didn’t like was the indoor pool which was very small and we could enter in the pool just once.For breakfast there is a buffet but I waited for 20 minutes because there were too many people!The food quality is good and there are a lot of things (korean, croissant, bread, american breakfast etc.)There are a lot of good restaurants near the hotel. I asked the hotel staff and they recommended me a very nice restaurant.The only thing that ruined everything was when I left a very important book in my hotel room. When I got back, I called the hotel and they told me that they didn’t find any book. They probably threw it away. But I know that it’s against the rules throwing away things left by the guests in the hotel. They have to keep them for a period of time and when no one calls back, they can threw it away.I’m very disappointed.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located in a residential area in the city south. It takes 5-10min to a few main shopping or business streets/districts by taxi from the hotel without any traffic. Closed a metro station line 9(walking around 10min from the hotel)Room is compact, clean, quiet. Walk in shower is smart. Disturbingly soft mattress and pillows which had got me a severe back pain that actually badly affected my work during the stay.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Pros: 노보텔 강남은 내 집처럼 편안한 호텔임. Staff Training 이 엄청 잘 되어있고 친절함 (1) 조식 뷔페가 오전 6시부터 여서 편안함. 6시 반 보다 훨씬 편리 Buffet Breakfast from 6 am at Square restaurant. 6 am opening of Square restaurant is very convenient, a lot better than 6 30 am opening. Novotel Gangnam appeared to be Air France Air attendant hotel. Early in the morning, many Air France Air attendants are having breakfast at Square restaurant. (2) Executive floor hotel room fridge items are free of charge (beer, 2 bottles of mineral water, sparkling mineral water, Lemonade, nuts, orange juice etc. (3) Easy access to Incheon/ domestic airports . Incheon Airport Limousine Bus directly goes from Novotel Gangnam to Incheon Airport (50 minutes - 1 hour 10 minutes/ when there is no terrible traffic jam) Airport Limousine Bus route had been changed and the time to the airport shortened. (2) Recently I found an alternative way. I check in my check in baggage at CALT (City Airport Service) located in Samsung-dong. I catch airport Limousine from CALT . It takes around 15 mins from Novotel Gangnam to CALT by taxi. The advantage of this way is that I can get seat number early + already check- in baggage at CALT. This way can substantially save time at the airport, avoiding a long queue at Incheon Airport.(3) From subway station (Line number 9) - direct line to domestic airport (4) VIP Lounge on Level 16 Happy Hour dish quality is very good. Many people have dinners there with free good selection of red/ white wine/ champagne, beer, sparkling mineral water, nuts, cheese etc as well as small buffet style dishes selection (5 pm - 7 pm). (5) Mr David Jung/ Front Senior Manager is excellent - professional + trustworthy character + commitment to guests & to Novotel Gangnam Hotel.Cons: Walking from the nearest subway station, it takes around 5 - 8 mins, but it is uphill. With carriers, it is a bit tired. I prefer to catch a taxi from the Station. Taxi fare is around $ 3.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have lived this hotel again in July and still felt the hotel is in super quality. We felt much appreciation to Mr. David Jung and Mr. Tyler Song in Front Office. Their nice personality and sincere make us a good mermory till this moment. Besides, we need to thanks to the cook in restaurants, especially one cook who had weaed black uniform (we do not know his name). His happy simley face and kind assistance made us very comfortable and pleasure while we were having the breakfast. We must live to your hotel again when we'll plan to go to Seoul next time.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I read the reviews but this hotel was better than I expected. It is possible to have a good stay at a hotel because you can get lucky and nothing goes wrong. Not this lovely hotel. I was regularly interacting with the staff, never to complain though, and it’s really a great place to stay. I travelled with my two sons (18 and 11years).I mentioned to a manager at reception that I did not get a view from my room and next day we were moved to a higher floor with great views.My special thanks to Irene at Concierge. She is very kind and knows her stuff. She had ideas for things to do and gave good directions, talking to the taxi drivers for us in Korean where needed. When my 11 year old dropped his iPhone 7 in a taxi, she did everything to help us although the taxi driver claimed he did not find it. A tip: always get the receipt from the taxi driver. His telephone number is on it and you can call if you leave anything in the car. In our case we didn’t do this but Irene used our credit card details to trace the driver. What a girl! The others at the concierge were equally nice and helpful.We used the restaurant at lobby level and bought cake from the snack bar next to it. All was great. Room Service was a good choice and tasty. The Square restaurant I found a nice place to eat but probably expensive. There was an issue with cancelling my deposit but another manager stepped in and sorted it out. I like these managers and the fact that can actually make decisions. A walk down the hill to the left of the hotel takes you to the stations. It’s a nice shopper’s walk to Gangnam station. A walk to the right is pleasant in the evening and if you go far enough you’ll arrive at the COEX. All in all, a lovely stay at this hotel in Seoul.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Novotel It's always my choice when I'm travelling for business in Korea in Gangnam Area. Hotel is very clean and people are very efficient. I always need to be helped by Concierge since I use to take taxi many times with a lot of haevy bags and Irene and all the staff was very patient. Sauna and fitness are super whenever I have spare time .. For European standard I can only say that lounge bar it's quite expensive... a thea or a coffee approx 10 euro it's really amazing but it's tha same everywere in 5 stars hotel there..by the way reception was very kind has given me 2 free light drink and flexible late check out. next time I'll be back for sure !!
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's a good place to stay at Seoul. Hotel is close to MRT station and lots of restaurant around this area. The only one disadvantage is the facilities of this hotel are not new, and some of them are old.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I typically don't like Novotel Hotels but like others, this one is modern, in a great location with excellent staff -- but most of all it has one of the best Housekeeping staffs I've seen. I'm a bit messy when I travel but everyday i returned to an immaculate and organized room. I even met the housekeeping manager Sophie who was wonderful and made my stay feel like home (which given how much I travel is priceless). Highly recommend this place.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is my go to place when staying in Gangnam Seoul. The staff is always very friendly and helpfull when serving you. The rooms are well maintaned and look great. The breakfast is delicious and the options are good.Location of the hotel is also very good.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was booked into a room very close to a night club down below the hotel that was playing very loud music (In connection to the world cup) However it was so loud I couldn't sleep so I asked to be moved and was upgraded to the 16th floor and executive lounge access. Thank you that was much appreciated.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is between 2 subway stations so it involves a not so comfortable uphill walk. Stayed 5 nights in an executive room on the 15th floor. Service at the main desk is excellent. There is a free 5 to 7pm nibbles & drink at the lounge on the 16th floor. A good place to relax. Wine selection is very average. Only one white wine is drinkable. The room is spacious, clean, newish and modern. Bathroom amenities are average. There is a coffee capsule machine but limited to 2 capsules a day. A complimentary bar fridge with 5 items but not replenish daily as promised. Housekeeper sometimes forgot to replenish reusable bathroom items so had to call. Room temperature is the hardest to adjust. Often too cold or too hot.Breakfast buffet is pretty good with both eastern & western but very similar every day. Service is average.Gangnam area is a place for young people especially in the eating/drinking & shopping areas. Did not see too many tourists, mainly for local people to hang out I guess.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel has modern look and near club area which is probably good if you like partying on weekend, but the place it self is on a hill which is you need to hike about 20 min from station to there. But the room was comfortable and really nice. The only unpleasant in here is the lack of service. I told them im gonna spend my birthday night there and ask if i could have a complimentary birthday cake and they told me i cant. Fortunately i move to grand ambassador seoul associated with pullman and they really made my day, give me an upgrade to executive room which is the highest floor and also give me 2 birthday cake and a bottle of wine for the complimentary. So if you gonna book accor hotel i reccomend you to go to grand ambassador seoul instead, they also provide free shuttle bus to myeongdong and dongdaemun as well, Not like this hotel.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Ambassador Seoul Gangnam
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is in a legal battle and states that they sent an email but there is no such thing! My friend also booked a reservation 1 month prior and did not receive an email. They are turning away customers. I had to pay an extra $160.00 AND reserve a subpar hotel at the last minute!
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolute chaos ! Police, Firetrucks, lobby full of shouting people. As mentioned in the previous review, the hotel has been in a court battle with the owners of the rooms. The rooms have now been repossessed by the owners and guests are told to leave as locks will be changed. We had to move to a different hotel this afternoon, terrible. Under no circumstances should you book this hotel at the moment !
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Please can someone explain how this is a 4 star hotel, nothing about this place is a 4 star from the moment you enter the lobby until you enter your room. The pictures posted on line are so false , rooms are so old, be aware when you book , station no so near as you think as long walk underground when you find the entrance .Everything in bathroom broken and dirty, please not a 4 star, any Ibis is far better than this .The front door looks like a prison Rooms only cleaned after 4 pm. Towels like hard sand paper . Only good thing airport bus dropped us off outside, cost 16,000 each , going back to airport took metro for 4800 each , took same amount of time , Nothing special about food courts downstairs Husband west to look at breakfast and ran back to room it's set up in corridor and you eat in a couple of bedrooms in the top floor.No gym... nothingSo again how did they get their 4 stars Please don't waste your time here spend a few £ more and go elsewhere , wish we had done
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I ran out of points for the Hilton so we moved to the Ramada for one night. It was close to all the shopping areas and conveniently serviced by the KAL Limousine bus to/from Incheon Airport. Our room was quite large and shaped like an L with one leg for the beds and the other a living room. It felt like 2 rooms in one but the condition was just average and could stand an update as it was dark inside and a little worn. The bathroom was functional but cracked tiles and mold was noticeable.Our rate did not include breakfast but there was a nearby convenience store and Subways sandwich shop. However, we went back towards Seoul station for a better meal.Service was acceptable and they gladly stored our bags while we wandered around Seoul before come back to catch our bus.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is central, Rooms clean, No room service available only breakfast, Near Seoul station & city hall, (city hall station slightly closer, 3 English tv stations only sport & news, Starbucks & subway next to the hotel, Coffee shop in the hotel, selling pastries, rooms have bath & over the shower, bathroom each day shower cap, comb,shampoo,shower gel, shower cap,Beds are great, Wifi is quick
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked this hotel for 7 nights on our annual family holiday. The photos looked recent and the rate from booking.com was OK for a 4 star hotel not far from the shopping district. Airport limo bus dropped us at the doorstep. This hotel has no porter so don't expect any help with your luggage from your transportation to the reception and your room. We booked a 3 single bed room and was told we had been upgraded free to a 4 bed room (always a good start) and we were quickly checked in (great). The room was a lot more dated than the website photos but was clean. The hotel provided a baby cot on request and we were happy. There are no toothbrushes or toothpaste provided. Although there is free water, a kettle, in room wifi, slippers and bathrobes. Also no Minibar but this is not an issue for me. Aircon was very good too. The TV had 2 English channels & 28 Korean channels. So bring your own movie/TV entertainment... The mattresses were a bit hard and the pillows too soft but neither caused me too much stress as we were so tired after each day's activities. An issue that was a deal breaker was the glass shower stall that leaked water all across the floor. It was dangerous after 2 people had showered and we had to put towels down to walk safely.... Not nice to walk on soggy cold towels and quite unhygienic. To their credit, when I mentioned the shower the next day to reception, the staff quickly offered to switch us to another room and let us inspect it first for suitability. We switched rooms to one with a bath tub & basic plastic shower curtain. The only other minor grip is that the square shallow sinks leave water all over the counter top.Staff were friendly and helpful. Spoke good English. They were very nice and provided great service. Extra towels were never a problem and always delivered quickly. We had a wifi issue in the second room and someone arrived to fix it within 5 minutes.Overall we stayed the full 7 nights since it was clean... Just not up to the standards of other 4 star hotels I've stayed in. It's 3.5 stars at best.Is an adequate hotel. But I wouldn't stay here unless I got a fantastic deal.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There are 2 Ramada hotels in Seoul. One is located in Dongdaemun called Ramada Seoul Dongdaemun, and the other Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun. Check in and check out is fast and did not require a deposit. They allow late check out until 1pm. Charge 24,200 Korean Won/hr until 5pm. Incheon Airport Bus stops right in front of the hotel every 30 minutes but stops operating at 6:50pm. If your plane is arriving past 7pm until early hours you will have to take the night bus located just outside the airport gates. The night bus drops you off at Lotte Mall beside City Hall, 20-30 minute walking distance to the hotel. We were told not to worry about homeless people sleeping on the streets during wee hours. It feels safe to walk around Seoul.The hotel interior and room is quite dated but serviceable. The lobby sofas are badly creased but comfortable, room aircon cold and can be adjusted accordingly. Wifi in room is free and very fast. Bed is old, sags in the middle but still comfortable. The 2 pillows provided were both too soft for me.Not much of a view too. Hotel receptionists are pleasant and helpful, speaks little English. Bring your own toothbrush but other amenities are provided. I suggest you bring your own slippers as the tiled floor gets cold and slippers provided are not the disposable ones. They seem to have been used by many other prior guests, mine has a heel indent. Note that during winter the aircon is turned off (December to February) verify months with hotel to be sure.There is a Coffee Bean at the lobby but it is close holidays and Sundays. The hotel has a restaurant at the 24th floor and local restaurants at the basement all of which closes at 8pm, closed holidays and Sundays. There are 3 convenient stores right outside, a Subway, a Starbucks ,2 local bars and some local eatery around the corner that remain open until late.Ramada Nandaemun is a 10 minute walk to Nandaemun market. Most shops and restaurants close at 6-8pm but street vendors remain open selling food and other wares stay open. There is a place in Nandaemun market that stay open late called Food alley. Always a taxi on standby outside Ramada in case you are too tired to walk or going far. Subways station is walking distance. Other places of interest such as Insadong, Gwanghamun Gate, Bukchon (which are all near each other) is also nearby.Do not expect luxury and great ambience. It is a not-so convenient place to sleep and rest.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We usually visit Korea at least twice a year and our hotel of choice is Ramada. Maybe because we are already familiar with the place and its location is near to the train station and some tourist destinations in Seoul.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spacious rooms ,excellent location . Close to all tourist land marks . Walking distance to namdeam market. Breakfast is ok . Restaurant is in a narrow passage . Room is clean and good. Bus stop is 100 mtr away. Nice hotel to stay and explore old Seoul area.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Travelling for business. Good standard for the room: good size, clean and with good amenities: bath and shower gel, comb, bath robe. The position is perfect to move around the city with public transport. unfortunatelly the room is not good acoustich isolated from outside noise: you can ear till late eve car jam and train noise. Very low the quality of breakfast: not so much food available for western people, we payed around 14€ each day, when you can eat for few dollars way better in the backery shop downstairs or in the front door convenience store.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were upgraded at the front desk. The room was large and the equipments were OK.The bush room was also nice and there was a buth tub.It seems there are restaurants in the same building but they were closed though some outside ones were opened.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: - Excellent hotel for stay in the heart of Seoul Downtown- Hotel provided me early check-in @ 1pm and late checkout @ 2pm on request.- Staff is very co-operative- City Hall and Seoul station metro are walking distance - Myeongdong and Namdaemun markets are walking distance.- Wonderful property and recommend to everyone
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed 7 days. The location is in the middle of Seoul and the public transportation is 5-10 mins away walking distance. The hotel is clean and very convenient to walk to palace, major subway and train station, shopping (myungdong and Namdaemun are walking distance). I would stay the hotel again when I visit Korea.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The rooms are very big and clean, with a small kitchen and washing machine, the location is also good close to Seoul Station. Breakfast is good but could have more variety, in general a good choice for your stay in Seoul.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in this hotel 1 week on a business visit. The hotel was absolutely spotless, fine room with a kitchen and a washing machine and kettle but no dishes or cutlery, which was a bit strange. Bathroom was very clean with a good shower - towels could have been a bigger but absolutely spotlessly clean and cleaned everyday. TV had a good choice of English movies and there was an electric adaptor supplied. Overall this hotel was very satisfactory. Close to the train station and the shuttle service that goes to the airport. It is clearly a banking area so there are lots of coffee shops and places to sit It is also conveniently located to the market area which is close by. Breakfast was very good with a spectacular view from the 25th floor the Sky Lounge and at 19 won it was good value for money and set you up for the whole day. There is no bar area the hotel just a coffee shop in the main reception so they don't do any of food other than breakfast but there is a number of good choice eateries below the hotel in the food court with many different small restaurants all serving different types of Korean food from as little as 7 won. Overall I think it's a very good facility with lovely gracious staff in nice safe surroundings.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location, quiet but central with lots of food/coffee options nearby. Shower was not good though turning hot/cold continuously no matter what setting it was on and more like a spray hose than shower.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Bus from airport dropped us off at the doors of Ramada Hotel which was great. Not only was our room ready for an early check in but we were given a complimentary upgrade to a suite which was amazing since we had two children. The room was spacious with plenty of storage, a kitchen and a washing machine. Clean rooms and hotel with friendly staff. Nice coffee shop in the lobby and there is a food court in the basement of the building. There are two restaurants on the street level attached to the hotel. There was also 2 convenience stores and a Starbucks attached to the building. Walking distance to Seoul Station, less than 10 minute walk.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked in advance online for 2 nights stay. When we arrived about 6pm, everything was ready. Staff at reception speaks English and very friendly and helpful. Room is very spacious, clean and comfortable. Good location, Coffee Bean at Lobby Ground Floor, convenience stores nearby, some nice Food Court at lower ground floor, some local restaurants nearby, walking distance to Seoul Station, Lotte Outlets, walking distance Namdaemun market.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The staffs are very kind. Though we traveled with our mother is over 80, its were really comfortable to stay. The junior suite room we could stay had an enough space for 3 adults. This hotel is near the Seoul station and the Cityhall station to be convinient for shopping and eating out.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel staff is very attentive and nice. The hotel has big rooms, a bit outdated, dim lights, the bathroom also a bit outdated. The bed was very comfy , a king size. There are amenities in the room, kettle and some tea/ coffee, a mineral water. The power plug is a plus, they have one for multinational purpose. The bathroom, they have some amenities and a hair drier. Overall, the rooms could have better lighting. The breakfast is in the top floor. I would say it is ok, simple Western and some Korean options. There are convenience stores very close to the hotel and a Starbucks however these close around 10PM and on Sundays. It is a 15 min walk to the Seoul station and 10 min walk to the City Hall subway station. The Nandaemun market is also is also a walking distance, 10-15 min. If you are keen , you could walk to the Guanghwanmun Gate.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is great and convenient. You can walked to the department store, markets and convenient for tours picked up as well. Also, there are restaurants below the hotel and food store across the streets like 7 Eleven in the U.S.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good-Good location Friendly staffNice amenities Great housekeepingWasher/dryer in roomBad-Outdated, tired roomsHot water took 3 minutes to get warmDimly lit room and bathroom Toilet malfunctioned twiceHad kitchenette but no plates or small sample of silverware, odd it isn’t supplied.Would stay again if I had to.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Big room, big bed. Very comfotable.Smooth Wi-FiNo toothbrush and toothpasteGood location near Seoul Station.CVS and Starbucks on the front level.Food court on the basement level. Close before 9PMPlug converter affordable
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We liked the location and the room, our room even had a kitchenette. The only downside was there was no air-conditioning for some reason? We had to open the windows and thank goodness it was winter so room cooled down. But I would make sure this works prior to booking again In summer as we wouldn't be able to stand it room was sooo hot in winter. Everything else was satisfactory. Front desk was the best part super helpful and nice lobby.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location, near from seoul station and easy to go everywhere in seoul. There are convinience store outside the hotel and very helpful for your daily needs (GS25 and See U). KKanbu Chicken next to GS25 provide delicious fried chicken with good postion to share with your family....If you a coffee lover like me, coffee beans are available at the hotel lobby and starbucks near the hotel. Sure we want to go back here. The minus for us is the hotel gave us room without a view (1017).... :-(
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was very nice and cheap. We took about 10 min walk to the trains station. It is very central and well located! loads of restaurants around. Rooms are very clean and modern and staff helpful. Nice for a short stay
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The toilet shld be renewed like replacing bath tubeThe ceiling fan cover drop of toilet suddenly on my second stay It’s terrible As a whole the room is big enough n tidy n clean I plan to come again in 2020 during CNY
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were transiting through Seoul and had to stay for a night. We chose Ramada based knots location to the KTX station, Seoul. The place has excellent accessibility by the Airport Limousine buses which halt right at the lobby of the hotel. The check-in was easy and the rooms were very spacious. The room air conditioning was a bit difficult to understand as it did not function, despite using all sorts of switches- so we had to open the windows in the night for some decent temperature control! The breakfast spread is quite nice. The staff is very courteous and helped us with a Jumbo Taxi to station as we were short on time. Would love to come back to this place again, though!
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Perfect location, near Seoul Station. Friendly staff. Conveniently located near convenience stores, markets and transport. Aside from the fact that it is conveniently located, there are great views of the city. Would definitely consider staying here again.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I like this hotel. Location is great, close to shopping, dining and transportation. The food court on the basement is easily accessible. Large room size, good amenities and clean. Staff are courteous and helpful.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun

review_body: The rooms already excelent and comfortable but when I stay there there is a problem with wifi connection need more improvement, the bath rooms was clean, the bed is clean and comfortable the location is in good location.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun

review_body: Reception Desk was KindThis Hotel is Best Location, So Convenient for go to any Where/Train Station, Namdaemoon, Namsan Tower, Myung- Dong, Gwang Hwa-moon,Duk Soo-Goong, Namdae-moon Market,,,Shower Room is Door, Block Out Water.Large Room and View City from Window,

27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun

review_body: The hotel had all without the toothbrush. Good access from the airport. It is very convenient that it is near Seoul station.Because it is easy to go where you go, it was very good as a base hotel..satisfaction
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good locations, 2minute walk from Seoul Station, good Korean Fried Chicken restaurant next door and public and Starbucks.Staff really friendly and offer shuttle to / from the airport every 30mins (at a cost) Rooms where dated and showing a bit of wear and tear but overall excellent value for money.There was some dust in places - clean but maybe not spotless! Overall if I was after value for money over anything else I would 100% stay here again ans recommend to friends and family to stay too
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun

review_body: Old style standard 3-4 stars hotel with very good location + Good staff + Food court on b1 floor + Golf and sauna (extra charge)Good for short stay- no breakfast - no swimming pool- no atmTank you!
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location and walking distance to namdaemun night market and myeondong. Just across the hotel a nice korean bbq resto and also bahn pho viet resto. Beside the hotel are nice resto and pubs. Basement foodcourt with couple of good resto. Worth the money for this hotel. Can't ask for more
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: · Love the spacious room for me & family . Just about 10 mins walk to train stations & shopping areas like Myeongdong , Lotte Mart etc . 3 convenience stores just below the hotel plus lots of restaurants with yummy food . Love the Kkanbu Chicken Restaurant that serves delicious fried chix . Plus point is the KAL bus from Incheon Airport stop directly at the hotel . Hotel staff was so kind to allow us earlier check in . A million thanks . Check in & out was fast & easy . Love the heated flooring especially during this winter season .
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I made a reservation to enjoy the vacation with my friends. Although you upgraded my room, I changed my room three times, not the room I wanted, but the staff informed me of my irritation and changed it.The room was warm and neat. Bedding was cozy, but the bathroom was a little messy.The nearby facilities were convenient, but the only view outside the window was a building.I'm willing to drop by again.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very close to seoul station. The room is clean, fast check in and check out. Many restaurants nearby, not far from Nam daemun market. Helpful staff you can ask them to call black taxi (driver can speak English)
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My first time staying in this hotel with my family. We love it. The best part is the location. it is about 10 minutes walk to either Seoul station or City Hall Station. It's also very close to the Deoksugung and Namdaemun market. There are 2 convenient stores and a Starbucks next to the hotel. The room is clean and bigger than other hotels. Hotel staff are helpful. My only complaint is that tooth paste and tooth brush are only available for purchase. I ended up buying one from the convenient store.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Older hotel but huge rooms, comfortable beds and all the amenities you would need are provided. About a 7 min walk to Seoul Station (and Lotte Mart). Only drawback is you'd have to walk/bus/taxi everywhere else in downtown Seoul as taking the trains from Seoul station is somewhat of a detour. However, front desk staff are friendly and extremely helpful in providing directions to everything.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ramada is located within walking distance from Seoul station and the lively Myeongdong. The room is very spacious and decent. There are few breakfast places within the vicinity of the hotel as well.Recommended!
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is near to Seoul Station and subway station but we took cab most of the time because the weather was too cold to walk. KAL Limousine bus to and fro Incheon Airport stops right in front of the hotel. 24-hr convenience stores are just steps away from the hotel.While I change hotel room due to last minute extended stay, the hotel upgraded me to a bigger room shortly after the check-in time is due as the room type that I have initially booked is still not available. I am impressed by the pro-active customer service.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location is fantastic. Walking distance to Seoul station, City hall(exit 9) and Namdaemun market. There's kannabu chicken restaurant and eating shops in the hotel basement. Fortunately it was snowing two days before we fly off. There s small park behind the hotel for my kids to play around in the snow.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very comfortable and spacious. Most of all the room is quite big, and the place is near the Seoul Station as well. There were an extra bed, and it looked like a bedroom and a living room, kitchen altogether, which was very good.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very convenient location near (within walking distance) to the Seoul Train Station, Namdaemun, and quick subway or bus ride to Dongdaemun. Room was comfortable with plenty of room. Hotel staff were professional and very helpful. We would definitely stay there again.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staffs at front desk are not good in communicate in English. In addition, I asked for packing tape and they said I only allow to use it in the lobby. I can't imagine how could a hotel ask the guest to pack stuffs in HOTEL LOBBY! Even I wrote an email to the hotel to address the problem and they even not responding.I won't recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very nice hotel, good services and kind crew, everything for a very good value for money. Nearby there is a very nice night market and a lot of restaurants Unfortunately there is no possibility to have breakfast at the hotel.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The stay was fine but just that when i request for early check-in by 2 hours. I was been charged.During my check-out period,, i was siiting at the lobby waiting for the bus till 1pm, and noticed that most of the guest is not charge. I hope it is consistent in the charging rule of your hotel. Overall, the stay was all good.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Me and my friend stayed at this wonderful Hotel for 6 nights this September (2018) and the room, the staff were amazing. If you go down there is a great food court.The location is great and there is 2 main subway Station
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I made a booking for 4 rooms and lucky to be upgraded to a larger rooms. The rooms are so huge and comfy. The location is closeby the Seoul train station. We can actually walk to Myeongdong and Namdaemun from the hotel and also travel by public buses. 24 hours convenient shop and restaurant are just on the ground floor of the hotel. The fried chicken restaurant are so delicious.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: One year ago, I stayed here & reviewed them in Tripadvisor. This time, we are back here again & they never failed us. The staff service is still excellent, rooms were extra spacious & clean. They were kind enough to allow our huge luggage kept in their storage while we went away for a short trip outside Seoul. The difference from last year is they no longer have free shuttle service to some Metro Stations.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was lucky enough to be upgraded to a suite. It was huge and had a small kitchen and washing machine as well as a lounge and massive bathroom and bedroom. Lovely bed and sheets. Walkable to the station as well as City Hall, which I regard as the centre of Seoul. Ive put mid range but its probably towards luxury. I can comment on the restaurants as I didn't use them.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: No frills but situated in a area convenient for sightseeing and lots of restaurants nearby. Washing machine in room came in handy. Airport bus stops in front of hotel. Staff pleasant and helpful. Room was quite large too. Enjoyed our stay there. Definitely visiythe night market in Abour 2 kilometers from the hotel. Lots of great street food.
hotelName:
27    Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Seoul Namdaemun
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is right in the heart of things yet quiet inside. The front desk is very kind and helpful. There are many restaurants, coffee houses and shopping possibilities very close. The breakfast was good and varied every morning. The air conditioning was much appreciated after a day of touring in warm weather. I would stay here again.
hotelName:
28    Metro Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at the same hotel when i was in Seoul end of June. As expected, it did not disappoint me. My rooms clean and neat. Service staff is excellent. Only setback is the check in is at 3pm which after long flight make me very tiring and need a rest.
hotelName:
28    Metro Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Checked in 11th to 16th June 2019. Room was very spacious and clean. Room amenities were topped up daily and cleaned. Loved the fact that this hotel is smacked in Myeongdong shopping district and right beside Euljiro1-ga station.Lots of amenities nearby with Starbucks, 7-eleven at the lobby and lots of food around the hotel. Breakfast was acceptable, nothing lavish but not short changing. Staff were genuinely friendly and courteous. In short, will return to stay here in future for sure.
hotelName:
28    Metro Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 4 days before moving to another hotel in Gangnam. Myeongdong was definitely the better location with lots more energy. The street food was a highlight and closer to many attractions and markets with a couple of close by subway stations. You only need to step out of the hotel to be in the buzz so a good location. The room was modern well equipped and big enough. It was also quiet considering the area. We took the breakfast option with the room that was pretty good and varied in comparison to many hotels. A really good option for a Myeongdong stay.
hotelName:
28    Metro Hotel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel room was clean with well-stocked amenities. As I booked through their official website, it came with free breakfast and tax refund. The breakfast was decent. The location was excellent as it is smack right in the Myeongdong shopping hub especially if you are into skincare and cosmetics. Not to mention it is within walking distance to Gyeongbokgung Palace. Their staff had been super friendly and helpful throughout my stay. Special mention to manager Sky Song who greeted us when we were having breakfast and offered to let us have a humidifier in our room upon knowing that my baby son had flu.
